Dzięki darmowej aplikacji Pyszne.pl zamówisz jedzenie z dowolnej restauracji w Twoim mieście.Aplikacja mobilna Pyszne.pl to odpowiedź na brak chęci do gotowania, imprezę z przyjaciółmi czy lunch w pracy – pizzeria, restauracja czy sushi bar - zamów jedzenie z dowozem z ponad 4.000 lokalii z całej Polski, np. z sieci Da Grasso, Gruby Benek, Biesiadowo, Dominium, Amrit czy Sensi Sushi.Pyszne.pl to przede wszystkim wygodna aplikacja, która umożliwia zamawianie jedzenia na telefon z dostawą do każdego miejsca – do domu, pracy czy do parku u ponad 4.000 restauracji z dowozem.Aplikacja mobilna Pyszne.pl to same zalety zamawiania jedzenia online z dowozem✔ Twoje ulubione lokale, pizzerie i restauracje w jednym miejscu. Pizzeria Dagrasso, Gruby Benek, Dominium, Biesiadowo, Pizza Station, Banolli, Fabryka Pizzy, restauracje Amrit Kebab, Noodle w Pudle, Banolli czy 77 Sushi i wiele innych – w naszej ofercie mamy ponad 4.000 restauracji. Nie ważne czy jesteś/jesz w Warszawie, Wrocławiu, Krakowie czy Poznaniu...✔ Wszystkie dania w jednej aplikacji – pizza online, kebab, sushi, hamburgery! A może dzisiaj obiad domowy lub kuchnia chińska, indyjska, japońska, amerykańska?✔ Bezpieczne metody płatności: online (PayU, karty kredytowej, PayPal czy Sofortbanking) lub gotówka przy odbiorze.✔ System punktów lojalnościowych Pyszne.pl - zbieraj punkty za swoje zamówienia i wymieniaj je na ekskluzywne kupony i rabaty u naszych partnerów lub kupony na jedzenie.✔ Restauracje i lokale portalu – pizza, sushi, kebab i inne ulubione dania jeszcze taniej – nasi partnerzy mają codziennie nowe indywidualne oferty dla Ciebie!✔ Nie wiesz jaką restaurację wybrać? LiveSoccer es una aplicación gratuita de fútbol que permite seguir las principales ligas de fútbol del mundo, como La Liga, Champions League, y Liga Europa, y obtener notificaciones en tiempo real de sus equipos favoritos en todas las competiciones.LiveSoccer ya ha conquistado a los aficionados de todo el mundo:“Good app, very accurate, up to date and sleek UI.”“Per gli amanti del calcio è davvero una bellissima app.”“Indispensável para os verdadeiros fãs de futebol.”“5 sterren. Goede app”Con una interfaz de usuario rica y diseñado pensando en que sea fácil de usar, tendrá el fútbol en vivo en sus manos.Usando LiveSoccer puede seguir en directo los partidos de más de 350 ligas de todo el mundo, incluindo la Liga Europa, Champions League, y Copa America.CARACTERÍSTICAS:• Seguimiento de partidos en directo de más de 350 ligas de fútbol del mundo.• Notificaciones personalizadas de eventos en vivo (objetivos, resultados finales , tarjetas amarillas / rojas , sustituciones y más) para todos los equipos.• Idiomas disponibles: Inglés , portugués , español.• Textos basados en eventos en vivo y comentarios de periodistas profesionales.• Alineaciones del partido, incluyendo fotos de los jugadores.• Análisis del partido ¨Head2Head¨.• Estadísticas del partido.• Personalizar ligas favoritas para localizarlos fácilmente.• y mucho más!Únase a nosotros en Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/livesoccerapp) o síganos en Twitter (@LiveSoccerApp) para conocer las últimas noticias sobre la aplicación y el mundo del fútbol.LiveSoccer incluye:• Todas las competiciones nacionales como la Premier League inglesa , la Serie A italiana, la Primera División de España, Primeira Liga de Portugal, la Serie A de Brasil ( Brasileirão) , la Bundes Liga alemana, la liga francesa y competiciones internacionales como la Liga de Campeones de la UEFA y la UEFA Europa League.• Miles de clubes, como el Real Madrid, Chelsea , Barcelona, Benfica, Manchester United , FC Porto, Arsenal y muchos más.• También puede seguir las estadísticas de miles de jugadores, entre ellos a sus favoritos como Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, Radamel Falcao , Gareth Bale, Andrés Iniesta, Philipp Lahm , Neymar, Luis Suárez, Franck Ribery , Sergio Busquets, y muchos más!

The Nike+ Running App tracks your runs and helps you reach your goals -- whether it’s running your first race, or setting a new personal record. From first-time runners to marathon veterans, you'll get the measurement and motivation you need to run farther and faster than ever before. Welcome to the world’s greatest running community. TRACK YOUR PROGRESSStay on track, no matter where you are. On the trail, treadmill, or streets, MotionX® combines your phone’s GPS and accelerometer for the most accurate tracking of your of your distance, pace and time. Measure your progress every mile with in-run audio feedback.STAY MOTIVATEDShare your runs and let your friends keep you going with cheers along the way. Show off your Nike+ level color and amp things up with a PowerSong at the press of a button.COMPARE AND COMPETENothing's as motivating as a little friendly competition. *****It’s free!Winner's Soccer Evo Elite , now totally Free!*****What’s new :a.The World Cup will last forever! From now on, every score and goal you get will be recorded on the ranking list. Hanging out with Friends!Now you can save the game videos at any time and share them with your global friends!Certainly you can support your friends by grading their videos!*****In this Elite version, you could play all basic mode of Winner’s Soccer for free.Winner’s Soccer 2014 is a real 3D competitive football game. It includes the teams and the latest football players’ data of 2014 World Cup. There are various modes for you to select, such as Cup, League Match and Friendly Match. It has up to 126 teams and 2600 players. Smooth actions and playback function let you feel like you actually in the game. 1．Game Modes This game has various modes, including Cup (World Cup, Club Cup), League Match (Premier League, Lega Serie A, La Liga and CSL), Friendly Match and Penalty Shootout. It also has a training mode for you to train skills of your team, dividing into Primary, Medium and Advanced.Friendly Match Mode: You can select 2 teams from 62 club teams to compete or shoot penalty.Cup Mode: You can select your favorite team from 64 national teams to participate the World Cup. League Mode, You can select one team from Britain, Italy, Spain or China to compete for championship.Training Mode: You can select a team to perfect its operation skills.2. Various Operation Skills This game provides two kinds of operation modes. You can choose the most suitable one. (You can change mode in Options under Menu or tap button || to activate Menu in game.)You can read Control Method in Help of Options under Menu.The operation adopts an international popular way, setting 5 pass ball keys: Short Pass /Press and Long Pass/Slide Tackle, Shoot, Through Pass/GK Rush Out, Long through Pass and Special Dribble /Focus Change.Short Pass: It is short pass in offense. Let controller press opponent dribbler in defense.Long Pass: Press Power Accumulate and pass the ball to a mate of appropriate distance after release. Let controller slide tackle when defend.Shoot: Make different shooting actions according to Power Accumulate and the distance between player and ball.Special Dribble: Including many special dribble actions: Marsille roulette, Step over, Step over and Pull back.Automatic combination skills:Through Pass: Pass ball to catcher according to Power Accumulate.Long through Pass: Pass ball to catcher with Long Pass according to Power Accumulate.Sprint: Rapid dribble, fasten speed of dribble but worsen control of ball.Drive ball out: Stop ball far away from body and facilitate dribble starting acceleration.Dribble with far distance: Double click in front when fast dribble can dribble farther and facilitate fast run.Fake Shoot and Fake Long pass: Pressing Short Pass when (or after) Shoot or Power Accumulate will cancel shoot or long pass. They are used to dribble past opponent Defenders or GK.One-Two pass: Two players cooperate to dribble past opponent Defenders.Lob shoot: Press Special Dribble to shoot.Control tracks of ball: Press direction keys to control the flying arc of ball.

Это справочник - Russian Law Reference Сборник законов РФ (России, Российской Федерации), содержит следующие законы и кодексы РФ:Конституция Российской Федерации==Кодексы==Арбитражный процессуальный (АПК РФ)БюджетныйВодныйВоздушныйГрадостроительныйГражданский (ГК РФ)Гражданский процессуальный (ГПК РФ)Жилищный (ЖК РФ)ЗемельныйВнутреннего водного транспортаОб административных правонарушениях (КоАП)Торгового мореплаванияЛеснойНалоговый (НК РФ)СемейныйТаможенный кодекс Таможенного союзаТрудовой кодекс (ТК РФ)Уголовно-исполнительный (УИК РФ)Уголовно-процессуальный (УПК РФ)Уголовный (УК РФ)== Законы ==О защите прав потребителейО налогах на имущество физических лицО недрахО приватизации жилищного фонда в РФО средствах массовой информации (о СМИ)Об образованииО банках и банковской деятельностиО бесплатной юридической помощи в РФО бухгалтерском учетеО валютном регулировании и валютном контролеО ветеранахО водоснабжении и водоотведенииО воинской обязанности и военной службеО высшем и послевузовском профессиональном образованииО государственной регистрации прав на недвижимое имущество и сделок с нимО государственной регистрации юридических лиц и индивидуальных предпринимателейО государственном регулировании производства и оборота этилового спирта, алкогольной и спиртосодержащей продукции и об ограничении потребления (распития) алкогольной продукцииО государственных пособиях гражданам, имеющим детейО гражданстве РФО денежном довольствии военнослужащих и предоставлении им отдельных выплатО закупках товаров, работ, услуг отдельными видами юридических лицО защите конкуренцииО землеустройствеО концессионных соглашенияхО крестьянском (фермерском) хозяйствеО лицензировании отдельных видов деятельностиО национальной платежной системеО некоммерческих организацияхО несостоятельности (банкротстве)О персональных данныхО пожарной безопасностиО полицииО правовом положении иностранных граждан в РФО применении контрольно-кассовой техники при осуществлении наличных денежных расчетов и (или) расчетов с использованием платежных картО прокуратуре РФО противодействии легализации (отмыванию) доходов, полученных преступным путем, и финансированию терроризмаО развитии малого и среднего предпринимательства в РФО размещении заказов на поставки товаров, выполнение работ, оказание услуг для государственных и муниципальных нуждО рекламеО розничных рынках и о внесении изменений в Трудовой кодекс РФО рынке ценных бумагО садоводческих, огороднических и дачных некоммерческих объединениях гражданО связиО системе государственной iTaxi is the most popular Polish app made for quick and direct ordering cabs.Now you can take a ride with us in the biggest Polish cities: Gdansk, Gdynia, Cracow, Lodz, Sopot, Poznan, Warsaw and Wroclaw!Thanks to iTaxi you:1.Take control over time, because you order a cab just in few seconds and you wait only few minutes for its arrival.2.Choose a cab and ‘a rate per kilometer’.3.Have 4 ways to order a cab: app on smartphone or tablet, www or call. In addition:1.The taxi driver informs you, when he will arrive at appointed address.2.Each taxi ride you can judge every moment you need.3.Are you not sure, if the taxi driver chose the shortest route? Tell us about it through our complaint form.Guarantee of Fair RideBeing fair is essential for us, that’s why we give you guarantee! If you go with iTaxi and you’ll have any doubts about the price of your ride, you can send it through our complaint form – that’s simple. If it turns out that you have paid more than it’s necessary, we’ll give you back twice more than you have paid for the next rides with iTaxi.**Do you own a company, where going by taxi is a part of everyday life? Do you appreciate efficient and innovative activities? Saving money and time is your priority? Cashless ride with iTaxi is a fair solution for your company!Our system it’s a simple way to manage the limits of rides for your employees and clients, precise settling accounts of rides and reports at request. With iTaxi you cut costs and everything is clear! We work for the best companies, such as: Agora, Generali, Oriflame, Play, Wprost and many more. So join to over 300 companies going with iTaxi: http://www.itaxi.pl/firmaAre you honest? Do you want to have more rides? iTaxi is the best solution for you! Don’t resign on your full-time job! You can work for us at the same time, meanwhile or just after your shift. iTaxi brings additional rides, no more long waiting at the taxi rank, no limits of working hours, indefinite agreement and we pay for the adverts in your cab! Check this out: http://www.itaxi.pl/kierowcaJoin in iTaxi – simply fair cab.

İstediğiniz uygulamaları arkadaşlarınızla paylaşmanız için mükemmel bir uygulamadır. 'Uygulama Paylaş' sayesinde uygulamaların linkini ya da apk dosyasını paylaşabilirsiniz.Uygulama Özellikleri- Email,Dropbox,Google Drive,Bluetooth,Facebook,Twitter etc. ile paylaşma imkanı,- Uygulamaları toplu seçme,- Uygulamanın linkini yada apk dosyasını paylaşma seçeneği,- Uygulamayı bluetooth aracılığıyla paylaşma,- Cacheleme seçeneği (Uygulama ilk paylaşıldığında cache'e atılıp sonraki paylaşmalarda daha hızlı paylaşıma olanak sağlar. İstenirse bu özellik kapatılabilir.)- Uygulamaları çalıştırmaPaylaşma seçenekleri: a)Adres ve Uygulama: Uygulamanın google play linkini ve kurulum dosyasını paylaşır. b)Adres: Uygulmanın sadece google play linkini paylaşır. c)Qrcode: Uygulamanın google play linkini barkoda dönüştürüp paylaşır. d)Uygulama ve expansion dosyası : Uygulamayı expansion dosyası ile paylaşabilirsiniz.Pro Özellikleri:★ 100 MB'dan büyük boyutlu uygulamaları paylaşma yeteneği, (.obb expansion dosyarınında paylaşılması),★ Paylaşılan expansion dosyalarının gerekli klasöre taşınması yeteneği, ★ Reklamsız kullanım.Pro'ya yükselt : Uygulama Paylaş ProYardım : Uygulama paylaşmaPaylaşmak istediğiniz uygulamanın üzerine tıklayıp 'Paylaş' butonuna tıklayarak yada paylaşmak istediğiniz uygulamaları seçip 'Seçilen uygulamaları paylaş' butonuna tıklayarak paylaşma seçeneklerinin olduğu menüye ulaşırsınız. Bu menüde paylaşmak istediğiniz seçeneğe göre telefonunuzda yüklü olan Dropbox, Google Drive, Email, Facebook, Twitter v.b. uygulamar ile paylaşabilirsiniz. Yada direkt bluetooth üzerinden diğer aygıtlara gönderebilirsiniz.Paylaşma seçenekleri :Adres : Bu özellik ile uygulamanın market adresini paylaşabilirsiniz.QRcode : Bu özellik ile uygulamanın market adresini qrcode olarak paylaşabilirsiniz.Adres ve uygulama : Bu özellik ile uygulama ve adresini paylaşabilirsiniz.Uygulama ve expansion dosyası : Bu özellik ile uygulayı expansion dosyası ile paylaşabilirsiniz.Expansion dosyası100 mb dan daha büyük olan uygulamalar expansion dosyasına sahiptir. Expansion dosyası olmadan uygulama çalışmayacaktır. Expansion dosyasını da telefonunuza kurmanız gerekmektedir. Expansion dosyaları obb uzantılıdır.Expansion dosyası taşıma 'Uygulama Paylaş Pro' expansion kurma işlemini kolay bir şekilde yapabilmeniz için özel yeteneklere sahiptir. Expansion dosyasını telefonunuzda açmaya çalıştığınızda 'Uygulama Paylaş' açılacaktır. Adımları tamamladıktan sonra expansion dosyası olması gereken klasöre taşınacaktır.Uygulamayı iyileştirebilmemiz için gördüğünüz eksikleri, fikirlerinizi bize mail atınız.

With a client rebuild from scratch the programmers of TeamSpeak 3 close the gap and bring you the ultimate TeamSpeak feeling to your Android device. Many client and admin features have been implemented to give our users the best TeamSpeak experience ever on Android. The most important ones: -Server-, channel-, and private chats -Automated away status on incoming phone calls -Creating and managing channels -Administration of user features: moving, banning, kicking, complaining, blocking, etc.Please visit our forums for a more detailed list of features.Stay connected with your friends, team mates, family and get your TeamSpeak3 client for Android now.

iTel Mobile Dialer Express is a mobile app for Android and other smartphones, offering a range of functionalities like VoIP Calls & SMSs, cross-OS Instant Messaging and much more from data enabled mobile phones (3G/4G or WiFi). For using this app, end users will need an Operator Code, which they can obtain from a VoIP Service Provider. While Service Providers can use this White Label Platform to offer Mobile VoIP services in their own brand.Features:★VoIP Calls & SMSs via Wifi, 3G / 4G, edge or UMTS.★Cross-platform Instant Messaging – an Android user can chat with an iPhone user or a Windows OS user can chat with a BlackBerry user. Offer unlimited mobile chatting and increase stickiness to your brand.★Easy Sign Up with Mobile Number as user ID & automatic Buddy List creation with facility to invite phonebook contacts to install the app. ★Facility to enable Mobile Top Up.For Service ProvidersiTel Mobile Dialer Express is available in all major OS Platforms and you can fully customize & brand it as per your requirements. For a free trial:1. Visit www.revesoft.com2. Register for a free Demo, with details of your softswitch(IP, Port) & we will send you a Demo Operator Code for testing the app on your own softswitch.For End UsersYou will be prompted for the following while starting the app:1. Operator Code – Collect Operator Code from your VoIP service provider. If the Service Provider is using REVE platform, he will be able to provide a valid Operator Code. 2. Mobile Number – to be entered with country code.3. Password – Received via SMS / IVR after entering your mobile number.

Como um ajudante que cuida de todas as suas necessidades, o DU Caller se desenvolveu, tornando-se uma ótima forma de identificar todas as ligações desconhecidas e bloquear ligações de remetentes de spam conhecidos e chamadores indesejados.Você já olhou o seu histórico de chamadas e quis saber: que números são estes? O DU Caller foi criado para informar quem está ligando para você. Com o DU Caller, você pode identificar com facilidade números desconhecidos, bloquear ligações indesejadas e personalizar telefones de spam.Por que usar o DU Caller - ID do chamador?★ Fácil de usar. Identifique números desconhecidos antes de atender o telefone: diga adeus a chamadas de telemarketing, scam, fraude, vendas, anúncios, assédios, apostas ilegais, empréstimos, seguros, phishing por voz, pesquisas e atendimento ao cliente!★ Bloqueie todas as ligações que quiser. Bloqueie remetentes de spam, bem como ligações indesejadas e incômodas com apenas um clique. Basta bloqueá-las com o DU Caller!★ Verificação do histórico de ligações: o DU Caller verifica se cada número estranho representa risco para garantir a sua segurança.★ Personalize a tolerância a spams. Com os alertas de spam, você sempre escapa de ligações inúteis.★ Design de IU confortável, bonito e acessível, além de uma experiência rápida e eficiente.Acredite: ao experimentar o DU Caller, você vai adorá-lo!

cPro, an application for accessing Craigslist from your Android device.Craigslist Mobile Search • Posting • Account Management • Notifications • Photo Wall • Thumbnail Photo Previews • Map Browser ---The New York Times: "Craigslist users have a secret weapon in cPro, which lets you search Craigslist much more easily than the Web site, and it offers a handful of other great features." ---cPro features an intuitive interface and essential set of features to browse and post to Craigslist. It also includes Notifiers that run your searches in the background and notify you of new matches. SEARCH: • Multi-City search • Map browser• Photo gallery• 20+ enhanced search features• Thumbnail photos and listing previews • Neighborhood support • etc, etc.POSTING: • post an ad in under 1 minute• over 1 million successfully posted ads from cPro! • attach pictures from your Camera or Photo Albums• full-fledged Account Management (including reposting, editing, and renewing)• full support of multiple accountsNOTIFIERS:• Multi-City notifiers with rapid Alerts• notifiers keep checking Craigslist until a new listing matching your search is posted ADVANCED FEATURES:• Favorite listings• add Notes to your favorite listings• Saved Searches• Maps and DirectionsSOCIAL: • Email, Call, or Text posters directly from cPro• Email or Text listings to your friends• Flag inappropriate and/or best-of-craigslist ads ESSENTIAL EXTRAS:• Photo Wall• Already-Seen indicators• Sorting by date, best match, low or high price • PIN code lock protection The craigslist and associated trademarks are owned by craigslist, Inc. and are being used under licensed permission from craigslist, Inc. for a limited purpose. www.craigslist.org ---AppAdvice: "cPro isn’t just a website wrapper; it takes searching, posting, and managing your Craigslist account to a whole new level" Forbes: "All of the features of Craigslist, but with a search agent option that notifies you of new results that match your terms."

Perfect for setting your travel itinerary- Filter accommodation immediately for Wifi, pool, beach, spa and designTop Clarity:- The trivago Rating Index (tRI) is a fair and accurate rating score which is actually an aggregation of all available rating scores on the web- An integrated map function takes you directly to the door, no matter where you are travelling from Top Interface:- The sleek, simple design makes booking on the go a fun and easy experienceTop Brand:- Voted as one of The Guardian’s “10 best money-saving apps”- Ranked on Independent.ie as one of the “best money-saving apps”Hotel? trivago!

Riding the Chicago CTA buses is cool. With Chicago Transit Tracker, you can create and track an unlimited number of routes, and see your closest route based on your location. Upgrade to Pro to remove the ads.There's no better tool for exploring and getting around Chicago than the Chicago Transit Authority. Great for when you need to reinstall your app or upgrade to Pro!-Closest Routes lookup based on your location-Alarms to tell you when to walk out the door-CTA Alerts-Smooth flashing indicators to alert you of changes-Filter by name when creating route-System maps-Report crashes to us to improve your experiences down the roadWhy Pro vs. Lite?- The Pro version removes ads.

SmartCall adalah Platform VoIP dengan bandwith paling hemat di dunia. Dengan kebutuhan bandwidth terkecil hanya 2kbps melalui mobile VoIP, SmartCall merupakan satu-satunya aplikasi VoIP yang dapat beroperasi pada jaringan 2,5G (GPRS). SmartCall memiliki solusi lengkap end-to-end yang menghubungkan semua sistem telepon melalui IP, seperti Smartphone, PBX VoIP di kantor, komputer desktop, dan layanan pertukaran pesan (SMS dan chatting dengan tulisan, gambar ,dan video) Setelah melakukan registrasi, Pengguna akan mendapatkan Nomor SmartCall untuk melakukan atau menerima panggilan telepon di seluruh dunia tanpa terkena biaya roaming. Nikmati SmartCall untuk telefon internasional murah dengan kualitas tinggi, dan bebas roaming di seluruh dunia !SmartCall sangat berguna saat berada di luar negeri untuk tetap dapat melakukan panggilan telfon ke Indonesia atau ditelfon dari Indonesia.Untuk tahap awal, SmartCall dapat digunakan untuk menelfon SmartCall lain secara gratis, atau menelfon semua nomor Operator Indonesia dengan biaya murah.Untuk pertanyaan, silahkan menghubungi kami: cs@smartcall.co.id.

★ Disponible en Barcelona, Madrid, 30 ciudades de Alemania, Viena, Varsovia. ★¿Cómo funciona mytaxi?Los taxistas más cercanos a un pasajero reciben una solicitud directamente en sus smartphones. La posición actual del pasajero te muestra en la pantalla. El cliente también podrá escoger entre algunos requisitos como, cantidad de pasajeros o pago con tarjeta.  Una vez aceptada la solicitud por el conductor, el pasajero puede seguir el trayecto del taxi en el mapa de la pantalla está informado exactamente de la distancia y el momento de llegada. Otras opciones están disponibles desde nuestra App: Elegir a taxista favorito, pedidos anticipados (en breve) o taxis de 5 estrellas. También ofrecemos la posibilidad de ponerse en contacto directamente con el cliente a través del móvil. Ventajas:Descarga gratuita de la App.- Individual: los pasajeros pueden guardar su taxista favorito, que se dará prioridad a con la siguiente reserva. Con la opción de 5 estrellas, los taxistas pueden aumentar su cantidad de reservas.- Independiente: No hay radioemisoras de por medio, Tiene un contacto directo con los pasajeros.- Innovador: Sin costes fijos mensuales, sólo paga una cantidad pequeña por cada recorrido exitoso. - Transparente: El nombre, número de pasajeros y opciones de reservación se muestran directamente en su pantalla. La ubicación y su llegada se muestran en vivo en la pantalla, también puede ver los taxistas a su alrededor con el radar de taxis. Conviértete en un driver mytaxi:Favor de registrarse en una de nuestras oficinas locales, puntos de venta o en línea. Por favor traiga lo siguiente:- Un Smartphone (sistema de operación: iOS o Android) con tarjeta de datos con un mínimo de 300 MB (cualquier operador)- DNI, licencia de taxi y carné de conducir Más información www.mytaxi.es o llama 93 222 40 40.Las condiciones generales del contrato se pueden encontrar en: www.mytaxi.es

Excel spreadsheets (.xls, .xlsx) - PowerPoint presentations (.ppt, .pptx) - PDF files (.pdf) The world’s most popular Zip utility, WinZip offers apps for all of the industry’s most popular platforms including Windows, Mac, iOS and Android.Compatible with Android operating systems 2.3 (Gingerbread), 3.x (Honeycomb), 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich), 4.1-4.3(Jelly Bean), 4.4 (KitKat) and 5.0 (lollipop), WinZip for Android is available now as a free English app.FAQ:Q1: I am using WinZip to compress the JPEGs, but size didn’t change much.A1: In order to compress your photos as much as possible without any loss of photo quality, WinZip should be configured to create Zipx files (best method compression). With WinZip, "Zipx, Best method" compression examines each file and selects the compression option most likely to supply the best compression results.Q2: I open a password protected zip in WinZip, but the file list still be obtained?A2: the behavior depends on the zip file encryption method, some of them are using password to encrypt the directory of files in the Zip (it is used to show the file list without unzipping), some of them do not encrypt the directory. For security, we recommend to avoid using file or folder name with confidential information.Q3: Why WinZip Android needs to be granted with the "Device ID & call information" permission? A3: It is the general app access permission on Android system. We use it because 1) to get the device information and apply to the feedback email automatically. 2) to use for the Google to track the user operations in WinZip at backend.

BBC Media Player works with BBC websites and applications to provide video and audio playback on your Android device.Once you have downloaded this application, continue to use your favourite BBC websites and apps on your Android device as normal. Whenever you play any video or audio the BBC Media Player will launch and handle playback of the content.Permissions-----------You may notice that when you install the app it asks you for permission to access your phone's network communication, phone calls, and system tools.These are standard Android app permissions that are defined by the Google Android platform. The 3 permissions the BBC Media Player app asks to use are: • Network Communication - full internet access.Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with access to the internet so it can play programmes.• System tools - preventing phone from sleeping, retrieve running applications.Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with the ability to prevent the phone going to sleep when you are watching a programme.• Phone Calls - read phone state and identity (Android Honeycomb and below only).Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with phone communication status and notifies the application if the phone rings or a phone call is in progress. We only use this permission to ensure that the BBC Media Player pauses if you receive a phone call and temporarily reduces its audio when you receive a text message or other notification while watching a programme. The BBC Media Player app does not access or store any personal information, phone numbers or IMEI numbers.

Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı Kur'an-ı Kerim Uygulaması“Bu Kur'an, ayetlerini düşünsünler ve akıl sahipleri öğüt alsınlar diye sana indirdiğimiz mübarek bir kitaptır.” Sâd Suresi, 38/29. ayetBu uygulama Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı tarafından hazırlanmış olup, Kur'an-ı Kerim’in meal ve tefsiriyle birlikte okunmasına yönelik istifadenize sunulmuştur. Uygulama üzerinde, zoom-in/zoom-out özelliği ile Kur’an sayfasını büyütüp küçültebilirsiniz. Elif-BA uygulamasına hızlıca yönlendirme işlemi ile de Kur’an-ı Kerim okumayı kolaylıkla öğrenebilirsiniz. Sesli Kur’an dinleme özelliği ile hatim yapabilirsiniz. İshak Danış’ın tilavetiyle Kur’an-ı Kerim’i ister ayet-ayet, ister sure-sure, ister cüz-cüz sesli olarak dinleyebilirsiniz.Kur’an Fihristi ile aramak istediğiniz her kelimeyi arayabilir ve ilgili ayetleri bulup meallerine ulaşabilirsiniz.Takdim bölümü ile Kur’an tarihçesine, Kur’an-ı Kerim’in tanım, isim ve sıfatlarına, meal ve tefsir ile ilgili geniş bilgilere ulaşabilirsiniz.Özellikleri:-Kur'an-ı Kerim; Sure, Cüz, Ayet ve Hatim okuma.-Konularına göre Kur'an-ı Kerim fihristi.-Sure, Cüz ve Ayet Arama-Sureleri, alfabetik, Kur’an’daki sırasına ve iniş sırasına göre sıralama özelliği-Sureler ile ilgili özet bilgiler- Gelişmiş İnteraktif Arama Özelliği: Uygulama içerisinde yer alan kelimeleri hem Arapça hem de Türkçe arama özelliği. Gelişmiş filtreleme ile aranan kelimelerin sonuçlarına ulaşabilme-Gelişmiş Okuma Seçenekleri: Sure veya cüz sonuna kadar yahut belirli ayetler arasında okuma özelliği-Kur’an Fihristi-Ayetlerle ilgili kişisel fihrist oluşturabilme-Kur’an’da yer alan secde ayetlerini görebilme- Kur’an Sözlüğü -Gelişmiş yer imi özelliği. Çeşitli renklendirme ile yer imi oluşturabilme-İnteraktif notlar özelliği.-Yatay-dikey ekran desteği-Gece okuma özelliği-İstenilen Ayeti Arapça ve Türkçe olarak paylaşabilme-Ayet-Ayet meal ve tefsir görebilme-Kur’an sayfalarında hızlı sayfa ve cüz erişimleri-Kur’an sayfalarının arkasındaki temaları değiştirebilme-Ekran parlaklığını ayarlayabilme-Font büyüklüklerini değiştirebilmehttps://www.facebook.com/MobilDiyanethttps://twitter.com/MobilDiyanet​

NPlay là Game giải trí đặc sắc trên Smartphone.Giúp bạn có những trải nghiệm tuyệt vời với các thể loại game dân gian truyền thống như tiến lên, xì tổ, bài cào, xì dách, phỏm,…Tham gia vào Game bạn và bạn bè của mình sẽ có những phút giây giải trí thư giãn mọi lúc mọi nơi. Tải game ngay hôm này để so tài với các cao thủ game bài nào.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Chúc các bạn chơi NPlay – Tien Len, Xi To vui vẻ, sảng khoái. Divertissement Nplay jeu est présenté sur le Smartphone.Vous aider à avoir de grandes expériences avec des genres comme la tradition populaire de l'avant, soufflant le nid, griffoir, blackjack, Phom, ...Rejoignez le jeu, vous et vos amis aurez des moments de divertissement de loisirs à tout moment, n'importe où. Surtout avec des cadeaux et énorme NCoin aide quotidien gratuit qu'il soit plus facile de comparer vos compétences avec d'autres joueurs sans manquer d'argent dans leur porte-monnaie.-------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------genres folkloriques diverses de jeu, interface conviviale agréable, un son riche décentralisée dans la classe ordinaire, géants, Vip vous donne plus d'occasions de découvrir le jeu.En outre des changements de jeu améliorant constamment produit parfait pour amener le meilleur du jeu populaire pour les joueurs. Télécharger le jeu aujourd'hui de comparer vos compétences avec le jeu de tous les lecteurs.-------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------Souhaitez vous jouez Nplay - Tien Len, Xi Pour amusant, gai.

"Beleef de spanning van de Koningin van de autosport met de Formule Live24!Ontdek ga naar de App in de motorsport wereld, met meer dan 500.000 downloads in Spanje, het Verenigd Koninkrijk en Australië in de afgelopen seizoenen.Met Formula Live-24 kunt u al van het seizoen de Grand Prix races te volgen, de kwalificatie en de vrije trainingen LEEF, met real-time updates, commentaar, pitstops en de resterende ronden.- Grand Prix van Australië (Melbourne-Albert Park)- Maleisische Grand Prix (Sepang)- Chinese Grand Prix (Shanghai)- Grand Prix van Bahrein (Sakhir)- Grand Prix van Spanje (Barcelona-Catalunya)- Grand Prix van Monaco (Montecarlo)- Grand Prix van Canada (Montreal-Gilles Villeneuve)- Oostenrijkse Grand Prix (Spielberg-Red Bull Ring)- Britse Grand Prix (Silverstone)- Grand Prix van Duitsland (Hockenheim / Nurburgring)- Hongaarse Grand Prix (Hungaroring)- Grand Prix van België (Spa-Francorchamps)- Italiaanse Grand Prix (Monza)- Grand Prix van Singapore (Marina Bay)- Japanse Grand Prix (Suzuka)- Russische Grand Prix (Sochi)- Verenigde Staten Grand Prix (Austin-Circuito de Las Américas)- Mexicaanse Grand Prix (Hermanos Rodríguez)- Braziliaanse Grand Prix (Interlagos-Jose Carlos Pace)- Abu Dhabi Grand Prix (Yas Marina)Blijf op de hoogte 365 dagen per jaar, met de laatste op het WK, met inbegrip van nieuws, analyses en adviezen van experts in de sport.Formula Live24 heeft dit alles, plus een bijgewerkte en innovatief nieuw ontwerp, met inbegrip van modellen van de nieuwste eenzitters -Mercedes W06, Ferrari SF14-T, McLaren MP4-30, Red Bull RB11 of Williams FW37-, en hoge kwaliteit graphics.Het volledig gratis te downloaden en blijf op de hoogte van het hele seizoen: kalenders, schema's, circuits, weersvoorspellingen, banden, en chauffeurs -Lewis Hamilton, Fernando Alonso, Jenson Button, Daniel Ricciardo, Sebastian Vettel, Kimi Raikkonen of Nico Rosberg- met prestaties verslagen en graphics. Maar er is nog veel meer!Met Formula live 24 zul je in staat om meldingen te ontvangen tijdens de vrije trainingen, kwalificaties en races, niet om de week top nieuwsberichten te noemen.Wat meer is, zult u in staat om uw mening te delen met de makers van de app, en met andere gebruikers, dankzij Twitter integratie. Gewoon gebruik maken van onze hashtag # F1Live24EN om te communiceren met de rest van de Formule Live24 gemeenschap.***************************************De F1 FORMULA 1 logo, F1, Formule 1, FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP en bijbehorende logo's zijn handelsmerken van Formula One Licensing BV, een Formula One groepsmaatschappij. Alle rechten voorbehouden. Deze toepassing is niet officieel en is niet in verband gebracht op enigerlei wijze met de F1-groep van bedrijven."

OpenVPN Connect is the official full-featured Android VPN client for the OpenVPN Access Server, Private Tunnel VPN and OpenVPN Community, developed by OpenVPN Technologies, Inc.Features: * Supports Ice Cream Sandwich, Jelly Bean and higher. Does NOT require a rooted device.* Easily import .ovpn profiles from SD card, OpenVPN Access Server, Private Tunnel or via a browser link.* Improved power management - preferences setting allows VPN to pause in a low-power state whenever screen is blanked or network is unavailable.* Android Keychain integration - OpenVPN profiles may reference a cert/key pair in the Android keychain.* Supports hardware-backed keystores (such as on the Nexus 7)* Support for multi-factor authentication using OpenVPN static and dynamic challenge/response protocols.* Full IPv6 support (at both the tunnel and transport layer)* Uses PolarSSL (not affected by Heartbleed issue)

appName: ハロハロ-登録無料！ビデオ通話で出会える大人気チャットSNS
description: ■ハロハロってどんなアプリ？最大の特徴はビデオ通話（ビデオチャット）や音声通話で話ができる点。もちろん文字チャットも楽しめますので、お好きな方法で異性と繋がることが出来るまさにライブチャット型SNSアプリなのです。しかも国内最大級の会員数を誇る「ハロハロ」には、日本全国からさまざまな年齢層や業種やタイプの男女が登録しているのできっとあなたにピッタリの異性とマッチングできるはずです。■登録からご利用の流れメアドや電話番号は不要！ダウンロード後、わずか30秒で登録は完了します。さぁ、素敵な出会いを求めて今すぐ無料登録しよう！登録後は会員一覧や検索から条件を絞り込みご近所さんを探したり、タイムライン等の無料で使える機能を駆使して気になるお相手をチェック。あとは、文字チャットで話しかけたりビデオ通話や音声通話で仲良くなりましょう！■ハロハロの充実機能主な機能についてのご説明です。[ビデオ通話（ビデオチャット）]気になるお相手とお互いの姿を見せ合い、テレビ電話の様に動画で会話を楽しめます。通話待機中のお相手ならすぐに発信し会話をスタートさせることができます。また、自ら待機設定して異性から掛かってくるのを待つ」事も可能です。[音声通話]通常の電話の様に気になるお相手と音声のみの会話を楽しめます。声を聴きながらだから親密度がアップしますよ。[チャット(メッセージ)]絵文字や無料オリジナルスタンプも使用できるテキストメッセージ機能です。その他、画像・動画やボイスメッセージも添付送信できます。[タイムライン]投稿・閲覧は完全無料でご利用いただけます。画像と共にアップされた近況報告にイイネやコメントを付けることが出来ます。他にも「お気に入りのお相手がオンラインになった事をプッシュ通知でお知らせする機能」や「気に入らないお相手をブロックする機能」「プレゼント送信」などなど多彩な機能満載です。■ハロハロが安全で安心してご利用いただける理由・サクラ行為を徹底排除。ハロハロに登録している会員様は全て一般の方です。なのでいわゆるサクラは一切存在いたしません。また、スタッフによる24時間体制での監視により一般会員様を装った業者などは徹底排除しておりますので安心してご利用いただけます。■ご注意ハロハロではアプリ内でのコミュニケーションを楽しんでいただく事を目的としており、異性紹介を目的としたアプリでは御座いません。いわゆる出会い系アプリでは御座いませんのでご注意下さい。メールアドレス・電話番号・他のアプリのIDなどの交換及び勧誘行為、売春、その他違法行為を目的としたご利用は固くお断りいたします。■iOS8.0以上での動作が確認できております。

SPARKASSE+ ALLE FINANZEN MOBIL IM GRIFFMit Sparkasse+ können Sie immer und überall Ihre aktuellen Kontostände einsehen, Überweisungen abschicken und Geldeingänge prüfen. Oder Sie lassen sich zum nächsten Geldautomaten oder zur Sparkassenfiliale lotsen. Nehmen Sie aus der App Kontakt mit Ihrer Sparkasse auf und sperren Sie verloren gegangene Karten.FUNKTIONEN• Multibankenfähig: Beliebig viele Konten bei nahezu allen Sparkassen und Banken• Diverse Kontoarten: Giro-, Festgeld-, Tagesgeld-, Spar-, Darlehens-, LBS-Bausparkonten, DEKA-Depots• Überweisungen und Daueraufträge ausführen• Im Zahlungsverkehr werden Empfängerdaten basierend auf Ihren bisherigen Umsätzen automatisch vervollständigt• SEPA: Automatisches Abholen von IBAN/BIC, sofern diese an Konten nicht hinterlegt sind• SEPA-Konverter: Wandelt Kontonummer und Bankleitzahl in IBAN und BIC• SEPA-Visitenkarte: Zeigen Sie Ihre SEPA-Kontodaten als QR-Code an und geben Sie diesen z.B. per E-Mail weiter • Anzeige von Depotbeständen und Kreditkartenumsätzen bei Sparkassen (keine DKB)• Geldautomaten und Filialen Ihrer Sparkasse finden• Kontowecker meldet Aktivitäten via Push-Nachricht (Voraussetzung: Google-Konto; Berechtigung: Prüfung, ob ein solches existiert)• Laden Sie Prepaid-Karten diverser Mobilfunkanbieter mit der Funktion „Handy-Laden“ via App auf• Börsennews, Kurse und Devisen (sofern von Ihrem Institut unterstützt) • Karten-Nutzung im Ausland freigeben/sperren• Umsätze grafisch auswerten• Service-Angebote Ihrer Sparkasse wie Mitteilungen, Öffnungszeiten, TermineVORAUSSETZUNGEN• Leider können von der App nicht alle Institute abgebildet werden. Nicht unterstützt werden u.a. Commerzbank, TARGOBANK, BMW Bank, Volkswagen Bank, Santander Bank, Bank of Scotland.• Sie benötigen ein für das Online-Banking (HBCI mit PIN/TAN bzw. FinTS mit PIN/TAN) freigeschaltetes Konto bei einer deutschen Sparkasse oder Bank• Für welche Kontoart Sie Sparkasse+ nutzen können, ist abhängig vom Angebot Ihres Instituts• Unterstützte TAN-Verfahren: iTAN, chipTAN manuell, chipTAN comfort (optisch), smartTAN+, sm@rtTAN optic, Einschrittverfahren, SecureTAN, pushTANSICHERHEIT • Direkte Kommunikation mit Ihrem Kreditinstitut über geprüfte Schnittstellen • Sicherer Datentransfer nach den deutschen Vorgaben zum Online-Banking• Verschlüsselte Datenspeicherung• Zugriff-Schutz durch ein persönliches Passwort• Autolock-Funktion zur Sperrung der App. Alle Daten sind bei Verlust maximal gesichert• Der TÜV bestätigt diese höchsten SicherheitsstandardsHINWEISE 1) Es werden nur Bankverbindungen in Deutschland unterstützt2) Welche Konten tatsächlich unterstützt werden, hängt vom jeweiligen Institut ab3) Zeitverzögerungen von einem Tag sind bei der Kontoaktualisierung möglich4) Die PIN ist nicht die persönliche Identifikationsnummer Ihrer EC-Karte. Es ist die PIN, die Sie beim Online-Banking auf der Webseite Ihrer Sparkasse/Bank nutzen5) Die Funktion „Abo-Laden“ unterstützt folgende Smartphones mit NFC-Chip nicht: Nexus 4, 5, 7, 10; Samsung Galaxy S46) Supportfragen schicken Sie bitte direkt aus der App, gerne inkl. Sendeprotokoll (vor fremdem Zugriff geschützt)7) Die Nutzung einzelner Funktionen kann Kosten bei Ihrem Kreditinstitut verursachen. Bitte erkundigen Sie sich, ob und in welcher Höhe diese ggf. an Sie weitergereicht werden8) Durch den Kauf und/oder die Verwendung dieser App erkennen Sie die Bedingungen des Endbenutzer-Lizenzvertrages der Star Finanz GmbH uneingeschränkt an. Sie finden diese unter: http://www.starmoney.de/?lizenz-android9) Informationen finden Sie unter https://www.sparkasse.de/service/sparkassen-apps.html

«Летай ТВ» – это приложение, которое превратит Ваш смартфон или планшет в полноценный телевизор. Теперь вы никогда не пропустите любимую телепередачу или важный момент футбольного матча, а время, проведенное в дороге или очередях, пролетит незаметно. «Летай ТВ» работает как в мобильных сетях 3G/4G, так и по Wi-Fi.Пожалуйста помните, что использование мобильного интернета для просмотра ТВ, может повлечь дополнительные расходы на трафик. Эту информацию вы можете уточнить у своего провайдера мобильного интернета. "Fly TV" - egy olyan alkalmazás, amely bekapcsolja a smartphone vagy tabletta egy teljes értékű TV. Most akkor soha nem fog hiányozni a kedvenc TV show, vagy egy fontos pillanat egy labdarúgó mérkőzés, és az eltöltött időt az úton, vagy felváltva, repülni. "Fly TV" működik, mint a mobil 3G / 4G hálózatok és a Wi-Fi-vel.Kérjük, ne feledje, hogy a használata a mobil internet TV-t nézni, és további költségekkel járhatnak a forgalom. Ez az információ akkor ellenőrizze a mobil internet szolgáltató.
Już dziś zamów taksówkę przez aplikację.

Onavo Count is a stunning app with intuitive reporting to help you understand how you use mobile data. It also lets you compare how much data you use in specific apps to other people. Features• Simple setup: Get going in seconds by setting your monthly cap and billing cycle• You compared with everyone: See how your data use measures up to other people for each app• Your data life: Understand how you use your data in categories that matter to you like music, maps and videos• Real-time alerts: Know when you’re approaching your data limit and get an indication of where you stand in your current data cycle with notifications on your phone• Onavo Extend integration: See how much data you’re saving with Onavo Extend right from the Onavo Count home screenHow it worksOnavo Count monitors and analyzes all types of mobile data and phone use. This includes background, foreground, and Wi-Fi use.

This version of Wisepilot is available for Sony Mobile customers only!Enjoy the benefits of being able to navigate all over the world!Bring this application on your travels and never lose your way! Wisepilot offers flexible navigation solutions for everyone, whether you are a frequent driver or simply want guidance on a day trip. You can either use just the free basic features or purchase one or more add-ons, creating a navigation app that is tailor-made just for you. To make it even more personal we have made it available in no less than 25 different languages.As an added bonus new users will have access to all available add-ons for free for a limited time of 30 days.OpenStreetMapWisepilot uses OpenStreetMap data which is continuously improved by its large user community. As the user, you are in control. Incorrect address for a location? Change it! Missing roads? Add them! The maps are updated frequently and as everything is online you will always have access to the latest information available. And since Wisepilot is designed to use very little data traffic there is no need to worry about astronomical roaming costs when abroad (but we still suggest that you monitor your data usage, of course).Premium add-onsTo allow you to customize your Wisepilot app the following add-ons are available for purchase in the in-app Shop:• Turn-by-turn navigation, including:* Voice guidance - Reach your destination with detailed instructions* Speed limits - See current speed limits on your route and get alerted if you exceed the limit• Speed cameras - See all speed cameras nearby on the map and get alerted when you approach one while driving• Live traffic - Up-to-date traffic info gives you an overview of any traffic disruptions on your route to help you plan a stress free trip. Traffic impact will be included in the estimated travel time when navigating.• Wcities - Find current and upcoming events near your locationQuestions, comments, concerns? Pay a visit to our user web portal at http://appello.zendesk.com

appName: 捕魚達人-大型機台打魚完美移植
description: 1、有沒有發現：玩來玩去都是一個人在捕魚，和街機捕魚多人一起玩的感覺不一樣！ 100%完美移植多人聯網街機捕魚，享受真正多人聯網一起捕魚的樂趣！2、有沒有發現：玩來玩去都是一樣的魚和場景，只是界面換了一下？ 100%街機捕魚玩法樂趣完美移植，更在畫面上進行全面升級，滿足你的視覺體驗！3、有沒有發現：你的砲台很厲害，你賺了很多金幣，可惜只有你知道！ 真正的還原街機廳多人聯網捕魚！你有多富有，多高富帥，現在就讓屌絲們羨慕去吧！4、有沒有發現：好多獎金魚，好多震撼的大BOSS！想賺金幣就來吧！ 自從遊戲中有了獎金魚和BOSS，媽咪再也不用擔心我賺不到金幣了！

Order a taxi from Yellow Cab Vancouver using your phone – 24 hours a day, 365 days a year!! Fast, convenient, and easy to use. Use a map to select your pick-up location, and track the location of your taxi. Receive notification alerts about the status of your booking, and when your taxi arrives.TAXI BOOKING FEATURES: •Request a taxi right now, or select a future date and time for pick-up. •Don’t know your location? – Send the taxi to your current GPS position. •You can also tap a location on a map, or type in a pick-up address. •Save a pick-up address as a favorite, and use it for future bookings. •Select booking options for your taxi (wheelchair accessible, pet-friendly, etc.) •Send additional info the driver – type a message, up to 255 characters. •A confirmation message lets you know your booking request was accepted. •Push notifications alert you when your taxi is on the way, and when it has arrived. TRACKING FEATURES: •Display the current location of your taxi on a map. •Cancel a booking. •Display up to three previous bookings made with your mobile device. •Tap a button to make a phone call Yellow Cab Vancouver (if app is installed on a phone). NOTE: If the Yellow Cab Vancouver app is installed on a tablet, the feature to call Yellow Cab Vancouver is disabled. Commander un taxi de Yellow Cab de Vancouver en utilisant votre téléphone - 24 heures par jour, 365 jours par an! Rapide, pratique et facile à utiliser.Utilisez une carte pour sélectionner votre lieu de ramassage, et suivre l'emplacement de votre taxi.Recevoir des alertes de notification sur l'état de votre réservation, et quand votre taxi arrive.TAXI booking Caractéristiques:• Demander un taxi dès maintenant, ou sélectionnez une date et une heure ultérieures pour pick-up.• Je ne sais pas votre emplacement? - Envoyer le taxi à votre position GPS actuelle.• Vous pouvez également appuyer sur un emplacement sur une carte, ou tapez une adresse pick-up.• Enregistrer une adresse pick-up en tant que favori, et l'utiliser pour les réservations futures.• Sélectionnez les options de réservation pour votre taxi (accessible aux fauteuils roulants, animaux domestiques, etc)• Envoyer des infos supplémentaires du pilote - tapez un message de 255 caractères.• Un message de confirmation vous permet de connaître votre demande de réservation a été acceptée.• les notifications push vous avertissent lorsque votre taxi est sur le chemin, et quand il est arrivé.Fonctionnalités de suivi:• Affichage de l'emplacement actuel de votre taxi sur une carte.• Annuler une réservation.• Affiche jusqu'à trois réservations antérieures faites avec votre appareil mobile.• Appuyez sur un bouton pour faire un appel téléphonique Yellow Cab de Vancouver (si l'application est installée sur un téléphone).NOTE: Si le Yellow Cab de Vancouver application est installée sur une tablette, la fonction à appeler Yellow Cab de Vancouver est désactivé.

Android version of the popular CPU identification tool for PC, CPU-Z is a free application that reports information about your device.- SoC (System On Chip) name, architecture, clock speed for each core ;- System information : device brand & model, screen resolution, RAM, storage.;- Battery information : level, status, temperature, capacity ;- Sensors.Requirements :- Android 2.2 and above (version 1.03 and +)Permissions :- INTERNET permission is required for the online validation (see notes below for more détails about the validation process) - ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE for statistics.Notes : Online Validation (version 1.04 and +)The validation allows to store the hardware specification of your Android device in a database. After the validation, the program opens your validation URL into your current internet browser. If you enter your e-mail address (optional), an e-mail with your validation link will be sent to you as a reminder.Settings screen and debug (version 1.03 and +)If CPU-Z closes abnormally (in case of bug), the settings screen will appear at the next run. You can use that screen to remove the main detection features of the application, and make it run.Bug reportIn case of bug, please open the application menu and choose "Send Debug Infos" to send a report by emailFAQ and troubleshootingYou can visit the FAQ at that address : http://www.cpuid.com/softwares/cpu-z-android.html#faq

Einkaufen – jederzeit und überall. Mit der Media Markt App für Android haben Sie die Tiefpreise immer in Ihrer Hosentasche und können in jeder freien Minute durch die besten und billigsten Angebote stöbern. Ihren Shopping Erlebnissen sind keine Grenzen mehr gesetzt: Unterwegs über die neuesten technischen Highlights informieren, zu jeder Zeit Ihr Lieblingsprodukt auswählen und dann ganz bequem direkt vom Smartphone aus bestellen, die Media Markt App bietet vielerlei Möglichkeiten. Auf geht’s..., die Tiefpreise warten auf Sie. Laden Sie sich jetzt die kostenlose Android-App bei Google Play herunter und genießen Sie ein übersichtliches, bequemes und mobiles Einkaufserlebnis. Schön blöd, wer sich das nicht herunterlädt!Folgende Highlights erwarten Sie in der App:1. Einkaufen- Blättern Sie durch die große Auswahl an Produkten, klicken Sie sich durch verschiedene Kategorien und nutzen Sie die Filterfunktionen. - Bestellen Sie alles direkt und bequem in der App.- Wählen Sie zwischen versandkostenfreier Abholung direkt in Ihrem Media Markt vor Ort oder bequemer Lieferung nach Hause. - Merken Sie sich ausgewählte Artikel auf Ihrem Merkzettel vor. Mit einem Klick können Sie diese Produkte in den Warenkorb legen. - Empfehlen Sie Ihre Lieblingsprodukte Ihren Freunden und Familie per Email oder Facebook.2. Produkt- und Marktsuche- Suchen Sie Produkte mit der Autocomplete-Funktion auch kategorieübergreifend.- Suchen Sie den Media Markt in Ihrer Nähe per Lokalisierung, Ortseingabe, Postleitzahl oder wählen Sie Ihren Markt direkt per Dropdown aus.- Mit dem QR Code Scanner gelangen Sie direkt zu den aktuellen Angeboten.3. Angebote- Beim Start der App sehen Sie die aktuellen Highlights von Media Markt- Weitere Angebote finden Sie im aktuellen Prospekt im „Mehr“-Bereich.4. Sicherheit- Alle Einkäufe werden über eine sichere SSL-Verschlüsselung übertragen.- Es gibt einen Login- und Registrierungsbereich für schnellen und sicheren Einkauf.5. Login- Mit Ihren Media Markt Login-Daten in der App einloggen und einfach per On-Off Switch Login verwalten.- Als Neukunden können sie sich einfach und schnell registrieren.Die App benötigt Zugriff auf folgende Berechtigungen:- Identität: Für den Versand von Push-Benachrichtigungen greift die App auf Google Cloud Messaging zu. Den Erhalt von Push-Benachrichtigungen können Sie jederzeit über die Einstellungen der App deaktivieren.- Standort: Für die Funktion Marktsuche „Media Markt vor Ort“ greift die App auf Ihren aktuellen Standort zu. Diese Funktion können Sie jederzeit über die Einstellungen der App deaktivieren.- Fotos/Medien/Dateien: Um die Performance der App zu optimieren, werden Dateien lokal auf Ihrem Gerät zwischengespeichert.- Kamera: Für die Nutzung des QR Code-Scanners benötigt die App Zugriff auf die Funktion Ihrer Kamera.- WLAN-Verbindungsinformationen: Um eine optimale Performance der App zu garantieren, benötigt die App Zugriff auf den Status Ihrer WLAN-Verbindung.- Informationen zur Bluetooth Verbindung: Für den Erhalt von ortsabhängigen Nachrichten, benötigt die App Zugriff auf die Bluetooth-Verbindung. Den Erhalt von ortsabhängigen Nachrichten können Sie jederzeit über die Einstellungen der App deaktivieren.Diese App unterstützt aktuell Android 2.3 und höher.Die App ist generell für Smartphones optimiert, Tablets größer 7 Zoll werden derzeit nicht unterstützt.

Die Commerzbank Kontostand-App:Jederzeit wissen, was auf dem Konto los ist.Einfacher geht’s nicht:1. App runterladen.2. App einmalig mit Ihren Online Banking-Daten auf Ihrem Smartphone aktivieren. 3. Ab sofort sehen Sie Ihren Kontostand und die letzten 10 Umsätze mit nur einem Klick. Zudem können Sie sich per Push-Mitteilung über das Erreichen von selbst vorgegebenen Kontoständen oder Buchungsbeträgen auf Ihrem Gerät informieren lassen. Die Benachrichtigungen erfolgen zeitverzögert und beinhalten nur Buchungen, welche seit dem letzten Öffnen der App aufgetreten sind. Einfach und sicher:-Rein informative App, Transaktionen sind nicht möglich.-Weder Kontoinhaber noch –nummer werden genannt.So sind die Informationen selbst bei Verlust Ihres Smartphones für Dritte wertlos.Voraussetzungen:Sie sind Online Banking-Kunde der Commerzbank und besitzen ein Zahlungsverkehrskonto (z.B. Girokonto), das hierfür angemeldet ist.Über Ihre Kommentare und Bewertungen freuen wir uns. Hinweise, Fragen oder Anregungen senden Sie bitte per E-Mail an mobileservices@commerzbank.com.Tipp: Holen Sie sich auch unsere Tablet-App sowie unsere Banking & Services App für Smartphones!

We have designed a convenient application, which you can use to monitor your own investments from any IOS or Android device. Wherever you are.Richmond Berks is an international investment agency specializing on auction trading. Richmond Berks purchases the property of bankrupt companies and then resell it at a moderate market price. Every adult person (age over 18) can take part in Richmond Berks activities and invest in order to gain his or her part of profits under the offer conditions listed at richmond Berks official website.RBD (Richmond Berks Dollar) - inner currency, equivalent of USD.Buying RBDA client wants to buy 100 RBD; he selects a payment system. Makes a payment.After the payment, his balance in his personal profile shows 100 active RBD. This 100 active RBD bring 1,4% daily profit. The client can withdraw active RBD anytime, with a 50% fine, since he will be withdrawing the funds from the company’s working capital. Daily payments of 1,4 % interest per day, permanently (the interest rate may increase, depending on company’s capitalization).RBB (Richmond Berks Bonus)Unlike active RBD, you cannot buy them; you can only get them for certain activities, with a 0.05% daily interest payment (Active RBD bring you 1,4% daily profit). Daily payment of active RBB is made to your free RBD balance.Withdrawing RBDOnly free RBD may be withdrawn to any payment system. If you withdraw active RBD, they shall be transferred to your free RBD balance with a 50% fine. You can withdraw free RBD to any payment system that you select. The funds shall be transferred to your payment system within 24 hours.IncomeRBD generates you a stable income depending on the company capitalization. Right now income factor is 1.4% per day. It can not be less than 1%. Weekends are exceptional. On Saturday and Sunday income factor is set to 0.7% (50% of normal income factor). RichShare - unique program based on neural network artificial intelligence calculations and blockchain technology . Lets everyone to take part in huge auctions with minimal requirements.Secure SSL ConnectionThe connection to this site is encrypted and authenticated using a strong protocol (TLS 1.2), a strong key exchange (ECDHE_ECDSA), and a strong cipher (AES_128_GCM).Secure ResourcesAll resources on this page are served securely.Partnership systemThe second-level partnership system – 10% - 3%, partnership bonuses are paid in RBD to the free RBD balance. They can be withdrawn at once, or reinvested. In case of reinvestment, RBD that are in free RBD balance shall be transferred to active RBD balance.

!!IMPORTANT!!DON'T install or update this unless other apps let you install it. This is a library which won't work by itself.This APK is for devices which support NEON.What's VitamioVitamio is a multimedia framework for all Android devices. Vitamio works like the Android's default MediaPlayer except that it includes much more powerful features. And it's absolutely free !Network ProtocolsThe following network protocols are supported for audio and video playback: MMS RTSP (RTP, SDP) HTTP progressive streaming HTTP live streaming (M3U8), for Android 2.1+Media formatsMany audio and video codecs are packed into Vitamio beside the default media format built in Android platform, some of them are listed below. divx/xvid wmv flv ts rmvb mkv mov m4v avi mp4 3gpSubtitlesVitamio support the display of many external and embedded subtitle formats. SubRip(.srt) Sub Station Alpha(.ssa) / Advanced Sub Station Alpha(.ass) SAMI(.smi/.sami) MicroDVD(.sub/.txt) SubViewer2.0(.sub) MPL2(.mpl/.txt) Matroska (.mkv) Subtitle TrackMore featuresThere are more wonderful features available in Vitamio. Background playback Multiple audio tracks support Mutitiple subtitles support, including external and embedded ones Processor optimization for many platforms Buffering when streaming Adjustable aspect ratio Automatically text encoding detectionAnd many other features are waiting for you !How to use VitamioPlease refer our website at http://vitamio.orgPlease don't hesitate to contact us if you have any problems.PrivacyWe must notify you that Vitamio will collect those information to improve itself when you using it.UniqueID generated from Device identifierVitamio reads your device identifier to generate an unique ID and collect the generated one instead of your device identifier. Most important, this generation can't be reversed. So don't worry about this, as it's not harmful.Device's CPU features and screen size.Vitamio will work on many different Android devices, different CPU architectures, different screen sizes and so on, so it needs to know the environment.The app's package name which is using VitamioThere're many apps which may use Vitamio, so Vitamio should know which process is using it to allocate proper resources.LicensesVitamio uses sevral opensource projects, thanks to them.FFmpeg, universalchardet

i-ONE뱅크를 이용해주셔서 감사합니다. 더 빠른 설치와 구동을 위해 지속적으로 업그레이드가 진행 중에 있습니다. 저희 IBK기업은행은 고객님의 소중한 의견에 항상 귀기울이겠습니다.i-ONE뱅크에 대해 궁금하신 점은 기업은행 고객센터 1566-2566(515)로 문의하여 주십시오.(상담가능시간 : 평일 9시 ~ 18시)1. 하나의 앱으로 모든 걸 한번에!뱅킹서비스, 상품가입, 자산관리 서비스로 바로 이동할 수 있으며, 별도의 추가 앱 설치 없이 모든 서비스를 통합적으로 이용할 수 있습니다.2. 뱅킹서비스은행지점에 가지않아도 대부분의 금융거래가 가능하며, 시력이 안좋은 이용자를 고려한 큰글씨뱅킹을 탑재하고 퇴직연금 및 IBK연금보험 등 금융거래 서비스를 확대하였습니다.3. 상품가입독자적으로 개발한 고객맞춤형 금융상품 추천기능과 다양한 상품검색기능으로 내게 필요한 상품을 빠르게 찾아줍니다. 주말•공휴일을 포함한 24시간 365일 가입이 가능합니다.4. 자산관리생애주기별 이벤트(결혼, 전세자금 등)에 따른 상품추천 서비스,고객님의 체계적인 은퇴준비를 위한 IBK평생설계, 자동이체, 카드결제일 등 지출일자와 금액을 알려주는 지출관리 기능을 통해 이제 스마트폰에서도 본격적인 자산관리가 시작됩니다.5. my ONE뱅크최근거래내역, 금융상품바구니, 만기도래 상품현황, 나의금융멘토 등 중요한 나만의 금융정보를 한눈에 확인할 수 있습니다.6. 기타어느 화면에서나 전체메뉴를 선택하면 필요한 금융서비스로 빠르게 이동할 수 있고, 메뉴검색을 통해 쉽게 찾을 수 있습니다. 안드로이드폰에서는 T-money 충전, 편의점 바코드결제 등을 이용할 수 있으며, 향후 제휴확대를 통해 다양한 지급결제서비스를 선보일 예정입니다.● 이용안내1. 이동통신사 3G/LTE, 무선인터넷(Wi-Fi)를 통해 다운로드 가능하며, 서비스 이용 시 이동통신사에 가입하신 요금제에 따라 데이터 이용요금이 부과될 수 있습니다.단, Wi-Fi를 통해 이용 시 보안정책상 특정포트를 제한하는 곳에서는 이용이 불가능할 수 있습니다.2. IBK기업은행은 어떠한 경우에도 고객님의 개인정보와 씨크리트카드 번호를 절대 요구하지 않습니다. 3. 이체 시 강제 종료되는 현상이 발생할 경우 스마트폰의 쿠키삭제 후 이용하시면 가능합니다. - 실행 후 [메뉴키]-설정-개인정보보호(및 보안)-쿠키 선택 후 삭제(모든 쿠키 삭제)4. 안전한 금융거래를 위해 탈옥, 루팅 등과 같이 운영체계가 변조된 경우 서비스 이용이 불가능합니다. 해당 단말기는 제조사 A/S센터 등을 통해 완전 초기화 후 i-ONE뱅크 앱 설치 및 이용해 주시기 바랍니다.5. 미지원기기 및 일부기기에서 발생하는 에러에 대해서는 고객센터(☎ 1566-2566)로연락하시어 문의주시면 자세하게 안내하여 드리겠습니다.

Samsung My KNOX gives you protection, privacy and productivity for your mobile work life. Use Samsung My KNOX to gain secure access to your work email and business apps on your personal Samsung smartphone, along with the tools to remotely find, lock or wipe your device in the event of loss or theft.Samsung My KNOX is a separate environment on your smartphone, complete with its own home screen, launcher, apps and widgets. All data inside Samsung My KNOX is encrypted, providing a secure and productive way to access confidential email and apps. Samsung My KNOX is designed to meet demanding enterprise security requirements, so it does not work on rooted devices.Samsung My KNOX creates a secure and productive space on your device Samsung My KNOX creates a separate, secure environment on your device for all your work-related data, ensuring it doesn’t mix with personal data. Apps outside the My KNOX environment cannot access data inside it, and apps inside My KNOX cannot access data outside it. Benefits •Convenience – Two devices in one: Separation between personal and work data.•Easy setup – No IT admin assistance needed.•Powerful, free apps – Pre-loaded in Samsung My KNOX.•Better security – Hardware and software security that delivers multiple protection layers for the operating system and apps. •Better privacy – Securely separates work data and apps from everyday content Reviews ⋆⋆⋆⋆⋆ “A must have! [Overview]ALSong is a free music player that displays the lyrics of the music playing. Free lyrics that are uploaded by the users are shown along with the music. Not only local music files like MP3 and FLAC, you can login to the Bugs Music then listen to the streaming music or download music files to play it.* ALSong Android TV Version *Listen to your music in Google Drive on your Android TV using the newly added Cloud Music function with ALSong synchronized lyrics.[Features]1. Free Live Lyrics- ALSong Music Player automatically finds the lyrics of the music file playing (such as MP3) then show it along with the music. The lyrics are cashed so data connection is not needed to see the lyrics the next time the same song is played.2. Display Auto Tagged Lyrics - If ALSong cannot show the lyrics in server or IRC lyrics, ALSong automatically displays the song’s lyrics tag if it exists in the music file. Only works when Auto Tag Lyrics is ON in Preferences.3. Playlists- Add your favorite songs to ALSong Playlist. You can create more than one playlists. Both local files like MP3 and Bugs streaming music can be added.4. Share via Twitter- You can post what song you are listening and your comment to twitter from ALSong. 5. Widget Supported- You can create a widget of ALSong music player on the home screen.6. Timer- You can set the time for ALSong to be terminated. The option is under Preferences.7. Section Repeat- You can set a starting point and an end point then repeat the section.8. Lyric Finder- If you want to search a lyric, you can search it then apply it to the music playing. It is useful if your local MP3 file cannot find the lyric automatically.9. Bugs Streaming Music- ALSong Music Player embeds Bugs Music service. By logging in, you can listen to the online streaming music. If you don’t have the music file in MP3, connect to this service then listen to the music!10. Equalizer (EQ)- Equalizer (EQ) function to customize the sound quality.11. Android TV Support- Listen to your music in Google Drive using the Cloud Music function in Android TV.- Synchronized lyrics of ALSong Mobile can also be used in ALSong Android TV.[FAQ]1. Control on Notifications is too big.- You can resize it by dragging with two fingers (Supported only in Android 4.1 or higher)2. I cannot see my music files added.- Press the “Scan Music Files” option in Preferences then the newly added music files will be added to ALSong. The more files you have in your phone, the more time will be spent to be scanned.3. Lyrics and music does not match.- Try finding a different music using the Lyric Finder.4. I cannot find Random playing and Repeat All function.- Tap on the button on the bottom left of the player screen. Each tap will change the mode to 1) repeating this song, 2) repeat every song one more time and 3) repeat every song. Tap on the button on the right to change the mode to sequential playing and random playing. The mode is on if the button turns blue.[System Requirements]Android 2.2, 2.3, 4.0, 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 4.4

Seguidamente se hará mención de las funcionalidades de la aplicación: •Para ver el menú de opciones deslice la pantalla de izquierda a derecha, también puede hacer clic en el icono que se encuentra en la barra superior o también puede hacer clic en el mensaje de instrucción que aparece al inicio.•Para volver al menú anteriormente visto puede presionar el boto atrás de su teléfono.•Diariamente en el menú de inicio se muestra un versículo diario para memorizar.•La biblia está dividida en antiguo y nuevo testamento, usted puede seleccionar el libro que usted desea y comenzar a leer los capítulos de la biblia, al lado de cada libro está el número de capítulos correspondiente.•Usted puede deslizar la pantalla para cambiar de capitulo o también puede hacer clic en las flechas izquierda y derecha, puede también ir directamente a un capitulo buscándolo por la lista haciendo clic en el icono de capítulos que está en el centro.•Puede seleccionar uno o varios versículos de un capitulo y mandar al marcalibros, copiar el versículo, crear un nuevo favorito o agregar a otro existente, crear una predica o agregar a otra, o compartir con un amigo el versículo.•El menú Clasificación de Libros te permitirá ver los libros según su clasificación y de igual forma podrás ir al libro que desees para leer sus capítulos.•El marcalibro te muestra los versículos que marcaste para tener rápido acceso o para ver luego.•El menú de Favoritos te permitirá ver y editar las notas, compartir tu grupo de favoritos y eliminar el grupo o algún versículo.•El menú Predicador te permitirá ver y editar el predicador y su título, compartir el grupo, editar una nota por versículo o borrarla y eliminar el grupo o algún versículo.•EL menú de Buscar te permitirá colocar una palabra en un campo de texto y buscar en toda la biblia, por antiguo o nuevo testamento, hasta por libro. appName: 三国双舞 -【本格三国志3DアクションRPG】
description: ――仲間と共に乱世を闘い抜け！世界500万プレイヤーを突破した、三国志が舞台の爽快3DアクションRPG「三国双舞」、遂に始動！ ハイクオリティな爽快アクションとドラマチックな三国志の世界を楽しもう！★☆リリース記念キャンペーン開催中☆★今プレイを開始すると、当日に150宝珠、翌日に趙雲プレゼント！さらに、30日間で最大1250宝珠がもらえるログインボーナスキャンペーン開催中☆■圧倒的爽快感！直観的な操作から繰り出す攻撃で敵を斬りまくれ！ 直観的な操作が可能な爽快フル3Dアクション！ 攻撃範囲・攻撃力が異なる武器5種から好みの武器を選び、通常攻撃・3種のスキル攻撃・ド派手な必殺技「乱舞」を繰り出し、敵の武将を討ち取れ！武器毎に異なる乱舞シーンは必見！■三国志の世界観を元にしたストーリーモード王道の三国志のストーリーを背景に、数々の名場面で迎えうつ敵将達とのバトル。敵将を討ち取り進行していく物語の先にあるドラマチックなストーリーを楽しもう！■仲間と共に闘え！白熱の完全リアルタイム対戦！ プレイヤー同士の一騎打ち、1対1の対戦。友達同士で協力して争う3対3、最大38人からなる義勇軍同士の共闘バトル。一瞬の油断が勝敗を左右する、白熱したプレイを楽しもう！友達同士で楽しめる完全リアルタイムなゲームモードを続々開放予定！■全武将が最高レアリティまで強化可能！ 有名武将が3Dで登場！仲間にした武将は最高レアリティまで強化可能！ 強力な武将に育て上げ、最強陣営で闘いに挑め！陣営を形成する武将同士の 相性により、戦力がさらにアップする陣営強化機能搭載！※登場武将の一部をページ下部に記載しております。■100億通り以上！自分だけのオリジナルキャラで最強を目指せ！ プレイヤーの分身である主人公の武器/装備/衣装の組み合わせ100億通り以上！組み合わせによる戦力強化はもちろん、衣装や戦旗などで見た目の変化も楽しめる！■オートプレイ機能で簡単片手プレイ！ 完全オートプレイモード、スキル発動のみ操作を行うセミオート機能で 隙間時間でも簡単片手でプレイを楽しめる！ - Escape bekjempe vanskelige tider med andre!Det brøt verden 5000000 spiller,Spennende 3D action RPG er den fasen av Three Kingdoms "Three Kingdoms Somai", endelig begynner!Nyt en verden av høy kvalitet spennende handling og dramatiske Three Kingdoms!★ ☆ utgivelsen jubileumskampanje blir holdt ☆ ★Spill Når du starter nå, på dagen 150 juvel, Zhao Yun gave til neste dag!I tillegg logg inn bonuskampanje konkurranser nå få opp til 1250 juvelen i 30 dager ☆■ overveldende oppmuntring! Burr sverd fiendens angrep for mating fra intuitiv betjening!Spennende full 3D handling mulig intuitiv betjening!Velg våpen av preferanse angrep rekkevidde, angripe strøm fra forskjellige våpen fem,Normal angrep - tre typer ferdigheter angrep-prangende dødsstøtet fôrer "Wild Dance",Uchitore fiendens krigsherrer! Wild dans scene som er forskjellig for hvert våpen er en må-se!■ Story modus som var basert på verdensbilde av Romance of the Three KingdomsPå bakgrunn av historien om de tre kongedømmer av den kongelige veien,Battle of feiret depresjon fienden general som i en rekke scener.Det ligger i forkant av historien som utvikler Uchitori fienden generelleNyt den dramatiske historien!■ Kjemp sammen med andre! Full sanntid match-up av gløde!Duell mellom spiller, en-mot-en kamp.3-to-tre konkurransen i samarbeid med hverandre venner,En samlet front Battle of milits hverandre som består av opptil 38 personer.For øyeblikket av vakt er innflytelse utfallet,Nyt det oppvarmede play!Full real-tid til å nyte hverandre vennerDen ene etter den andre åpen spillmodus!■ mulig å styrke alle krigsherrer til den høyeste sjeldenhet!Berømte krigsherrer dukket opp i 3D!Warlords var til stipendiat mulig styrke opp til sjeldenhet!Det hjalp vokse til en mektig krigsherre, overse i kampen mot den sterkeste camp!Avhengig av kompatibiliteten til krigsherrene med hverandre for å danne en leir,Camp forbedringer utstyrt med styrker ytterligere opp!※ Jeg har indikert den del av utseende warlords i bunnen av siden.■ 100 hundre millioner måter! Rett sterkest i det eneste opprinnelige karakter av deg selv!Helten er et alter ego for spilleren våpen / utstyr / draktKombinasjon 10 milliarder eller flere typer!Krefter forsterket ved kombinasjon av kurs,Endring av utseende i slike kostymer og slaget flagg kan også nyte!■ Enkel enhånds spill i auto-play-funksjonen!Full auto-play modus, i en semi-automatisk funksjon for å utføre operasjonen eneste ferdigheten aktivereLiker å spille med enkle ene hånden og med gap tid!

FrostWire Basic is a re-imagined free BitTorrent Client / MP3 Music and Video Downloader / designed with an everyday user in mind, but with fast download speeds to satisfy even the most demanding downloaders.What makes it so different? The built-in torrent search!With other BitTorrent clients you have to go outside of the app first and find the content to download yourself - whether it's music, a movie, app or an ebook - the process can get quite complicated and time consuming.FrostWire does the heavy lifting for you - it searches multiple torrent indexes and presents the search results right inside the app, separated by file type, ready for one-click download. It even lets you play most files BEFORE the download is complete, which is great when downloading larger files like HD movies or entire music albums.It has a built-in music player and a media browser, so you can download, easily access and play your files in the same app. PLEASE NOTE: The FrostWire Basic version CANNOT download from YouTube or SoundCloud any more in compliance with Google Play Developer guidelines. We had to take those options out of the app version from Google Play to remain listed in the App Store. All other FrostWire versions remain fully featured YouTube Downloaders & BitTorrent Clients in one.FrostWire is an Open Source project - you can find all android and desktop versions & download them FREE from our website - http://www.frostwire.com or contribute to the code at http://github.com/frostwireFEATURES:- Built in torrent search- Easy one-tap download & seed- Play while you download- Easily filter search results by file type: Music, Video, Images, Applications, Documents, Torrents- Open any .torrent file or paste magnet link in Transfers to download any file you want- Select Storage Location (Internal Storage or SD Card)- Download in Wi-Fi only mode (preserve mobile data)- Full featured music player with gesture support- Built in media browser (rename and delete your files from within the app)SUPPORT:Your feedback is very important to us!Please file a support request if you need any help, want to report a bug or just ask a question.http://support.frostwire.com/hc/en-us/requests/newGoogle Play comments and one star ratings don’t give us the opportunity to help you and fix the issue!If you are not getting ANY search results, make sure you have a strong internet connection.If you get an ERROR while downloading from cloud sources or your BitTorrent downloads PAUSE, please use a stable Wi-Fi - mobile data connection is still not very reliable. Email us at support@frostwire.com for a fix if you are not getting enough search results or feel like the results are not tailored to what you are looking for.You can also check our Knowledge Base http://bit.ly/1aAzcIw or get support from our online Community Forum http://forum.frostwire.comWe are very active on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/FrostwireOfficial and Twitter https://twitter.com/frostwire Come and talk to us!

Darmowe ogłoszenia z Twojej okolicy teraz w zasięgu Twojej ręki. Dzięki naszej mobilnej aplikacji w dowolnym miejscu i o dowolnej porze możesz szybko dodawać i przeglądać oferty pracy, mieszkania i używane samochody. Z aplikacją OLX.pl (dawniej Tablica.pl) na Androida masz również stały dostęp do swoich ogłoszeń jak i odpowiedzi, a komunikacja z użytkownikami serwisu staje się o wiele prostsza.Najważniejsze funkcje:- wyszukiwanie ogłoszeń w całym serwisie lub w wybranej kategorii i lokalizacji,- szybkie dodawanie zdjęć: prosto z komórki do Twojego ogłoszenia - nie musisz już szukać kabla, żeby połączyć się z komputerem,- łatwe i szybkie dodawanie ogłoszeń: wystarczy wybrać kategorię, umieścić krótki opis i dołączyć zdjęcia z telefonu,- powiadomienia Push: powiadomienie o każdej nowej odpowiedzi wprost na telefon - nawet jeśli aplikacja nie jest włączona.

appName: レシピブログ　～無料アプリ！NO.1料理ブログのレシピ満載～
description: 日本最大のお料理ブログのポータルサイト「レシピブログ」のスマートフォンアプリ。山本ゆりさん（syunkonカフェごはん、しゅんこんカフェごはん） 、みきママさん（藤原美樹）、Mizukiさん、ヤミーさん、SHIORIさん（彼ごはん）、JUNAさんなどテレビや雑誌で活躍する人気ブロガーが多数参加！1万6000件を超えるお料理ブログの中から、材料名や料理名で毎日の簡単おかず、お弁当、おつまみ、お菓子、パンなど手軽な料理レシピを検索できます。また、季節のイベント「クリスマス」「お正月」「バレンタイン」「ハロウィン」や調理器具「電子レンジ」「オーブン」「スチームケース」などからも検索が可能です。◆アプリの主な機能・人気ランキングの閲覧「ママの料理」「男の料理」「簡単・時短」などのカテゴリ別のブロガーランキングや「お菓子」「パン」「お弁当」などの料理レシピランキングが閲覧できます。・お気に入り登録機能気になるブログや料理レシピをクリッピングできます！（利用するにはレシピブログへの無料会員登録が必要です）・閲覧履歴の確認過去に閲覧した料理レシピの履歴が確認できます。【無料！会員登録でできる　myレシピブックの主な機能】・レシピ検索や人気のブログランキングを無制限にチェックできます！・myレシピブック機能でお気に入りのブログやレシピをクリッピングできます！・お気に入りのブロガーさんのブログ更新情報やアクションをタイムラインでお届けします！・感想コメントを書いたり、「おいしそう！」「ナイスフォト！」と応援したりメンバー同士でコミュニケーションができます。・TwitterやFacebookをお持ちの方は同じアカウントで無料会員登録が可能です。＜レシピブログのアプリで対応していないサービス＞※以下はPCサイトのコンテンツや機能となりスマートフォンアプリには搭載されていません。・人気ブロガーさんの連載やインタビューの閲覧・みんなの投稿コーナーやお気に入りアイテムファイルへの投稿・myレシピブックでのブログ記事やレシピの編集、レシピ判定

appName: フリマアプリ-モノキュン！オークションより簡単なフリマアプリ
description: ＼延長決定／手数料無料キャンペーンを実施中！・出品商品が売れたときの販売手数料無料（商品代金の10%）・コンビニ・ATMで支払いしたときの決済手数料無料◆いまだけ◆どちらも無料で取引ができます　※2017年6月30日までその他にも、買い物でポイントがもらえるお得なキャンペーンを随時、開催しています。アニメグッズやゲームの推しキャラ・推しメンのグッズを集めるなら、まずはモノキュン！をチェックしてみよう！■オタク向けフリマアプリ - モノキュン！とはモノキュン！は、あなたがキュン！とするアニメグッズやキャラクターグッズ、コスプレ衣装や声優・アイドルのレアグッズや希少フィギュアが集まるオタク向けフリマアプリ！オタクグッズを好きなアニオタ仲間がたくさんいるから、あなたがキュン！とするものがきっと見つかる！ヤフオクやモバオクなどのオークションが苦手な方や、通常のショッピングアプリでは満足できないオタクの方が、フリーマーケット感覚でお買い物ができるアプリです！▼あんしん・安全・かんたんな取引き１）商品をカメラで撮影！3分でかんたんに出品ができますスマホで商品の画像を撮影、紹介文を書いて値段を決めれば出品完了！面倒な出品作業も３分でラクラク！２）購入申請機能で、購入者を選択して取引することができます購入希望者は購入の意志を出品者に申請し、出品者はその相手と取引するかどうかを選ぶことができます購入申請機能を使うと、他のフリマアプリに同時出品中の商品などは即購入されずに安心して出品できます※購入申請機能は出品時に選択することができます３）商品の購入代金はクレジットカード／コンビニ／ATMでの支払いが選択できます支払い方法が選択できるので、コンビニに寄ったついででも支払いが可能！４）商品やお金のやり取りはモノキュン！事務局が仲介する安心の売買システムです運営事務局は信頼のNTTグループ〔NTTソルマーレ（株）〕です商品が届かない、商品がニセモノだった、壊れていたなどのトラブルにも安心サポートします※安心・安全な取引きのため、会員登録時にSMSによる電話番号認証を行います※配送先は日本国内に限ります＼こんな方に「オタク向けフリマアプリ - モノキュン！」はオススメ！／・押し入れに眠っているアニメグッズやコミック/マンガを整理したい・推しキャラや推しメンが変わった…今まで集めていたアニメ/アイドルグッズを売りたい方！・フィギュアグッズやカードがかぶった…・レアなグッズ/マニア向けの掘り出し物を探したい・リサイクルショップで買取してもらうより、同じ趣味の仲間に使ってほしい・メルカリ（mercari）やオタマート（Otamart）、フリル（fril）やラクマにも出品していて、もっと売れるフリマアプリを探している・育児、子育て中で子供が喜ぶおもちゃ・ホビー商品などを買物したいママ、主婦・アニメイト、とらのあな、まんだらけといったオタクショップに行くのが好き・リアルなフリーマーケットへの出品はやった事がなくて難しそう・ヤフオクやモバオクなどのオークションアプリでの買い物は難しそう…・昔憧れていたキャラグッズをもう一度集めたい・コミケなどで買い物するのは抵抗があるので、オタク向けアニメグッズをネット通販でこっそりショッピングしたい・秋葉原でのお買い物が大好きだが、遠くてあまり行けないので、オタクが集まるフリマアプリを探している・コスプレ衣装の置き場がない。。。誰かにコスプレ衣装を買ってもらいたい。＼「オタク向けフリマアプリ - モノキュン！」ではこんな商品の出品お待ちしています！／・“刀剣乱舞”“ラブライブ”“デレステ”など人気アニメの缶バッジ、ラバスト、クリアファイル、キーホルダー・“デレステ””スクスト”などヲタク向けキャラクターのぬいぐるみやポスター・一式セット、ウィッグ、アクセサリーなどコスプレ衣装・少年マンガ、少女マンガ、全巻セットなどコミック、本、雑誌・PS4、3DS、スーパーファミコンなどのゲーム機本体、ゲームソフト・アイドルや声優、歌い手のCD/DVD、ドラマCD、生写真、ライブグッズ・ビックリマン、ミックリマン、ももクロマン、遊戯王、アイカツなどのカードコレクション・スマホケース、イヤホンなどのアクセサリー類・ミニカー、ラジコン、プラモデルなどのおもちゃ・ホビー・ブリキの高額アイテム、昔遊んでいたブリキのおもちゃ・ウルトラマンなどのソフビ人形、懐かしのおもちゃ・推しているアイドルのコンサートツアーグッズや、ハンドメイドの応援グッズ・アニメ全般（アメコミマンガグッズ、アニメフィギュア、アニメポスター、アニメタペストリー）＼高額取引・人気があるアニメグッズ一例／ラブライブ：アニメやスマホゲーム化もされたラブライブ！ラブライブ人気は高く取扱い商品数も多い！スクールガールストライカーズ(スクスト)：スマホアプリから人気に火が付きTVアニメ化も決まったスクスト！スクストキャラのキーホルダーやフィギュアが人気！ガンダム：オタクといったらガンダム！？根強い人気を誇るガンダムシリーズは圧倒的にプラモデルの出品数が高い！ハイキュー：バレーボールをテーマにしたハイキュー！キーホルダーや下敷き、クッションなど幅広い商品があります！オルタナティブガールズ(オルガル)：オルガルは美少女キャラが特徴のスマホアプリゲーム！オルガルのフィギュアやトレーディングカードが人気！遊戯王：カードの王様といえば遊戯王カード！レアカードからデュエルで使えるカードまで数多くの出品数を誇ります！アイカツ：カードダスとして人気のアイカツ!はカードダスのみならず人形や文房具など様々なアイテムがあります。アイドルマスター：スマホゲームから人気に火が付いたアイドルマスター(アイマス)！PS4やXbox 360などのゲームソフトが人気！デレステ：アイドルマスター(アイマス)シリーズの人気作！特にデレステグッズは男性人気が強く高値で取引されています！＼「オタク向けフリマアプリ -
