Ab sofort können Sie uns dabei helfen, die nächste Generation der erfolgreichen App noch besser zu machen!Treten Sie jetzt der SBB Mobile Preview Community bei und testen Sie die neue Android App. www.sbb.ch/previewBitte beachten: für SBB Businesstravel Kunden gibt es die App „SBB Mobile Business“ im Android Market.SBB Mobile ist perfekt auf die Bedürfnisse der ÖV-Nutzer in der Schweiz zugeschnitten. Fahrpläne können in Echtzeit abgefragt und Billette direkt mit dem Smartphone gekauft und angezeigt werden.Fahrplanfunktionalitäten:• Nationale, internationale und städtische Fahrplanabfrage.• Suche nach Bahnhöfen, Haltestellen, (Kontakt)-Adressen mit GPS-Unterstützung, Verbindungen mit Velomitnahme und barrierefreie Verbindungen.• Anzeige von Verbindungen und Fahrtinformationen (in Echtzeit).• Belegungsprognose• «Take me home»-Funktion.• Abfahrts-/Ankunftstabellen.• Kartendarstellung von Start- und Zielorten.• Fahrplanabfragen im Kalender importieren und per Mail verschicken.• Favoriten-Auswahl.Billettfunktionen• Kauf und Anzeige von Billetten des Öffentlichen Verkehrs der Schweiz für bis zu 8 Mitreisende.• Das Angebot umfasst u.a. Einzelbillette, Tarifverbundbillette, Tageskarten, Sparbillette, Klassenwechsel, Sitzplatzreservierungen für die Schweiz.• Die Bezahlung erfolgt mit Kreditkarte oder PostFinance Card. Voraussetzung ist eine einmalige Registrierung im SBB Ticket Shop (Menüpunkt «Billette»).Weitere Informationen: www.sbb.ch/mobileDatensicherheit & BerechtigungenWofür benötigt SBB Mobile die Berechtigungen?Standort.Damit Sie die Take me home-Funktion effektiv nutzen können, muss die GPS-Funktion aktiv sein, damit SBB Mobile die nächste Haltestelle finden kann. Dasselbe gilt, wenn Sie im Fahrplan die nächste Haltestelle in der Umgebung anzeigt haben möchten.Internetzugriff.SBB Mobile benötigt den Internetzugriff auf Fahrplandaten und Ticket Shop-Daten, damit die App Ihre Anfragen beantworten kannKontaktdaten.SBB Mobile benötigt den Zugriff auf Ihre Kontaktdaten, damit Sie beim Billettkauf Mittreisende aus dem Adressbuch importieren und bei Fahrplan-Abfragen Kontaktadressen als Destination auswählen können.Kalender und Mail.Sie können Fahrplanausgaben in Ihren eigenen Kalender speichern und die Verbindung per Mail verschicken (Freunde, externen Kalender). Um die gewünschte Fahrplanausgabe im Kalender zu importieren, benötigt SBB Mobile Schreib- und Leserechte.Speicher.SBB Mobile benötigt für die Offline-Funktionalitäten wie z.B. Haltestellenliste, Verbindungen (Verlauf) und Billettekauf den Zugriff auf den Speicher (App-eigene Einstellungen speichern).Standby-Modus deaktivieren.SBB Mobile benötigt das Recht, den Standby-Modus zu deaktivieren,, um zu verhindern, dass sich der Bildschirm des Smartphones ausschaltet. Zum Beispiel bei Push-Benachrichtigungen, damit das Gerät nicht stand by geht, bevor Sie die Meldung erhalten haben.Vibrationsalarm steuern.SBB Mobile muss für Push_Benachrichtigungen den Vibrationsalarm steuern können, damit das Gerät vibrieren kann, wenn eine Push-Meldung eintrifft.QR Reader.Damit Sie den QR Reader nutzen können, benötigt die App den Zugriff auf die Kamera. Sie werden unter dem Punkt Hardware-Steuerelemente Android Kamera nach der Berechtigung gefragt

Medscape from WebMD (medscape.com) is the leading medical resource most used by physicians, medical students, nurses and other healthcare professionals for clinical information.The Medscape app is the highest rated, fastest growing free mobile app for healthcare professionals with over 4 million registered users.The Medscape app for Android™ is available for free.All features are available for free. Authored and reviewed by expert physicians.- Medical Calculators Access 129 medical calculators covering formulas, scales, and classifications directly through the calculator feature. Plus, 600+ drugs in our drug reference have integrated dosing calculators.- Drug Formulary InformationFind out whether a drug is covered under a particular health plan and easily compare tier status for drugs in the same class to consider an alternative for your patient. Choose from our complete list of 1,800 plans across all 50 states. - Continuing Medical Education Courses:Complete accredited CME/CE courses for professional development and to fulfill licensure requirements. Courses available in 1,000+ topics across 30+ specialties.- Offline Access:Drug, condition, and procedure reference, plus drug interaction checker can be accessed without an internet connection when you select the option to download our clinical reference database. For more information, visit medscape.com/mobileapp Please remember, we aren’t able to respond to you based on comments. If you have any suggestions to improve our app or are having issues using our app, please contact us through our online help center at help.medscape.com.Supported Device and OS Information: Supported Devices: Google Nexus S, Samsung Galaxy S II, Samsung Galaxy S III, Google Nexus 7, Samsung Galaxy Note II, Samsung Galaxy Nexus, Motorola Droid Razr, Samsung Galaxy Note, HTC Evo 4G, HTC IncredibleSupported OS: 2.3, 4.0, 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 4.4NOTE: Users with 'rooted' devices and ad-blocker software installed may experience connectivity errors while using Medscape.Please disable ad-blocker software before attempting to download Medscape's offline Clinical Reference.

Remind (formerly Remind101) is a free, safe, and simple way for teachers to communicate with students and parents. Send updates, questions, and more to any device—students and parents can receive notifications by text message, on the app, on the web, and by email. * Save time by sending quick, one-way announcements to an entire class.* Reach individuals and small groups directly with instant, safe messages. * Personal phone numbers are never shared, and message history can be accessed at any time.In one Harvard University study, frequent teacher-family communication increased the likelihood of homework completion by 42% and decreased instances of teacher redirection by 25%. Communication is critical to student success, and Remind can help teachers build strong relationships with students and their families.If you love Remind, share the app with your colleagues or write a review!BLOOMBERG BUSINESSWEEK: “Jessica D, a teacher in Louisiana, uses Remind daily to brief parents on whether their children did well in class and what their homework is for the night. She says the app has led more students to complete their homework and even credits it with improving scores on standardized tests. “The word I use is ‘transform,’ ” she says. “It transformed my classroom. And I think it made me a better teacher.”BUZZFEED: “...SMS allows the app to be used by parents without smartphones. Brett Kopf said that Remind’s features have proved especially popular in low-income districts, where parent engagement is a key issue for teachers, and parents’ sometimes erratic work schedules can make it difficult to get in touch by phone.”

Für eine einfache Buchungen in Zukunft können Sie häufige Abholung Adressen als "Favoriten" oder einfach re-Buch aus einer Aufzeichnung der letzten Buchung Adressen hinzuzufügen.Booking Details wie cab Anzahl und voraussichtliche Ankunftszeit per SMS gesendet werden.Also mach weiter, laden Sie sich unsere Tap einen Cab App jetzt, alle diese Bequemlichkeit zu Ihrem Komfort.FUNKTIONENNew BuchungenWahl der Strom-und VorausbuchungenAutomatische Erkennung und Einfügen des aktuellen oder ausgewählten Standort aus der Karte in der AbholadresseAuswahl von Taxi-TypAuswahl der Anzahl von Taxis (bis zu 3 Taxis)BuchungsstandReservierungs-Status wird auf der Buchungsbestätigung Seite angezeigt werden und auch per SMSLetzte StandorteAnmeldung ist nicht erforderlich, um diese Funktion zu genießenApp wird einzufangen Adressen Ihrer letzten Buchung. 【超豪華スタッフが織りなす世界観】スマホゲームの常識を覆す、ゲーム業界屈指のスタッフが一挙集結！イメージイラスト：天野 喜孝サウンド：岩田 匡治（ベイシスケイプ）シナリオ：田中 豪/松元 弘毅（Romancework）キャラクターボイス：松岡禎丞/佐倉綾音/小清水亜美/赤羽根健治 他壮大なスケール、重厚な物語、感情を揺さぶるサウンド…超豪華スタッフが綴る、圧倒的な世界観を堪能せよ！単なるスマホゲームを越えたドラマがここに。【手軽で爽快な片手縦持ちプレイ】バトルでは、2D横スクロールアクションを採用。敵味方がリアルタイムに動きまわる戦場で、あなたのスキルが試される。キャラや武器ごとの豊富なスキルで、迫り来る敵を翻弄しろ！また、片手で遊べる簡単操作でありながら、ジャンプやステップなど、多彩なアクションが可能。上下左右、様々な敵の範囲攻撃を、華麗にかわして反撃だ！さらに、スキルをヒットさせると、魔石ゲージが上昇。コンボをつなぎ、ゲージを溜めて、大技「魔石解放」を叩き込め！！協力プレイで力を合わせれば、さらに強力な一撃を放つこともできるぞ！【4つのジョブ・最大3人の協力プレイ】登場する様々なキャラクターには、4種類のジョブが存在。近距離×高火力の、ファイター。中距離×バランス型の、ナイト。遠距離攻撃が得意な、マジシャン。回復や支援重視の、プリースト。それぞれの特色を活かしたパーティーで、様々なステージを踏破せよ！また、最大3人でのオンラインマルチプレイが可能。コミュニケーションをとりながら、力を合わせ、強敵を討ち倒せ！【武具＆キャラクターをカスタマイズ】作中入手できる武具や、同行する仲間は、街で強化することが可能。武具の「強化」や「進化」のほか、キャラクターの「能力解放」で、自分好みのステータスにカスタマイズ。頼もしい仲間や、強力な武具を、自分のプレイスタイルに合わせて育成しよう！【実力派声優陣が物語を演出！】主人公らのボイス担当として、松岡禎丞、佐倉綾音、小清水亜美、赤羽根健治ら豪華声優陣が集結！重厚なストーリーに命を吹き込み、臨場感あふれるボイスで盛り上げる！【ストーリー】海峡に浮かぶ小さな島、「ヴァインランド」西にローム教会を掲げる五星連合国を構え、東には軍事力により大陸を支配するクザン帝国を臨む。列強の大国の挟間に置かれながらも、かの地は、古来より魔石使いの一族の力によって独立を守られてきた。だが、魔石使いの力を欲する両大国の思惑は、静かに、それでいて確実に島の人々の心を蝕んでいった。やがて歴史は、連合に与する者達、帝国に与する者達、中立と独立を謳う者達を生んだ。銀の氏族を中心とした連合派。白の氏族を中心とした帝国派。青と赤の氏族を中心とした中立派。三分された島の統治は乱れ、頻発する小競り合いにより多くの血が流れた。島は、終わりの見えない内乱の時代へと突入していた。--------------------------------【推奨スペック】Android4.1以上RAM:2GB容量:1GBCPU:snapdragon Bem-vindo ao blah versão beta!O blah juntou tudo para você em um só lugar. Seus contatos da agenda, os das redes sociais e ainda uniu todos os jeitos de falar: Voz, SMS, chat, chamada voIP e chamada de vídeo.Com o blah você pode falar ao mesmo tempo com até quatro pessoas via Chamada blah (voIP) e Chamada de vídeo. E até 100 pessoas via chat.Na agenda de contatos, todos os contatos são identificados visualmente com círculos. Isso ajuda a identificar os contatos que são TIM, ajudando os clientes a fazer chamadas entre clientes da mesma operadora e assim economizar nas ligações. • Multi-Device: Vários aparelhos utilizando uma única conta• Chamada Inteligente: Corrige automaticamente o formato do número no momento da ligação• Interceptação SMS: Recebe e envia torpedos na mesma tela do chat• Envio de arquivos: Compartilhe arquivos como .pdf e .doc com seus contatos• Envio de localização, imagens, vídeos e arquivos de vozSaiba mais em: www.blah.com.brPerguntas Frequentes: http://blah.com.br/faqTráfego de dados cobrado conforme plano de serviços de sua operadora. Bienvenue à bla bêta!Le bla rejoint tout pour vous en un seul endroit. Contacts de votre répertoire, les réseaux sociaux et les toujours unis les façons de parler: voix, SMS, chat, appels VoIP et l'appel vidéo.Avec le bla vous pouvez parler simultanément avec un maximum de quatre personnes par l'intermédiaire de bla d'appel (VoIP) et l'appel vidéo. Et jusqu'à 100 personnes par chat.Dans le carnet d'adresse, tous les contacts sont identifiés visuellement par des cercles. Cela permet d'identifier les contacts qui sont TIM, aidant les clients à faire des appels entre les clients du même fournisseur de services, et ainsi sauvegarder les liens.• Multi-périphérique: Plusieurs périphériques en utilisant un seul compte• Appel Intelligent: corrige automatiquement le format de nombre sur le pouvoir• Interception SMS: envoyer et recevoir des messages texte sur le même chat écran• Envoi de fichiers: Partager des fichiers pdf et doc comme à vos contacts• Envoi de localisation, photos, vidéos et fichiers audioPour en savoir plus: www.blah.com.brFAQ: http://blah.com.br/faqLe trafic de données facturé en fonction de votre plan de service de transport.

En ucuz uçak bileti alabildiğiniz UcakBileti.com artık her an yanınızda. Pegasus, Atlasjet, Onur Air, Thy, Sunexpress, Anadolu Jet, Bora Jet başta olmak üzere tüm dünya havayollarını en uygun fiyatları bulmak için sorgulama yapabilir ve uçak biletleri alma işlemini buradan gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.Uçak Bileti SorgulamaUygulama sayesinde tek ekranda tüm havayollarını karşılaştırabilmek mümkün. Bunun yanında gidiş ve dönüş biletlerini farklı havayollarından alabilirsiniz. Aktarmalı, direkt ve iptal edilebilir uçuşları, kalkış-varış saatlerine, havayolu ve havalimanına göre listeleyebilirsiniz.Uçak Bileti FiyatlarıEn uygun uçak bileti fiyatı bulabildiğiniz sistemde ayrıca yapılan kampanyalar ve daha düşük biletleme ücretleri sayesinde en ucuz bileti alabilmeniz mümkün oluyor. Rezervasyon imkânı ve indirim kuponlarıyla daha hesaplı uçun. Kullanıcı dostu ara yüzüyle biletinizi kredi kartına 9 aya varan taksit seçenekleriyle en hızlı şekilde satın alabilirsiniz.Dünyanın önde gelen güvenlik altyapısı firması GeoTrust Global CA tarafından sağlanan SSL sertifikasına sahip Ucakbileti.com’da yapılan tüm satışlarda 3D güvenlik sertifikası uygulanmaktadır.THY Uçak BiletiSkytrax 2015 verilerine göre Avrupa’nın en iyi, dünyanın en iyi 4. hava yolu şirketi olan Türk Hava Yolları dünyada toplam 267 noktaya sefer düzenlemekte. Dünya’da Turkish Airlines markası ile hizmet veren firmaya ait tüm uçuşlar uygulamamız üzerinden en cazip fiyat avantajları ile satın alınabilir. Pegasus Uçak BiletiOfficial Airline Guide verilere göre iki yıl üst üste “Avrupa’nın En Hızlı Büyüyen Hava Yolu” seçilen Pegasus Hava Yolları 30 yurt içi 59 yurt dışı olmak üzere toplam 89 noktaya uçmaktadır. Pegasus Hava Yolları genel olarak Sabiha Gökçen Havalimanı’nı merkez olarak kullanmaktadır, sadece İzmir uçuşlarını İstanbul Atatürk Havalimanı’ndan yapmaktadır.Atlasjet Uçak Bileti2004 yılında ilk tarifeli uçuş seferlerine başlayan AtlasJet, 2015 yılında adını AtlasGlobal olarak değiştirmiştir. Yurt içinde ve yurtdışında bir çok noktaya uçmaktadır.Onur Air Uçak Bileti1992 yılında kurulan Onurair Türkiye’nin en eski özel hava yolu şirketdir. İç hatlarda 13, dış hatlarda 9 farklı noktaya uçuş gerçekleştirir. Uçuşları İstanbul Atatürk Havalimanı’nı merkez olarak kullanır. Ayrıca Onur Air, Türkiye’de uçak bakımlarını kendi hangarında gerçekleştiren tek özel hava yoludur.Sunexpress Uçak Bileti1989 yılında Antalya merkezli olarak kurulan SunExpress Hava Yolları, Türkiye’nin yurt dışına tarifeli sefer düzenleyen ilk özel hava yoludur. Hava yolu şirketi Lufthansa ve Türk Hava Yolları’nın ortak şirketidir. İkinci merkezini 2006 yılında İzmir’de açan SunExpress Hava Yolları’nın, üçüncü merkezi ise İstanbul Sabiha Gökçen Havalimanı’dır. Avrupa’ya tarifeli veya charter uçuşlar düzenlemektedir. 2010 yılında Türkiye’de ilk kez Anadolu şehirlerini Almanya’nın önemli destinasyonlarına bağlayan tarifeli uçuşlara başlamıştır.Anadolujet Uçak BiletiTürk Hava Yolları’na bağlı olarak 2008 yılında kurulan Anadolu Jet, Ankara merkezli bir hava yolu şirketidir. Türk Hava Yolları’na kıyasla daha sınırlı servis sunarak bilet fiyatlarını düşürmeyi ve daha çok yolcunun hava yolu ulaşımından faydalanmasını hedeflemiştir. Anadolu’da 45 noktaya sefer yapmaktadır. Anadolu Jet uçuşlarının tamamı ekonomi sınıfı olarak gerçekleştirilir.Bora Jet Uçak Bileti2010 yılından itibaren T.C. Ulaştırma Bakanlığı Sivil Havacılık Genel Müdürlüğü tarafından sertifikalandırılmış, Türkiye’de dolmuş uçak taşımacılığı yapan ilk hava yolu şirketidir. Dolmuş uçak taşımacılığı, küçük gövdeli ama konforlu uçaklarla, büyük gövdeli uçakların iniş-kalkış yapamadığı havalimanlarınından merkezi havalimanlarına yolcu taşıyabilmek için geliştirilmiş bir proje. Bu projenin Türkiye’deki öncülerinden olan BoraJet, en fazla 100 kişilik uçaklarıyla yolcularına alternatif hatlar sunuyor.

appName: Garena 傳說對決 - 5v5 公平團戰 MOBA 手遊
description: ★ 遊戲簡介《Garena 傳說對決》由 Garena 與騰訊天美工作室所合作開發，是一款能讓 10 位玩家同場競技的多人對戰 MOBA 手遊。簡單好上手的操作方式、細膩的畫風與高品質的遊戲畫面、多樣化的英雄與遊戲模式，無論你是操作華麗的神手玩家，或是想與三五好友輕鬆對戰的休閒玩家，都不能錯過襲捲台港澳的傳說風潮！★ 遊戲特色【三路推塔、十人激戰】：經典的三路推塔 MOBA 玩法，以上中下三路搭配 10 位玩家的英雄選擇與策略思考，激盪出無限種對戰可能！【公平對戰、隨時開團】：遊戲中不販售任何可能影響英雄強弱與戰局勝敗的物品，提供絕對公平的對戰環境，無論新手或老手，想當王者只能憑實力！【獨特英雄、精美畫風】：機智小狐狸、賣萌羊咩咩、可愛小胖子、超殺高校女…數十位別具特色的獨特英雄，國際級一流畫師所繪製的精美畫風，選出你的本命角色大殺四方！【多種模式、豐富玩法】：1v1、3V3、5V5 - 無論你喜歡單挑或團戰，多樣化的對戰模式都能讓你欲罷不能！【節奏快速、想玩就玩】：平均一場10分鐘的對戰，零碎時間拿起手機隨時解放壓力！傳說對決，逗陣來玩！★ 聯繫我們Garena 傳說對決官方網址：http://moba.tw/Garena 客服中心：https://m.service.garena.tw/Facebook 粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/1164866106908877/

Get ready to drink socially with Untappd!Untappd is a social discovery and check-in network for anyone that enjoys beer. It gives you the ability to easily find nearby craft beers and bars, see what beers are trending, as well as see where your friends are drinking. Check out the personalized recommendations and use Untappd to find the nearest location you can get the beer you want. Once you’ve got that delicious beer in your hand, use Untappd to track, rate, take a photo, and share it with all your friends. As you explore more beer styles and locations, you will uncover a variety of badges!Features:- Easily discover new beers and bars near your location- See where you’re friends are drinking and meet up with them- Personalized beer recommendations based on the tastes of you and your friends- Find where you can get a specific beer nearby- Share ratings, reviews and photos of your favorite beers with your friends- Post your activity and photos to your Twitter, Facebook and Foursquare- Create a wish list of beers you want to try in the future- Unlock a variety of badges for trying different styles and placesFor help and support, visit http://help.untappd.comFollow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/untappdLike us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/untappdUntappd reminds you to please drink responsibly.

Do you like Air Bank? You can go out with her.With our mobile banking application, you can like us wherever you are. And what does it do?It shows you anytime how much money you have in your account. You can comfortably submit a specific payment by simply scanning a QR code. You have a perfect overview of all your payments. Moreover, there are extra handy filters. You can also sort your individual payments into groups so you know how much you spend.You would like to withdraw money and do not carry the card? In a few seconds it will create a code for you with which you can withdraw money without your card at more than 4,300 Sazka terminals.When you point your camera at the street, you immediately see the nearest ATM, our branch or Sazka terminal.It helps you block your card or change its limits within a few moments. It constantly carries current exchange rates with it and entertains you with our news.Your best choice is to get to know the application by yourself. Tip: You can set additional security measures, for instance confirmation of your payments by a signature password. You can create this password simply in your internet banking and change it anytime in the same place.For each mobile phone in which you have the application, you can specify in your internet banking whether you will carry out active operations through it, such as payment orders.If you lose your cell phone, remember that you can easily block it in your internet banking. Once you do, nobody can access your accounts from it.

Приложение ИЛЬ ДЕ БОТЭ — это магазин в вашем мобильном устройстве, в котором вы найдёте широкий ассортимент косметики, парфюмерии, средств по уходу за кожей, продукции для волос и ногтей, аксессуаров для мужчин и женщин от более чем 120 всемирно известных брендов. ИЛЬ ДЕ БОТЭ входит в состав компании SEPHORA (группа LVMH) и занимает лидирующие позиции на рынке парфюмерно-косметической продукции в России уже более 10 лет.Особенности приложения:ДИСКОНТНАЯ КАРТАОформите виртуальную дисконтную карту при первой покупке через приложение с начальной скидкой 10% или привяжите вашу дисконтную карту ИЛЬ ДЕ БОТЭ к приложению, чтобы пользоваться ею в магазинах вместо пластиковой карты. КАРТА ГОРОДАКарта подскажет адреса всех магазинов ИЛЬ ДЕ БОТЭ в вашем городе, а также адрес и контакты самого близкого к вам.ДОСТАВКА И ОПЛАТАВы можете сделать заказ для себя или отправить подарок на адрес близкого человека в любой населенный пункт России. Оплатить заказ можно как наличными при получении, так и с помощью банковской карты и других электронных способов. WISHLISTЕсли товара нет на складе, добавьте его в Wishlist, и приложение скажет вам, когда он появится в наличии.PUSH-УВЕДОМЛЕНИЯПолучайте информацию о статусе вашего заказа, поступлении новых коллекций, акциях и скидках.ФИЛЬТРЫДля удобства поиска сортируйте товары по названию, цене, бренду или дате. Внутри каждой категории товаров встроен тонкий фильтр, учитывающий специфику товара и ваши предпочтения.ПОИСКИщите нужный вам товар или бренд через строку поиска и рассказывайте о понравившихся товарах друзьям через функцию «Поделиться». Appendix ILE DE BEAUTE - a store in your mobile device, where you will find a wide range of cosmetics, perfumery, products for skin care, hair and nail products and accessories for men and women from more than 120 world-famous brands.ILE DE BEAUTE is a part of the company SEPHORA (group LVMH) and holds a leading position in the market of perfumery and cosmetic products for over 10 years in Russia.Features of the app:DISCOUNT CARDArrange a virtual loyalty card at the first purchase through the app with an initial discount of 10% or tie your discount card ILE DE BEAUTE to the application to use it in shops instead of a plastic card.CITY MAPMap will prompt the address of ILE DE BEAUTE stores in your city, and the address and contact closest to you.SHIPPING AND PAYMENTYou can order for yourself or send a gift to the address of a loved one in any settlement of Russia. Pay for the order can be cash on delivery or by credit card or other electronic means.WISHLISTIf out of stock, add it to Wishlist Home, and the app will tell you when it is back in stock.PUSH-NOTICEGet information about the status of your order, new collections, promotions and discounts.FILTERSFor convenience sort products by name, price, or brand to date. Within each category of products is integrated fine filter, taking into account the specifics of the goods and your preferences.SEARCHSearch for your desired product or brand through search string and talk about favorite products to friends via the "Share".

description: “เรื่องเล่าเช้านี้” (Ruenglao) คือ Application ที่จะไม่ทำให้ “แฟนข่าว” พลาดเหตุการณ์สำคัญ ประเด็นที่น่าสนใจ กับ รายการเรื่องเล่าเช้านี้ นำทีมโดย- สรยุทธ สุทัศนะจินดา- พิชญทัฬห์ จันทร์พุฒ- เอกราช เก่งทุกทาง- อริสรา กำธรเจริญ- สู่ขวัญ บูลกุลพร้อมด้วยทีมข่าวเรื่องเล่าเช้านี้ และครอบครัวบันเทิง นำโดย- โก๊ะตี๋ อารามบอย- เบนซ์ พรชิตา- จอย รินลณี- โอ๋ ภัคจิราที่พร้อมเสิร์ฟทุกข้อมูลผ่านมือถือตลอด 24 ชั่วโมง“เรื่องเล่าเช้านี้” ออกอากาศทางสถานีโทรทัศน์ ไทยทีวีสีช่อง 3 ทุกวันจันทร์ – ศุกร์ เวลา 6.00 – 9.30 น.“แฟนข่าว” สามารถติดตามรายการได้ที่ http://morning-news.bectero.com/ หรือ http://เรื่องเล่าเช้านี้.com พร้อมด้วย http://www.facebook.com/MorningNewsTV3 และ http://www.twitter.com/MorningNewsTV3

收藏來自世界各地 80,000 道以上的食譜！「愛料理」被數百萬計的人們喜愛，是台灣最大的食譜網站。「愛料理 App」最棒的特色，就是能夠讓你隨時隨地，在任何一種情境與氛圍，都能逛食譜、決定當日與來日的美味菜單。你可以尋找喜愛的食譜，收藏在自己的清單中，隨時再繼續使用。突破限制地將美食、做菜完好的融入你的生活！找尋每日的菜單外，你還能選擇多元的情境主題，如 "懶人的快速食譜"，"新年年節的菜餚"，"完美的野餐派對食物"，"深夜必吃的美味食堂"。在這裡你一定能找到適合你的完美料理配方！「料理是全世界共通的語言，橫跨空間與時間，乘載與傳遞人與人之間的愛與暖意。」 — 愛料理- 今天想吃什麼？80,000道食譜快速搜尋• 瀏覽愛料理站上最熱門、最新的完整食譜• 各式各樣你想要的情境主題，如「情人節」「聖誕節」「低卡瘦身」「異國料理」「時令節氣」• 透過關鍵字搜尋，食材、菜餚、功效的名稱，如「美容」• 你可以快速找到你想要的完美食譜- 每日推薦你料理點子• 告訴你熱門搜尋關鍵字，看大家都吃什麼• 數不盡的創意料理激發你的靈感- 保存你最喜愛的食譜• 輕鬆收藏喜愛的食譜並隨身攜帶• 可以將保存的食譜分類成自訂的收藏清單，如「美味的點心」「爸爸最喜歡的菜」- 發表你的食譜• 輕鬆的記錄下每日的料理步驟與食材配方- 「愛做菜」「學做菜」都愛用• 一個步驟一個步驟照著食譜完成菜餚• 貼心的食材採買清單與提醒功能，讓你不會忘了買任何一樣食材- 你的料理，是世界共通的語言• 利用「我也做了」功能上傳你的成品照與其他主廚互動• 快速分享喜愛的食譜給 Facebook 或 LINE 家人好友• 你可以追隨喜愛的主廚，認識來自世界各地愛做菜的人們網站網址：http://icook.tw歡迎到愛料理FB粉絲團按讚：http://fb.com/icooktw客服疑問請來信到：hi@icook.tw開發/維護 by Sleepnova, Inc.http://www.sleepnova.org/?ref=iCook_Play

Alarm Clock is the new form of simplicity with elegantly designed clocks and intelligent algorithm for alarm activations. The app is built around flexible and intelligent algorithm for alarm activations. Our alarms auto adjust themselves while the time zone changes and each alarm starts with predefined settings. If you talk on the phone, the alarm is automatically played in a lower tone as not to disturb you. While the alarm runs and someone is calling you, it will auto snooze and start playing the call ringtone. Alarm Clock is designed to free you from annoyance and will obey to all your needs of how you want to be woken up or reminded for the important things in your life. Apart from minimalistic design, we have also developed Alarm Clock to use very low system resources. It can be used as an alarm manager, and it can be used as beautiful desk clock as it sits on your charger – the choice is yours. We have also thought about usability – the digital modes have one of the biggest and easily noticeable digits, so they can be enjoyed in any light settings and from a great viewing distance.FEATURES- 4 types of stylish designer clocks – analog dark, analog light, digital dark, and digital light- Unlimited alarms and timers – set them multiple times, one at a time, repeating or recurring, with tunes from your own phone library- Flexible and intuitive algorithm for alarm activations - Beautiful 2x1 and 4x2 widgets, along with lock screen widgets- Presents a lot of customization options to best suit your flavors- 3 types of notifications – next alarm, missed alarms, present active alarms- One size fits all – our app utilizes unique architecture that equally supports smartphones with the smallest screens up to the largest tablet screens without affecting in any matter the size of the app - Intuitive app settings – get an easy access to all options you need- Wake up with your favorite music - Auto adjustment for alarms while changing time zones- Set custom labels for alarms and timers with unrestricted length of the text- Utilizes 12 or 24 time format- Use automatic auto snooze to preserve your battery life or tune up the snooze time by yourself - Specially tailored for both landscape and portrait modes- An option to allow and disable the notifications- Pretty and lightweight you can use it as a nightstand clock- Build from the ground up with native tablet support- Offers quality support for Android devices – from Android 1.5 to Android 4.4- Optimized for all known screen resolutions - Your wish is our command! Choose by yourself what will be the next feature of Alarm Clock – send us e-mail or leave a comment with your suggestions. Get in touch with us and follow the latest news regarding our apps:http://www.facebook.com/macropinchhttp://twitter.com/macropinch

Access your Android's built-in Linux command line shell. Unleash your inner geek!This is a new version of the popular "Android Terminal Emulator" application. Same great program, just with a new name.Top Features+ Full Linux terminal emulation.+ Multiple windows.+ Launcher short cuts.+ UTF-8 text. (Arabic, Chinese, Greek, Hebrew, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Thai, etc.)+ Completely free. No ads, no in-app-purchases, no nag screens, nothing.Quick FAQ:+ If you are having trouble entering text, try installing the free "Hacker's Keyboard IME". (Especially if you have a Samsung or HTC device.)+ This app isn't a game emulator.+ This app won't help you root your phone or change your phone's IMEI.+ You need to know (or be willing to learn) how to use the Linux command line to use this app.+ You may want to install a set of command line utilities like "Busy Box" or "Debian chroot" in order to add commands beyond the commands that come built into your Android device.+ If you get a -505 error when trying to install this app under Android 5.0, it means that some other app is using the same permissions. You will have to uninstall the other app in order to install Terminal Emulator for Android. (People tell me that "jrummy's Toolbox Pro" causes this problem.)Want to know more about Terminal Emulator for Android?Join the G+ community: #Android Terminal Emulatorhttps://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/106164413936367578283Or check out the documentation wiki:http://github.com/jackpal/Android-Terminal-Emulator/wikiWant to add or improve a translation of Terminal Emulator for Android? See https://github.com/jackpal/Android-Terminal-Emulator/wiki/Translating-to-Other-Languages for instructions.

En popüler videolar artık cebinizde! Fizymotion uygulaması ile özel olarak derlenen binlerce videoyu izleyebilir, ilgili alanınıza göre 14 farklı kategoriden istediğinizi seçip en güncel ve popüler videolara rahatlıkla erişebilirsiniz. Bu uygulamada Haber, Spor, Ekonomi gündeminden son dakika haberlerini bulabilir, son teknolojik gelişmeler için özel olarak çekilen videoları ve oyun incelemelerini seyredebilirsiniz. Turkcell Akademinin sizin için seçtiği eğitim videolarını seyrederken, çocuklarınızın ve bebeklerinizin gelişimiyle ilgili uzman görüşlerini takip edebilirsiniz. “Ne yemek yapsam?” ya da “Bu sezon neler moda?” diyorsanız en lezzetli yemek tariflerinden moda ve güzellik dünyasıyla ilgili tüm ipuçlarına fizymotion ile ulaşabilirsiniz.Gündem, Eğlence, Eğitim, Sağlık ve daha bir çok kategoride videoları bulabileceğiniz fizymotion ile en beğendiğiniz videoları Facebook ve Twitter ile tüm arkadaşlarınızla paylaşabilirsiniz. Size özel hazırlanan bu uygulamayı ÜCRETSİZ olarak indirerek kullanabilirsiniz. Uygulamayı kullanmak için herhangi bir üyelik ihtiyacı yoktur.Özellikler;• Kullanım kolaylığı sağlayan özel tasarım• Popüler ve son dakika videolarını öne çıkaran ana sayfa yapısı• Üyelik yapmadan videolara ulaşma imkanı• İlgi alanınıza göre video kategorisi seçimi• Eğitim, sağlık gibi bir çok kategoride profesyoneller tarafından hazırlanmış videolara erişim imkanı• Beğendiğiniz videoları Facebook ve Twitter ile tüm arkadaşlarınızla paylaşma imkanıKeyifli seyirler dileriz!

The official BBC Sport app is the sports fan’s guide to live sport news, stats, fixtures and results, curated by the BBC’s team of sport journalists. Users can also read articles and analysis, set football/cricket/F1 notifications and even customise and set quick links to favourite sports and teams.Main features:- Home screen displaying the top stories across the world of sport- Customise the app by adding quick links to your favourite sports and teams- Set match alerts for more than 150 UK football clubs (line-ups, kick-off, goals, half-time score and result), cricket teams and every Formula 1 race- Home screen widget. Configurable to reflect your choice of topics, resizable to suit your screen size and the widget can be viewed as a 4x1 or list layout. Requires Android 4.0.3+- Comprehensive football news, analysis, live scores, match stats and text commentaries – plus the gossip column- Dedicated indexes for dozens of sports, including football, F1, cricket, rugby union, rugby league, tennis and golf- A page for football teams and competitions including the Premier League - A full season’s football fixtures and results searchable by day- Football tables- Share stories and results with your friends and followers- The BBC will be adding new features to the app and will notify you when they become available in the Google Play StoreA network connection is required in order to access content.

Holy Quran has a real page turning effect, elegant style and smooth Nastaliq font for full page readability. Don't bother yourself by scrolling up and down; now easily recite as actual printed Quran page by page.Juz index has all 30 chapters and Surah index has all 114 surahs. You can add bookmarks while reading. With go to page number option you can jump to a page instantly. Resume option will take you to the last page you left reading.Sajdah ayaat are highlighted with green color. Starting of each Juz is prominent by first line with black background. Screen will not turn off while you are reading. This is only a single file download, just install and enjoy the app.We warmly welcome your suggestions and support, send your feedback at feedback@fanzetech.comPlease remember us in your prayers.

Aplikasi Tokopedia menawarkan kemudahan bagi para pembeli untuk menemukan jutaan produk dengan harga terbaik dari berbagai toko online di Indonesia, serta memudahkan para penjual untuk mengelola toko online mereka kapan dan di mana saja.Dengan aplikasi Tokopedia, Pembeli dapat:✓ Mengurutkan produk sesuai keinginan (harga termurah, penjualan terbanyak, dll)✓ Melacak pesanan ✓ Mengirim dan membagikan informasi produk lewat media sosial dan aplikasi messaging✓ Belanja lebih mudah dengan fitur Hot List, Wish List dan Notifikasi HargaDengan aplikasi Tokopedia, Penjual dapat:✓ Mengelola bisnis online langsung di genggaman✓ Menerima notifikasi instan setiap ada pesanan✓ Mempromosikan produk ke jutaan calon pembeli dari seluruh IndonesiaBuka toko online GRATISBerjualan online lebih mudah, foto dan upload gambar produk bisa langsung dari smartphone Anda. Pengiriman produk menjadi lebih mudah dengan berbagai jasa logistik yang tersedia. Promosikan produk dengan fitur Gold Merchant dan TopAds. Transaksi AMAN & NYAMANSistem rekening bersama Tokopedia menjamin kepercayaan penjual serta keamanan pembeli. Tokopedia baru akan meneruskan dana ke penjual setelah barang diterima pembeli. Transaksi dapat dilakukan melalui sistem transfer antar bank, BCA KlikPay, Mandiri ClickPay, dan Mandiri E-Cash.Jutaan Pilihan Produk dengan HARGA TERBAIKTerdapat jutaan produk dengan harga terbaik dari berbagai kategori: pakaian, handphone, fashion & aksesoris, elektronik, mainan, makanan & minuman, serta kategori lainnya. Pembeli dapat berdiskusi langsung dengan penjual serta melihat rating & review terpercaya dari pembeli lainnya.Kirimkan kritik dan saran Anda seputar Aplikasi Android Tokopedia via email ke: android.feedback@tokopedia.com​Tokopedia - Ciptakan Peluangmuhttps://www.tokopedia.com

Scan any QR Code or product UPC barcode to quickly get connected to content including prices, coupons & reviews from millions of items. It's like personal shopper in your pocket so you’ll always get the information you want.You’ll also have access to a selection of the latest coupons, deals and event related offers from thousands of national and local stores that change based on your interests. Get hand-picked offers and content from the products you love or want.Scan a product UPC barcode, and we’ll help you find a variety of information:√ Quickly see a comparison of prices from your favorite stores like Amazon, Macy’s, Best Buy, Target, and purchase right from your phone (depending on your country)√ Check-out product reviews & see what others are saying√ See nutritional facts & ingredients from food products (US only)√ Find closest product locations near you (US only)Other ways AT&T Code Scanner powered by ScanLife can help:√ Save all your scanning activity in your History√ Sync with Facebook to share your favorite products with others or to access later√ Create your very own personalized QR Code right from the app so others can save your contact details- NOTES ON PERMISSIONS -We take your privacy seriously, so it is important to understand why we ask for certain permissions. Most of the permissions you see are to deliver content to your device like contact details or dialing a phone call if you choose to. "INTERNET":The app connects to the Internet to show content after you scan a barcode."ACCESS WIFI STATE and ACCESS NETWORK_STATE":The app verifies if a network connection is available in order to connect to the Internet."CAMERA":The app uses the camera to scan barcodes. "ACCESS FINE LOCATION":Location is used to give you more relevant information like local prices when available. You will be prompted before Location data is used."BLUETOOTH" & "WI-FI MULTICAST"These permissions are ONLY activated if you print a QR Code to a wireless printer."GET ACCOUNTS"This is used to send periodic push notifications for deals and offers. You can disable this from the app settings under Notifications.------------------------scan, scanner, QR Code, qrcode, rewards, barcode, scancode, UPC, prices, price check, datamatrix, reviews, deals, coupons, reviews

《RO仙境傳說：復興》採用了即時戰鬥RPG的玩法設計，是一款結合回憶冒險與魔寵蒐集養成的骨灰級經典手遊。玩家將可組織一個與眾不同的冒險隊伍，可愛的“天使波利”、邪惡囂張的“巴風特”、成群結隊的“哥布林大軍”甚至是水晶爪牙“卡崙”都將共同成為你的夥伴，同時不同職業玩家帶上各式各樣特殊卡片，每個人都可在競技上大放異彩！這是以往RO系列遊戲所不曾有過的絕美體驗！===【遊戲特色】===『知名懷舊主題，樣貌完整呈現』－經典角色、場景，完美傳承以往熟悉的畫面風格！『華麗終結技，爽快連擊戰鬥』－突破過去，讓戰鬥增添更奢侈華麗的視覺饗宴！『寵物多養成，組成多元團隊』－經典BOSS怪物，收集徵招夢想中的魔寵加入隊伍！『豐富紙娃娃，打造獨特外型』－多樣化的頭飾、翅膀、武器，讓你變換外型無極限！『競技拚排名，爭奪仙境霸主』－競技場、修羅場，可與其他玩家比實力，拚輸贏！===【官方資訊】===RO仙境傳說:復興官網：https://ror.gnjoy.com.tw/FB官方粉絲團：RO仙境傳說:復興※本遊戲內容涉及攻擊(暴力等血腥畫面)。※本遊戲有商城加值區，請依個人興趣、能力進行體驗，避免過度消費。※長時間進行遊戲，容易影響正常作息，宜適度休息及運動。

☆☆☆戰爭從未停熄－暗崖堡：帝國☆☆☆一場守衛家園的戰爭，一場權利與金錢的角逐，一場背叛與陰謀的較量！你，準備好了嗎？★ 遊戲推薦理由 ★√ 建設x保衛x征服，帝國文明強勢回歸！　你需要不斷的探索未知的土地才能擴建自己的城堡，同時內政廳、兵營、倉庫、市場等設施都需要為你的居民逐步建設起來，防止暴動！當然還要小心有人窺探这至高無上的权利，如果你有野心適時的资源掠夺也不失為一個快速累積資源的途徑。√ 訓練強大的軍隊，擊敗所有敵人！武力的強大是你穩定地位和領土侵略的根基！你所擁有的軍隊是由矮人族、巨人奴隸、法師和騎兵組建，你需要通過各種途徑和每場戰役不斷提升軍隊的戰力值。同時你需要在將領中心招募傳奇英雄，他們的本領深不可測…由他們帶領的軍隊一定會給你的敵人帶來永無止境的絕望！√ 征戰屠龍之地 探秘塞爾柱克山除了防禦和侵略的這種頻繁隨機的戰爭事件外，你還可以通過祖先流傳下來的神秘地圖探索未知的領域，初探大冰原、橫穿卡萊荒原、阿貝拉歷險…用盡你的智慧與謀略，每一次探險的光輝榮耀都會烙印在史詩的捲軸中！ √ 組建聯盟 挑戰全球玩家在這片無盡大陸上，駐紮著世界各國的玩家，一定要選擇志同道合的夥伴組建成強大的聯盟，是和顏悅色的談判歸降？還是一言不合拔刀相向廝殺？你的聯盟將與你同在！穿上盔甲，拿起你的劍，帶領你的軍隊，在這場權力的遊戲中贏得榮耀！★暗崖堡：帝國－一款2017年不可錯過的戰爭手機遊戲★★遊戲支持★FACE BOOK粉絲頁：www.facebook.com/darkbladegame客服郵箱：empire@happyuniverse.com

Procrastinate harder and kill boredom!Enjoy the day's most ridiculously entertaining stream of images, pictures, GIFs, and memes! Millions of people around the world use Imgur everyday to share and enjoy hilariously funny GIFs, awesome science facts, amazing 4K wallpapers, political news and current events, cute kitten pics, informative tutorials, memorable moments from video games, and their favorite motivational stories. Perfect for your commute, standing in line, zoning out in class and whenever you should be doing something else. What a time to be alive!• Easily browse and enjoy the most awesome pics and funny GIFs in grid view or tap a post to bring its content front and center.• Go beyond the most viral posts on Imgur and Reddit and dive into our Topics: Funny, Awesome, Aww, The More You Know, Storytime, Current Events, Design & Art, Reaction, and special Ephemeral topics like National Video Game Day, National Bacon Day, and more!• Use our Upload feature to create your own pictures, memes, GIFs, and photo albums with millions then easily publish your new post to Imgur or share it with your friends and followers on Facebook or Twitter.• Want to share a funny GIF or photo you found on Tumblr, Pinterest, or somewhere else on the web? Upvotes not guaranteed.• Search for new or popular images, posts, or reaction GIFs, or if you're interested in seeing images from a specific section of Reddit, type in r/ before your search term to find all the awesome images from that sub reddit.• Need an awesome wallpaper for your phone? No problem! Search for "wallpapers" to see the best from Imgur and Reddit. Then, download and set this image as your wallpaper in your Android settings. • Vote to help send the best to “Most Viral”—our winner’s circle of the best posts that day based on their views, comments, and upvotes. • Love something? Make sure to upvote and favorite pics and posts so you'll never forget them.• Imgur is even more fun with friends! Share images and GIFs with your friends on Messenger, Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Tumblr, Pinterest, 9GAG, and more!• Thousands of posts are published to Imgur each day so be sure to open the app daily to see the best funny GIFs, eye-opening stories, adorable animals, and ridiculously entertaining pictures.Here’s what people are saying about our app:"Great design and great performance! Remote Control Pro supports all kinds of TVs both in Wifi an IR mode. Universal Remote Control for All TVs is a professional TV remote simulation for all kinds of smart TV including Samsung Smart TV, LG Smart TV, Sony Smart TV and Panasonic Smart TV. It is easy to configure (wifi connection and IR port) and easy to use as the real TV controller. Instructions: ★Download and install our Remote Control for TV in your android phone or tablet. ★Connect your smart TV and Smart Phone to the same wifi network. ★Launch the TV control remote app and search the smart TV device. ★Select the Smart TV and start to use. ★If the app fails to find out the TV device, please enter the IP address of the TV manually to connect. Feature: ★Universal sharp simulation. Support all kinds of Smart TV. ★Support Wifi connection mode and IR mode. ★Easy to configure ★Simple, easy to use interface (TV channels and TV volume control) ★Vibration On/Off Disclaimer: Dear user, thanks for installing our apps. Before you use our TV controller, please make sure your TV is a smart TV which provides wifi connection and remote control API. And remember to connect the device as our instructions. If the controller fails to find out the TV device, please enter the IP address of the TV manually to connect. Our Universal Remote Control support as many TVs as possible, while a very few TVs are not supported. Please kindly report the unsupported TVs mode to us.

Le Monde, l’info en continu-------------Suivez toute l’actualité française et internationale : •  accédez aux dernières informations à travers nos nombreuses rubriques thématiques : International, Politique, les Décodeurs, Pixels, etc. ;•  recevez les alertes d’actualité en temps réel et partagez les contenus que vous aimez en quelques clics avec vos proches ;•  retrouvez la diversité des contenus multimédias du Monde.fr : vidéos, portfolios, infographies… ;•  retrouvez l’essentiel de l’actualité en un clin d’œil grâce au Direct, qui vous permet de rester informé en temps réel, et à la « une », pour parcourir des articles enrichis, sélectionnés spécialement pour vous par la rédaction du Monde. •  Nouveau : suivez les sujets qui vous intéressent avec le Suivi d'actuLa navigation a été entièrement revue et optimisée pour vous offrir une expérience fluide, en immersion, grâce à une interface épurée. Découvrez aussi votre application sous Android Wear : accédez aux dernières actualités directement depuis votre montre connectée !Une offre premium toujours plus riche ! Grâce à l’Edition Abonnés, profitez : •  des contenus du journal du jour et des avant-premières avant même sa parution en kiosque ;•  de l’accès à tous les contenus payants ;•  du classeur, en sauvegardant vos articles favoris ;•  des alertes personnalisées ;•  de la possibilité de réagir ;•  du journal Le Monde et de ses suppléments partout, sur tous les écrans, avec un accèsaux 30 dernières éditions ;•  de newsletters thématiques ;•  Et aussi sur le site Le Monde.fr : la lecture zen, l’information internationale en temps réel géolocalisée, votre blog, vos réactions.Abonnez-vous directement à partir de l'application !Nous sommes à l’écoute de nos lecteursSi vous avez une question, ou que vous rencontrez un problème technique, n’hésitez pas à consulter notre FAQ, accessible dans l’aide de l’application.Si vous ne trouvez pas la réponse à votre question, vous pouvez nous écrire grâce à la rubrique « nous contacter » accessible dans l’aide de l’application également.Merci de nous préciser dans votre message les informations suivantes : le modèle de votre appareil, la version de votre application et l’e-mail de votre compte abonné.Vos retours nous sont précieux et sont lus attentivement dans le but d’améliorer constamment votre application.L’équipe mobile Le MondeCrédit Photo : AFP PHOTO | Martin BUREAU

تفسير الاحلام بالحروف احد تطبيقات الكتب الاسلامية بفضل الله عملنا على تسهيل عملية البحث ليكون تفسير الحلم، تفسير المنام و تفسير الرؤيا اكثر دقة لاعتمادنا على اظهار نتيجة البحث تفسير الاحلام بالحروف و اتاحة الفرصة للمستخدم الاختيار في تطبيق واحد بين كتاب تفسير ابن سيرين" منتخب الكلام في تفسير الاحلام" و كتاب تفسير النابلسي " تعطير الانام في تفسير الاحلام" "ملاحظة كتاب تفسير ابن سيرين بالحروف" و اي افضل ما كتب في تفسير الاحلام بين مراجع و كتب اسلامية في هذا المجال.باختصار ترجمة ابن سيرين و النابلسي رحمهما الله:ابن سيرين: الإمام أبوبكر محمد بن سيرين البصري التابعي الكبير القدير في التفسير، والحديث، والفقه، وتعبير الرؤيا و تفسير الاحلام و تفسير المنام ، والمقدم في الزهد والورع وبر الوالدين، توفي 110 للهجرة بعد الحسن البصري بمائة يوم، وكان عمره نيفاً وثمانين سنة. كان ابن سيرين عالماً بالحساب، والفرائض، والقضاء، ، يصوم يوماً ويفطر يوماً. اشتهر ابن سيرين بالورع وكان عالما بارعا بتأويل الرؤى و تفسير الاحلام و تفسير المنام. قال ابن شبرمة: دخلت على محمد ابن سيرين بواسط فلم أر أجبن من فتوى منه، ولا أجرأ على الرؤيا منه. قال هشام: ما رأيت أحدًا عند السلطان أصلب من ابن سيرين. وكان ابن سيرين قد حبس في السجن على دين أصابه وقد حبسه مالك بن المنذر، وقدر روى عبد الحميد بن عبد الله أن السجّان قال لإبن سيرين: إذا كان الليل فأذهب إلى أهلك فإذا أصبحت فتعال. قال لا والله، لا أكون لك عونًا على خيانة السلطانالنابلسي: الشيخ عبد الغني بن إسماعيل بن عبد الغني المعروف بالنابلسي الدمشقي. ولد بدمشق سنة (1050)هـ، وشغله والده بقراءة القرآن ثم بطلب العلم, وتوفي والده في سنة اثنين وستين وألف, فنشأ يتيماً, واشتغل بقراءة العلم. كان مصون اللسان عن اللغو والشتم, ولا يحقد على أحد, يحب الصالحين والفقراء وطلبة العلم ويكرمهم، معرضاً عن النظر إلى الشهوات, كثير السخاء وله كرمات كان لا يحب أن تظهر عليه ولا أن تُحكى عنه. تآليفه ومصنفاته كثيرة فمنها: التحرير الحاوي بشرح تفسير البيضاوي، كثر الحق المبين في أحاديث سيد المرسلين، ذخائر المورايث في الدلالة على مواضع الأحاديث، توفيق الرتبة في تحقيق الخطبة، الجواب التام عن حقيقة الكلام، القول العاصم في قراءة حفص عن عاصم نظماً على قافية القاف، علم الملاحة في علم الفلاحة، تعطير الأنام في تعبير المنام... كتاب تفسير النابلسي اول كتاب تفسير الاحلام بالحروف. توفي في (1143)هـ, ودفن بالقبة التي أنشأها وغلقت البلد يوم موته لكثرة الناس.طريقة عمل التطبيق: تفسير الاحلام في هذا التطبيق مفهرس حسب الحروف الابجدية لتسهيل وصول المستخدم الى تفسير المنام و الحلم حسب الكلمة المطلوبة مع ميزة الاختيار بين تفسير النابلسي و تفسير ابن سيرين.كيفية استخدام تفسير الاحلام والمنام بالحروف:1-اما ان تختار البحث كتاب تفسير ابن سيرين او كتاب تفسير النابلسي او البحث في الكتابين سويةَ2- بعد الاختيار تفتح لك صفحة لاحرف الابجدية من الاف اللى الياء3- بعد اختيار الحرف تظهر لك الكلمات لتختار ما يناسبك4-او الطريقة الاسرع كتابة كلمة موضوع المنام و الرؤيا و تقوم بالبحث فتظهر لك مباشرة تفسير المنام حسب الكتاب اللذي تم اختياره مسبقاً اما كتاب تفسير النابلسي تعطير الانام في تفسير الاحلام اما كتاب تفسير ابن سيرين كتاب منتخب الكلام في تفسير الاحلام أو في الكتابين سويةَ.5-تفسير الاحلام بالحروف، يتيح لك فرصة نسخ النص و مشاركته باستخدام برامج المشاركةالخلاصة: تفسير الاحلام بالحروف يتم تفسير الاحلام و تفسير المنام بناءً على على كتب تفسير الاحلام الشهيرة مثل كتاب تفسير الاحلام لابن سيرين و كتاب تفسير الاحلام للنابلسي حيث تم اعتماد تفسير النابلسي و ابن سيرين على اصول و قواعد تفسير الاحلام في الاسلام من القرآن الكريم و الحديث الشريف و الكتب الاسلامية للسلف الصالح.ننصح الاخوة بقراءة مقدمة كتاب تفسير ابن سيرين الاطلاع على اصول الحلم و المنام و الرؤيا مع الضوابط و الاصول التي اعتمادها ابن سيرين و النابلسي في تفسير الاحلام وتفسير المنام و الادلة التي استنبط منها ابن سيرين و النابلسي تفسير الاحلام و تفسير المنام.Islamic Dream mood A-Z Dream Dictionary a mobile application present Dream mood and dream Interpretation "what do Dreams mean" in Arabic Based on the famous Islamic Books and Islamic Imams and Dream analyzer specialized in meanings of Dreams like Ibn Sirin and Nabousli.Dream mood A-Z Dream Dictionary apps offer the most easy way to know what do your dreams means using the dictionary tactics referred to the Islamic books Naboulsi and Ibn Sirin Driver application (private label)The application works in conjunction with automated dispatching software – TaxiAdmin.Key features:+ GPS taximeter allows you to enjoy unlimited number of tariffs with flexible settings. It can be customized to serve the purposes of any taxi company. + GPS taximeter can also be configured to work zonally, which means that the cost per one mile/kilometer may vary from zone to zone, depending on the ride. The application calculates everything for you, providing the driver and the client with the estimated ride fare.+ The application is used to display the jobs that are in the air now and let drivers take the jobs that are processed in the main office by the call-center.+ Managing the queue list by sectors. Telegram is a messaging app with a focus on speed and security. It’s super-fast, simple, secure and free. Telegram seamlessly syncs across all of your devices and can be used on desktops, tablets and phones alike. You can send an unlimited amount of messages, photos, videos and files of any type (.doc, .zip, .pdf, etc.). Telegram groups have up to 200 people and you can send broadcasts to up to 100 contacts at a time. Be sure to check our website for a list of Telegram apps for all platforms.We built Telegram to make messaging speedy and safe again, without the usual caveats.Why Switch to Telegram? FAST: Telegram is the fastest messaging app on the market because it uses a distributed infrastructure with data centers positioned around the globe to connect users to the closest possible server. SECURE: We made it our mission to provide the best security among mass messengers. Telegram heavily encrypts all your data with time-tested algorithms.CLOUD STORAGE: Telegram seamlessly syncs across all your devices, so you can always securely access your data. Your message history is stored for free in the Telegram cloud. Never lose your data again!GROUP CHAT & SHARING: With Telegram, you can form large group chats of up to 200 members, send broadcasts to up to 100 contacts at a time, quickly share large videos, documents (.doc, .ppt, .zip, etc.), and send an unlimited amount of photos to your friends. RELIABLE: Built to deliver your messages in the minimum bytes possible, Telegram is the most reliable messaging system ever made. It works even on the weakest mobile connections. 100% FREE & NO ADS: Telegram is free and will always be free. We are not going to sell ads or introduce subscription fees. PRIVACY: We take your privacy seriously and will never give third parties access to your data.For those interested in maximum privacy, Telegram offers Secret Chats. Secret Chat messages can be programmed to self-destruct automatically from both participating devices. This way you can send all types of disappearing content — messages, photos, videos and even files. Secret Chats use end-to-end encryption to ensure that a message can only be read by its intended recipient.SUPPORT: For real-time support, please go to Settings in Telegram and select “Ask a Question” to send a message directly to our support volunteers. You can also email us at support@telegram.org.

Essayez de changer l'image de fond avec votre propre photo ou image.L'application de lecteur de musique est différent et beaucoup d'autres marché du lecteur de musique. Le code lui-même est mauvais et beaucoup de nouvelles fonctionnalités ont été ajoutées (méthode de service Music Player, système de stockage de base de données, défilement rapide bulle alphabétique, mode aléatoire rapide, Favoris et Mes playlists, mode de minuterie de sommeil, Picker chanson la voie ....)Appuyez sur le bouton de menu sur l'écran principal, ou faites glisser l'écran vers la droite tout en maintenant l'extrémité gauche du menu principal apparaît. Fond d'écran Appuyez sur le bouton pour changer l'image d'arrière-plan.Vous pouvez définir des photos prises avec l'appareil photo ou un fichier image. Lorsque vous sélectionnez une image si elle est liée à mes Google Photos, vous serez en mesure de sélectionner vos photos ou images stockées sur votre smartphone ou votre tablette, vous pouvez appeler les Google Photos images et des photos de l'application. Les utilisateurs de Google Plus peuvent télécharger des photos directement disponibles pour les images de poste et les photos onglet. Lorsque vous sélectionnez une réduction de la photo ou de l'image ou de l'élargissement à l'aide d'un éditeur de photos, vous pouvez faire pivoter. Après avoir utilisé votre doigt, touchez l'image beolrimyeon votre doigt pour faire pivoter le zoom de pincement ou de l'image. Modifier l'image en appuyant sur l'enregistrement et l'image est enregistrée. Personnalisez votre famille, amis, amants, écran auto-appareil photo comme une image, célébrité préférée étoiles, animaux mignons, des images animées, des voyages de paysages pris belles et merveilleuses vont, les athlètes, etc. ce style favori.Il y a des boutons pour chaque écran de menu. Cliquez sur le bouton de menu et modifier les informations de tag de la chanson ou de l'album sélectionné que vous souhaitez ajouter à la liste de lecture.Appuyez sur l'image de couverture de l'artiste dans les principaux changements d'écran plus bas à l'écran de jeu. Vous pouvez modifier le mode de l'écran du lecteur de jeu et en cliquant sur l'icône de coeur est enregistré dans Favoris.Caractéristiques générales:Défilement rapide bulle alphabétiquemode de lecture aléatoire rapideDeux fonctions Favoris et Mes playlistsSept bandes de fréquences (basse, contrôle du volume des aigus sur les médias)16 préréglages de l'égaliseur selon une variété de genres musicauxVIRTUALIZER, booster basse, REVERB EFFECTToute chanson, album, artiste, favoris, joué par genreet la fonction de recherche Pkcker chanson mp3mode de lecture d'arrière-plan (lorsque la chanson continue à jouer lorsque vous utilisez d'autres applications ou appareils en mode veille)Diverses fonctions de lecture aléatoire: (lecture aléatoire), la lecture normale, répète un, tous une fois, répéter, répéter l'ensembleDormez fonction de minuterie: Lorsque vous réglez la minuterie de sommeil après un certain temps, le lecteur arrête automatiquement.Vous pouvez commander le lecteur dans la fenêtre de notification.Interface utilisateur simple simple et facile à utiliserFonds d'écran de l'utilisateurL'utilisation d'un égaliseur 7 bandes pour régler le son d'une plage de fréquences spécifique.L'ajout du boost VIRTUALIZER BASS ajoutera un peu de vie au son. Les utilisateurs peuvent écouter la chanson semble venir vivant majestueusement comme si en écoutant de la musique dans le ton désiré.REVERB EFFECT que vous pouvez personnaliser le son pour un locuteur particulier.Vous pouvez utiliser preset régler la 16 basses fréquemment utilisé et les fréquences aiguës choisi parmi les réglages de l'égaliseur ou les paramètres manuellement (Preset: FLAT, BASS, TREBLE, ROCK, GRUNGE, METAL, DANSE, PAYS, JAZZ, SPEECH, CLASSIQUE, BLUES, OPERA, SWING, ACOUSTIQUE, NEW AGE)

The GPS Phone Tracking Pro App makes it easy to keep track of life’s essentials; use it to:•Find Your Friends – and get directions to their location.•Find Your Phone – check the app’s Web site to find a lost device.•Stay Connected – discover your friends’ whereabouts at any time simply by checking the GPS Phone Tracking Pro map. The GPS Phone Tracking Pro does it all. This handy, easy-to-use app leverages the latest technology to help you stay connected in real time to the people (and the devices) that matter most. GPS Phone Tracking Pro functions, features and benefits include:Great Friend Locator. GPS Phone Tracking Pro uses GPS coordinates and state-of-the-art GPS location data to report the real-time whereabouts of your friends. Simply install the GPS tracker app on your phone and your friends’ phones. Once registered, each friend appears as a unique icon on the GPS Tracking Pro’s navigational map so you’ll know exactly where each friend is, at all times. Want to know instantly which friends arrived at a party, theater, museum or another planned meet up point? Want to figure out if anyone is stuck in traffic, made a wrong turn or even worse – if your habitually late friend has even left his/her house yet? No need to send annoying “Where are your?” or “What’s your ETA?” texts, GPS Phone Tracking Pro puts this information at your fingertips. And to make life super easy, GPS Tracking Pro can send alerts the moment your friends arrive at the appointed location! Another Friend Locator Feature With GPS Phone Tracking Pro, you can monitor your friend’s travel from one location to another via the app’s GPS maps. This is a very helpful feature when you’re traveling separately from a friend who has a tendency to get lost often. And let’s face it: GPS Phone Tracking Pro also makes a great family tracker. This is especially helpful if a family member is scheduled to pick you up. You can track their progress toward your destination, enjoying yourself until the last possible moment you have to be at the agreed upon pick up spot!Reliable Cell Phone Tracker GPS Phone Tracking Pro can pinpoint the location of registered mobile devices, smart phones and even old school feature phones via the app’s website, 24/7. Just log in and your phone will appear as an icon. Click on the icon to view the location of the missing mobile phone. This GPS phone tracking device helps with Androids too. It accesses GPS Android data to pinpoint the location of missing Droids.Phone Tracking for Friends With Feature Phones Friends who don’t have the latest smart phone (or a smart phone at all), can still enjoy GPS Phone Tracking Pro’s features and benefits – with a little help from their friends! Here’s how it works: The app will send a text invite to the feature phone. Once your friend accepts the invitation and replies with a “yes,” to the text, their individual icon will appear on the app’s GPS maps. If their phone is lost, the app will provide GPS navigation assistance to help you guide them its destination. It’s a phone tracker extraordinaire.Innovative and Versatile Phone Locator Do you constantly misplace your cell phone and are tired of asking other people (friends or family) to help you find it or if they’ve seen it? GPS Phone Tracking Pro can help. Its state-of-the-art GPS system can keep tabs on registered phones, using satellites to triangulate the exact location of every phone registered to your account. If a phone is ever out of satellite view, GPS Phone Tracking Pro uses triangulation via the nearest cell phone tower and the cell phone carrier’s data to determine the missing phone’s location. This versatile phone locator also offers printer-friendly directions to the misplaced phone’s location. GPS Phone Tracking Pro is compatible with Androids, whether you have AT&T, Verizon, Sprint or another phone carrier.

It can utilize the characteristics of smartphones and calculate the taxi fare and required time quickly and simply.It searches the route and distance by the names of places, stations, airports and others, and calculates the required time and fare of the taxi for that area. ComicRack for Android is the companion for the best eComic Reader and Manager for PCs: ComicRack for WindowsOptimized for phones and tablets it allows you to read your eComics anywhere you want.When used together with ComicRack for Windows it allows automatic synchronization of eComics with your Android device via USB, including reading positions, reading lists and bookmarks. Your synchronized eComics will also be converted and optimized so they can be read fast an reliable on your handheld device. And best of all, this way you can read all the formats ComicRack for Windows supports (PDFs and even WebComics). Optionally the eComics can even be size optimized during synchronization which usually makes them half the size without noticeable quality reduction.ComicRack includes a Live Wallpaper that shows random covers from your library. You can even start reading by double tapping the background.ComicRack also includes a highly configurable app widget that allows you to glimpse into your library and start reading immediately if you see something you like.Short feature list:• Optimized for phones and tablets• Reader with single and double page viewing• Advanced zoom modes• Auto scrolling• Right to left reading mode for mangas• Color adjustments• Automatic page cropping for small devices• Full library management with lists and searching• Management of reading states (unread, completed, bookmarks etc.)• USB synchronization with ComicRack for Windows• Reads CBZ and CBR natively• When used together with ComicRack for Windows it supports CBZ, CBR, CB7, CBT, PDF, DJVU and WebComics• Live Wallpaper• App Widgets• Twitter integrationThis is the add supported free version. If you like the program and want to get rid of the ads, get wireless synchronisation and in general do a good thing, please buy the full version.Troubleshooting:If you want to use your external SD Card to store Comics on Android 4.4 and above, please follow the the guide in the FAQ.If you experience any bugs it is best to post your problems in the appropriate section of the user forum.Online Resources:Documentation is located athttp://comicrack.cyolito.com/documentation/comicrack-for-androidFAQ is available athttp://comicrack.cyolito.com/faqs/comicrack-androidUser and Support Forum is athttp://comicrack.cyolito.com/forumEven if you have no problems you can join and talk to other ComicRack users.

Order your taxi in just three clicks from Montreal’s largest taxi provider with the Taxi Diamond application, and pay your fare in whatever way suits you best, either via the application or to the driver directly (cash, debit, coupons or credit card). *** Over 7,000,000 Downloads! ***JuiceDefender - Battery Saver is a powerful yet easy to use power manager app specifically designed to extend the battery life of your Android device. Packed with smart functions, it automatically and transparently manages the most battery draining components, like 3G/4G connectivity and WiFi.The _preset modes_ are the perfect way to gain precious hours of battery life - literally as easy as one tap!JuiceDefender also allows _complete customization_ through a clean and intuitive user interface; and once configured it runs by itself, improving battery life in a fully automated manner.Finally, it _integrates seamlessly_ with power control widgets and shortcuts, without interfering with manual settings.With JuiceDefender - Battery Saver you can easily manage Mobile Data, WiFi and CPU speed, you can keep power consumption under control (e.g. disabling connectivity when the battery runs low), schedule regular Synchronization events, enable or disable connectivity for specific apps, auto-toggle WiFi depending on your location, and much more.When it comes to smartphones, battery life is never enough: run at full capacity when you need it, but save battery when you don’t, with JuiceDefender.Over 7 million downloads show that it really works - try it for a few days and see for yourself, it’s free!Features*:- 5 Preset Profiles (from default mode to full customization)- Easy and Intuitive User Interface- Home screen Battery Widgets- Mobile Data toggle automation- 2G/3G toggle automation**- WiFi toggle automation + Auto-Disabling option- Location-aware WiFi Control (e.g. enable WiFi only at home/work, disable it otherwise)- Battery Consumption Optimization (e.g. when screen off, battery under threshold, etc.)- Comprehensive Connectivity Scheduling (regular schedule, night time/peak time, week days/weekends)- Connectivity Control for Specific Apps with Interactive Training mode- CPU scaling when phone is idle**- Smart Brightness control- Bluetooth control with Automatic Reconnect- Full Activity Log- It’s FREE!* Some features require upgrading to JuiceDefender Plus or Ultimate.** Available if supported by your ROMMore information, reviews, and support: JuiceDefender.comJoin the community: facebook.com/JuiceDefender

The StudentVUE Mobile application helps students stay informed and connected by providing day-to-day insight into their own academic experience. StudentVUE Mobile for the Android phones works with the Synergy™ student information system in much the same way as the StudentVUE web portal, allowing students to stay on top of upcoming school events, classroom happenings, assignments, tests, and academic performance. Students can view their classroom assignments and scores, attendance, transcripts, graduation status and more. NOTE: StudentVUE Mobile for the Android phones is a free application for students using the StudentVUE web portal. How to find District URL: The StudentVUE Mobile app uses the same user login as the web-based StudentVUE portal.  If you need help please contact your School District’s Administration office for access URL and StudentVUE login information. Sample URLs:http://sispxp.yourdistrictname.orghttps://parentvue.yourdistrictname.orghttps://sismobile.yourdistrictname.orghttps://yourdistrictname.org/sismobile Please do not include /Login_Parent_PXP.aspx or /Login_Student_PXP.aspx. Example:If on the StudentVUE web portal you are usinghttps://yourschooldistrictname.org/sismobile/Login_Student_PXP.aspx In the District URL field of the iPhone App, you will type following:  (***Please do not include /Login_Student_PXP.aspx )https:// yourschooldistrictname.org/sismobileRequirements:• Only school districts using the Synergy™ student information system version 6.5 and higher can support the StudentVUE for the Android phone application. • Requires wireless or 3G Internet connection.• The StudentVUE Mobile for the Android phones app uses same user login as the web-based StudentVUE portal. Please contact your School District’s Administration office to verify Synergy™ version and StudentVUE login information.

uSwitch — your personal assistant to compare and switch energyThe UK’s top energy switching site now has an app. But it doesn’t just help you switch and save — get personalised, expert energy help, right in your pocket.• Scan your energy bill for instant personalised comparison results — It's now faster and easier than ever to switch and save with uSwitch!• Get access to exclusive deals to save even more— Be the first to know about uSwitch’s exclusive, market-leading energy deals.• Switch to a cheaper plan, anywhere, anytime — In just five minutes you can compare all energy plans and get fair and impartial results. Then authorise the switch to your new supplier right in the app.• Know what’s happening with your switch — Once you’ve chosen your new energy deal, track the progress of your switch.• Keep saving — Leave it with uSwitch. Your details are saved in the app, and we’ll keep tracking the market. You’ll only hear from us when you can save again by switching. • Instant access to your info — Quickly view your plan end date, your cancellation fee or your plan name without digging out an old energy bill.• Relax and save — The app notifies your new supplier and makes sure you stay on the best deal. All you need to do is download now to start comparing deals!FAQs about the uSwitch App:• What is the uSwitch app for?The app helps you compare gas prices and electricity prices. It uses uSwitch’s own comparison tool (the same one found at www.uswitch.com) for finding the cheapest gas prices or electricity prices for your region.• How do I scan my bill’s QR code with this app?If you already have an account, tap “Your energy details” to view your info and then choose “Update my details” to access the QR code reader function. If you don’t have an account, you’ll automatically be prompted to scan your bill’s code while creating your account.• Do I need a uSwitch account to use the app?Yes. If you already have an account for comparing energy prices, great! You can sign in and the app will automatically sync up all your energy info. If you don’t have an account, download now and you can set one up in minutes right in the app.• Is the uSwitch app free?Yes. It doesn’t cost anything to use the uSwitch app — even if you switch. You don’t pay anything to compare and switch gas and electricity supplier.• Which suppliers can I switch to with the uSwitch app?You can switch to all of the big six suppliers including British Gas, E.ON, EDF Energy, ScottishPower, SSE and npower. You can also switch to a dozen small suppliers including award-winning energy supplier OVO Energy, and the largest independent supplier in the UK, First Utility.• Can I use the app if I don’t know anything about my energy details?Yes. If you don’t have a uSwitch account or don’t have your gas and electricity details available, you can still run an energy comparison by answering a few questions about your energy use. It’s best to use your actual consumption though, so track down a bill if you can. If your bill has a QR code, it takes just seconds to scan the code for instant comparison results. And you’ll only have to do this once because the app will remember all your info for you.• Can I compare other products uSwitch compares (i.e., broadband, car insurance, mobiles)?Not yet. For now, the uSwitch app only compares gas prices and electricity prices for domestic households with standard meters, economy 7 meters and smart meters. But we hope to roll out more comparisons soon!• I live in Northern Ireland, can I switch with the app?uSwitch does not support energy switching for homes in Northern Ireland; you will not be able to switch gas or electricity supplier through any of our channels, including our website and mobile app.

n7player Music Player is an intuitive audio player giving you an innovative way to browse your music. It provides advanced features in a user-friendly interface.Quick access to currently playing songs allows for total control in a handy way. Because the ease of use, this app is perfect for beginners but its countless features will satisfy even the most demanding and advanced users.All music at your fingertipsDon't search for your music, with n7player you have access to your whole library in a friendly and intuitive way controlled by simple gestures. Handles all most popular formats including FLAC and OGG.Unique n7player's surface is not the only way of browsing through your music library. Play by directories or sort in a more old-school way - albums/artists/tracks. High quality audioThanks to the advanced 10-band equalizer with many presets to choose from and the possibility of creating your own, enjoy your music in high-quality. Tune bass & treble to your liking, enable volume normalization, adjust channel balance and everything you need.Customize every aspectPersonalizing is your thing? Customize every single element of your player - from changing whole themes, through widgets to lockscreen.Collect and managePlaylists are one of the easiest and most effective ways of listening to your favorite music. Keeping this in mind, we have built n7player with this idea as the heart of the player.Tag editor, album art grabber, scrobbling...We know how important it is to have the entire library with all the details - album arts, tags, lyrics. Tag editor is a simple but full-featured tool that allows you to correct information contained in your audio files. Use a built-in album art grabber to beautify your music library.n7player is more than a simple music player. There are far more features than that – read below for the full list.Here's a list of selected features of n7player - audio player.PLAYBACK FEATURES• Plays all most popular filetypes:mp3, mp4, m4a, ogg, wav, 3gp, mid, xmf, ogg, mkv*, flac**, aac**• Full-featured, 10 band equalizer:tunable bass and treble, built-in presets with possibility of creating your own, pre-amp, channel balance, audio normalizations, surround effects and SRS (if available on your device)• Control what you play:apart from basic stuff like repeat once, repeat all, shuffle all, n7player adds easily accessible current queue of tracks• And more:gapless playback, timer, playback resume...BROWSING FEATURES• Intuitive and user-friendly music surface:your whole music in an artist cloud which zooms-in into an album wall• Filter your music library:control which artists show up, limit your library to the specified folders, hide albums you don't want to see• Personalize your experience:use your favorite skin, select most suitable widget, install our free music visualizer (BLW), change your lockscreen...• Browse through folders, old-school library is here too:sort your library by artists/albums/tracks/genres, browse your folders and manage them• Cover auto-grabber:getting your missing album arts will help browsing your libraryCONTROL WHAT YOU PLAY• Full playlist support:create, modify or use automatically created ones• Control your music with a buttons on your headset:fully configurable buttons on your headset• Do it your way:control through notifications, widgets, headset buttons, lockscreen...EXTENDABLE• Stream your music to other devices:n7player connected to ToasterCast allows you to listen to your music on external devices through ChromeCast/AirPlay/DLNA• Music visualizer:Connect n7player to our music visualizer – BLW - to bring your homescreen alive through music• Song lyrics:Thanks to a free third-party add-on, you can add lyrics to all your songs• More stuff coming in the future!*) available on Android 4.0+**) available on Android 3.1+

appName: 鳳火群英-三國名將榮耀歸來
description: 最好玩的RPG+SLG玩法！首週通關累計贈送30000魂玉，開服七日精準定位玩家成長所需，根據指引內容完成任務，魂玉、海量資源每天送不停！登錄七日即送橙將，創建角色第七日登錄即可領取橙將趙雲、貂蟬、小喬、張遼任選其一！《鳳火群英》完美複現了多達300位歷史名將，任由主君號召編排佈陣橫掃天下；百變陣法系統大大提升了遊戲的策略性，擊破數值統治以智取勝；銅雀臺上紅顏受困，只待天下英雄前來解救，戰力極致加持完爆對手；多人組隊遠征伐魔，齊力開荒迎戰逆天boss，熱血沸騰！----------三國群英猛將！衝鋒！-----------眾多特色三國群英武將霸氣登場，搭配神級裝備寶物，打造最強華麗陣容，在進攻、防禦、平衡之間搭配各種武將獨門絕技，迎接屬於你的三國志之路！體驗全新攻城掠地當霸主的快感！----------三國美女！營救！----------自古紅顏多薄命，而你就是拯救三國亂世美眉的亂世英雄。在鳳火群英遊戲中，數十個三國紅顏美女等你解瑣，伴你征戰天下，笑傲群雄！----百變陣眼！智慧謀略！----遊戲中獨創陣眼系統，3D武將模型配以華麗的戰鬥特效，上演一場精彩絕倫的視覺盛宴。魔王降世，魔物來襲，PK競技，攻城掠地等你來挑戰。----組隊互動！開荒！----拒絕單機玩法，《鳳火群英》組隊遠征，齊力合戰BOSS！和兄弟們共進退！擊殺BOSS獲獎勵，在遠征的路上越走越遠，挑戰顛覆王者之路。-----天上地上！三國策略遊戲我最強----《鳳火群英》手機遊戲突破傳統玩法，天上地上我最好玩！獨創暗黑Q版風格,多武將上陣，緣份系統，陣眼系統策略多組合打造全新玩法，超絢畫面，超強互動與您一同打造最好玩的三國策略手機遊戲。粉絲頁>>https://www.facebook.com/17hero官網>>http://www.udfun.com/fhqy

Weather & Clock Widget for Android, the quick and accurate weather app, provides detailed weather for all cities worldwide, it searches your address and locates cities quickly, and provides the current temperature, current weather condition, humidity, pressure and wind speed and direction, in addition, five, ten days and hourly weather forecast. Weather & Clock Widget for Android, is 100% free, and it comes with many cool widgets, portrait and landscape user interface.Weather & Clock Widget for Android comes with different widget sizes, 2x1, 4x1, 4x2 and 4x3 for normal screens, and 5x1, 5x2 and 5x3 for large screens and tablets. Weather & Clock Widget for Android supports a wide range of Android phones; it supports Android Version 2.3 and higher.Features:- Provides current weather condition and five days weather forecast- 10-Day and Hourly Weather with precipitation- Sunrise and Sunset time- Atmospheric pressure with different units- Temperature in status bar- Share weather and location information with friends.- Home screen widgets, 5x3, 5x2, 5x1 for large screen only and 4x3, 4x2, 4x1 and 2x1 for all screens.- Searches for all cities in the world by country and city or zip code- Ability to set your internet source to Wi-Fi only- Ability to disable internet access from operators while you are in roaming- Ability to set your preferred temperature unit, Celsius or Fahrenheit- Automatic update intervals are: 30 minutes,1, 3, 6, 9, 12 hours and Manual update.- Auto location detection- Up to 10 different locations- Weather map with ability to add any city to your city list- Notification alerts (with option to disable it)- Moon phase- UV Index and Dew Point- Widgets to display calendar events (You may select calendars from Settings > Widget Settings > Event Calendars)- Available in: English, Dansk, Deutsch, Ελληνικά, Български, Suomi, Norsk Bokmål, Nederlands, Slovenčina, Slovenščina, Svenska, Română, العربية, كوردى, ئۇيغۇرچە, Français, Hrvatski, Türkçe, Čeština, Español, Català, Italiano, Português, Magyar, Македонски, Pусский, Українська, Қазақ тілі, Polski, Português(Brasil), Српски, Lietuvių, հայերեն, Indonesia, Việt, 日本語, 中文 (简体), 中文 (繁體), 한국어.For any questions or issues, please visit FAQ page at: http://www.devexpert.net/weather* Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

If your search draws a blank we’ll recommend similar searches to try instead. And predictive search helps you type faster, automatically corrects minor typos and suggests search phrases faster than you can type them.Store locator You can use the store locator with targeted search and GPS technology to find and connect with any JCPenney store, check store hours and more!In-store product availabilityEasily check a stores’ availability for items you’re looking for before you go to the store.Order trackingTrack your orders to find out exactly when your shipment should arrive at your door!JCPenney RewardsReward your wallet almost every time you shop! Now you can sign up for JCPenney Rewards while you create a jcp.com account. Or connect your existing JCPenney Rewards profile to your jcp.com account. It’s easy! Earn 100 points or more in a month and get one $10 JCPenney Reward.
