Features include:- Watch live TV- Catch up on the past 30 days- Watch on Wi-Fi and cellular networks- Download TV programmes to watch later (on devices running Android 4.1 and above)- Browse Categories and Channels- Cast content to your TV using Chromecast- Share your Favourites across other devices with a BBC iD account**We’ve developed the BBC Media Player app to improve video streaming playback on Android devices. You’ll need to install this separately from the Google Play Store.To make installation of the BBC Media Player as easy as possible, BBC iPlayer will prompt you to install it when you first play a streamed programme.The BBC iPlayer app uses standard Android app permissions that are defined by the Google Android platform. The permissions the BBC iPlayer Android app asks to use are:Photos/Media/Files"Read the contents of your USB storage" & "Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage"This permission is used to store downloaded programmes. The application must be able to write, read and delete these files.Device ID & Call Information"Read phone status and identity"This permission is used to read the Android "Device ID". This is an anonymous ID that cannot be used to identify the user and is not used to track the user. It is used by iPlayer's content protection system to ensure that downloaded programmes can only be played on the device that downloaded them. iPlayer does not use this permission to determine the device phone number, whether a call is active, or the remote number in a connected call.Other permissions (not explicitly mentioned when installing BBC iPlayer, as they are more general to most apps):"Prevent phone from sleeping"This permission is used by two features: Downloads & Chromecast.While downloading a programme, the application prevents the system from sleeping when the device is locked, so the download can continue. This is only active while a download is in progress.While "casting" a programme to a compatible receiver like Google's Chromecast, the application stops the system from fully sleeping when the phone is locked. This stops the application losing connection with the receiver so the phone can continue to control playback."Full network access"iPlayer needs access to the internet to download programmes, schedules and information about programmes and configuration, and to send usage statistics."View network connections"This permission lets iPlayer determine whether a network connection is available before accessing the network, and provide better error messages when it can’t retrieve data.iPlayer also determines what type of network connection is in use (Wi-Fi or Cellular) for the Downloads feature. Downloads are enabled when connected to a Wi-Fi network. On a cellular network, downloads are disabled/paused."Test access to protected storage" This allows the app to check if there is space on your device to download programmes.To give you with the best experience, certain details like your Search History and Favourites may be stored on your device or securely on BBC servers. To analyse and improve the app, it also uses technologies similar to performance cookies used by the BBC. You can alter your settings for this on your device. For more information about this and privacy, cookies and iPlayer more generally, visit the BBC iPlayer privacy FAQ page at http://iplayerhelp.external.bbc.co.uk/tv/app_privacy, or the BBC’s Privacy & Cookies site at http://www.bbc.co.uk/privacy/The app was developed by Media AT (Media Applications Technologies Limited) which is a wholly owned subsidiary of the BBC (British Broadcasting Corporation).Full details of Media AT are available on the Companies House website at: http://data.companieshouse.gov.uk/doc/company/07100235.

Millions of people use SoundCloud to listen to music and audio for free.Wherever you are. Whatever you’re doing. The SoundCloud app lets you hear more.This holiday season, give yourself the gift of more sound. More hip hop. More rock. More electronic. More classical. More house, jazz, audiobooks, sports…KEY FEATURES- Explore Trending Music and Trending Audio feeds- Search directly for tracks, artists and other users- Follow friends and artists to hear what they share- Browse tracks by genre- Listen to your stream wherever you are using WiFi or data- Play, pause and skip tracks from the lockscreen- Login or register with Facebook and Google+- Record sounds. Share them on Facebook, Twitter, and Tumblr- Listen to playlists, or create your own and share them with your followers- Shuffle your likes or playlistsGET STARTEDIt’s easy to dive straight in and start discovering music & audio. Try the Explore section to find trending music & audio of just about every genre you can think of. As you explore, tap the heart to ‘like’ and save your favorites for later playback.The Search page lets you find your favorite tracks, and artists. Follow their profiles so you can listen to the new music they post in your Stream.Find out more on http://help.soundcloud.com/customer/portal/topics/110297-mobile-apps/articlesPRAISE FOR SOUNDCLOUD“SoundCloud is focused on building out a massive trove of content, weaving it all into the Web and making it easier to share. The “YouTube for audio” analogy looks increasingly apt, especially if its metrics continue to shoot skyward.” - ReadWrite“SoundCloud is a sharing machine. Remember the early days of audio online — when you had to download the Real Player or Windows Media Player to listen? The days of downloading before listening are over.” - USA Today“It's an evolution of audio's most vital self-service creation and discovery platform, music's best analogue to Twitter, YouTube, and Kindle Direct Publishing. It's not just finding or sharing songs or podcasts or spoken-word readings your friends may be listening to — it's finding and sharing the people who make those recordings, too.” - The VergeCOMMUNITYLike what you hear? Let us know, and share your discoveries with the world. SoundCloud Blog: http://blog.soundcloud.comFacebook: http://www.facebook.com/soundcloudTwitter: https://www.twitter.com/soundcloudTumblr: http://soundcloud.tumblr.comInstagram: http://instagram.com/soundcloudPROBLEMS? FEEDBACK?The more you tell us, the better SoundCloud gets. http://help.soundcloud.com/https://twitter.com/SCsupportPERMISSIONSYour privacy is really important to us. We only ask for the permissions we need for the app to be at its best. For more information, read http://help.soundcloud.com/customer/portal/articles/1575188-what-permissions-are-required-to-download-the-appIf you have any more questions get in touch with us - see the help section. This app is available in English, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Indonesian, Russian and French.

Tickets einfach stornieren, wenn der Kinobesuch doch nicht klappt.Warum verschwindet nach einem Neustart meines Gerätes die Verknüpfung für die App?Wenn die App auf bestimmten Geräten der Samsung Galaxy Reihe installiert wird kann es vorkommen, dass eine auf dem Homescreen eingerichtete Verknüpfung nach dem Geräteneustart nicht mehr vorhanden ist. Dieser Fehler kann vermieden werden, wenn die App im internen Speicher und nicht z.B. auf der externen SD Karte installiert wird. Warum kann ich das eingestellte Kino nicht wechseln oder nicht auf das Menu zugreifen?Bei einigen Geräten ab Android 4.x gibt es herstellerseitig keine Taste für die Menüfunktion mehr auf dem Gerät (z.B. bei dem HTC Desire X). Um hier die Menüfunktion aufzurufen, muss die Taste "Letzte Apps" lange gedrückt gehalten werden. Das Verhalten der Taste "Letzte Apps" kann in den Einstellungen unter "Anzeige" konfiguriert werden.

Regrann™ allows you to repost, keep to repost later, share and save photos & videos while using the Instagram app. You can also post full sized pics from your phone's gallery to Instagram without cropping them. No more having to leave out parts of your photos. It gives credit without adding watermarks to original photos and videos. And you do not need to login. The app runs in the background. SIMPLE - No need to leave InstagramFrom any Instagram screen and from any Instagram user, choose a photo or video you like, click on the 3 dots bellow the comments and select “Copy share URL”. It’s that easy! Regrann will activate and give you the choice to repost to your Instagram feed, keep to repost later, save or share with any other app that accepts photos or videos. AUTHENTIC - Keep original photos and videos intactProvide your followers with the full experience of the photos and videos you repost, share or save. Regrann gives credit to the user you repost from without modifying in any way the photos and videos. Credit is added to the caption of the photos / videos you repost. When you upload photos from your phone's gallery to Instagram, the No-Crop feature allows you to upload them in full without having to crop and leave sections out.FAST - No login requiredRegrann uses the Instagram app to repost photos and videos. So, there is no need for you to login to it. It runs in the background of Instagram. Also, Regrann can be set to operate in Quick modes for reposting to Instagram, saving to your device or posting later... for even higher speed.

FX File Explorer version 4.0 is now available with a new Material Design UI!FX File Explorer is a file manager with optional media, networking, cloud, and root capabilities. FX is designed to let you quickly and easily manage all content on your phone or tablet.FX has no ads.The free main module of FX File Explorer (this product) includes all file management features for working with files on your phone/tablet.The "FX Plus" add-on adds media management, network (FTP, SFTP, SMB, WebDAV) and cloud capabilities (Dropbox, Google Drive, SkyDrive, Box, SugarSync). The "Plus" add-on is a paid app (with a 7-day free trial).The free "FX Root" add-on is for developers and knowledgeable enthusiasts who need to make changes as the root user. General Features (included standard):* Material Design.* Productivity-oriented layout: The "Home Screen" shows bookmarks, storage, tools and (with FX+) media/network locations. You no longer have to wade through the garbage that apps store in the root folder of your SD card to get to the places you actually use.* Dual pane mode and unlimited windows (quickly switch between different locations)* Pinch-to-zoom in any "Explorer" window, zoom-in to see additional information about items* Intuitive swipe-to-select gesture for managing multiple items (Slide finger horizontally across items to select/deselect them; see YouTube Videos, web site documentation, or in-app help for more information)* "Usage View" mode analyzes storage space usage, enabling you to see total size of any folder* Indexed SearchFile Viewers / Editors (included standard)* Text Editor with Undo/Redo history, Cut/Copy/Paste, Find, and Pinch-to-zoom* Binary (Hex) Viewer* Image Viewer* Media Player, pop-up Audio Player* Zip, Tar, GZip, Bzip2, and 7zip Archive Extractor / Creator (.zip, .tgz, .tar.gz, .tar.bz2, .7z)* RAR Extractor (UnRAR)* Shell Script ExecutorMedia Capabilities (FX Plus add-on required):* Browse image and video collections* Browse audio by artist, album, playlist, or all tracks* Create and rearrange playlists with drag and drop (multiple files can be rearranged by selecting them)Network / Cloud Capabilities (requires FX Plus add-on):* Windows networking (SMB)* FTP (including secure FTP-S and FTP-ES)* SSH FTP (Secure Shell FTP; password and public key auth)* WebDAV (see help for using WebDAV with OwnCloud)* Cloud Storage: Google Drive (incl. Google Docs), Dropbox, SugarSync, Box (Box.net), and SkyDrive (SkyDrive requires Android 2.2 or later)* Stream video and audio media files from SMB, FTP, SSH, Google Drive, Dropbox, SugarSync, Box, and SkyDrive to media player applications* Browse local network for Windows (SMB) shares* Find FTP and SSH FTP local network shares using multicast DNS (mDNS) service discovery (Bonjour/Zeroconf/Avahi)* Encrypted keyring (used to avoid entering sensitive passwords in public while not allowing access in event of device theft)* Download and convert Google Drive / Google Docs files into Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OpenDocument, PDF, and other formatsBluetooth Capabilities (FX Plus add-on required):* Bluetooth FTP Client* Discover / pair devices from within FX File ExplorerAdditional FX Plus Features:* AES-256, AES-128 Zip Encryption. Browse inside encrypted Zip files, viewing text documents, images, audio, and video without writing unencrypted data to SD card* App Management* Browse apps by permissionNOTES:* Streaming video playback: Format support is based upon third-party playback software installed on your device. Android typically supports MP4 and 3GP. FX can play AVI, FLV, MKV, and WMV formats *IF* you install third-party players available from the Google Play Store.* GDrive / GDocs: Cut/pasted documents will be converted to Microsoft Office formats by default. Use "Open With" to download them in the format of your choice.Have a bug report or question? Please email android@nextapp.com.

Take your fitness to a new level with Runtastic: The best free fitness & running app tracker on Android!The Runtastic Running & Fitness app uses GPS to map and track sports and fitness activities, such as running, jogging, biking, walking, hiking and many more. The 4.5+ rated app tracks details like duration, distance, elevation change, calories burned & more of your cardio and strength training workouts to help you build healthy lifestyle habits and reach your exercise goals. Audio feedback based on your personal preferences* Map workouts in real-time with GPS & monitor exercise progress* Personal workout diary, advanced statistics & graphs* Mapping: Detailed live mapping & historic mapping of training sessions (Google Maps)* Runtastic Earth View: Watch your workout in 3D (free Google Earth App required)* LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Show your friends where you are & draw motivation from their cheers* Running Leaderboard: See who’s run the furthest this/last week or this month* Routes: Create, browse & find routes and save them to your Android phone* Customizable dashboard configuration: Display preferred training statistics (duration, distance, pace, speed, heart rate, calories burned, elevation gain, time, post-workout hydration recommendation) during your workouts* Monthly & overall metrics for elevation gain, pace, speed, heart rate, distance, number of workouts, duration & calories burned* Auto Pause: Session is paused automatically when you stop moving* Use Runtastic Training Plans to make progress & reach fitness goals* Interval run training, coaching and dynamic split (km/mi) tables * Training Goals: Select a calorie, distance or pace goal to optimize training* Challenge a Run: Compete against yourself by challenging past activity results * Geotagging: Take pictures during your workout and see them on the map on Runtastic.com* Runtastic Wearable Connect: Display activity stats on Runtastic Orbit & Runtastic Moment, our 24/7 wearables* Enjoy music with Google Play Music, Spotify, Pandora, SoundCloud & more, directly within the Runtastic app (available on Android 4.4 and above)* Colored Traces: Colors indicate training changes, incl. pace, elevation, slope* Manual entry of workouts: Add treadmill, spinning, weight lifting workouts & more* Integrate Runtastic activities to your MyFitnessPal account & to Google Fit* Android Wear Integration: Control your Runtastic app with Android Wear* Share sports activities on Google+, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp & via emailRUNTASTIC.COMSave workouts to Runtastic.com & join our online fitness community. You'll get further exercise data analysis, coaching & comparisons with friends! These benefits keep you motivated while striving to reach fat burning, cardio training or overall health & wellness goals.ADDITIONAL TRAINING RESOURCESYou can also choose an expert training plan to help you reach your goals. Training plans provide coaching & inspiration for fitness goals, incl.: weight loss, building endurance, jogging a 10k, running a half-marathon, running a marathon or attaining a bikini body!Runtastic is all about health & fitness apps! Check out more of our apps to help you reach your fitness goals at http://play.google.com/store/search?q=pub:Runtastic

A good app worth 5-star ★★★★★ ratings!Purify is a tiny tool that works as an optimizer for your mobile speed and battery. It can clean and clear the ram of your mobile. It can automatically stop less used apps, saving more battery charge. At the same time it acts like a ram booster. Additionally , Purify can work as a notifications manager and display them in one place, reserving a clean state for your notification bar. ## Why users love purify** Battery SaverPurify can stop apps when they are not in use. In other words, saving more memory for apps running in the front. This effective feature constantly improves your device’s battery life and running performance. Here’s a testimonial from our user: "Now with purify app every 1% battery stays for a very good time. It is just a tiny but effective battery saver".** Speed boosterAfter identifying apps that frequently auto start in the background (especially those start without your permission) , Purify automatically places them into hibernation, removing their running privileges in order to save system memory and optimize the running speed. Purify can increase the performance of apps you use regularly by managing the amount of memory they consume. “Purify is an effective Speed booster for my old phone, working 360 days of a year. I really adore this tiny helper” says one of Purify users.** Notifications ManagerWith root access, Purify can effectively manage all notifications and offer you a clean and clear notification bar. You can wipe out notifications in bulk. Without unwanted notification disturbing you, your phone’s performance is fully utilized. Please notice that for non-root devices, Android system does not offer the permission to manage notification bar at the moment but we are working actively to achieve it in the future. ** Multiple languages supportThanks to our volunteers from all over the world, Purify has been translated into 6 languages including: English, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, Hindi and Indonesian. Besides improving the performance of Purify, we will constantly add more languages in the future, hopefully Purify will have 360 translations one day ;)** Bloatware Remover With root permission, Purify has the ability to uninstall all bloatware that annoys you daily. This feature can help boost your device’s running speed, saving power and most importantly, recover your device with a clean and clear state. So far, Purify has helped users to remove bloatware from more than 360 categories. “I really appreciate Purify helps me to remove those apps that I don’t need. Now my phone’s running performance is significantly enhanced.” said one of Purify Facebook fans.## Why does Purify requires root access to run some features?Purify blocks the ability of apps to auto start and stops them if they run at an inappropriate time. That can be just done when your devices have root access. In addition, removing bloatware and managing notifications also requires root access.## How is Purify different from CCleaner, Green Booster or any other booster tool?CCleaner clears cache and junk to preserve more storage while Purify is best at leveraging apps running privilege based on usage. It is an awesome speed booster, ram booster and a cool battery saver. Rather than temporary boosting, Purify can effectively put apps into hibernation to achieve an effective improvement in the mobile’s performance. And we also made Purify tiny in size, clear and cool in UI so it won’t be a burden for any kind of devices.Use Purify - cool down your phone and enjoy the awesome experience!## Stay tuned★Official website: http://purify.kingroot.net/?utm_source=gp&utm_medium=gp&utm_campaign=gp★Google+ Community: https://plus.google.com/communities/106086755269756446231★Translation: https://crowdin.com/project/king-root

Jugnoo gives you the freedom of traveling stress-free in auto-rickshaws. Get affordable and safe rides at the lowest possible fares in your city. Simply tap a button and a certified Jugnoo driver will arrive at your desired pick-up location within minutes. How Jugnoo works:1. GPS detects your current location.2. Tap the auto rickshaw button at the centre and we ping the nearby Jugnoo autos.3. One of the Jugnoo autos accepts your request and moves towards your pick-up location.4. Instant confirmation along with the driver's details are displayed.5. Track the Jugnoo auto coming your way on the map or call the driver directly.6. Carry the meter with you and pay according to the distance travelled.7. Pay the fare shown at the completion of ride using cash or online wallets.8. Refer your friends for free rides. Jugnoo is changing the way people have been taking auto rickshaw rides. Our drivers are professionally trained and their autos undergo stringent quality checks.Connect with us over social media for exciting deals on rides.Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/jugnooseLike us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/jugnooseHeart us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/jugnoo_india/Have a question? Write to us at support@jugnoo.in Jugnoo daje swobodę podróżowania bez stresu auto-riksze. Uzyskaj niedrogie i bezpieczne przejażdżki po możliwie najniższych taryf w Twoim mieście. Wystarczy dotknąć przycisk i certyfikowany sterownik Jugnoo przybędzie do żądanej lokalizacji pick-up w ciągu kilku minut.Jak Jugnoo działa:1. GPS wykrywa bieżącą lokalizację.2. Naciśnij przycisk auto rikszą na środku i ping pobliskie autos Jugnoo.3. Jednym z aut Jugnoo zaakceptuje prośbę i przesuwa się w kierunku swojej lokalizacji pick-up.są wyświetlane 4. Natychmiastowe potwierdzenie wraz ze szczegółami kierowcy.5. Tor auto Jugnoo pochodzących drogę na mapie lub zadzwoń sterownik bezpośrednio.6. Wykonać miernika z wami i płacić w zależności od przebytej odległości.7. Należy zwrócić opłatę pokazany po zakończeniu jazdy z wykorzystaniem środków pieniężnych lub portfele internetowych.8. Patrz znajomym bezpłatnych przejazdów.Jugnoo zmienia sposób w jaki ludzie zostali biorąc przejażdżki rikszą auto. Nasi kierowcy są profesjonalnie wyszkoleni i ich samochody przechodzą rygorystyczne kontrole jakości.Połącz się z nami na social media dla ciekawych ofert na przejażdżki.Dołącz do nas na Twitterze https://twitter.com/jugnoosePolub nas na Facebooku w https://www.facebook.com/jugnooseSerce nas na Instagram na https://www.instagram.com/jugnoo_india/Mam pytanie? Napisz do nas na support@jugnoo.in~~pobj

Lose weight by tracking food & fitness with the SparkPeople’ Calorie Counter and Diet Tracker app. We think it’s the best weight loss and diet app for Android, and we think you will too.This app brings the fitness tracking and calorie counting tools, exercise demos, and detailed reporting that have helped millions of SparkPeople members meet their goals and live healthier, better, lives. The app fully integrates with our site, giving you access to detailed fitness and diet reporting, articles by our health experts, thousands of healthy recipes and more.WHY YOU SHOULD DOWNLOAD OUR APP RIGHT NOW:The biggest food database of any food tracking app: With over 3,500,000 foods tracked and more being added every day, it’s easy to count the calories of what you’re eating and find a diet that’s right for you.Fast Diet & Fitness Tracking: It’s easy to track your workouts and count the calories you burn. Track both strength and cardio with our easy-to-use search function, including sets, reps, and weight/rep. Calculate the calorie makeup of any meal with our simple calorie calculator. Hundreds of Exercise Demonstrations: Get fit and avoid common exercise injuries with our short demos of popular cardio and strength exercises. All demos are performed by our licensed trainers, so you can learn how to exercise the right way, every time.Barcode Scanner: Scan the barcode of any food and find its calorie and nutritional information in our food database. Track all common nutrients: calories carbs, protein, fat, fiber, cholesterol, and more. Quick Glance Home Screen: See a daily log of calories eaten, calories burned and fitness minutes as soon as you open the app.Daily Weigh-In Page: Keep track of your day-to-day gains and losses with our easy to use weight chart. It’s easier to keep those extra pounds off once you’ve seen how far you’ve come!Health, Diet & Fitness Articles: Read articles from SparkPeople’s nutritionists and fitness experts to learn how to be a healthier, more motivated you.Total Integration: You can access all fitness and nutrition logs from your computer, tablet or smartphone, so you always have the information you need, when you need it. Plus, you’ll always have an online backup of all your data.Get Motivated with SparkPoints: SparkPoints is a game we’ve woven through our program that makes getting fit fun. Track your food and fitness, learn new, healthy habits, and spin the SparkWheel to get points and earn trophies.Connect Apps & Devices: Already use other apps or devices to track your fitness, but want more help with weight loss strategies & diet tracking? Just connect the app or device you use to your SparkPeople account! We offer full integration with FitBit, Jawbone UP, Misfit, Runkeeper, and Garmin devices.SPARKPEOPLE ISN’T JUST AN APP, WE’RE A COMMUNITYThe SparkPeople Calorie Counter & Diet Tracker fully syncs with SparkPeople.com. Since 2001, SparkPeople.com has helped millions of people just like you to lose weight and stay fitt, and we do this by offering support, education and powerful weight loss and fitness tools. With your SparkPeople account, you can also access:- SparkPeople.com's vast library of healthy-living articles, fitness videos, and exercise planning tools.- SparkRecipes.com, our healthy recipe site. TaxiGo is an app to help you to calculate the cost of a taxi ride. It's easy to use, just press the origin and the destination of your journey on the map. Very useful to know the route and the taxi fare estimate for your ride.How to use:Press and hold over the map the origin point until it appear a marker then press and hold the destination of the travel.Settings:It's open for the user to modify the cost of taxi fares. For now we have information of some cities of Mexico, Brazil, US and Germnay but it can be changed according to your city and type of service. You just need to input the initial fare and per kilometer fare established in your city.*Night fares:To use the night fares, go to Settings and check "Enable the night fare" ✓, back to the map and draw a new route for get the night fare costs.This class of applications is also known as: taxi cost, taximeter, taxi route, taxi calculator, rides.We will update constantly new versions with more fares and features.*For more news follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/taxigoapp

FBReader (FBReaderJ) is a free ebook reader.Main ebook formats: ePub (including main features of ePub3), Kindle azw3 (mobipocket), fb2(.zip).Other supported formats: RTF, doc (MS Word), html, plain text.Formats supported via free plugins: PDF (https://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.geometerplus.fbreader.plugin.pdf), DjVu (https://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.geometerplus.fbreader.plugin.djvu)FBReader supports synchronization of your library and/or reading positions with the FBReader book network (https://books.fbreader.org/), a Google Drive™ based cloud service. Synchronization is disabled by default; to enable and configure it, use the preferences dialog.FBReader is fast and highly customizable - it can use external TrueType/OpenType fonts and custom backgrounds, the screen brightness can be adjusted while reading (slide finger up/down along the left screen edge), and different day/night color schemes can be selected.This reader also includes a browser/downloader to access different network ebook catalogs and stores. Several popular English, French, Russian, Chinese, and Polish libraries are included. Custom OPDS catalogs are supported too.Alternatively, you can download books manually and save them on your device in /sdcard/Books.FBReader is integrated with external dictionaries, including Dictan (https://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.softex.dictan), ColorDict, Fora Dictionary, FreeDictionary.org, and LEO dictionary.In addition, this reader is localized for 34 languages, and includes hyphenation patterns for 24 languages. The app is open-source (GPL).

Asistente para memorizar armaduras, notas e intervalos, y mejorar la ejecución de música a la primera lectura.Lee música rápidamente y sin esfuerzo como un profesional. Aprende a reconocer las armaduras, las notas y los intervalos en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. Tres módulos de aprendizaje independientes en una sola app. Reserva 5 minutos por día para esta app y leerás música como un profesional en poco tiempo. La app usa un enfoque ingenioso para memorizar información a través de la repetición y de patrones visuales haciendo énfasis en el contenido difícil de recordar.La interfaz simple, elegante e intuitiva permite el desplazamiento entre diferentes sistemas de nomenclatura de notas usadas en los principales países del mundo:• CDEFGAB (major + minor, 大调 + 小调, 大調 + 小調)• CDEFGAH (dur + moll)• Do Re Mi Fa Sol La Si (mayor + menor, maior + menor, majeur + mineur, maggiore + minore)• Дo Рe Ми Фа Coль Ля Си (мажор + минор)• ハニホヘトイロ (長調 + 短調)• 도 레 미 파 솔 라 시 (장조 + 단조) Módulo Armaduras: Este módulo te ayudará a memorizar un círculo de quintas, indispensable para cualquier músico. Aprenderás a reconocer las claves basadas en la cantidad de bemoles y sostenidos en una armadura al principio de una línea de notación musical. Elige entre tres modos de aprendizaje usando los botones en la parte inferior de la pantalla principal del módulo: • Tonalidades mayores solamente: botón izquierdo • Tonalidades menores solamente: botón central • Tonalidades mayores y menores juntas: botón derecho Módulo Notas: Este módulo te enseñará a reconocer las notas rápidamente sin pensar, la verás y la sabrás. Elige entre tres modos de aprendizaje usando los botones en la parte inferior de la pantalla principal del módulo: • Clave de sol solamente: botón izquierdo • Clave de fa solamente: botón central • Clave de fa y clave de sol juntas: botón derecho Módulo Intervalos: Este módulo es de mucha ayuda especialmente para pianistas (entre otros). Los pianistas dotados no necesitan identificar todas las notas en una partitura. Reconocen los patrones basados en la distancia de las notas (intervalos) y automáticamente posicionan sus dedos de acuerdo a eso. Elige entre tres modos de aprendizaje usando los botones en la parte inferior de la pantalla principal del módulo: • Intervalos armónicos solamente: botón izquierdo • Intervalos melódicos solamente: botón central • Intervalos armónicos y melódicos juntos: botón derecho

Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) said “There are 99 names of Allah, and that anyone who memorizes all the names will be awarded paradise.”Finally an app that helps you to learn and memorize the 99 names of Allah. The amazement does not stop there this app also helps you remember the meanings of each name of Allah.The 99 names of Allah are called 'Asma Ul Husna' (Pronounce Asma Al Husna) which in Arabic means ‘The Most Beautiful Names’. These islamic names are attributes of Allah SWT by which Muslims regard God in Islam.In Arabic, the word Allah means ‘The God’. It is derived from the union of the word ‘Al’ meaning ‘The’ and ‘Ilah’ Meaning ‘God’. The word Allah is the supreme and all comprehensive divine name. In Islam, the name Allah is unique and unmatched and indicates the existence of one creator of the universe. Die FOCUS Online App bietet schnelle News und nachhaltigen Service aus den Bereichen News, Politik, Sport, Panorama, Geld, Gesundheit, Immobilien, Wissen, Kultur, Reisen, Finanzen, Familie und Auto. Die Artikel und Videos der FOCUS-Online-Redaktion bieten rund um die Uhr Information und Unterhaltung. Die Highlights der App im Überblick:✔ Gratis-App✔ Optimiert für Smartphones, Tablets, TV und Wearables✔ Kurze Ladezeiten✔ Optimiertes Layout mit reduzierter Grafik bei schwachen Netzwerkverbindungen✔ Widget für den Homescreen ✔ Sehr häufige Aktualisierung der Inhalte✔ Gute Lesbarkeit durch einstellbare Schriftgrößen✔ Hochqualitativer Journalismus aus der FOCUS-Online-Redaktion✔ Großes Videoangebot in allen Ressorts✔ Inhalte auf Facebook, WhatsApp & Co. leicht teilbar ✔ Push-Meldungen (z.B. Eilmeldungen), die auf bestimmte Themen eingegrenzt werden können✔ Börsen-Kurse✔ Fußball-Livedaten (Spiele, Blitztabellen und Live-Ticker für Bundesliga, DFB-Pokal, Champions League und Turniere)✔ Tor-Alarm: Pushmitteilungen zu Ihrem Lieblingsverein oder Spielen✔ Formel 1- Livedaten (Live-Ticker, Platzierungen, Fahrerwertung)FOCUS Online entwickelt sein mobiles Angebot ständig weiter. Wichtig sind dabei die Bedürfnisse des Users und die Berücksichtigung der neuesten technischen Entwicklungen rund um Smartphones und Tablets. Wir freuen uns weiterhin auf Ihr Feedback und schätzen Ihre Meinung sehr. Nutzen Sie dazu bitte die Feedback-Funktion in der App.┄┄┄Erklärung zu den Berechtigungen:✗ Ihre Konten (Konten auf dem Gerät suchen)Wird auf Geräten mit älteren Android-Versionen für den Empfang von Push-Mitteilungen benötigt, da ein vorhandenes Google-Konto erforderlich ist. Mit dieser Berechtigung ist es nur möglich, abzufragen, ob ein Konto vorhanden ist. Die Liste der gefundenen Konten wird nicht übermittelt und die Daten der Konten selbst sind der App nicht zugänglich.✗ Speicher (USB-Speicherinhalte ändern oder löschen)Wird benötigt, um auf Geräten mit wenig internem Speicher Daten wie beispielsweise Bilder zwischenspeichern zu können. Die App greift hierfür ausschließlich auf das von ihr erstellte Cache-Verzeichnis zu.Andere Daten auf dem USB-Speicher werden weder gelesen noch manipuliert.✗ System-Tools (Standby-Modus deaktivieren)Hiermit ist es zukünftig optional möglich, beim Erhalt einer Push-Nachricht das Gerät aus dem Ruhezustand zu holen.✗ Hardware-Steuerelemente (Vibrationsalarm steuern)Optional wird der Vibrationsalarm ausgelöst, wenn das Gerät eine Push-Nachricht erhält.✗ Google-Servicekonfiguration lesenWird von Google für die Google Play Services benötigt.

Ỷ Thiên 3D là tựa game đầu tiên được chuyển thể từ kiệt tác Ỷ Thiên Đồ Long Ký _ Y Thien Do Long Ky của nhà văn Kim Dung. Ỷ Thiên 3D được phát triển bởi công ty Perfect World nên sở hữu cả cốt truyện lẫn đồ họa, gameplay tuyệt vời. Đây là tựa game đáng mong chờ nhất 2016.ĐẶC SẮC- Ỷ Thiên 3D - Y Thien 3D là game mobile sử dụng đồ họa Era tiên tiến nhất hiện nay, tái hiện thế giới Võ Lâm Truyền Kỳ và các Tuyệt Chiêu Võ Công chân thực, sắc nét như xem phim full HD.-Ỷ Thiên 3D được thiết kế và vận hành với tiêu chí “Cộng Đồng” khi 90% các tính năng đều liên quan đến hỗ trợ từ Bang Hội – Hảo Hữu – Phe Phái.-Tính năng Cường Hóa, Tăng Sao đặc biệt khi thay đồ không bị mất cấp độ cường hóa- Hệ thống thú cưỡi đa dạng, bắt mắt và gia tăng công lực cực lớn..- Tính năng Ủy Thác – không cần luyện công cũng lên cấp độ- Vận tiêu đột phá kinh nghiệm, Cướp tiêu cướp hàng, nhận được lượng lớn vật phẩm- Sàn đấu giá thông minh, sân chơi mới dành cho dân cày-Hệ thống nhiệm vụ được ưu việt hóa giúp game thủ hoàn thành cực nhanh và đơn giản.-Không nạp tiền vẫn trở thành VIP, game thủ có thể thu thập nguyên liệu, chế tạo vật phẩm. CỐT TRUYỆN- Xây dựng từ tiểu thuyết Ỷ Thiên Đồ Long Ký - Y Thien Do Long Ky, bối cảnh game là một thế giới Võ Lâm Truyền Kỳ đầy màu sắc kiếm hiệp với những cái tên quen thuộc như: Trương Tam Phong, Tạ Tốn, Trương Vô Kỵ, Chu Chỉ Nhược..-Bản đồ trong game rất rộng lớn, các Hiệp Khách tha hồ ngao du sơn thủy đến các địa danh nổi tiếng trong văn học lẫn phim ảnh đó là: núi Võ Đang, núi Nga My, đỉnh Quang Minh, núi Côn Luân, Hồ Điệp Cốc… Gặp gỡ các Hào Kiệt, Kiếm Khách trong giang hồ, cùng nhau kết thành tri kỷ.-Đồ Long tái xuất- Phong Vân tật khởi. Vì sự xuất hiện của thanh đao Đồ Long, mà cả giang hồ nổi bão lao vào tàn sát nhau. Đến cả tứ đại môn phái Võ Đang – Nga My- Minh Giáo- Thiếu Lâm cũng bị cuốn vào vòng xoáy tranh giành ngôi vị minh chủ võ lâm. -Những bộ tuyệt học danh bất hư truyền như Cửu Âm Chân Kinh, Càn Khôn Đại Na Di, Như Lai Thần Chưởng, Cửu Dương Thần Công… được tái hiện vô cùng đẹp mắt sát với tưởng tượng của Kim Dung. CẬP NHẬT -Phiên bản Update sẽ ra mắt vào đầu tháng 10 với tên gọi Võ Lâm Truyền Kỳ, với một loạt tính năng mới như:-Thế giới Võ Lâm Truyền Kỳ sẽ không chỉ có hận thù, xung đột mà còn được tô điểm bởi màu sắc lãng mạn của các cặp đôi Kiếm Hiệp Tình Duyên. Chức năng Kết Hôn sẽ khiến game thủ tim được tình yêu của mình.-Cập nhật môn phái mới, khiến cho cuộc tranh giành quyển bí kíp Cửu Âm Chân Kinh càng trở nên khốc liệt.-Chiến tổ đội liên server. Thách đấu người chơi từ các server khác. Phá bỏ giới hạn game mobile thông thường.-Hệ thống bí tịch kỳ bí tạo ra những hiệu ứng khác nhau hứa hẹn cường hóa các cao thủ lên tầm cao mới. Ismerje meg a Hao Kiet, Keresés itt cigány, valamint a bizalmasa.Hosszú újraexportálható Express minta kiindulási fogyatékos. Mivel a megjelenése kardot és a sárkány, de jól Wanderer vihar csapódott egy másik mészárlás. Négy nagy mindkét Wudang szekta - Oroszország USA Ming Giao- Shaolin belekeveredtek az örvény intelligens ember tülekedés harcművészetek.-A Top átviteli lista kárt iskola a pekingi kilenc Yin Chan, Kun Qian Dai Na Di, Tathágata ügyvéd Shen, Yang Shen Gong ... Kilenc gyönyörűen reprodukálható rendkívül közel Kim Dung képzelet. FRISSÍTVEFrissítés leminősítés változat fog megjelenni október elején úgynevezett kardforgató, egy sereg új funkciók, mint például:-A Világ kardforgató nem csak a gyűlölet, viszály, hanem díszíti színes romantikus párok Duyen Tinh Kiem Hiep. Funkció Házasság teszi a játékosok szeretik a szíve.-Updated Új szekta, hogy a verseny a recepteket könyv kilenc Yin Chan Kinh egyre vad.-Chien Inter-kiszolgáló csapat. Challenge játékosok más szerverek. Megtörve a szokásos mobil játék határait.Elnök rejtélyes titkos rendszer különböző hatások fokozása ígéretes játékosok új magasságokba. GiveBlood is the Canadian Blood Services mobile app for Canadians looking to save lives. Quickly and easily find a clinic and book an appointment. Not only will this app automatically place a reminder in your calendar, it will track your donations each and every time, keeping your life saving gift top of mind all the time. With instant reminders, dynamic location services and embedded social networking, all you need to do is log in and find an open appointment slot. So why not save a life today? It’s in you to give. Features: •Search for donation clinics near you •Use your current location to map local clinics, and view their services and amenities •View available time slots •Book, view or cancel a donation appointment •Add appointments and reminders to your calendar •Easily sign-up or sign-in to access your account information •View and modify your personal details •View your donation history •Send feedback GiveBlood is available in English and French. The displayed version corresponds to the language that you have selected in your device settings. Giveblood és l'aplicació mòbil de Serveis de Sang de Canadà per als canadencs que busquen salvar vides. Ràpida i fàcilment trobar una clínica i demanar una cita. No només aquesta aplicació col · locarà automàticament un recordatori en el seu calendari, es farà un seguiment de les seves donacions cada vegada, mantenir una vida d'estalvi d'alt do de la ment tot el temps. Amb recordatoris instantanis, els serveis de localització dinàmics i xarxes socials integrat, tot el que ha de fer és iniciar sessió i trobar una ranura de cita oberta. Així que per què no salvar una vida avui? La versió que es mostra correspon a l'idioma que seleccioneu en la configuració del dispositiu.

Letzgo diventa Zego!Letzgo, il primo servizio di carpooling urbano istantaneo in Italia, cambia nome e diventa Zego.Zego è il nuovo modo per spostarsi in città condividendo i posti liberi delle auto.Dal tuo smartphone o dal tuo tablet, trovi in tempo reale altri amici che ti portano dove vuoi. Scarica l’App, entra a far parte della community e inizia a muoverti comodamente, risparmiando.Con Zego puoi chiedere un passaggio o renderti disponibile come driver.HAI BISOGNO DI UN PASSAGGIO?ECCO COME FUNZIONA 1. Decidi dove vuoi andare. Inserisci il punto di partenza e di arrivo e invia la tua richiesta.2. Un driver della community Zego risponderà alla tua richiesta.Controlla immediatamente chi può venire a prenderti e in quanto tempo. Puoi sempre consultare il profilo del driver e il suo rating.3. Sali a bordo e goditi il viaggio.In ogni viaggio, attraverso l’app, puoi segnalare in tempo reale la tua posizione via Facebook, sms o e-mail.4. Arrivi a destinazione.Al termine del viaggio dai un feedback al tuo driver e, se vuoi, puoi riconoscere un rimborso a chi ti ha dato il passaggio.VUOI DIVENTARE DRIVER?Inizia subito a dare passaggi ai membri della community Zego. Scrivici a community@zegoapp.comSUPPORTO:Hai qualche domanda o suggerimento? Aiutaci a migliorare, scrivi a support@zegoapp.comSEGUICI:Per rimanere sempre aggiornato sulle nostre novità seguici su Facebook, Twitter e Instagram.

Noticias Boom es una de las aplicaciones de información más atractivas que suman las últimas noticias sobre los asuntos actuales, guapas, videos y graciosos en México.El soporte técnico de Noticias Boom se llama Motor Inteligente de Push(PIE), el cual es una tecnología basada en datos grandes. PIE puede descubrir tus preferencias e intereses de lectura rápidamente y puede proporcionar las noticias que te importan más. The official app for OnlinePizza.Order all type of food home using your phone but without making a call!At OnlinePizza.se you can order home delivery and take away of pizza, sushi, thai food, chinese, indian, pasta, hamburgers, kebab, falafel, drinks, candy and snacks to your home.=========REASONS TO GET THE ONLINEPIZZA APP:- ORDER FOOD using your phone without making a call.- NAVIGATE EASILY between a big variety of restaurants and cuisines in your neighborhood.- READ REVIEWS of restaurants and their food and service.- CARD PAYMENT - avoid cash and pay by card.- MODIFY YOUR ORDER - maybe extra kebab sauce on the pizza?=========THIS IS HOW YOU ORDER:1. Choose your favorite restaurant by clicking the restaurants (you can only order from one restaurant at a time).4. Choose your favorite dish by clicking "LÄGG TILL". Here you can also modify your order. 5. Click "KLAR" when you’re done and "TILL KASSAN" to go to the checkout.7. Click "VÄLJ LEVERANSSÄTT" to choose take away or home delivery.8. Click "LÄGG ORDER" to send your order to the restaurant and await your food delivery.=========WHEN TO ORDER FROM ONLINEPIZZA?- When you're on your way home from work, school or workout.- When you're at home (alone or with family and friends).- At work or in the office.- On the couch when watching a movie.- When you have no time to cook for the kids after having a long day.- When you want to treat yourself.- When you want to surprise your partner with a luxurious meal.- Anytime!=========POPULAR CITIES WITH HOME DELIVERY OF FOOD AND PIZZA:Eskilstuna, Gävle, Göteborg, Karlstad, Linköping, Luleå, Lund, Malmö, Norrköping, Stockholm, Sundsvall, Uppsala and Örebro as well as many others.At OnlinePizza.se you find menus from more than 1250 restaurants that offer take away and home delivery in more than 210 cities all over Sweden. Atėjo laikas kai įniršio veidus savo telefono! Parsisiųsti ★ Nuotrauku Keisti Photo Editor ★ ir turi neįtikėtinai įdomus redagavimo savo nuotraukas su juokingiausių lipdukai kada nors! Mes jums siūlome: Spalvinga dizaino laimingų spalvų! Intuityvus čiaupo kontroliuoja tinka visiems vartotojams! Didžiulė kolekcija Pyktis susiduria juokingi lipdukai! Tekstas ant vaizdo redagavimo nuotraukų! Instagram, Facebook, ir "Twitter" pasidalijimo galimybes! Puikus būdas atsikratyti nuobodulio! ★ Nuotrauku Keisti Photo Editor ★ yra visiškai nauja nuotraukų redagavimo programa, kuri bus suteikti jums valandų įdomus ir pramogų. Redaguokite savo nuotraukas į gražių būdu su linksmas kolekcija įniršio veido lipdukais, kad mes sukūrėme specialiai Jums. Pridėti juokinga tekstą į nuotraukas, kad jie dar labiau įdomus ir nustebinti visus savo draugus parašėte juos "Facebook", "Twitter", ir Instagram. Nedvejokite - gauti šią nemokamą vaizdo redaktorių nuo GP šiandien ir mėgautis savo pic redagavimo patirtį. Pyktis veido Photo Booth siūlo jums spalvinga dizaino laimingų spalvų: raudona, oranžinė, geltona, žalia, mėlyna, aksomo ir violetinė. Valdymas yra paprastas ir intuityvus, todėl visi vartotojai kartos turės jokių sunkumų ją naudojant. Jis tinka vaikams, paaugliams ir suaugusiems. Vaikai turės milžinišką įdomus pridedant įvairių Troll veido memes į savo nuotraukas ar nuotraukas savo draugams. Paaugliai bus pasijuokti iš savo draugais visuose socialiniuose tinkluose. Suaugusieji bus pridėti šiek tiek juoką į savo rimtų gyvenimą. Yra kažkas visiems, todėl jūs galite atsisiųsti šį nuostabų juokingas veido kūrėjas dabar! ★ Nuotrauku Keisti Photo Editor ★ yra iš įniršio komiksų kolekcija susiduria lipdukus, kad jūs tiesiog dievina! Nuotrauka manija yra jos smailės, taigi jums turėtų galutinai fotografuoti su savo fotoaparatu, pasirinkite nuotrauką lipduką, kad gerai dera su jūsų asmenybę ir įdėti jį į visų socialinių tinklų. Kombainas redaguotas nuotraukas su kai kuriomis Instagram rėmai ir siųsti juos tiesiai ant Instagram, kad visi jūsų pasekėjai gali pamatyti, kaip linksmas šie rage veidai. Leiskite nuotrauka linksmybės prasideda! Tai pyktis veidą vaizdo redaktorius jums pasiūlyti gražių fotomontažas - už nuotraukas sau ir grupinių nuotraukų. Pagražinti savo mėgstamus nuotraukas su meme lipdukais, kad šis nuostabus veidas keitiklis programa siūlo jums ir kad visi jūsų draugai juoktis kaip crazy. Yra platus pasirinkimas madingam komiksų simbolių, tokių kaip Challenge Accepted, Me Gusta, College Freshman, Success Kid, I too Like to Live Dangerously, Annoying Facebook Girl, ir daug daugiau. Jei esate iš nuotraukų redagavimo ventiliatorius, kurti koliažus ir fotografuojant save, tai pyktis komiksai app yra puikus pasirinkimas už jus. Fotografija Apps šiuo metu yra labai populiarus, todėl, jei norite, kad tilptų, jums turėtų galutinai turi šį juokingas Image Editor programinę įrangą savo telefonui. Mes siūlome Jums galimybę tapti sławna tarp savo draugų, darant visi juokiasi kaip crazy kiekvieną kartą jūs einate. Smagu, kad žmonės jaustųsi gerai, todėl pradėti redaguoti vaizdus su juokingas veido lipdukai dabar ir sukurti kai kurių gražus pics meną!

Check your refund status, make a payment, find free tax preparation assistance, sign up for helpful tax tips, and follow the IRS on Twitter, Tumblr, and YouTube - all in the latest version of IRS2Go.Download IRS2Go and connect with the IRS whenever you want, wherever you are.IRS2Go is the official app of the Internal Revenue Service.--When installing IRS2Go, you will see a list of Android permissions that the app requests. To help you understand why we ask for certain permissions, we’ve provided a breakdown of the usage.Network - full network access; view network connections. These permissions are required to access the internet.Location - precise location (GPS and network-based). The app allows taxpayers to search for nearby Volunteer Income Tax Assistance (VITA) and the Tax Counseling for the Elderly (TCE) locations, which offer free tax help for taxpayers who qualify.Phone - directly calls phone numbers. The app allows users to make phone calls to the IRS or VITE/TCE locations.Storage - read the contents of your USB storage; modify or delete the contents of your USB storage. The Free Tax Help mapping feature uses these permissions to save map data to your phone's storage. This means that your phone won't need to download the same map data every time.

День Рождения – удивительный праздник. Каждый год он приходит к каждому из нас и приносит радостные чувства, делает нас опытнее и мудрее. Важно, чтобы поздравления имениннику были оригинальными, приятными и запоминающимися. Кроме подарков, очень хорошо будет организовать поздравления в виде красивых стихов, рассказать имениннику веселые истории, привести высказывания, цитаты и афоризмы великих людей, связанные с этой замечательной датой.

MyRadar is a fast, easy-to-use, no-frills application that displays animated weather radar around your current location, allowing you to quickly see what weather is coming your way. Just start the app, and your location pops up with animated weather!The map has the standard pinch/zoom capability which allows you to smoothly zoom and pan around the United States and see what the weather is like anywhere. MyRadar shows animated weather, so you can tell if rain is headed toward or away from you, and how fast. In addition to the free features of the app, a few additional upgrades are available; see severe storm warnings for your area, as provided by the National Weather Service, and real-time hurricane tracking - great for the start of hurricane season!MyRadar currently only shows weather in the United States, and only in the 48 contiguous states - not Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico. Download MyRadar today and try it out!

myMusic — бесплатное музыкальное приложение для телефонов и планшетов. Слушай у нас музыку из ВКонтакте и других социальных сетей. Миллионы треков: новинки, поп, рок, рэп, метал. Уникальная система рекомендаций подберет для вас персональный плейлист. Скачивай и слушай песни без Интернета в myMusic.Прослушивание загруженных треков возможно только через приложение myMusic.myMusic это:►Импорт из ВКонтакте. Подключите ваш аккаунт VK: сохраните и слушайте всю музыку в приложении.► Скачивание треков. Музыкальное приложение позволяет скачать любую музыку. Музыка сохраняется в памяти устройства или SD-карте, чтобы слушать ее без интернета. Найти скачанные треки можно на вкладке "Моя музыка" в плейлисте "Скачанная музыка", прослушать скачанные треки возможно только через приложение myMusic.► Легкая авторизация. В приложении можно авторизоваться под своим аккаунтом ВКонтакте (VK) или Моего Мира. Также myMusic поддерживает технологию SSO - если на вашем устройстве установлено приложение "Мой Мир" или "Почта Mail.Ru", то вы сможете войти в свой аккаунт одним нажатием.► Миллионы треков. myMusic дает доступ до миллионов музыкальных треков и каждый день добавляются тысячи новых песен.►Рекомендации. Начиная с первого прослушанного трека наша система рекомендации начинает подбирать музыку, которая понравится именно вам. Чем больше вы слушаете песен, тем более точные рекомендации вы получаете.► Музыкальный каталог. Мы собрали и регулярно обновляем разные тематические плейлисты хорошей музыки на любой музыкальный вкус: популярная музыка, рок, электроника, джаз, рэп, поп, классика, альтернатива, и многое многое другое.► Поиск. Удобный поиск поможет вам найти любую музыку, а поисковая выдача покажет не только треки, но и плейлисты ► Плейлисты. Собирай свою коллекцию любимой музыки - создавай свои собственные плейлисты и добавляй понравившиеся плейлисты других пользователей► Удобный интерфейс. Минималистичный дизайн, понятное управление, ничего лишнего — просто любимая бесплатная музыка! myMusic - free music application for phones and tablets. Listen to music from us from VKontakte and other social networks. Millions of tracks: news, pop, rock, rap, metal. Unique recommendations for you to select a personal playlist. Download and listen to the song without Internet in myMusic.Listening to downloaded tracks possible only through the application myMusic. myMusic this:► Import from VKontakte. Connect your account VK: save and listen to all the music in the annex.► Download the tracks. Music app lets you download any music. Music is stored in the device memory or SD-card to listen to it without the Internet. Find tracks can be downloaded in the "My Music" playlist "download music", listen to downloaded tracks is possible only through the application myMusic.► Easy authorization. In the application, you can log in to your account VKontakte (VK) or My World. MyMusic also supports SSO - if your device has an application "My World" and "Mail Mail.Ru", then you can log into your account with a click.► million tracks. myMusic gives you access to millions of music tracks and every day thousands of new songs added.► Recommendations. From the first track listened to our system recommendation starts to pick music that will appeal to you. The more you listen to the songs, the more accurate the recommendations you receive.► Music Catalog. we have collected and regularly update the different thematic playlists of good music on every musical taste: pop music, rock, electronic, jazz, rap, pop, classical, alternative, and much more.► Search. Convenient search will help you find any kind of music, and the issuance of a search will not only tracks but also playlists► Playlists. Collect your favorite music collection - create your own playlists and adds favorite playlists of other users► User-friendly interface. Minimalist design, intuitive control, nothing more - just love free music!

Save your battery life and discover which apps are draining your battery with the FREE Battery Widget Pro. Battery Widget Pro monitors app battery drain, battery charge speed, and battery discharge speed to help improve your battery life. In addition, Battery Widget Pro’s centralized device settings manager lets you adjust GPS, WiFi, screen brightness, and 8 other battery consuming device settings. By anonymously sharing battery usage data with the Better App Community, you will help app developers improve their apps and help other Better App Community members improve their battery life. Benefit instantly from the power of many by comparing your battery performance to Better App Community members similar to you.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Key Features• App Battery Usage History: Track how much battery is consumed by each of the apps on your device. • Analyze your apps’ battery usage by foreground, background, and overall. • Sort by battery usage in the past hour, day, week, month, or all time.• Device Toggles: Access and adjust toggles for screen brightness, screen time, WiFi, data, vibration, volume, Bluetooth, sync, screen rotation, airplane mode, and GPS.• Top Battery Draining Apps Widget: Available from your homescreen, flip through the 5 apps that are draining the most of your battery.• Battery Percentage Widget: See what percentage of battery is remaining on your device.• Remaining Battery Time: See how much time is remaining until your battery is fully charged or discharged.• Battery Drain Monitor: Receive notifications if your battery is discharging faster than usual. • App Manager: Force close or uninstall high battery drain apps from within Battery Widget Pro to save battery life.• Join the Better App Community: Increase battery life with the Better App Community. Benefit from the Better App Community by seeing how your battery charge and battery discharge compares to others with the same device and carrier network. With the Better App Community, we are improving battery life, together.• Better App Community Reports: Receive weekly community-powered battery reports that compare and analyze the battery usage of popular apps such as Facebook and Twitter.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Battery Widget Pro utilizes necessary permissions to provide you with helpful information to help save battery better than ever before. If you have any questions about the permissions requested by Battery Widget Pro, please feel free to email us at support@m2appmonitor.com. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Install Battery Widget Pro today to save battery life.

My Contacts Backup is the easiest way to backup and restore your contacts all from your phone without needing a computer or synchronization. You can backup all your contacts with a single touch and send yourself as a .vcf attachment via email.All contacts can then easily be restored any time by simply opening .vcf file in your mailbox.Key Features:* Offline Backup. No need to sync to any server. Just email the backup file to yourself.* Your adress book is secure and safe. We don't access or store your contacts.* Easy restore. No need to any app to restore backup file. Just tap on the *.vcf backup file in the Android or iPhone mail client.* Easily transfer contacts between Android or iPhone devices using just email client.* Copy backup file to your computer via USB cable feature.* Set REMINDER to backup regularly (weekly or monthly) * Backup Contacts as VCF (VCard)----------IMPORTANT NOTE: After sending backup file (*.vcf) to yourself, please check your inbox if message arrived and contains attachment (backup file). Sometimes email providers block attachments if attachment size is too large. Try with another mail account if possible, to send your backup file. Or copy backup file (on SD card) to your computer via USB cable.----------

The Samsung Print Service Plug-In provides native printing support on Android devices.1) Samsung Galaxy Devices - Samsung Print Service plug-in is pre-installed app on selected Samsung's Android OS smart phones and tablets (see compatibility list below). 2) Android KitKat(4.4) Devices- Samsung Print Service plug-in extends Android's printing feature in Android 4.4(Kitkat) to support printing on Samsung Printers. The plug-in enables printing to many Samsung laser printers, and MFPs without the need for third party apps or additional print drivers. Easily print photos, web pages and documents when your mobile device is connected to a compatible Samsung printer through a wireless network or a direct wireless connection to the printer. Watch full episodes of your favorite FOX shows the day after they air and binge on the full season of select shows – anytime, anywhere with FOX NOW. SIGN IN with your TV provider username and password to watch all available episodes from the FOX primetime lineup – including ALL episodes of the current season for many shows. If you don't see your provider or you don't have one, don't fret - new episodes unlock 8 days after airing on TV!WATCH and BINGE our NEW fall shows - no TV provider required - including:• MINORITY REPORT • SCREAM QUEENS• ROSEWOOD • GRANDFATHERED • THE GRINDER Plus, watch episodes from more than 30 primetime FOX shows and specials - including the full current season for many shows:• AMERICAN IDOL • ARE YOU SMARTER THAN A 5th GRADER? • BOB'S BURGERS• BONES• BOOM!• BROOKLYN NINE-NINE • BULLSEYE• EMPIRE • FAMILY GUY• GOLAN THE INSATIABLE • GOTHAM• HELL'S KITCHEN • HOME FREE• HOTEL HELL • THE LAST MAN ON EARTH • MASTERCHEF • MASTERCHEF JUNIOR • NEW GIRL• THE SIMPSONS • SLEEPY HOLLOW • SO YOU THINK YOU CAN DANCE • WAYWARD PINES • WORLD'S FUNNIEST • Select FOX SpecialsThe fine print on episode availability:• New shows: Immediately watch the latest episodes of our new shows without a TV provider login!• Returning shows: The latest episode of each returning show unlocks 8 days after airing on TV, except for So You Think You Can Dance, which unlocks 30 days after airing. • Full seasons and TV provider subscriptions: While a show is on the air, we try to make the full current season available to stream throughout the season. If you have a TV provider, you're all good - when we have rights to stream a full current season, you'll get all the episodes. If you don't have a TV provider (or we don't yet support yours), then we generally keep the latest five episodes unlocked for your viewing pleasure.• Past seasons: We typically don't have the rights to stream past seasons. Check your favorite subscription streaming service or Google Play instead.More helpful tips:• Access to the latest full episodes on FOX NOW is part of your TV subscription service. We support many TV providers including Xfinity, DirecTV, Time Warner Cable, AT&T U-Verse, Verizon FiOS, Optimum, Cox, Charter, Suddenlink, Mediacom, WOW! and many more. Visit http://fox.tv/providers to check the devices your provider supports.• Set reminders for new episodes on air and in the app - just star your favorites so you never miss an episode.• Did you know FOX NOW is on your TV? Look for us on many more of your favorite devices including Apple TV, Roku, Chromecast, Xbox One and Xbox 360.• For questions regarding content, signing in with your TV provider or technical issues please visit http://ask.fox.com or tweet us @FOXNOW.• Follow us on Twitter @FOXNOW for the latest episode updates and other FOX NOW news.We may work with mobile advertising companies and other similar entities that help deliver advertisements tailored to your interests. For more information about such advertising practices, and to opt-out in mobile apps, see http://www.fox.com/policy#ads. You may also download the App Choices app at www.aboutads.info/appchoices.

3BMeteo, informazioni comode, veloci ed affidabili. Le previsioni meteo più amate dagli italiani a portata di Smartphone e tablet.Se dici previsioni del tempo in Italia, dici 3bmeteo. Ecco a voi le previsioni più affidabili ed accurate, continuamente aggiornate nelle prime 24h, grazie alla tecnica del Nowcasting che utilizza dati meteo reali, immagini satellitari e radar e che permette di ottenere una previsione attiva elaborata con i dati più recenti.Tra le tante funzionalità anche notizie in tempo reale, articoli di cronaca e curiosità scientifico-ambientali, video realizzati dai meteorologi della nostra redazione ed una grande community di utenti!Giorno dopo giorno questa applicazione diventerà davvero indispensabile per vivere il tuo tempo senza sorprese; dal risveglio alla mattina per la scelta dell’abbigliamento idoneo alla giornata, alla pianificazione di attività fino a 10 giorni dopo, fino agli eventi più importanti e alle tue imminenti vacanze, insomma alle informazioni di base per gestire attività quotidiane nella massima comodità e con la tranquillità di un prodotto di qualità.Previsioni non automatiche, ma curate da uno staff di più di 15 meteorologi che lavorano 365 giorni l’anno per dare il miglior servizio possibile. Gli esperti sono rappresentanti di tutte le zone d'Italia e si impegnano con la loro esperienza per "scavare" più a fondo nelle singole aree.Per le località imperdibile l’auto-localizzazione; saprai automaticamente che tempo farà nelle zone da te scelte come "preferite". Non dovrai selezionarle ogni volta, il tuo Smartphone saprà dove ti trovi, ma soprattutto il tempo esatto per quel luogo! E non c’è un numero massimo di luoghi prediletti, hai una grande possibilità di selezione. Aggiungi anche la possibilità di consultare dal tuo tablet le cartine regionali per una prospettiva sempre più ampia e contestualizzata.Cosa otterrai, nel dettaglio? La rappresentazione del tempo medio del giorno, previsioni sintetiche per le fasce notte, mattino, pomeriggio e sera, previsioni con dettaglio orario, monitoraggio di mari e venti, analisi di agenti atmosferici e tutte le parametriche possibili e desiderabili. Il tutto con un'interfaccia grafica rinnovata, chiara nella simbologia, completa nei dettagli meteo-climatici.Ti presentiamo inoltre la possibilità di vedere le immagini in tempo reale delle webcam di tutto il database; o ancora, potrai partecipare alla 3BMeteo Community dove condividere con gli altri utenti le tue foto e video o semplicemente segnalare le condizioni climatiche della tua zona.Se tutto questo non ti basta, eccoti i widget 3BMeteo che renderanno il rapporto con l’informazione meteorologica ancora più semplice, veloce e funzionale. Sono ben 3 i widget a disposizione, tra i quali uno vede il tempo fino a 5 giorni avanti; al loro interno potrai inoltre decidere se visualizzare le previsioni dell'ultima località visitata o contestuali alla tua posizione.Previsioni attendibili necessitano di conferme e spiegazioni: con questa app non solo puoi costantemente controllare eventuali importanti cambiamenti in corso, ma anche ricevere notifiche push di allerta e leggere gli approfondimenti dei nostri esperti. Il giornale meteo è una vera e propria fucina di informazioni fondamentali per capire il tempo, scritto con un linguaggio semplice, chiaro ed accattivante, come l’interfaccia grafica, molto intuitiva oltre che di facile utilizzo anche per i meno tecnologici.E se l’Italia è troppo piccola per voi, non temete: 3bmeteo vi assicura anche le previsioni per tutto il Mondo! Potrete infatti avere informazioni sul tempo anche all’estero, con una gestione automatica e fino ai 7 giorni successivi.3BMeteo è perfettamente ottimizzata con sistema operativo Android e le funzioni sono disponibili tanto in lingua italiana quanto in lingua inglese! Questa stessa applicazione è perfettamente idonea anche per tablet Android, con un layout specifico che è perfetto sia in modalità portrait che landscape.

Mobilbankappen fra SpareBank 1 gir deg tilgang til de mest brukte bank- og forsikringstjenestene du trenger når du er på farten. I tillegg kan du på en enkel måte ta kontakt med oss.I mobilbanken får du full oversikt over dine kontoer, kort, betalinger, sparing, lån og forsikringer – og du kan selvsagt bestille en rekke tjenester og produkter. Vi legger til nye tjenester fortløpende.Appen inneholder også «Melde skade», reiseforsikringsbevis og bestille verdivurdering av din bolig. NyhetI appen kan du velge å slå på «automatisk lesetilgang». Med denne funksjonen gir du appen en sikker og enkel tilgang til å hente ut data og informasjon om: •Forbruk: Hvor mye har du brukt i dag, i går og de siste7 dager.•eFaktura: Antall ubehandlede eFakturaer.•Mikrospar: Oversikt over hvor mye du sparte i går og sist uke. •Lønn: Appen vil gi beskjed når lønnen har kommet inn på konto.Det vil komme flere tjenester etter hvert. Merk: Har du Android versjon 4.3 eller lavere? Da vil du fortsatt ha tilgang til den gamle mobilbanken. Om du vil benytte deg av de nye tjenestene vi har laget, må du ha Android 4.4 eller nyere.Lag eget passord for å komme i gangFor å ta i bruk mobilbanken, må du lage deg et eget passord for mobile tjenester. Dette lager du enkelt selv i nettbanken under menypunktet «Mobil», «Koder og Passord» og «Passord». Gi oss ris og rosVi liker kommentarer og tilbakemeldinger fra deg for å kunne bli bedre. Ta kontakt med oss gjennom våre sosiale kanaler, kundesenteret eller skriv en kommentar i App Store. Bli kundeEr du ikke kunde hos oss, kan du enkelt bli kunde på www.sparebank1.no Tilganger og personvernSpareBank 1s mobilbankapp vil be om tilgang til å lese din lokasjon (stedsinformasjon). På startsiden i mobilbanken ligger det et stedsbestemt bakgrunnsbilde som vil variere basert på hvor du befinner deg. Det er viktig å understreke at verken SpareBank 1 eller ansatte i SpareBank 1 kan se hvor du befinner deg. Din lokasjon benyttes kun av appen for å tilby riktig bakgrunnsbilde eller vise frem relevante initiativ basert på hvor du er.Appen vil be om denne tilgangen når du installerer appen. Vi bruker Google Analytics til å samle inn anonym statistikk om hvordan kundegrupper (ikke enkeltpersoner) bruker appen. Formålet med dette er å lage statistikk, som vi benytter til å forbedre appen. Eksempler på hva statistikken gir oss svar på er:•Hvor mange som bruker ulike telefontyper og operativsystemer?•Hvor mange som logger seg inn fra ulike land?•Hvor mange som bruker de ulike tjenestene i appen?I de tilfeller Google Analytics benyttes, blir informasjonen om din bruk lagret på Googles servere i USA. Informasjonskapselen samler blant annet inn IP-adressen din, men SpareBank 1 har valgt å legge inn en kode som fjerner de siste sifrene fra IP-adressen din før informasjonen lagres av Google. Dette gjør at analyseverktøyet kan anslå brukerens geografiske plassering, men adressen kan ikke benyttes for å identifisere den enkelte bruker.Informasjonskapslene inneholder ikke personopplysninger.

Akıllı durak uygulamanız Mobiett artık dünya kentlerini de kapsayacak! Mobiett sayesinde gittiğiniz ülkedeki toplu ulaşım bilgilerine alışkın olduğunuz Mobiett ara yüzüyle ulaşabileceksiniz.İstanbul Büyükşehir Belediyesi İETT İşletmeleri Genel Müdürlüğü’nün resmi uygulaması olan MobİETT uygulaması ile, başta İstanbul olmak üzere Dünya kentlerinin toplu ulaşım verilerine ulaşabilirsiniz. İstanbul’a ait canlı otobüs verisi sadece MobİETT’de!. Dilediğiniz an, istediğiniz durağa ait otobüs güzergâh bilgilerine, varış saatlerine anlık olarak cep telefonunuzdan ulaşabilirsiniz.. MobİETT, İstanbul Büyükşehir Belediyesi İETT İşletmeleri Genel Müdürlüğü’nün geliştirdiği anlık toplu ulaşım bilgisini, otobüs konum sunucusu, durak bilgi sunucusu ve otobüs- hat-durak analiz sunucusu ile almanızı sağlayan bir uygulamadır. MobİETT ile otobüs konum bilgisine, otobüslerin hat-güzergah ve durak bilgisine, alarm ile otobüs durağa gelmeden haber alımına ilişkin bilgilere ulaşabilirsiniz.MobİETT uygulaması akıllı bir uygulamadır. Sadece ihtiyaç duyduğunuz bilgiyi gösterir.Uygulamayı açtığınızda bulunduğunuz yere yakın tüm duraklar ekranınızda belirecek ve kolayca duraklar hakkında bilgi alabileceksiniz. Bu uygulama ile beklediğiniz otobüsün ne kadar süre sonra geleceği ya da otobüsün kaç durak geride olduğu gibi bilgilere estetik ve modern bir görsel tasarım ile erişebilirsiniz. Ayrıca, MobİETT sayesinde beklediğiniz otobüsün durağınızdan geçip geçmediği bilgisine de tek tuşla ulaşabilir, telefonunuzu sallayarak güncelleme yapabilirsiniz.Uygulamayı kullanabilmek için internet bağlantısına sahip olmanız gerekiyor.Destek için beyazmasa@iett.gov.tr ile irtibata geçebilirsiniz.

The App also offers an exclusive section on life management and spirituality from a dedicated team out of Ujjain.Features:• Latest news stories with in-depth analysis• Extensive News Coverage from Gujarat and its diaspora• Astro and numerology updates• HD Photo gallery with vast collection of pictures• User-friendly Navigation• Post Comment and Share Articles• Exclusive Contests & Campaigns • Save articles to read later• Share articles, photos and videos via email and social media• App Available Free About Dainik Bhaskar Group:Dainik Bhaskar, stands as an example of achieving perfection through determination. The newspaper highlights many positive values that have driven India, its growth and aspiration. It is depicted as a change agent through its campaign “Zid Karo Duniya Badlo”.With a readership of 1.97 crore the brand Bhaskar is today synonymous with success, quality, change dynamism and ethics in millions of households across India and the corporate world alike. From a humble beginning of one Hindi Edition from Bhopal in 1958 the group today has grown to become India’s largest newspaper group. The group has a strong presence in newspapers, radio, internet and printing. With its flagship Hindi daily newspaper Dainik Bhaskar, Divya Bhaskar, Divya Marathi and English Daily DNA, it covers 13 states, with 66 editions which include Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, Chhattisgarh, Haryana, Delhi, Punjab, Himachal Pradesh, Jharkhand, Uttarakhand, Jammu & Kashmir and the Union Territory of Chandigarh. In addition to these, it also publishes Business Bhaskar, DB star and Magazines like Aha! Zindagi, Balbhaskar, Young Bhaskar and Lakshay. The other media businesses includes MY FM ( Radio Channel) and IMCL (Internet services)

Call blocker and SMS filter. This application both blocks unwanted caller and SMS, and helps manage a blacklist. Easy and lightweight, it does not consume any of your device's battery power. If you are looking for a call blocker or SMS spam filter, this application is what you need.You can either block any caller or SMS from your contacts list, calls, and messages logs, or add unwanted number manually.Numbers from the blacklist are blocked quietly and without any signs of a call. Whatever you do, you will not be distracted by phone calls or SMS.Calls Blacklist saves all blocked calls and SMS in a journal. Don't worry, you will never lose any important call or message.This call blocker also boasts some convenient setting options, such as the ability to block private numbers, or to disable notifications.Features:- Numbers blacklist (blocking of incoming calls and SMS).- Schedule.- Whitelist (never blocked numbers).- Blocked caller and SMS journal.- Blocking of anonymous (private) numbers.- Blocking of unknown numbers.- Blocking numbers by prefix ("Begins with" option).- Blocking of all callers.- Blocking of all incoming SMS.- Notification of blocked calls and SMS (can be disabled in the settings).- Enable and disable blocking by one click.- Saving blacklist to file.- Loading blacklist from file.Advantages:- robust call blocker.- works on all devices.- easy to use.- lightweight and robust.- does not consume memory or CPU resources.And it's totally FREE!FAQ:- Why do I need to set Calls Blacklist as default in the SMS app for Android 4.4 and later? It is necessary to provide the SMS blocking function. This is due to limitations in Android 4.4 and later, which allows only one app to manage messages.- How can I unblock caller? You need to delete the number from the blacklist (click on the number and select "Delete" in popup menu).If you have any questions about the program, please let us know by e-mail: support@vlmob.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/vlmobcom
