«КонсультантПлюс: основные документы» - некоммерческий проект компании «КонсультантПлюс».Приложение позволяет в любое время получить доступ к наиболее востребованной правовой информации: кодексам РФ, основным правовым актам федерального законодательства, к обзорам новых документов и справочным материалам.Кроме этого в выходные и праздничные дни, а также в вечернее время по будням для пользователей сняты ограничения на доступ к расширенной базе документов, которая включает:• федеральное законодательство; • законодательство Москвы и Санкт-Петербурга; • судебную практику; • финансовые консультации; • законопроекты, международные правовые акты и другие документы.Для работы без доступа в интернет можно заранее поставить закладки на любой документ или его часть. Документы с закладками сохраняются в разделе «Избранное». Приложение содержит полезные сведения по многим повседневным вопросам, таким как:• защита прав потребителей; • налоговые льготы и вычеты; • защита трудовых прав; • оформление и защита имущественных прав; • штрафы за административные правонарушения, в том числе штрафы за нарушение ПДД; • получение материнского капитала; • оплата налогов физическими лицами и др.Специалисты найдут в приложении календарь бухгалтера, производственный календарь, ставки налогов, расчетные индикаторы и др. Вся информация ежедневно обновляется. Изменения сохраненных на устройство документов загружаются автоматически.Информацию легко найти с помощью Быстрого поиска. Расширенный поиск поможет найти документы по известным реквизитам (дата принятия, принявший орган и др.). Доступны тексты в любой редакции, даже c изменениями, не вступившими в силу. При помощи кнопки i на полях можно получить разъяснения (дополнительные документы) к абзацу или статье документа. Приложение создано компанией «КонсультантПлюс» – разработчиком самой популярной справочной правовой системы КонсультантПлюс (согласно исследованию ВЦИОМ 2015 г.).Подробнее о приложении - http://www.consultant.ru/androidПрисоединяйтесь к КонсультантПлюс в социальных сетях • Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ConsultantPlus.Comp • ВКонтакте - http://vk.com/consultantplus.comp• Одноклассники - http://www.odnoklassniki.ru/consultantplus.comp

ColorNote® is a simple and awesome notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. Taking notes with ColorNote® Notepad is easier than any other notepad or memo pad app.* Notice *- If you cannot find the widget, then please read the FAQ below.- When you're finished using the notepad, an automatic save command preserves your individual note.* Product Description *ColorNote® features two basic note taking formats, a lined-paper styled text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens. This list may be viewed in traditional ascending order, in grid format, or by note color.- Taking a Note -Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit, share, set a reminder, or check off or delete the note through your device's menu button. When checking off a text note, the app places a slash through the list's title, and this will be displayed on the main menu.- Making To-do List or Shopping List -In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like and arrange their order with drag buttons activated in the edit mode. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap, which will toggle a line slash. If all items have been checked, then the list's title is slashed as well.* Features *- Organize notes by color (color notebook)- Sticky note memo widget (Put your notes on your home screen)- Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. (Quick and simple list maker)- Checklist notes to get things done (GTD)- Organize your schedule by note in calendar- Write a diary and journal in calendar- Password Lock note : Protect your notes with passcode- Secured backup notes to SD storage- Supports online back up and sync. You can sync notes between phone and tablet.- Reminder notes on status bar- List/Grid View- Search notes- Notepad supports ColorDict Add-on- Powerful task reminder : Time Alarm, All day, Repetition.(lunar calendar)- Quick memo / notes- Wiki note link : [[Title]]- Share notes via SMS, e-mail or Twitter* Online backup and sync cloud service *- Notes will be encrypted before uploading notes by using the AES standard, which is the same encryption standard used by banks to secure customer data.- It does not send any of your notes to the server without you signing in.- Sign-in with Google or Facebook.* Permissions *- Internet Access: For online backup & sync notes- Modify/delete SD card contents: For backup notes to SD card- Prevent phone from sleeping, control vibrator, automatically start at boot: For reminder notes* FAQ *Q: How do you put a sticky note widget on the home screen?A: Go to the home screen and hold down your finger on an empty space and choose widget, Color Note will then be desplayed so you can stick on the page. Q: Why don't the widget, the alarm and notes remider functions work?A: If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn't support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone.Settings - Applications - Manage Applications - Color Note - Move to DeviceQ: Where are backed up notes data on the SD card?A: '/data/colornote' or '/Android/data/com.socialnmobile.dictapps.notepad.color.note/files' on SD card Q: I forgot my master password. How can I change it?A: Menu → Settings → Master Password → Menu Button → Clear Password. You will lose your current locked notes when you clear the password!Q: How can I create todo list note?A: New - Select checklist note - Put items - Save. Tap an item to strikethrough.

You can also send text, photos, and share your location alongside voice messages.Voxer works with other popular smartphones and over any 3G, 4G, or WiFi network in the world.Join many who are using Voxer with family, groups of friends, and teams at work to:* Instantly communicate through live Walkie Talkie - PTT (Push To Talk)* Send voice, text, photos and location messages* Play voice messages anytime - they're all recorded* Create messages even when offline* Homescreen widget for instant communicationUpgrade to Voxer Pro for $3.99/monthly or $29.99/yearly to unlock easy group communication features including larger group chats, Admin Control, Share from Dropbox, increased storage, Walkie Talkie mode (instantly receive voice messages even when you’re not in the app), and more themes.We want to hear from you!* Like us on Facebook @ fb.com/voxer* Follow us on Twitter @ twitter.com/voxer* Need help? Check out support.voxer.com

Super-Simple way to send filesSend Anywhere is a multi-platform file sharing service where users can directly share digital content in real time. Send Anywhere’s differentiating factors are:EasyNo signup or login required; The process could not be simpler!All you need is a 6-digit key to pair devices.Free & UnlimitedSend any type of file, of any size, as many times as you want. There are no limits on how much you can send and it is totally free. SafeSecurely send files directly between devices without relying on cloud.AnonymousShare your photos and docs without sharing your personal information.Cross-PlatformFully supports Android, Non-Android mobile OS, all PC platforms, Chrome Extension, and a web browser.(https://send-anywhere.com).Offers Optimal PathWhether you are connected on Wi-fi or cellular network, files will be transferred via the fastest optimal path. Here is how you use it, it is quite simple! To Send1. Select file(s) that you want to send, then tap the yellow paper plane button. 2. This will generate a temporary 6-digit key that you can share with the receiving device.3. Stand by.* You also have the option to send a push alert to a nearby or recently used device*The 6-digit key only lasts for ten minutes and if this is too short, you can upload your files for 24 hours.To Receive1. Once you get the 6-digit key, type-in and the transfer will start immediately. 2. Enjoy! Log-in to skip repetitive confirmationsWith each of your devices logged-in, you can share files between your devices without inputting the 6-digit key nor going through the hassle of clicking 'accept' to receive the file(s). ----Find us in social media! We will love to know who are awesome users are :) • Facebook: https://facebook.com/Send2Anywhere • Twitter: https://twitter.com/Send_Anywhere

Help your baby to fall asleep instantly. Uses classic monotonous sounds (lullabies) proven to be effective by generations of parents!NEW: Record your own lullabyNEW: Material design Why is my baby crying?Your baby is fed, has a clean nappy, no issues with colic, you were playing with your baby but still it is crying? The baby is probably too tired, but at the same time unable to fall asleep by itself. This is a common situation of newborns and a situation when Sleep Baby Instant can help the most.Sleep Baby Instant helps your baby to fall asleep using classic monotonous low frequency sounds proven to be effective by generations of parents: Such sounds include: • Shower• Washing machine• Car• Hairdryer• Vacuum cleaner• Shush• Fan• Train• Musicbox• Heartbeats• Sea and stream...From practical experience, we have learned that such sounds are more effective as a lullaby than tones, music or sing.To start using Sleep Baby Instant put your phone to a hearing distance from your baby, choose one of the available sounds, set a timer and start the playback. We do highly recommend not putting the phone closer to the baby than necessary and turning on airplane mode as well as muting alerts during the entire use of this app.

Poweramp is a powerful music player for Android.Follow us on twitter @PowerampAPP to get instant updates on app development progress, feature spotlight, theme sharing, take part in giveaways and even chances for free copies of Poweramp.Please check Common Questions/Answers below in the description.Key Features:- plays mp3, mp4/m4a (incl. alac), ogg, wma*, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mpc, aiff (* some wma pro files may require NEON support)- 10 band optimized graphical equalizer for all supported formats, presets, custom presets- separate powerful Bass and Treble adjustment- stereo eXpansion, mono mixing, balance- crossfade- gapless - replay gain- plays songs from folders and from own library- dynamic queue- lyrics support, including lyrics search via musiXmatch plugin- embed and standalone .cue files support- support for m3u, m3u8, pls, wpl playlists- OpenGL based cover art animation- downloads missing album art- custom visual themes, lot of skins available on Play- 4 widget types with many selectable styles, advanced customization; Android 4.2 lock screen widgets- configurable lock screen- headset support, automatic Resume on headset and/or BT connection (can be disabled in settings)- scrobbling- tag editor- fast library scan- high level of customization via settingsThis version is 15 days full featured Trial. See Related Apps for Poweramp Full Version Unlocker or use Buy option in Poweramp settings to buy Full Version. ====Common Questions/Answers for Poweramp v2.x:Q. My songs are missing from folders/library.A. Please ensure you have all your folders with music actually checked in Poweramp Settings => Folders and Library => Music Folders.Your original Android Library is not changed, nor any files deleted.Poweramp library is a separate, completely independent library. When you installed Poweramp 2.0, it just got filled with the files scanned from your sd card/other flash memory, as specified in Music Folders. Q. Volume too low. Volume changes weirdly. Other volume issues.A. Try to disable Direct Volume Control in Poweramp Settings => Audio => Advanced Tweaks.Poweramp 2.x uses Direct Volume Control by default on 2.3+ mid-to-high end devices. On stock ROMs this produces much better audio output. But many custom/buggy ROMs, while supporting DVC, can fail with it.

HITSTER.FM представляет особенный радио эфир, построенный по топ-чартам и хит-парадам всего мира, Наше онлайн радио даст тебе рейтинги треков, подкасты, музыкальные новости, рецензии альбомов и кое-что ещё:* Ты любишь радио Европа плюс, радио Рекорд, радио Энерджи, DFM, Русское радио, радио Хит ФМ? Тогда попробуй и сотни других мировых радиостанций, тщательно отобранных по различным музыкальным жанрам – рок, рэп, поп, инди, k-pop, регги, электроника и многим другим. Слушать радио онлайн можно с удовольствием!* При прослушивании песни ты можешь повлиять на её судьбу – ставь свою оценку, и мудрая система рейтингов либо поднимет его в топ, либо выбросит из чартов вон.* Кстати, теперь не нужно задумываться, что звучит в эфире радио – после оценки песни ты увидишь её название. Тысячи радио хитов и десятки тысяч оценок и отзывов на фм-хиты помогут разобраться в многообразии музыки и найти то, что любишь именно ты. Ни одна песня, мелодия, запись, сингл, альбом не останутся без внимания!* Собираешься в дорогу, где может отсутствовать интернет? Конечно, можно слушать музыку онлайн, просто сохрани диджейские подкасты и музыку вк – и можно слушать всё это без интернета.* Интересует вкусная популярная музыка? 随时随地发现新鲜事！微博带你欣赏世界上每一个精彩瞬间，了解每一个幕后故事。分享你想表达的，让全世界都能听到你的心声。在微博：-你能看到最新，最全面的资讯内容。无论是官方发布的新闻还是草根爆料的八卦。-第一时间了解关注人的最新动态，无论是体育、电影、财经、还是吃喝玩乐。-想说点啥？发送文字、照片、视频，随心所欲地创作，轻松自在地表达。首页信息流：查看大图、GIF动画、视频、音频，查看好友微博及分组微博；消息：及时收到@、评论和私信，还可发送语音、表情、图片及位置信息，私密分享也精彩；发现广场：在这里可以查看热门内容，还有购物、电影、听歌、运动，旅游等频道。你的生活，也许因为微博而不同；微博运动：绑定指定运动设备，查看运动信息，健康数据。与别人一拼高低微博雷达：探索附近的好友和优惠，参与电视节目的互动好玩又实惠。微博会员：设置卡片背景，主题皮肤、封面，背景音乐和微博来源。让你个性十足，与众不同。微博支付：买东西，发红包，生活缴费。支持各种支付场景，让你生活，购物更轻松。 Encontrar algo novo a qualquer hora, em qualquer lugar!Microblogging com você para desfrutar de cada momento maravilhoso do mundo, para entender a história por trás de cada um. Partilhe você quer expressar, de modo que o mundo inteiro pode ouvir a sua voz.No micro-Bo:- Você pode ver o conteúdo mais recente e mais abrangente informação. Se é a publicação oficial de notícias ou fofocas quebrou raízes.- A primeira vez para entender os desenvolvimentos mais recentes dizem respeito a pessoas, se é esportes, filmes, finanças, ou bebida.- Diga Diansha? Envie texto, fotos, vídeos, livre para criar, confortavelmente expressão. Início Fluxo de Informações:Ver imagem ampliada, animações GIF, vídeo, áudio, Ver amigos microblogging Weibo e agrupamento;Mensagem:Oportuna recepção @, comentários e mensagens privadas, mas também para enviar voz, expressões faciais, fotos e informações de localização, privacidade share também maravilhoso;Discovery Place:Aqui você pode visualizar o conteúdo popular, bem como compras, filmes, música, esportes, turismo e outros canais. Sua vida, talvez porque o micro-Bo e diferente;Microblogging Esporte:A ligação especifica equipamentos esportivos, visualizar informações de exercício, os dados de saúde. O nível de uma luta com os outrosMicro Bo Leida:Explorar os amigos e promoções próximas, interativo programa de TV participação divertida e acessível.Usuários microblogging:Definir fundo do cartão, temas pele, tampa, música de fundo e fontes de microblogging. Deixá-lo cheio de personalidade, diferente.Pay Microblogging:Shopping, envelopes vermelhos, o pagamento da vida. Suporte a uma variedade de cenários de pagamento de modo que você vive, fazer compras mais fácil.

Инфокиоск ОАО 'АСБ Беларусбанк' в Вашем телефоне!Приложение M-Belarusbank - это мобильный банкинг для владельцев пластиковых карт, зарегистрированных для услуги SMS-банкинг в инфокиоске ОАО 'АСБ Беларусбанк'.Основные возможности:1) Платежи оплачивайте и получайте дополнительную информацию по всем возможным платежам банка и системы 'Расчет'(ЕРИП)2) Оповещения будьте в курсе движения денежных средств на ваших карт-счетах с помощью оповещений о приходных и расходных операциях3) Избранное сохраняйте Ваши избранные операции, а также устанавливайте напоминания о необходимости их проведения. Сохранение возможно на сервере системы, что позволит восстановить оперции после переустановки приложения либо переходна на другую платформу (Java, Windows Mobile)4) Мультикарточность регистрируйте несколько карточек и получайте доступную банку информацию о текущем состоянии Ваших карт-счетов (остаток средств)5) Журнал просматривайте все отправленные и полученные с использованием приложения M-Belarusbank данные6) Сервисы пользуйтесь дополнительными услугами банка (блокировка/разблокировка карточек, автооплата, регистрация пароля 3-D Secure, заказ выписки и чеков по операциям на e-mail,...)7) Информация узнавайте различную справочную информацию банка (о курсах валют, стоимости драгоценных металлов, результатах розыгрышей лотерей,...)8) Работа через SMS или GPRS выбирайте подходящий для вас канал связи для проведения операцийПриложение M-Belarusbank также доступно для других платформ, подробности на сайте http://m-bank.by/belarusbank Infokiosk OAO Belarusbank "a telefont!Függelék M-Belarusbank - egy mobil banking a kártyatulajdonosok regisztrált SMS-banking önkiszolgáló terminál, OAO Belarusbank ".Főbb jellemzők:1) A kifizetések fizetett és kapott további információkat az összes lehetséges fizetési Bank és a "számítási" (SSIS)2.) riasztások Legyen tisztában a cash flow a kártya számlák segítségével figyelmezteti a hitel-és terhelési tranzakciók3.) Kedvencek Mentsd el a kedvenc műveletek és emlékeztetőket a magatartásukat. Megtakarítás lehet a kiszolgáló rendszer, amely visszaállítja opertsii után újratelepítése vagy tranziens másik platformra (Java, Windows Mobile)4) Multikartochnost regisztrálj több mint egy kártyát, és kap egy üveg rendelkezésre álló információk az aktuális állapotát a kártya számlák (mérleg)5) A Journal böngészhet az összes küldött és fogadott az alkalmazás M-Belarusbank adatok6) Szolgáltatások A további szolgáltatások, a bank (lock / unlock kártyák, AutoPay, regisztráció jelszó 3-D Secure, a rend nyilatkozatok és ellenőrzéseket tranzakciók az e-mail, ...)7) Information érdeklődni a különböző háttér-információt a bank (az árfolyamok, a költségek a nemesfémek, az eredmények a sorsolás ...)8.) A munka a SMS-ben vagy GPRS válassza ki a megfelelő kommunikációs csatornát, hogy tranzakciókatFüggelék M-Belarusbank is elérhető más platformokon, részletek http://m-bank.by/belarusbank

Wells Fargo ® for Android tablet is a fast, secure, and free* app for Wells Fargo and Wells Fargo Advisors clients. It is available 24/7 using your existing Wells Fargo Online® Username and Password. Your security is our priority — Mobile data transmissions are safeguarded by 128-bit SSL (Secure Socket Layer) encryption to help prevent unauthorized access. Our Online Security Guarantee provides additional protection against unauthorized access to your accounts. The simple, easy-to-use tablet design will provide you with a simplified digital banking experience.ACCOUNT ACTIVITY • View your account balances and activity — for consumer accounts, view check and deposit images.• Available balance and pending deposits — Learn more about how your available balance is calculated and what’s still pending. Note, some transaction activities may not be immediately recorded to your account and may not yet be reflected in the available balance. • Search and Sort — Find the transaction you're looking for quickly. • Expand/collapse account details -- to see only the information you need.• Detailed transactions list — View the date, location, amount, and more for transactions on one page.• Credit card rewards balance – know at a glance your point total.• Hot tasks – Simplifies the way you view your account activity, send and transfer money, deposit checks, and pay bills.MOBILE DEPOSIT • Deposit checks using your Android tablet. WELLS FARGO SUREPAY • Send money, using a mobile number or email address, to friends and family with eligible accounts at U.S. financial institutions. TRANSFERS AND PAYMENTS • Make transfers to your accounts.BILL PAY • Schedule payments and pay bills right from your tablet. • If you're already a Bill Pay customer, your payees are automatically available for use. TRACK INVESTMENTS • Monitor balances, holdings, account activity and open orders for your Wells Fargo Advisors and WellsTrade accounts.• Get real-time quotes, charts, market data and news.• Track your retirement account plans and balances.ATM LOCATOR • Let us help you find a nearby Wells Fargo ATM. Locate an ATM using your current location/GPS or enter the zip code or address of the area you wish to search. You’ll be provided a list of ATMs with the address and distance from your current location. DEPOSIT PRODUCTS OFFERED BY WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A. MEMBER FDIC. INVESTMENT AND INSURANCE PRODUCTS: NOT INSURED BY FDIC | NO BANK GUARANTEE | MAY LOSE VALUE. Wells Fargo Advisors is the trade name used by two separate registered broker-dealers: Wells Fargo Advisors, LLC, and Wells Fargo Advisors Financial Network, LLC, Members SIPC, nonbank affiliates of Wells Fargo & Company.WellsTrade accounts are available through Wells Fargo Advisors, LLC. PERMISSIONS • Location permissions are necessary to determine your current location to display nearby Wells Fargo locations/ATMs and provide mapping directions.• Camera permissions are necessary for you to use the Mobile Deposit feature.• Internet access permissions are necessary for the app to connect with Wells Fargo Mobile.• Identity permissions are necessary in order to enable you to access your contacts to prefill emails/phone numbers when using Wells Fargo Sure Pay.• Photo permissions are necessary for you to use the Mobile Deposit feature.• Contacts permissions are necessary to enable you to prefill contact information (emails/phone numbers) when using Wells Fargo Sure Pay. * Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.Minimum system requirements: Android OS v4.0 and higher are supported. If you aren't able to upgrade, use your browser to sign on to wf.com.

Aplicación para clientes registrados.La aplicación SmartTD es un sistema de recepción de servicios de taxi para centrales TAXITRONIC que, instalada en un Smartphone/Tablet, se comunica con el taxímetro, permitiendo así ampliar las funciones de éste. Algunas de sus características principales son:-Interface con menús gráficos de uso intuitivo.-Integración con el navegador del teléfono, sin necesidad de introducir manualmente las direcciones recibidas por la central.-Posibilidad de utilizar cualquier aplicación del teléfono mientras se espera un servicio.-Conexión con la central de Radio Taxi aun estando fuera del vehículo.-Actualización de la zonificación on-line sin pasar por el taller.-GPS interno que garantiza la correcta ubicación del vehículo.-Posibilidad de impresión de tickets de servicio y totalizadores (con impresora integrada o externa).Terminales autorizados: Smartphones:- bq Aquaris E5 4G (Aquaris E5)- Huawei Ascend G7 (G7-L01)- Huawei P8 Lite (ALE-L21)- Huawei P8 (GRA-L09)- LG G4 (LG-H815)- LG G4c (LG-H525n)- Motorola MotoG 4G (XT1039)- Motorola MotoG (3ª generación) (XT1541)- Motorola Nexus 6 (XT1100)- Orange Nura (Alcatel One Touch M812)- Samsung Galaxy A5 (SM-A500FU)- Samsung Galaxy A3 (SM – A300FU)- Samsung Galaxy S6 (SM-G920F)- Samsung Galaxy S5 (SM-G900F)- Samsung Galaxy S4 (GT-I9505)- Samsung Galaxy S4 mini (GT-I9195)- Samsung Galaxy Note 4 (SM-N910F)- Samsung Galaxy Note 3 (GT-N9005)- Samsung Galaxy Express2 (SM-G3815)- Samsung Galaxy Grand Neo (GT-I9060)- Samsung Galaxy Grand Prime (SM-G531F)- Sony Xperia Z3 (D6603)- Sony Xperia Z3 Compact (D5803)- Sony Xperia Z Ultra (C6833)- Wiko Rainbow 4G (Rainbow 4G)Tablets:- Asus Fonepad 7 (K00Z)- Samsung GalaxyTab 4 7.0 4G (SM – T235)- Samsung GalaxyTab 3 7.0 3G (SM – T211)Terminales anteriores:Smartphones:- Lenovo (A880)- LG Optimus L7 (P700)- LG Nexus 4 (E960)- Samsung Galaxy S3 (GT-I9300)- Samsung Galaxy S3 mini (GT-I8190)- Samsung Galaxy S2 (GT-I9100)- Samsung Galaxy Note 2 (GT-N7100)- Sony Xperia Z1 (C6903)- Sony Xperia T2 Ultra (D5303)- Sony Xperia Z (C6603)Tablets:- Samsung GalaxyTab 2 7.0 3G (GT - P3100)

Как похудеть?Ответ прост — диета и правильное питание!Приложение поможет:★ Контролировать свой рацион питания★ Рассчитать норму калорий, ЖБУ (жиры, белки, углеводы), норму потребления воды★ Найти простой рецепт приготовления вкусного первого или например полезного веганского салата★ Узнать больше о популярных диетах (Дюкана, белковой, французской, японской и других)Всё очень просто:Укажи пол, рост, вес, возраст, дневную физическую нагрузку. Отмечай свой дневной рацион. Приложение определит норму калорий, жиров, белков, углеводов и воды.Предложит рецепты с картинками и описанием.

Aplikasi pengaliran langsung mobile terbaik dengan 10 juta pengguna di seluruh dunia.Gabung dengan pengalaman waktu nyata teman, orang-orang, dan tempat di seluruh dunia lewat Android Anda.Dengan beberapa ketukan Anda dapat menonton dan mendengar apa yang dialami oleh orang lain pada saat itu juga. Membuat komentar menggunakan akun Twitter/Facebook dan berinteraksi dengan 10 juta penyiar langsung di seluruh dunia. Berlangganan ke pengguna favorit Anda untuk mendapat pemberitahuan saat mereka sedang tayang langsung. Pertanyaan dan saran Anda selalu kami terima dengan senang hati!Perlu bantuan?Kunjungi kami di: https://ssl.twitcasting.tv/indexsupport.php- Tentang Fitur Collabo Penonton bisa bergabung dengan siaran yang sedang tayang di Live lalu menyiarkan bersama-sama. * Untuk memulai Collabo Dari Aplikasi TwitCasting Live, pilih modus "Collabo" lalu mulailah menyiarkan. * Untuk bergabung dengan Collabo Dari Aplikasi TwitCasting Viewer, pilih menu "Gabung dengan Collabo" saat menonton pengaliran langsung. FITUR:* Bekerja di Android 2.1 atau versi lebih tinggi* Tidak perlu mendaftar untuk menonton pertunjukan langsung. * Mempos komentar Anda dengan akun Twitter atau Facebook.BAHASA:Bahasa Inggris, Bahasa Jepang, Bahasa Portugis, dan lainnyaPERSYARATAN:* Android 2.1 atau versi lebih tinggi* Catatan: Ini adalah aplikasi penonton untuk "TwitCasting Live". yy, bigo

Приложение которое знает как похудеть. Полностью на русском языке. Простой калькулятор калорий (без учёта БЖУ). Контроль веса (график). Поиск друзей по диете. Большая база продуктов. Вы можете дополнить её своими собственными. Калькуляторы BMI и BMR и анализатор вашего рациона позволяют рассчитать необходимое число калорий для улучшения Вашей фигуры без вреда для здоровья. Для подсчёта белков, жиров и углеводов использйте Калькулятор калорий PLUS. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bulat.diet.helper_plus Пишите в комментариях как можно дополнить программу либо улучшить её. Way2 (Formerly Way2SMS), the best news app for summarized, short news in 8 Local Indian Languages (Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Gujarati, Bengali) & English, brings to you the ultimate news reading experience in magazine style format. Way2 app offers a range of stories from world news to India news and keeps you updated on the latest stories & breaking news on the move. Way2 app also supports Free SMS sending service to any mobile network in India. Sending Free SMS is now made very easy with its smooth & improved interface which delivers Free SMS in less than 10 seconds anywhere, anytime in India. Users can also schedule Free SMS for future delivery, making Way2 app, India’s premier destination for sending free SMS irrespective of the networks.We work hard continuously (24 x 7) to deliver best daily news / stories on politics, business, technology, sports, entertainment, anything and everything happening around the world. Users who are looking for trending stories, latest headlines, breaking news, current affairs, local news and top news stories can download the free Way2 app and keep themselves informed quickly within 2-3 minutes.Our professional editors read thousands of news articles from international & national newspapers, magazines, websites, blogs and hand-pick top news / stories to present you crisp news in short within 400 characters in Local Indian Languages (Hindi news, Telugu news, Tamil news, Kannada news, Malayalam news, Marathi news, Gujarati new, Bengali news) & English. Way2 app aggregates all the top news stories & trending news headlines from reliable sources such as DNA, Reuters, Guardian, BBC news, PTI, Zee News etc. Users can tap the headlines to read full length articles from these sources.Way2 enables the users to assimilate all the major events happening across the world without spending too much time reading lengthy articles. We help you in saving your time with our short news by covering current affairs, latest news, breaking news, sensational news, daily news headlines, trending news on international & national politics, stock updates, automobile sector, movie reviews (Bollywood, Hollywood, regional films), sports (Tennis, Football, live scores in cricket, IPL updates, ICC world T20), music, videos on Elections, parliament and interesting scoops. Timely notifications for the most important news and breaking news every day to keep you informed. You can bookmark important articles and also share them with your friends & family on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, E-mail, SMS, reddit, pinterest and other supported social platforms. What Else: In short you can stop your daily news hunt now and download the free Way2 app instantly to save your time and stay updated on latest news in short and breaking news in short. Way2 app gives you the improved features of Way2SMS with its new UI & UX.We’re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, please email us at: appsupport@way2online.net

description: 2017年の年賀状注文の受付は終了いたしました。◆◇◆　サンプル注文終了間近　◆◇◆サンプル注文の受付は12月21日（水）までとなります。お早めにご利用くださいませ。=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-累計100万ダウンロード突破！累計1000万枚を受注した、年賀状作成アプリの決定版話題のスマホ年賀状作成アプリの決定版が、よりおしゃれに、カンタン便利になって2017年も登場！こだわりの2017年用新デザインは700種類以上！（順次追加予定）年賀状から宛名をデータ化する「宛名スキャン」を搭載！（利用料無料）◆「スマホで年賀状2017」とは日本郵便と連携し、年賀状の作成から、印刷、配送まで年賀状のすべてがカンタンにできる「ネットで年賀状」のアプリ版です。・15時までのご注文分は、翌日出荷！・宛名印刷無料！宛名面のレイアウトがさらに美しくなりました！・お手元（自宅）への配送だけでなく、元日に直接相手の方にお届けすることもできます。（12月24日15時までの注文分）◆年賀状デザインはすべて新作！700種類以上！ママに人気の写真を入れて作るフォトフレームタイプから、定番の干支イラストタイプまで、おしゃれな2017年用年賀状デザインを700種類以上ご用意しています。お好きなデザインを選んで、メッセージを編集したり、写真を入れるだけで誰でも簡単に年賀状を作成することができます。◆はじめての方も安心「サンプル注文」作成したデザインを印刷見本として、無料でハガキに印刷してお届けします。注文前に印刷品質を確認することができるので、ネット印刷がはじめての方はぜひお試しください。※サンプル注文の受付は、2016年11月1日（火）～12月18日（日）予定◆昨年好評の「宛名スキャン」累計90万枚のスキャン実績お手元にある「年賀はがき」をスマホで写真撮影するだけで、宛名を読み取りあなたに代わって「宛先帳」に登録（データ化）します。オペレーターによる手作業での入力のためデータは正確で、何枚でも無料でご利用いただけます。※データ化は通常、翌日に完了します。※写真撮影された「年賀はがき」は、オペレーターに個人情報が特定されないようセキュリティに配慮して管理を徹底しております。◆15時までは「翌日出荷」。最短翌々日にお届け！15時までのご注文分は翌日出荷で、「最短で翌々日」にはお手元にお届け。お手元への配送は、ゆうパック(日本郵便)を使用し、「配達日指定」も可能になりました。※地域によってお届け日は異なります。◆Twitterやメールで住所を知らない方にもお届け可能！※Twitterは相互フォロワーのみに送ることができます。◆選べる「年賀はがき」は3種類！スマホで年賀状は、印刷するはがきを「年賀はがき」、「ディズニーキャラクター 年賀」、「ハローキティ 年賀」から選べます。◆料金基本料金0円！1枚からでもお手軽に注文できます。デザイン、宛名印刷、投函代すべて込みで1枚78円～お年玉付き年賀状をご注文いただけます。（はがき代除く）さらに、10枚から「まとめ割」を適応、最大30%OFF！※年賀状の作成、管理は無料、ご注文に料金がかかります。※宛名スキャンは何枚ご利用しても無料です。◆コラボレーション年賀状がいっぱい！人気のキャラクターやブランドとコラボレーションしたスマホで年賀状オリジナルデザインが続々登場！【ラインナップを一部ご紹介】・ムーミン谷の年賀状・すみっコぐらし年賀状・リラックマ年賀状・北欧デザイン スカンジナビアン年賀状・和モダンデザイン 濱文様年賀状◆Instagramで人気の双子モデル「りんか＆あんな」がイメージキャラクターとして登場！インスタグラムで人気爆発の双子キッズモデル「りんか＆あんな（りんあんちゃん）」に、スマホで年賀状2017のイメージキャラクターになってもらいました！公式サイトにも登場しているのでぜひチェックしてください。 Acceptance of the New Year's card order of 2017 has ended.◆ ◇ ◆ sample order near the end ◆ ◇ ◆Acceptance of the sample order will be until December 21 (water).Please use as soon as possible.= - The best app and huge collection of statuses for all occasions for quick update status in Facebook, Twitter etc.All statuses are divided into 11 categories: Funny statuses, Love statuses, New Year statuses, Sad statuses, Nice statuses, Man statuses, Woman statuses, Clever statuses, Life statuses, Joke statuses, Friend statuses.Using our application you can log in and post statuses in social networks: Facebook, Twitter, VKontakte, Odnoklassniki and Moi Mir.You can edit any short status from the collection, and send their own status (no longer than 250 characters) to multiple social networks in one click!Post statuses on the wall Facebook, Twitter and VKontakte with photo or image.Post Photo statuses into Facebook and VKontakte.Post statuses on a background pictures on the wall Facebook, Twitter and VKontakte.Copy any status in clipboard.Share any status in to third-party applications, such as a text editor or an application for sending SMS.Collect your personal collection of Favorite statuses.Store in "Favorites" any phrases up to 250 characters from the third-party applications or publish these phrases in social networks in the form of statuses.Set up app's widget on home screen.Menu is available on the main page of the application:Two main menu items – Search and Settings."Search" – search statuses by any your keywords."Settings" – select the social network, which you will work, update statuses, sorting statuses in categories, how long time to keep posting history, set up widget theme and the ability to change the language of the application (Russian / English / Spanish / German / French / Italian / Portuguese)."History" – posting history of statuses with using of the application (for 7 days by default)."Download" - download additional database of statuses for the app.This application is absolutely free! Looking forward to your feedback and suggestions for improvement:https://www.facebook.com/StatusesForAllOccasionsIf you want to help me to translate and collect a new base of statuses on your language, please mail me.

설명* 신한S뱅크에 대해 궁금하신 점은 고객상담센터 1577-8000(6-4-4)로 문의해주시기 바랍니다.(상담가능시간 : 평일 9시~18시) * 조회는 더 빠르게 ! ① 특허출원된 로그인 설정,간편조회 설정으로 7단계의 계좌조회를 1단계로 획기적 단축 (환경설정에서 등록가능) ② 전체계좌 조회, 입/출금별.최근/과거순 거래내역 조회 등 * 계좌이체도 순식간에 ! ① 특허출원된 위젯이체: 입/출금계좌,금액 등을 설정하여 스마트폰 바탕화면에서 간편하게 이체 ② 추가이체: 한번의 거래로 5개 계좌까지 이체 * 감성충전, 지식나눔 ! ① 지식서재 메뉴에서 전자책 및 카드북 콘텐츠 열람 가능 (콘텐츠는 매달 업데이트) ② 내 서재에 콘텐츠를 보관하여 최대 6개월간 이용 ③ 주요 콘텐츠 SNS 공유 기능* 이용이 편리한 UX ! ① 특허출원된 스마트센서를 활용한 음성 검색 기능 ② 우→좌 드래그 혹은 '메뉴'버튼으로 메뉴 호출 가능 ③ 모바일 앱, 웹 접근성 인증마크 획득 ④ 한 번의 로그인으로 머니멘토, 스마트펀드센터 등 이용 * 배경화면도 내 스타일대로 ! ① 배경화면 변경 기능으로 취향에 따른 스킨 적용 (6가지 기본 스킨 및 홈페이지/휴대폰 이미지 적용 가능) ② 메뉴순서 설정 기능으로 이용자 중심으로 메뉴 변경 가능 * 스미싱을 예방하는 습관 !(보안센터) ① 안심거래서비스: 스마트기기에서는 1개 기기만 지정하여 보다 안전하게 거래가능 (영업점을 방문하여 최대 5개 기기까지 지정가능) ② 예외기기 로그인 알림: 이용한 적 없는 기기에서 로그인 시 SMS로 통보 ③ 피싱방지 보안설정: 로그인 시 성명,최근 접속일자,피싱방지 아이콘/문구를 통해 스미싱앱에 효과적으로 대응가능 ④ 스마트인증 서비스: 인증서를 USIM에 저장하여 거래 안정성을 강화하는 유료 서비스 ⑤ S-Shield: 사전에 이체 건수를 등록하여 거래 안정성 강화 ⑥ 기타: 이체한도 감액, 이용기기 등록 서비스 등※ 주의사항 ① 신한S뱅크 설치 후 유해어플 설치차단을 위해 ‘환경설정 → 보안 → 알수없는 출처’를 해제하시기 바랍니다. ② 신한은행은 보안강화, 앱 업데이트 등의 이유로 보안카드 번호 전체 등 금융정보를 요구하지 않습니다. (피싱방지 보안설정 등의 기능을 활용하여 신한S뱅크를 사칭한 악성앱에 주의하시기 바랍니다.) ③ 보다 안전한 금융거래를 위해 OTP카드 혹은 주요 보안센터 기능을 이용하시기 바랍니다. ④ 전자금융사기 예방서비스 전면 시행으로 주요 거래시 고객정보內 연락처로 추가인증 후 거래가 가능합니다. (연락처 변경시 인근 영업점에서 정비하시기 바랍니다.)※ 신한S뱅크 MINI를 이용하시면 조회/이체 거래를 편리하게 이용하실 수 있습니다.※ 업데이트가 안될 경우 설치된 신한S뱅크 삭제 후 재설치하시기 바랍니다.※ ASUS 젠폰 일부 모델 등과 같이 임의개조(루팅)된 상태에서 판매되는 일부 스마트폰/태블릿 기기에서는 이용이 불가합니다.

Despre aplicatia OLX.ro:- Are o interfata intuitiva, usor de folosit- Daca ai ceva de vanzare adaugi anunturi rapid, in cateva secunde- Daca esti interesat sa cumperi, accesezi rapid toate categoriile de anunturi care te intereseaza- Poti cauta anunturi in Bucuresti sau in oricare alta localitate care te intereseaza- Filtrezi usor rezultate pentru a gasi doar anunturi relevante pentru tine- Aplicatia numarul 1 in categoria ShoppingDaca esti interesat sa vinzi : pasi pentru a adauga anunturi in aplicatia OLX.ro- Deschizi aplicatia OLX.ro- Selectezi "Adauga anunt nou"- Apesi pe icon-ul sub forma de aparat foto si faci poze produsului. Poti adauga pana la 8 imagini. Imaginile sunt foate importante intr-un anunt. Ele contibuie semnificativ la decizia cumparatorilor de a lua sau nu in considerare anuntul.- Completezi apoi campurile "Titlu" si "Descriere" si alegi categoria in care se va publica anuntul tau- Mai departe stabilesti pretul dorit si starea produsului ( utilizat sau nou)- Completezi datele de contact- Adaugi anuntul- Distribui anunturi prin email sau pe conturile tale de Facebook, Google + si What’s Up- Primesti notificari in timp real de la potentialii cumparatori - Vinzi produsul- Dezactivezi anunturile care nu mai sunt de actualitateDaca esti interesat sa cumperi: pasi pentru a gasi anunturi in aplicatia OLX.ro- Deschizi aplicatia OLX.ro- Ai acces la peste 3.000.000 de anunturi din toata tara- Selectezi categoriile de anunturi- Alegi categoria din care face parte produsul cautat de tine (ex. auto,moto si ambarcatiuni)- Selectezi subcategoria (ex. autoturisme)- Selectezi marca dorita (ex. BMW)- Folosesti filtrele pentru a ajunge la anunturile relevante pentru tine (ex. Seria 3, benzina, 4000 euro, din 2007)- Iti cumperi produsul dorit la cel mai bun pret!- Adaugi la favorite anunturile preferateDe ce sa instalezi aplicatia OLX.ro?- Nu pierzi nici o oportunitate - nu esti in permanenta langa laptop sau PC dar ai intotdeauna telefonul langa tine- Publici anunturi foarte usor- Gestionezi totul direct de pe telefonul tau mobil- de la realizarea pozelor pana la adaugarea anunturilor, negocierea cu potentialii cumparatori si vanzarea produselor- Ai publicat deja anunturi pe OLX.ro? Primesti in timp real notificari de la potentialii cumparatori pentru produsele tale.- Cauti ceva anume de cumparat? Iti salvezi cautarile si primesti notificari de fiecare data cand apar anunturi noi care te pot interesa- Poti comunica usor oricand cu alti utilizatori care pun anunturi sau sunt interesati sa cumpereIata cat de usor de folosit este aplicatia OLX.ro pentru Android! P.S.: Daca ai orice fel de feedback pentru noi, da-ne un mail pe contact@olx.ro. Sigur ne va ajuta!

Nie musisz już przycinać swoich zdjęć przed publikacją ich na Instagramie! Insta Square Maker to aplikacja pozwalająca na publikacje zdjęć w dowolnym formacie w serwisach akceptujących tylko kwadratowe zdjęcia.Główne funkcje:- umieszcza dowolny obraz (w orientacji poziomej i pionowej) w kwadratowej ramce.- wybór dowolnego koloru tła.- efekt cienia- wybór pozycji obrazu w ramce- ponad 20 filtrów- rozmytego tła ze zdjęcia- dedykowany przycisk pozwalający na szybki eksport do Instagramu.* Identyfikacja dzwoniącegoInsta Square Maker oferuje darmową identyfikację dzwoniącego. Funkcja identyfikuje dla Ciebie przychodzące numery, nawet te, których nie masz na liście kontaktów. Po zakończeniu połączeniu wyświetlany jest wynik identyfikacji i masz możliwość zapisania osoby w książce adresowej. Za pomocą jednego kliknięcia z ekranu identyfikacji numeru przejdziesz do edycji zdjęć w Insta Square Maker.W dowolnym momencie możesz wyłączyć lub dostosować identyfikację numerów w ustawieniach.

Blued concentrates on mobile network, social contact and providing easy and stable services for gay, bi, and curious guys all over the world. So far it has attracted more than 15 million worldwide users. Launched on 16th November 2012, Blued, as the world’s most interesting and popular FREE gay social app, now is available on iOS, Android and Windows 8. Blued provides the fastest, easiest, and sexiest way to connect with the biggest network of guys.Blued, to beloved!FEATURESBROWSE: View and chat with unlimited guys both near you and online worldwide. Extensive profile filter is available. GROUPS: Join a nearby or a TAGGED group by common interests, or you can simply create a group and invites your friends in.CHAT: Exchange text, photo, audio message, emojis and location. BUZZ: Share your moments by posting your feelings and pictures, check your favorite or nearby guys’ moments and LIKE it. NEWS: The News board continuously synchronizes information with Danlan.org, and gives you a wonderful time by providing the latest LGBTQ news and relevant information such as literature, fashion.EXPLORE: More friends? By moving the pin and dropping it on any part of the world map, no matter where you are, you may meet on Blued.TRACKS: Free access to following list and visiting history.TERMS OF SERVICES- Be respectful to each other!

Kendalikan data seluler Anda - hemat uang & gunakan paket Anda dengan lebih efektif.Manajer Dataku adalah aplikasi terbaik untuk membantu Anda mengendalikan pemakaian data seluler Anda dan menghemat uang pada tagihan bulanan Anda. Sangat hebat dan sungguh merupakan alat yang bagus." - Android HeadlinesManajer Dataku... Adalah aplikasi Android terbaik untuk memantau dan mengendalikan jumlah data yang dipakai oleh Android Anda" - Best Android Apps Review"Memantau pemakaian data Anda merupakan tugas yang krusial... Itulah sebabnya aplikasi seperti Manajer Dataku menjadi sangat penting.""Manajer Dataku adalah alat yang sangat praktis" - CNETManajer Dataku bekerja dengan baik di semua jaringan di seluruh dunia, termasuk China Mobile, Vodafone, AT&T, Verizon, Rogers, Airtel, China Unicom, America Movil, Telefonica, Axiata, Orange, VimpelCom, China Telecom dan sebagainya.Kami menghargai masukan Anda dan ingin mendengar pendapat Anda. Silakan menghubungi kami lewat tombol Masukan pada aplikasi.Komentar untuk perizinan Anda:- Informasi pribadi Anda: Tidak mengakses Kontak; hanya waktu luncur aplikasi.Catatan: Tidak mendukung penyimpanan SD. Jika ditempatkan di kartu SD maka layanan pemantauan akan terganggu dalam sebagian kasus.

DaTuner (Lite) is an all-purpose, precise and responsive chromatic tuner app for Android with a simple interface. Rather than focusing on fancy graphics assets, we made it fast and easy to use! ** HERE BE DRAGONS: This app is completely FREE and AD-FREE. If you've never tried DaTuner, and like leaving 1,2, or 3 stars without a comment, please try one of the other free, ad-supported tuners instead, because this app is terrible, awful, no-good, really, really bad!, I'll just tell you that up front so you don't bother! :)**For the rest of you, DaTuner is super precise from A0 all the way up. For even more accuracy, see the real, multiple-harmonic strobe tuner on the Pro version, reviewed by Android Central:"For the Android-loving musician, I think DaTuner Pro is easily the best tuner you can have on your device. I used to give that title to *see review!*, but DaTuner has proven to be so powerful, easy to use, and accurate, it'd be foolish to not use it."http://www.androidcentral.com/android-app-review-tuner-datuner-proExtremely fast, with latencies and averaging all adjustable via the settings menu. If it's fast on 5 year old Android devices running 2.1 without fixed-point support, then it is GUARANTEED to be fast on your device! :)DaTuner converts the fundamental frequency to the nearest note and error in cents for quick and easy tuning of your guitar, ukelele, violin, bass, cello, mandolin, piano, harp, saxophone, Ducati timing belt, harmonica, kazoo, you name it.DaTuner's display is easy to read; nearest note and octave is displayed in a giant, easy to read font in the center of the screen, and frequency in hertz plus error in cents is displayed at the bottom of the screen. Sensitivity is auto-adjusted, but can also be adjusted by touch via a bar on the left-hand side of the screen, and the speed/accuracy of the algorithm and the relative frequency (if other than 440Hz) can be adjusted via the configuration menu.There is no "dead zone" with this tuner app as is the case with many other apps. Instead, the whole display turns green when the incoming frequency is within a configurable range of the target frequency and you can still see small changes in pitch even within the "in-range" area. Both the "in-tune" range and the colours shown for sharp and flat can be configured in this version. Screen and filter lock allow you to select the note that you would like to tune to, with filter lock ignoring anything outside of the range of the note you wish to tune, which is useful for tuning in noisy environs.Features:1.) No dead zone - screen changes to green when tuning is good.2.) Auto-Sensitivity - no configuration required.3.) Bright, easy-to-read display.4.) Quick, accurate and precise.5.) Screen lock: Lock to the note you want to tune, even if extremely out of tune and make your way up/down to it.6.) Filter lock: Lock and filter to a specific note and filter out everything outside that note's range.7.) Ad-free!8.) Reference frequency adjustment for orchestra tuning, adjustable manually or by letting the app listen to another reference.9.) Some instruments can be selected - more to come!10.) Choice of colors for sharp/flat/in-tune11.) Sample rate range 8kHz - 48kHz.Features in the PRO version [not in this free version]1.) [PRO] REAL strobe tuner display, with up to 4 overtones!2.) [PRO] Transposition.3.) [PRO] Temperaments. You can modify the ones that exist or add your own using a text editor. The temperaments are saved on your external memory under the /DaTuner directory.4.) [PRO] Notation (ie Solfége, English, English sharp, English flat, Northern European.) Customization of these will be possible in a future upgrade.5.) [PRO] Pitch pipe with multiple harmonics, so it is audible even when playing low tones.6.) [PRO] Accelerated tuning algorithm.Not worth five stars? Please ensure to leave a comment with your rating so I can fix it! Thanks!

[Notice] - By specification, the playback is interrupted when returning from the background. - This app does video streaming. For streaming video playback, we recommend a highspeed network connection, such as Wi-Fi. (Works with 3G.) - Your playback may stop because of task killer and eco setting. Please turn disable task killer and eco setting. You may need to restart the device after changing these settings. - You can only watch videos compatible to the MP4 standard. - Due to a change in the specification of the video sites, you may not be able to view videos, temporarily. Ayrıca sürekli sen gebelik hangi hafta unutmak mı? Sonra benim ve eşim gibi. Bu uygulama hamilelik, sizin bulunduğunuz haftanın zaten hamile olduğunu kaç gün bazı temel veri girdikten sonra size gösterir, mevcut yaklaşık boyut ve ağırlık bebeğinizin ve bu ilk prenatal tarihi olarak bir bilgi birkaç diğer önemli bit annelik izni (Alman yönetmelik dayalı) ne zaman başlayacağını, ziyaret, ya da hangi tarihte bu muhtemelen ilk çocuğu quickenings vb hissediyorum .. Buna ek olarak, uygulama bir widget olarak monte edilebilir. Yani sen, zaten hamile olduğunu kaç gün olduğu hafta ilk bakışta ekranda görebilirsiniz, ve kaç gün muhtemelen bebeğinize doğuracağım alacaktır. Widget etkinleştirmek için, birkaç saniye için ekrana dokunun ve daha sonra giriş "widget" ve app "Gebelik gözlemcisi" seçeneğini seçin. Ağırlık ve uzunluk birimleri hemen değiştirilebilir. İçeriği, renkler ve widget şeffaflık ayarlanabilir. Henüz ile satiesfied olmayan bir şey varsa, bana bunu düzeltmek için bir şans verin;-) Bu durumda algılanan hata veya istenilen fonksiyonu ile bana bir e-posta göndermek! Teşekkürler!

WhatsApp Messenger is a messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone’s Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, and Voice Messages. First year FREE!* (WhatsApp may charge thereafter, current price is $0.99 USD/year).WHY USE WHATSAPP: • NO ADDITIONAL FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone’s Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to message and call friends and family, so you don’t have to pay for every message or call.*• MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, and Voice Messages.• WHATSAPP CALLING: Call your friends and family using WhatsApp for free, even if they’re in another country. WhatsApp calls use your phone’s Internet connection rather than your cellular plan’s voice minutes.* (Note: you can’t access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp). • GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family.• WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer’s browser.• NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There’s no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.* • SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone’s existing address book. • ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you’re always logged in so you don’t miss messages. No more confusion about whether you’re logged in or logged out. • QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there’s no need to add hard-to-remember usernames.• OFFLINE MESSAGES: Even if you miss your notifications or turn off your phone, WhatsApp will save your recent messages until the next time you use the app.• AND MUCH MORE: Share your location, exchange contacts, set custom wallpapers and notification sounds, email chat history, broadcast messages to multiple contacts at once, and more!*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. --------------------------------------------------------- We’re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at: android-support@whatsapp.com or follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/WhatsApp@WhatsApp---------------------------------------------------------

appName: FINAL FANTASY LEGENDS 時空ノ水晶
description: 【ご新規＆カムバックキャンペーン実施中！！】メインストーリー第一部完結記念！１月３１日（日）まで「ご新規＆カムバックキャンペーン」を実施中！！期間中に『ファイナルファンタジーレジェンズ時空ノ水晶』を新規もしくは復帰でプレイしていただくと、なんと最大３０００個の時空石を始めとした超豪華アイテムをプレゼント！【祝！150万ダウンロード突破！！】◆ファイナルファンタジーの新たなる『伝説』◆『ＦＦレジェンズ 時空ノ水晶（ときのすいしょう）』は、魅力的なキャラクターたちが織りなす、時空を超える壮大なストーリーが楽しめる新たなファイナルファンタジーです。◆◇ゲーム内容◇◆■時空を超える大冒険主人公のトゥモロやヒロインのエモを始めとした登場人物たちが、現在・過去・未来と時間を超えて仲間と出会い、「絶望の未来」から世界を救う冒険を繰り広げます。■アビリティと召喚魔法モンスターとの戦闘はわかりやすいコマンドバトルRPG！魔法や技などの様々な「アビリティ」や、強力な召喚獣を呼び出す「召喚魔法」を駆使して戦おう！■召喚獣の力を宿すクリスタル『幻石』と呼ばれるクリスタルを装備することでアビリティや召喚魔法を使えるようになり、幻石を強化すればキャラクターも強くなります。イフリートやシヴァ、チョコボなどＦＦシリーズお馴染みの召喚獣を始め、様々な召喚獣の力を宿した幻石が多数登場！◆◇ストーリー◇◆駆け巡れ、すべての時空を――過去と未来をつなぐ、遥かな旅へ！東の大陸アジマ、西の大陸ウェスタ。人間の過ちによって引き起こされた事件で世界は東西に分かれ、長い歴史の中で、争いをくり返していた。中央に位置する小島ナバルで穏やかに暮らす少年トゥモロは、ウェスタの冒険家リーグの土産話を夢中になって聞き入っていた。不思議な流れ星に異変を察知したリーグの後を追ったトゥモロは、未来からやってきた不思議な少女エモと出会う。現在、過去、未来、そして時間から切り離された幻獣界。さまざまな時代でたくさんの仲間と出会い、別れ、紡がれていく”未来の約束”の物語……。◆◇主題歌◇◆『Timeless Tomorrow』Vocal：Lia各種音楽配信サイトで好評配信中！詳細はコチラ　http://soundtrack.jp.square-enix.com/download/detail.html?id=0079------------------------------■推奨環境・プレイ中はサーバとの通信が発生するため、通信可能な環境でお楽しみください。・対応OSAndroid OS 4.0以降・対応機種http://support.jp.square-enix.com/faqarticle.php?kid=72488&ret=main&id=11021※対応機種以外での動作は保障しておりません。---------------------------◆◇ご意見・ご要望・不具合のお問い合わせはこちら◇◆http://support.jp.square-enix.com/main.php?id=11021&la=0

Access to your bank when and where it suits you.With Nordea's Mobile Banking app you can easily manage many of your banking transactions whenever you want. E.g.; you can view your accounts, transfer funds, pay bills, follow your investments and view information about your loans. Tip! Pay your invoices quickly and easily by using your camera to scan the details. Features included:- Check balance and transactions on your accounts.- Check your MasterCard transactions.- Transfer money between your accounts.- Make payments to others.- Get an overview of your upcoming payments; including creating or deleting payments- Pay bills and register bills for direct debit (Betalingsservice).- See all the payment details on upcoming payments.- Create, edit and delete payees.- View details on bank loans, car loans and mortgages, including outstanding debt, current interest rate and the next due performance.- See information about your custody accounts and securities in custody accounts.View balances and details of your custody accounts-You can now view and select your custody accounts from the overview page and see holding and asset details.Read and send e-mails to Nordea-You can now read Nordea e-mails including attachments, plus send new as well as reply to e-mails with Nordea/your advisor.Scan invoices-Use your mobile phone's camera to scan bills for payment.View loan details-Ability to view loan details; including balance, current interest rate and repayment information.Creditor reference-New payment solution - Creditor Reference is a unique identification code that can be used for account-to-account payments.Make Express Credit Transfer-With Express Credit Transfers you make payments to third parties with other banks, where the transaction is cleared immediately and can be viewed in the transaction list within a few seconds.Get Service Notification Message-Pop-up message; for example in relation to system updates or technical problem upon login to mobile banking app.In order to use the Mobile bank you need to:•be 15 years old•have an Online agreement for Nordea’s Netbank •have an active NemID•have a Smartphone, which you can download apps toNordea's Mobile Banking allows you to perform a variety of banking transactions. Banking transactions are covered by Nordea conditions: “Rules for Internet banking – Private” and “Terms for retail customers”. For information about Nordea processing of personal data in connection with the banking business, see the “Terms for retail customers”, which you can find on Nordea.dk.The app will not disclose personal information to third parties. All information used to perform banking transactions is deleted from the app upon concluding the session.

The Daily Bible Verse mobile app delivers a new word of God directly to your mobile device each and every day in a simple and easy to read layout. Thank you for all of the wonderful comments. I can't begin to tell you how powerful and meaningful your words are to us!Background of Daily Bible Verse~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~As God led the Israelites through the wilderness for 40 years, he provided for their physical nourishment by sending from heaven each morning a grainy white substance called manna which covered the ground like frost and was gathered up by God's people. That story reminds us how God provides for the spiritual nourishment of His people by sending his word from heaven which has been collected in the Bible.May you be blessed by "Daily Bible Verse"; a daily bite sized chunk of spiritual food for your heart and mind.

RoadGuard is dé app waarmee jij eenvoudig hulp regelt als je met pech langs de weg staat. Zonder abonnement, zonder verzekering.Veel mensen hebben een abonnement of verzekering voor pechhulp terwijl ze er nooit gebruik van maken. Dat is toch zonde! Daarom is er RoadGuard, de nieuwe pechhulp. Makkelijker, persoonlijker, logischer. Gewoon via je smartphone. Met RoadGuard op je telefoon is hulp altijd in de buurt. Natuurlijk laten we je vooraf weten wat je moet betalen voor een lekke band of een lege accu. Doe een melding en wij komen direct naar je toe. Handig: je ziet in de app wie jou komt helpen en hoe lang het duurt voordat hij er is. En je betaalt alleen voor de hulp die je daadwerkelijk krijgt.OVERAL: Waar je ook staat in Nederland. Of dat in de middle of nowhere is of voor je eigen voordeur. Wij zijn altijd in de buurt om jou te helpen. VOOR JOU: Of je nu in je eigen auto rijdt of in die van iemand anders. Of je pech krijgt met je auto, motor, busje, caravan, camper of scooter. We zijn er gewoon als jij ons nodig hebt.HANDIG: In de app zie je direct wat onze hulp kost, wie er naar je onderweg is en hoe lang het duurt voordat hij er is. Betalen? Natuurlijk via de app. Met iDEAL, Paypal of creditcard. Geen geld bij je? Stuur een mail naar thuis met Payperemail. Na afronding van de pechhulp sturen we je per e-mail een factuur. Easy does it!GRATIS DOWNLOADEN: Onze app is gratis. Je zit nergens aan vast. Je betaalt voor de hulp die je krijgt. Geen abonnement of verzekering dus. LOGISCH: Moeten we nog meer zeggen? RoadGuard is gewoon logisch. Zet de app dus direct op je telefoon. Dan weet je zeker dat hulp altijd binnen handbereik is. Kun jij lekker onbezorgd op weg. En krijg je toch pech? Dan zijn we maar een paar kliks verwijderd. DIT IS HOE HET WERKT:- Open de RoadGuard-app. Heb je nu pech en RoadGuard niet op je telefoon? Geen probleem! Download ‘m hier meteen. Je kunt de app direct gebruiken.- Meld je probleem. Je ziet meteen hoeveel je moet betalen. Ga je daarmee akkoord? Fijn! We weten precies waar je bent en komen zo snel mogelijk naar je toe.- Wij komen je helpen! In de app zie je direct wie jou komt helpen en hoe lang het duurt voordat hij (of zij) er is.- Betaal direct via de app. Dat kan met iDEAL, PayPal en creditcard. Of stuur een mail zodat iemand thuis voor je kan betalen.Dus. Heb je een lekke band, een lege tank, een motor die oververhit is of een lege accu? Verkeerd getankt en nu benzine in je diesel? Een lampje dat brandt en zegt dat je moet stoppen? RoadGuard! Met een paar kliks zijn onze hulptroepen onderweg en helpen je weer verder. VRAGEN? Op http://www.roadguard.nl/vragen lees je alles over RoadGuard.PROBLEMEN MET DE APP? Voordat je een negatieve review plaatst, geef je mening via de app. Of op http://www.roadguard.nl We proberen graag samen het probleem op te lossen!ROADGUARD IS EEN INITIATIEF VAN CENTRAAL BEHEER EN EUROCROSS ASSISTANCE Vind ons leuk op Facebook, op https://facebook.com/roadguardVolg ons op Twitter, op https://twitter.com/roadguard Jalan Guard adalah aplikasi yang memungkinkan Anda dengan mudah mengatur bantuan ketika Anda rusak di sepanjang jalan. Tanpa berlangganan tanpa asuransi.Banyak orang memiliki langganan atau asuransi untuk bantuan pinggir jalan sementara mereka tidak pernah menggunakan. Itu memalukan! Oleh karena itu, ada jalan Guard, bantuan pemecahan baru. Mudah, lebih pribadi, lebih logis. Hanya menggunakan smartphone Anda.Dengan jalan Guard di ponsel Anda selalu membantu di tangan. Tentu saja membiarkan Anda tahu sebelumnya apa yang Anda harus membayar ban kempes atau baterai mati. Menempatkan pesan dan kami akan datang langsung ke Anda. Nyaman: Anda lihat di aplikasi yang akan membantu Anda dan berapa lama waktu yang dibutuhkan sebelum ia tiba. Dan Anda hanya membayar untuk membantu Anda benar-benar mendapatkan.Di mana-mana: Di mana pun Anda berada di Belanda. Apakah itu adalah di tengah-tengah dari mana atau di pintu depan Anda. Kami selalu sekitar untuk membantu Anda.UNTUK ANDA: Apakah Anda sedang mengemudi di mobil Anda atau orang lain. Atau dengan mobil Anda mogok, sepeda motor, van, kafilah, motor atau skuter. Kami hanya seperti Anda membutuhkan kami.HANDY: Dalam aplikasi Anda dapat langsung melihat berapa biayanya bantuan kami, yang cara untuk Anda dan berapa lama waktu yang dibutuhkan sebelum dia tiba di sini. Bayar? Tentu saja aplikasi. Dengan iDEAL, PayPal atau kartu kredit. Tidak ada uang tunai? Kirim email ke rumah Payperemail. Setelah menyelesaikan bantuan breakdown, kami akan mengirimkan faktur melalui email. Mudah melakukannya!GRATIS DOWNLOAD: Aplikasi kami adalah gratis. Anda ada komitmen. Anda membayar untuk membantu Anda mendapatkan. Tidak ada langganan atau asuransi sehingga.LOGIS: Need kita katakan lebih? Jalan Penjaga hanya masuk akal. Masukan aplikasi sehingga langsung di ponsel Anda. Anda pasti tahu bantuan selalu dalam jangkauan. Dapatkah Anda baik-baik saja tanpa beban di jalan. Dan Anda masih mendapatkan beruntung? Kami hanya dengan beberapa klik saja.INI ADALAH CARA KARYA:- Open Road Penjaga aplikasi.Anda sekarang memiliki nasib buruk dan Jalan Penjaga tidak pada ponsel Anda? Tidak masalah! Unduh di sini dengan segera. Anda dapat menggunakan aplikasi secara langsung.- Laporkan masalah Anda.Anda segera melihat berapa banyak Anda harus membayar. Apakah Anda setuju dengan itu? Baik-baik saja! Kami tahu persis di mana Anda berada dan secepat mungkin untuk Anda.- Kami datang untuk membantu Anda!Dalam aplikasi Anda dapat langsung melihat siapa yang datang untuk membantu dan berapa lama waktu yang dibutuhkan sebelum dia (atau dia) ada.- Pembayaran secara langsung melalui aplikasi.Yang mungkin iDEAL, PayPal dan kartu kredit. Atau kirim email sehingga siapa pun dapat membayar untuk rumah Anda.Dengan demikian. Apakah Anda memiliki ban kempes, tangki kosong, mesin terlalu panas atau baterai mati? Salah mabuk dan sekarang bensin di diesel Anda? Sebuah cahaya yang datang dan mengatakan Anda harus berhenti? Jalan Penjaga! Dengan beberapa klik, bala kami di jalan dan membantu Anda lebih lanjut.PERTANYAAN? Pada http://www.roadguard.nl/vragen membaca semua tentang Jalan Guard.MASALAH DENGAN APP? Sebelum posting review negatif, memberikan pendapat Anda melalui aplikasi. Atau http: //www.roadguard.nlWe ingin mencoba untuk memecahkan masalah bersama-sama!ROAD GUARD IS AN INISIATIF PENGELOLAAN PUSAT DAN EURO LINTAS BANTUANSeperti kami di Facebook di https://facebook.com/roadguardIkuti kami di Twitter, di https://twitter.com/roadguard

Works on Android Lollipop 5.1.1 with latest system update (OTA update build LMY48I) !!Kill tasks, free memory, speed up phone, save battery life, 1 tap boost your phone.■ Feature-----------------------------• Kill selected tasks• RAM Cleaner• CPU lagging monitor (Remind user if CPU lagged by some apps)• App or game killer• AntiVirus - Virus Scan (Trustlook Supported)• Android optimizer• Ignore apps when kill tasks• Auto kill tasks on every screen off• Regular kill• Startup Kill• One click task kill widget• Quick uninstaller• Show battery life• Support all android version• Kill GPS: Kill apps to stop GPS• Memory Booster, RAM Booster• Memory Cleaner, RAM Cleaner• Permission manager addon for Android 4.3 (App Ops)• Holo style■ Description-----------------------------The Advanced Task Manager can list all the running tasks on your phone and it can help you stop any of the tasks easily and quickly. It is also a task management tool which can manage all the installed apps on your phone.The task management mechanism of android system has been changed after the release of the version 2.2 of the android system. Task killers cannot kill the services and notifications on your phone.By use of the Advanced Task Manager, you can thoroughly stop tasks in the following steps: 1) long press the task that you want to stop 2) chose the “force stop” option3) press the the “force stop” button on the application info system panelIf you want to manage running services, click menu->service, then it will open the system service panel where you can stop running services.**Please note that installing other task manager or task killer tools may make your phone unstable or cause potential conflict.**■ FAQ-----------------------------Q: Why do apps restart again after killing?A: Some apps are restarted by system events. Apps cannot be prevented from restarting because of system limitation. We suggest you to enable auto kill in settings, and it will kill tasks on every screen off. It will help to save battery life and release memory for the phone.Q: How can I add apps to the ignore list?A: You can long press the task that you want to ignore, and then you will get a poped up context menu, click "Ignore". The ignored apps will not be shown in the task list, and will never be killed. You can manage the ignored apps in settings.Q: How can I manage startup apps?There is "Startup Kill" in settings. It can help you to kill tasks when system starts up.■ Trademark-----------------------------The Android robot is modified from work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License.

On-board navigation by GarminImportant notes:- Xperia Edition runs EXCLUSIVELY on selected SONY Xperia devices- The software requires additional data (maps, voices) via WiFi after installation!Garmin brings its award winning experience from personal navigation devices to transform your SONY Xperia device into a fully functioning mobile navigation system. Xperia Edition is an on-board solution, meaning no data transfer, waiting time or roaming charges occur when using the map display, voice announcements or route calculation. The system files are saved directly to your device so you can navigate anywhere in Europe incl. Russia OR North America OR Australia OR Southern Africa OR Brazil/Argentina without worrying about cellular coverage or excessive data charges. You can make free use of the Xperia Edition with all options active within a 30 days trial phase and later decide whether you want to extend this phase by another 30 days via a Google subscription for the 30-DAYs-ALL-IN package or purchase one of the two lifetime options EFFICIENCY or EXCELLENCE available. Even after ending of the trial phase the pedestrian navigation function always remains.Features included in the EFFICIENCY, EXCELLENCE and 30-DAYs-ALL-IN:• Supports 18 different languages• Europe (incl. Russia), OR North America, OR Australia, OR Southern Africa, OR Brasil/Argentina maps • Turn-by-turn voice guidance• Intelligent address search• Reality Scanner• Point of Interest search• Local Search (a)• Car & Pedestrian mode• Navigate to contacts• Take me home function• Route Planning• Clever Parking• Live Weather (a)Features additionally included in the EXCELLENCE lifetime package and the 30-DAYs-ALL-IN option:• Reality View Pro - Photo realistic display of motorway junctions and exits• 3D map view – Bird-view-like map display• Speed Assistant – Display of current speed limit and warning when exceeding• Radar Info - Fix installed speed & red light cameras• Lane Assistant Pro - Display of the best lane to take when approaching a junction• Text-to-Speech - Spoken Street Names• MyRoutes - Multiple route calculation• Enables pedestrian navigation on SONY SmartWatch 2. Requires additional installation of the free extension NAVIGON Smartwatch Connect, available here in Google PlayOptional extensions for the EXCELLENCE package, included in the 30-DAYs-ALL-IN option:• Traffic Live (a) - Real time traffic updates. Avoid traffic jams, roadworks, road closures and more. Automatic re-routing possible• Mobile Alert Live (a) - Receive real time information on danger spots in your country (Europe and North America only!). You can also report such spots to help other drivers• Mobile Alert Live Premium (a) - As Mobile Alert Live, but working Pan-European wide (Europe only!), providing information level of reliability, time passed since last report and the number of reporters travelling in your direction• FreshMaps - Regularly map updates (b)• Panorama View 3D - View the landscape in 3D with mountains and valleys• Urban Guidance - Use also public transport to navigate in many urban areas (a)• NAVIGON cockpit - Gauges and displays showing various physical parameters(a) Live service. A data connection is required (b) Garmin warrants at least a 24 month support for this service after purchaseNotes:- On first startup a short data connection (ca. 25kB) is mandatory to register your product. During trial phase and for subscription products a short data connection is required at every start. Please ensure data connection is available- NAVIGON is an on-board solution. Hence all map material, voices and system files are saved on the phone. With all maps installed the app requires approx. 3.4GB of memory. Please ensure you have sufficient mass-storage memory available- The map material must be downloaded via WiFi. Please ensure a reliable connection is available. Time of download depends on network and number of selected maps

Vinasun Taxi là ứng dụng chính thức của công ty cổ phần Vinasun. Vinasun Taxi giúp cho người tiêu dùng thêm kênh lựa chọn đặt xe taxi của Vinasun tại Việt Nam với nhiều tiện ích cộng thêm thông qua điện thoại smartphone (bên cạnh các kênh khác như gọi tổng đài, đón xe qua nhân viên điều hành điểm tiếp thị, vẫy xe trên đường…).Tính năng:(1) cho phép khách hàng đặt xe trước (hẹn giờ đón).(2) cung cấp đầy đủ thông tin của xe và tài xế cùng với thông tin ước lượng thời gian xe sẽ đến đón. Khách hàng có thể gọi trực tiếp đến số điện thoại liên lạc của lái xe.(3) cho phép khách hàng dễ dàng theo dõi số tiền cước của chuyến đi ngay trên ứng dụng nhờ được đồng bộ với đồng hồ cước trên xe.(4) cung cấp tính năng ước lượng giá và khoảng cách giữa điểm đặt xe và điểm đến.(5) khách hàng hủy đặt xe hoàn toàn không bị tính phí.(6) cho phép khách hàng xem lại lịch sử đặt xe và các thông tin liên quan.Các tỉnh thành hỗ trợ:- Hồ Chí Minh, Sài Gòn- Đà Nẵng- Khánh Hòa, Nha Trang- Bà Rịa, Vũng Tàu- Bình Dương- Đồng Nai- ... Vinasun Taxi is de officiële app van de aandelen van de vennootschap Vinasun. Taxi Vinasun hulp consumenten kiezen voor meer kanalen van Vinasun taxi boekingen in Vietnam met veel extra voorzieningen via smartphone (naast andere kanalen zoals call telefooncentrale, pick-up door het bedienend personeel punt marketing, zwaaien auto's op de weg ...).Kenmerken:(1), die stelt klanten in staat om auto te reserveren voor (pick-up timer).(2) voorziet in een volledige waaier van informatie over het voertuig en de bestuurder van informatie met de geschatte tijd zal komen voor de auto. Klanten kunnen rechtstreeks bellen naar het telefoonnummer van de chauffeur.(3) kunnen klanten eenvoudig volgen de hoeveelheid vracht tochten op de toepassing omdat de klok wordt gesynchroniseerd met heffingen op voertuigen.(4) schattingen van de prijs en de functie kloof tussen de auto en stelt u de bestemming.Annuleringen (5) van de klant complete voertuigen zijn niet in rekening gebracht.(6) stelt klanten in staat om orde geschiedenis en andere auto-gerelateerde informatie te herzien.De provincie ondersteunt:- Ho Chi Minh-Stad, Saigon- Da Nang- Khanh Hoa, Nha Trang- Ba Ria Vung Tau- Pacific- Dong Nai- ...

description: 【はじめての方限定！今ならポイント100円相当プレゼント】●Reader Storeのメールマガジンにはじめて登録された方に好きな本の購入に使用できる100ポイントプレゼント！メールマガジンでは毎週話題の新刊やおトクなキャンペーンの情報をお届けしています！ 詳しくは　http://ebookstore.sony.jp/stc/mailmag/20141101/mailmag_new/ ※キャンペーンは予告なく終了する場合があります--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ソニーの公式電子書籍アプリです。コミック、小説、雑誌など約29万冊取扱。無料の本2,000冊以上、試し読みサンプルも充実しています。キャンペーンや優待プログラムを豊富にご用意しており、お得に本をお楽しみいただけます。ソニーの電子書籍アプリReader はMy Sony IDもしくはSony Entertainment Networkアカウントでお楽しみいただけます。また、お持ちのGoogleアカウントやYahoo! JAPAN IDでかんたんに会員登録をしていただくことも可能です。アプリに関するQ&Aはこちらhttp://ebookstore.sony.jp/stc/support/qa/smt/■特徴＜Reader Store について＞・21ものジャンル別の売り場、読者が実際に読んで書いたレビューが充実。おもしろいと思える一冊に出会いやすい書店です・レビューを書いた本を他の人が買うとソニーポイントがプレゼントされる「自分の本屋さん体験」ができるサービスをご用意しています・毎月 約2,000冊のペースで新刊入荷しています ・約2,000冊の無料の青空文庫、無料の試し読みサンプルなど、実際のご購入前に電子書籍を体験できるラインナップが充実しています・書籍を購入するとソニーポイントがたまります。たまったポイントで書籍を購入することができます・書籍はクレジットカード/auかんたん決済/ソニーポイント/NET CASH(Reader Store専用電子図書券)での購入が可能です　ソニーの電子書籍ストアReader Store　 http://ebookstore.sony.jp/＜アプリについて＞・フォントには「筑紫明朝・ゴシック」を採用、小さなサイズでもきれいな文字で書籍をお楽しみいただけます。・背景や文字色、余白を変更することができます（.bookを除く）。・文字拡大、明るさ調整、ブックマーク（しおり）、ハイライトなどにも対応。・最後に読んだページ位置やブックマーク（しおり）、ハイライトなどの情報を他の端末と共有できます。・実際の本のようなページめくりを含む多彩なページめくりアニメーションに対応（コミックのページめくりアニメーションはEPUBのみになります）。・デバイスのボリュームキーによるページめくりも可能です（EPUB雑誌を除く）。・購入した本は書籍、雑誌、コミックごとの本棚に並び、タイトル/著者名/最近読んだ本/最近購入した本で並べ替えができます。またお好みの本棚を手動で作成できます。・さらに同じタイトル、著者、ジャンル、出版社の場合は自動でまとめて表示することもできます。・購入した書籍は対応する端末間で5台まで共有できます。・バックアップしたコンテンツを後からアプリに取り込むことができます。・Android4.4以上ではメモリーカードにコンテンツを保存することができます（デバイスの制限により、Android4.4以上でもアプリからメモリカードを認識できないデバイスがあります）。・最後のページで、今読んだ本の続刊を読んだり、関連する本を探したり、レビューを書いたりすることができます。・どのページからでも「次の巻」「前の巻」をいつでも開くことができます。・Reader Storeタイルにソニーポイントを表示します。今月期限切れになるポイントも確認できます。・Android4.4以上ではフルスクリーンモードによる読書がお楽しみいただけます。コミックの見開き表示等で画像が大きく表示され読みやすくなります。＜動作環境＞・Android™ 4.0 ~ Android 6.0　Nexus 9では、OSを5.1以降にアップデートする必要があります。　Intel製CPUを搭載した一部のデバイスでは、アプリが動作しない場合があります。・本体RAM 1GB以上・本体メモリーに140MB以上の空き容量＜動作に必要な権限＞▼プライバシー- 端末のステータスとID読み取り：コンテンツ内に電話番号のリンクがある場合、タップすると電話アプリを起動▼ストレージ- コンテンツの保存・読み出し▼ネットワーク通信- インターネットからデータを受信する：Reader Storeからのお知らせ（Push通知）を受信- ネットワークのフルアクセス：Reader Store へのアクセス- ネットワーク接続の表示：ネットワークが使用可能かどうかの確認- Wi-Fi接続の表示：大容量のコンテンツをダウンロードするときにWi-Fi接続以外の時にお知らせする▼アプリ情報- 起動時の実行：ダウンロード処理等を実行するサービスを起動- 実行中アプリの取得：Reader 拡張機能がインストール済みかどうかの確認▼電池への影響- タブレット/携帯電話のスリープを無効にする：ダウンロード中や機器認証中のスリープ抑止▼システムツール- システム設定の変更：バックライトの制御、画面OFFタイマーの制御＜対応フォーマット＞・Reader Store 配信コンテンツ(.mnh)：表示するには機器認証が必要です。・XMDF (.zbf)・ドットブック (.book)・EPUB(.epub)：日本語EPUBフォーマットは、ファイルによって表示できない場合があります。本製品は、フォントワークス株式会社のフォントを使用しています。XMDFはシャープ株式会社の登録商標です。ドットブック（.book）は株式会社ボイジャーの登録商標です。“Reader”およびそのロゴは、ソニー株式会社の日本国およびその他の国における登録商標または商標です。その他記載されている会社名、製品名は各社の商標または登録商標です。【関連キーワード】電子書籍、本、小説、コミック、マンガ、漫画、ライトノベル、雑誌

De NMBS app geeft een volledig overzicht van beschikbare openbaar vervoer reismogelijkheden in België. De multimodale reisplanner berekent je snelste reisweg van deur-tot-deur, eventueel met GPS. De vertrektijden van bus, metro en trein zijn direct raadpleegbaar en de treininformatie is in real time. Je kan realtime vertrek- en aankomsttijden per station raadplegen, alsook zoeken op treinnummer. Voorts kan je storingen op het net raadplegen, alarmen instellen voor halten naar keuze en automatisch verwittigd worden bij treinvertragingen.Via de NMBS app kan je ook vervoersbewijzen aankopen, reiswegen bewaren in je kalender en/of ze delen met anderen via sms, e-mail of Twitter.Bij het downloaden wordt toelating gevraagd om bepaalde diensten te activeren in de app: oGPS positie: je kan via geolokalisatie het station vinden dat zich het dichtst in je buurt bevindtoKalender: je kan een reisweg in je kalender bewarenoContacten: •je kan een Mobile Ticket kopen voor iemand uit je telefoonboek, •je kan een adres van een contactpersoon kiezen als oorsprong of bestemming, •je kan anderen per sms/e-mail/Twitter op de hoogte brengen van je reisoPushberichten: je wordt automatisch verwittigd wanneer je trein vertraging heeftoTelefoon: je kan rechtstreeks onze klantendienst of Securail contacterenDe betaling van een Mobile Ticket gebeurt met een kredietkaart (VISA, MasterCard, American Express) via de beveiligde servers van Ingenico Payment Services. Indien je dit wenst, kunnen je gegevens na een eerste gebruik opgeslagen worden, zodat bij volgende aankopen enkel nog de CVC-code ingegeven moet worden.

Solo Weather is an easy app with elegant UI, provides detailed weather for all cities worldwide. Life should be simple and beautiful, and why not try the Solo Weather! It is free, no fees, no ads, no gimmicks.Favorite features:*Provides current weather condition and five days weather forecast*Searches for all cities worldwide by country and city or zip code*Humidity sensor, UV index, and chance of precipitation*Sunrise and Sunset time*Up to 9 different locations*Easily swipe for the most accurate weather forecasts*Auto location detection*Ability to set your preferred temperature unit, Celsius or FahrenheitTips:*Swipe horizontally for other locations*Swipe vertically for more detailed weather information

The official Android app from Auto Trader – the UK’s #1 motoring digital marketplace connecting buyers and sellers since 1977.With the Auto Trader Android app you can:- Search Auto Trader’s full range of used, nearly new and brand new cars and bikes.- Advertise your car for sale on Auto Trader, or get a part exchange quote from participating dealers.- Search for nearby dealers by enabling location services, or search by postcode, make and dealer name.- View detailed car specs and high quality images you can zoom in on and read user-generated owner reviews.- Contact sellers with just one click, or view their location and get directions to visit them.- Be a smarter owner with My Car. Track your car’s real-time value and create reminders for tax, MOT, and other key dates. Free, easy and quick.- Save frequent searches for faster access and store favourite cars or bikes in 'My Auto Trader'.- Found the car you want to buy? Make sure that it doesn’t have a hidden past with one of our mobile vehicle checks.We like feedback! If you have any – good or bad – please write to us at android@autotrader.co.uk What’s new:- Calculate finance for a car you likeGive it a try, and don’t forget to let us know what you think at android@autotrader.co.uk

Mobiilipankissa hoidat pankkiasiasi nopeasti ja kätevästi. Voit esimerkiksi maksaa laskusi älypuhelimen viivakoodinlukijalla tai käydä rahasto- ja osakekauppaa missä ikinä liikutkin. Mobiilipankki on nopea ja turvallinen käyttää.Mobiilipankissa on kaksi ympyränmuotoista valikkoa, ”Päivittäisasiointi” ja ”Sijoitukset”. Valikoiden välillä liikut pyyhkäisemällä puhelimen näyttöä.Mobiilipankissa voit:- tarkistaa saldot ja tapahtumat helposti ja nopeasti - seurata päivittäisiä tulojasi ja menojasi graafisessa näkymässä- tehdä tilisiirtoja ja maksaa laskut vaikkapa kuvaamalla viivakoodi kameralla- katsella ja muuttaa hyväksymättömiä maksuja- seurata säilytystileilläsi olevien arvopapereiden kehitystä sekä pörssikursseja- käydä arvopaperikauppaa 18 eri markkinalla ja rahastokauppaa Danske Invest Rahastoyhtiön rahastoilla - luoda omia listoja sinua kiinnostavista yrityksistä ja muista sijoituskohteista- katsoa päivän valuuttakurssit ja muuntaa hintoja missä vain matkustatkin- lähettää ja vastaanottaa verkkopankkiviestejä- etsiä lähimmän konttorin tai automaatin karttahaulla- lähettää soittopyynnön asiantuntijallemme ja varata ajan tapaamiseen.

-------------------------STATE BANK FREEDOM PLUS IS NOW STATE BANK ANYWHERE--------------------------------------------------Mobile Banking Smart Phone application for SBI Retail Internet Banking users--------------------------State Bank Anywhere is State Bank of India’s retail internet banking based application for your smartphones.
