The Yandex.Taxi app is a quick, easy and safe way of ordering a taxi. The average waiting time is 4-5 minutes and you can track your cab’s location on the map in real time. The app is currently supported in Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Ekaterinburg.Features: • Order a cab without calling the company – your order is sent directly to the closest available driver so they can reach you as quickly as possible. • Track the location of your car on the map. • View the name, phone number and licence plate number of the driver who’s picked your order. • Add special requests, such as children’s seat, receipt, pets or extra luggage. • Get price estimate for your location. • Rate your journey to give your feedback on the service.For comments, complaints or suggestions, please e-mail us at support@mobtaxi.yandex.ru.

Get Set for Argos on the move! Download the new Argos app for your Android device today to start exploring our huge range of products. It couldn't be easier to shop for what you love and need; whether you need toys for the kids or want to update to the latest tech, you can browse all the latest deals, create a wishlist and order products on the move from wherever you are. Shop our entire range of over 40,000 amazing products just how you like to.- Fast Track Delivery: Raining outside? In the middle of a Netflix marathon? Let us bring what you need to you at a time that suits you, even if you need it the same day!- Fast-Track Collection: Get in. Get your stuff. Get going! Couldn't be simpler!- 1 Click Reservation: Need it? Want it? Can't live a second longer without it?? Tap 1 Click and it'll be there waiting for you.- Wishlist: Filling a new home? Waiting for pay day? Building a birthday or Christmas list? Tap the heart symbol and save all your favourite items in one place. What more could you wish for?- Check Stock: We love seeing our customers but we don't want you to waste a journey so you can quickly and easily check stock at your nearest and favourite stores with a simple tap. We want to make the best apps in the world...ever. Maybe a bit ambitious but we want the Argos app to be one of your 'must haves' and that means we need your help and ideas. We love fanciful ideas, nothing is too big or too small so please feel free to go nuts! We do love a challenge and our developers are workaholic demons (a couple might actually be demons) so get in touch via appdev@homeretailgroup.com to keep them busy...society simply isn't ready to meet them yet.Permissions required for this app:• Identity: This is so we can remember your key details for you, such as your preferred delivery address and contact details.• Location: So we can show you the stores and stock that is closest to where you are• Microphone: Use your voice to search for products like never before • Wi-Fi connection information: This means we can find you with better accuracy to show you where your nearest Argos store is. Get Set für Argos für unterwegs! Laden Sie die neue Argos-App für Ihr Android-Gerät heute zu erkunden unserem großen Sortiment von Produkten.Es könnte nicht einfacher sein, für das, was du liebst und Bedarf einkaufen; ob Sie Spielzeug für die Kinder brauchen oder wollen, um auf die neueste Technologie zu aktualisieren, können Sie alle Angebote zu sehen, erstellen Sie eine Wunschliste und um Produkte auf dem Umzug von wo immer Sie sind.Kaufen unser komplettes Sortiment mit über 40.000 erstaunliche Produkte, wie Sie mögen.- Fast Track Lieferung: Raining outside? In der Mitte ein Netflix-Marathon? Lassen Sie uns zu bringen, was du brauchst, um in einer Zeit, die zu Ihnen passt, auch wenn Sie es am selben Tag brauchen!- Fast-Track-Sammlung:. Nehmen Sie sich jetzt Ihre Sachen. Loslegen! Könnte nicht einfacher sein!- 1 Klicken Sie auf Reservation: Brauchen Sie es? Will es? Kann nicht eine Sekunde länger leben, ohne es ?? Tippen Sie auf 1 Klicken Sie auf, und es werde da sein, warten auf Sie.- Wunschliste: Füllen ein neues Zuhause? Warten auf Zahltag? Der Aufbau einer Geburtstag oder zu Weihnachten Liste? Tippen Sie auf das Herzsymbol, und speichern Sie alle Ihre Lieblingseinzelteile an einem Ort. Was will man mehr wünschen?- Lizenz Check: Wir lieben es, zu sehen, unsere Kunden, aber wir wollen nicht, dass Sie zu einer Reise zu verschwenden, so dass Sie schnell und einfach zu prüfen Lager in Ihrer Nähe und Lieblings-Shops mit einem einfachen Tippen.Wir wollen die besten Apps in der Welt zu machen ... je. Vielleicht ein bisschen ehrgeizig, aber wir wollen die Argos App zu einem Ihrer "must haves", und das bedeutet, wir brauchen Ihre Hilfe und Ideen. Wir lieben fantasievollen Ideen, nichts ist zu groß oder zu klein, so zögern Sie nicht, Nüsse gehen! Wir lieben die Herausforderung und unsere Entwickler sind Workaholic Dämonen (ein paar vielleicht tatsächlich Dämonen), so nehmen Sie Kontakt via appdev@homeretailgroup.com um sie zu beschäftigen ... Gesellschaft einfach nicht bereit, sie noch zu treffen.Berechtigungen für diese App benötigt:• Identität: Das ist, damit wir Ihre wichtigsten Details für Sie, wie Ihrer Wunschadresse und Kontaktangaben zu erinnern.• Ort: So können wir Ihnen die Läden und Lager, die am nächsten, wo Sie sind, ist zu zeigen• Mikrofon: Verwenden Sie Ihre Stimme, um für Produkte wie nie zuvor zu suchen• Wi-Fi-Verbindungsinformationen: Das heißt, wir können Sie mit besserer Genauigkeit zu finden, um Ihnen zu zeigen, wo in Ihrer Nähe Argos Geschäft ist.

Al-Moazin prayer times application, is a must have companion for all Muslims. Die netbanking-App der Erste Bank Österreich und der österreichischen Sparkassen bietet Ihnen viele Funktionen und Infos rund ums Geld!So können sie auch unterwegs und zwischendurch Ihre Finanzgeschäfte erledigen, • Modernes Layout • Einfache, intuitive und komfortable Bedienung • Spezielle Ausrichtung der Funktionen und Services auf die Bedürfnisse bei der Nutzung unterwegs und zwischendurch • Wichtige NotfallnummernnetbankingErledigen Sie Ihre Bankgeschäfte einfach und komfortabel von unterwegs aus. • Aktuelle Infos zu Girokonto, Sparkonto und Wertpapierdepot • Inlands- und Auslandsüberweisungen erfassen oder durch Nutzung der im netbanking am PC angelegten Vorlagen beauftragen • Übertrag zwischen eigenen Konten • Postfach mit Nachrichten (netbanking-Produkt-Infos, Sicherheitsnachrichten etc.) • Erledigen Sie Überweisungen einfach mit Ihrer Smartphone-Kamera (Scan & Pay).Die netbanking-App ermöglicht Ihnen auch die Übersicht über die Umsätze Ihrer Bankkarten und Kreditkarten Leider kann es passieren, dass man Karten verliert oder sie einem gestohlen werden. Das ist eine unangenehme Situation, die hoffentlich nie eintreten wird. Falls doch, dann können Sie mit der netbanking-App • alle Ihre Bankkarten und s Kreditkarten (= die eigenen Kreditkarten der Erste Bank und Sparkassen) • sofort online sperren - die Sperre ist sofort aktiv!Die Erste Bank und Sparkassen bieten Ihnen im mobilen Web ein mobiles Portal mit netbanking an.Einfach die Funktion “mobile netbanking“ im netbanking–App-Menü aktivieren.Filial- und BankomatsucheDie App zeigt Ihnen die nächstgelegenen Filialen oder die nächstgelegenen Bankomaten in allen Ländern, in denen die Erste Group vertreten ist: Österreich, Tschechien, Slowakei, Ungarn, Kroatien, Serbien, Rumänien und Ukraine.Es werden im Ausland nur die Bankomaten der lokalen Erste Group Konzerninstitute angezeigt, in Österreich auch die Bankomaten anderer Institute.Kontakt & NotfallservicesHier stehen Ihnen eine Sperr-Hotline, der 24h helpdesk, das 24h Service und das spezielle Service „Ich will Kunde werden“ für Neukunden der Erste Bank und Sparkassen zur Verfügung. Einfach antippen und es wird automatisch das gewünschte Service angewählt.Weitere interessante Services: • Kreditrechner • News der Erste Bank • Aktienempfehlungen • Aktuelle Wechselkurse • und Research-Infos nach den Kategorien Länder, Aktien, Anleihen, Videos, Rohstoffe, Währungen und MakrosDetaillierte Informationen zu den Funktionalitäten und Services erhalten Sie durch Antippen des Informationsbutton auf der netbanking-App Starseite (i-Symbol) Sicherheit bei der Nutzung der netbanking-App Unter Sicherheit verstehen wir die Absicherung von netbanking vor unbefugtem Lesen und vor unbefugter Einsicht in Ihre Daten, sowie vor unerlaubten Transaktionen.Um dieses Ziel zu erreichen haben wir eine Vielzahl von Maßnahmen gesetzt, die den Schutz Ihrer Daten während der Übertragung sowie den Schutz Ihrer Daten im Rechenzentrum gewährleisten.Details – vor allem zur Nutzung des TAC-SMS-Autorisierungsverfahrens in der netbanking-App - und wichtige Tipps dazu entnehmen Sie bitte dem Link www.sparkasse.at/sgruppe/Privatkunden/Produkte/E-Banking/mobiles-nb-App oder durch Antippen des Info-Button auf der Startseite der netbanking-App.

Everyone’s a winner with the Hungry Jack’s App.Check-in at any Hungry Jack’s® store and shake your phone to reveal your prize. You can’t lose – every shake wins! Prizes include free Coke, free fries, 2 for 1 deals and many more great discounts across our menu. The app also includes:• A handy store locator • The full Hungry Jack’s® menu• A useful nutritional calculatorPlease note that in order to check-in and win, you will need a Facebook account.We’ve heard you and we’ve taken some time to make improvements to our app. For phones with less memory, we’ve reduced the app in file size. Devices with smaller screens now have a scrolling option. Our store information has also been updated, so any new stores we’ve opened recently should be available for check-in. If you’re having problems checking into a store, a helpful prompt will help you troubleshoot. Troubleshooting Tips:1. App crashing or stalling? Apps require a certain allocation of memory to run properly. Our app is 25MB in size, so if you’re experiencing performance issues, check your phone has sufficient memory available, close down other apps you’re not using, or restart your device. If you still experience difficulty, we recommend closing down the app completely and launching it again. If that doesn’t work, delete and reinstall the app completely as a last resort before contacting us. 2. No Prizes left?We monitor the prize pool to make sure there are plenty to go around. Occasionally, the prize pool may be temporarily depleted, in which case we recommend returning to a store to shake and win again after 24 hours to try again. 3. Can’t check-in? Store not being detected?Check that the GPS function on your phone is turned on. If it is, but you still can’t check in, you may need to carry out a GPS fix. Note this may be called ‘Cell Network Location’ on your phone, depending on the maker.The strength of your GPS signal will also depend upon the network you use and quality of your 3G connection. Signal strength varies across different service providers, locations, and the volume of other users in your area. If you have had problems in the past loading maps or other location services, it’s likely this will be due to your device’s connectivity, which is not the fault of a particular app. Newly opened Hungry Jack’s stores may take a week or two to be loaded into our systems, so we ask for your patience if you can’t immediately check in to a new store. We hope this Troubleshooting information is of assistance to you. If you are having problems that can’t be resolved by the points above, please let us know by clicking the ‘Email Developer’ button below, or send an email to socialmedia@hungryjacks.com.au.To help us try and get to the bottom of your issue, please supply us with the following information. We require all of this information in order to be able to assist you. Please fill out the subject line of your email with: ‘Hungry Jack’s App Issue’.• Phone make and model:• Detailed description of your problem:• Screen grabs of what is happening:• Store name & location (if your issue is GPS-related):After receiving all of the above, we will attempt to replicate your experience to see how we can help. On occasion, it may not be possible for us to recreate your issue. In this instance, we will keep an eye out for similar feedback from other users that might help us help you.We thank you for your continued support and feedback. Hungry Jack’s® Team.

A Yellow Battery egy friss akkumulátorkímélő alkalmazás a világ vezető Android-fejlesztő csapatától. Akkumulátorod optimalizálásával segíti meghosszabbítani annak élettartamát, használatát pedig 50%-kal megnöveli. A Yellow Battery telefonod állapotának és alkalmazásainak okos menedzselésével a kezeidbe teszi akkumulátor-használatának és élettartamának egyszerű megnövelését!Jellemzők:►Akkumulátor kezdőoldalAz alkalmazott optimalizált algoritmussal az alkalmazás gyorsan megjeleníti a készenléti időt és elemzi különböző feladatok során (telefonálás, videók megtekintése, wifi, bluetooth be vagy kikapcsolása, stb.) az akkumulátor-használatot, pontos becslést adva ezzel felhasználóinak a szükséges időről.►Használati mód bekapcsolásaVálassz egy előre beállított módot (például wifivel vagy anélkül), amellyel hosszútávon kímélheted akkumulátorod teljesítményét. Emellett ha szükséges, az akkumulátor használati módjait személyre is szabhatod.►Egy lépéses optimalizálásGyors optimalizáció az akkumulátor teljesítményének egyszerű és hatékony kímélése érdekében. A funkció gyorsan tehermentesíthető a nagy energiaigényű időszakokat, aminek segítségével gyorsan folytathatod a munkádat anélkül, hogy az akkumulátorod felhasználása miatt kellene aggódnod.►Szuper optimalizációA mély optimalizáció a teljesítmény kímélése érdekében sokkal hatásosabb, mint az egy lépéses és a hatása is tovább tart.►Felhasználási részletekAz alkalmazás időről időre elemzi az akkumulátor felhasználását és sorba állítva megjeleníti az energiafogyasztó alkalmazásokat. Akkumulátorod kihasználását mindig időadatokkal együtt monitorozhatod, bezárhatod a háttérben futó felesleges, energiahasználó alkalmazásokat.►Akkumulátor-információEz a funkció az akkumulátor összes kapcsolódó információját összegyűjti, és az információkat egy oldalon összegyűjtve megjeleníti, a gyorsabb áttekintés érdekében (kapacitás, technológia, etc.). További kérdéseid vannak a Yellow Battery-ről? Keress minket a következő címen: yellowbatteryyb@gmail.comKedvelj minket Facebookon:www.facebook.com/yellowbattery

Slickdeals is the largest deal-sharing community on the Web. Millions of people regularly use the Slickdeals app to share and rate the best deals and coupons on everything from laptops to everyday products like paper towels. If there’s a deal, coupon, rebate, promo or freebie out there, we have it on the Frontpage! We don’t just look for big discounts; we look for combos where you can stack a deal with a promo or coupon code, free shipping or rebates to sweeten the deal even further. With more than a million people visiting Slickdeals during any given day, you sometimes have to be ready to strike quickly before a hot deal runs out. That’s where our app comes to the rescue! Download it today and have our Frontpage within arms reach for whenever the shopping bug strikes, or we shoot you a notification for a coupon code on that 65” HDTV you’ve been eyeing for a while.How it works:Every day our app aggregates thousands of deals submitted from our users on a variety of products, services and offers. These deals are then evaluated in our Hot Deals forum by the community who votes up or down and provide feedback on the product on sale or the deal itself. After a deal gets enough up votes it graduates to the Popular Deals forum. Here our team of Deal Editors monitor and evaluate all deals before hand-selecting which ones to promote to the Frontpage. All Frontpage deals have been thoroughly researched for price history, product reviews and if it has free shipping or a coupon code to go with it (among other things). Only the best of the best make it to the Slickdeals Frontpage, which is why it should always be your first stop before buying anything online. There are people in this world who pay full price and there are people who don’t. We don’t.Popular Deals: The Popular Deals forum is your chance to check out deals before they get promoted to the Frontpage. Not all popular Deals become Frontpage deals, but all Frontpage deals were once Popular Deals. If you want to beat the rush and increase your odds of snagging a great deal before it reaches the masses, the Popular Deals forum is the place to be.Forums: The heart of the Slickdeals community is our forum where users help each other find the best deals, prices, product reviews and exchange feedback. There's no limit to the types of deals you can find here -- from freebies to financial discussion, HDTVs to purses -- our users find the best deals on the web, anytime, anywhere.Deal Alerts: Setting up a Deal Alert is one of the smartest things to do when you know what you want, but don’t necessarily need it right away. Configure your alert for keywords, stores and categories by setting thresholds for when you want to be notified. We’ll send you a notification when a deal matches your criteria so you can focus on other things! (Login Required)Coupons: One of the best tips we can give you for shopping online is to never buy anything without first checking our extensive inventory of coupons for more than 5,000 stores. This is how an average deal often becomes a slick deal. We update our coupons daily, so we won’t waste your time with expired coupons.Favorites: Favorites allows you to save deals for easy reference if you can’t pull the trigger on it right away. (Login Required)Login: Log in to your Slickdeals account and be part of the community straight from your is device. If you find a deal that’s Slickdeals-worthy, go to the Hot Deals forum and submit coupons codes, promo codes, sales, freebies or anything else you deem a slick deal. Your voting and feedback help make our community better, which means saving more people money.Categories: Browse our category pages if you want to see all deals in a given category instead of doing specific searches or scrolling through the Frontpage deals.Have an issue with the app? Suggestions? Praises? Coupons? Send us an email at android/iOS@slickdeals.net - Your feedback will help us make this the best deals app.

Configure LED color and its flashing frequency for notification as shown below:- Miss call- SMS- MMS- Gmail- Calendar reminder- Hangouts- *Email- *Facebook- *Facebook Messenger- *Twitter- *WhatsApp- *BBM- *LINE- *GO SMS Pro- *Handcent SMS- *chomp SMS- *Textra SMS- *Verizon Messages- *Any 3rd party apps- Low battery- Battery charging- Battery charged- No signal- Roaming- No 3G/4G- No Wifi- Airplane Mode On- Silent Mode On- Vibration Mode On- Ringer Mode On- Mobile Data On- Wifi On- Wifi Hotspot On- Bluetooth OnOn Android 4.1 and 4.2, ROOT is required for those mark with asterisk *. After grant the ROOT permission, you need to restart Light Manager for changes to take effect. However ROOT is not required anymore from Android 4.3 onwards. You need to enable the Notification Access for Light Manager at Setting > Security > Notification Access > Light Manager.There are three operating modes:1) Normal Mode - Only LED color for the first notification will be flashing2) Alternating Mode - A few LED colors will be flashing alternately when multiple notifications are received3) Screen Mode - Notifications alert will be shown on screen (For those devices without a physical notification LED, only available for Android 4.3 and above)You may go to the test section to test whether this app works for your device.For Samsung Galaxy SIII (JB):- Device's screen needs to be turned off in order for the notification LED to work- You need to go to Setting > Display > LED indicator and enable "Notifications" in order for this application to workFor supported devices list and FAQ, you may go to the link below:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1t26evGufoC4Fha1Vjyho1cgBKHY6MLJGBPHcsGKZVLc/edit

NOVO APLICATIVO VÁ DE TÁXI, UMA FUSÃO ENTRE TAXIJÁ UOL E VÁ DE TÁXI PORTO SEGURO【Atenção】O uso contínuo de GPS em background pode diminuir drasticamente a duração da bateria.【Descrição】A Porto Seguro e o UOL se uniram para melhorar sua experiência ao chamar um táxi. Agora os aplicativos Vá de Táxi e Taxijá são um só.O Vá de Táxi é o app de chamadas de táxis que utiliza tecnologia para unir passageiros e taxistas. Acreditamos na mobilidade urbana e na sustentabilidade do transporte como diferencial nas evoluções das cidades, sempre buscando oferecer mais qualidade de serviço e benefícios para nossos usuários.O novo Vá de Táxi utiliza o PagSeguro UOL como sistema de pagamento pelo app e traz toda a segurança e simplicidade para passageiros e taxistas. Hoje contamos com mais de 27 mil taxistas cadastrados e 535 mil usuários.Com operação em várias cidades brasileiras, o Vá de Táxi é pioneiro na criação de uma ferramenta de chamada, pagamento e gestão de despesas de táxi corporativo.【Funcionalidades】• Praticidade: escolha sua forma de pagamento (pagamento pelo app, máquinas de cartão de débito ou crédito, dinheiro e empresas);• Variedade: pague com Visa, Mastercard, American Express (AMEX) ou Elo (Cielo);• Segurança: veja os dados do taxista e acompanhe o trajeto enquanto ele se aproxima do local;• Tranquilidade: veja a distância e o tempo de chegada aproximado do seu táxi;• Facilidade: adicione endereços favoritos e recentes para chamar seu táxi no dia a dia;• Aplicativo Gratuito.【Como Funciona】1. Abra o aplicativo Vá de Táxi e aguarde o aplicativo encontrar sua localização com a ajuda do GPS e localizar os táxis disponíveis mais próximos;2. Confirme seu endereço de origem;3. Escolha a forma de pagamento (ex.: pagamento no app, cartão de débito etc.);4. Acompanhe em tempo real o deslocamento do táxi;5. Aguarde o táxi chegar em poucos minutos. 【Vá de Táxi Empresas】O Vá de Táxi Empresas é a solução corporativa para empresas que buscam facilidade, controle e redução de custos em suas despesas de táxis corporativos. Conte com os benefícios que nosso serviço oferece:- Redução dos custos com táxis corporativos;- Rapidez e praticidade ao pedir táxi e pagar pelo próprio aplicativo;- Relatórios de corridas de seus funcionários e colaboradores;- Organização por níveis hierárquicos;- Controle de prevenção a fraudes;- Não se preocupe mais com fluxo de reembolso.【Atendimento】Caso tenha alguma dúvida, elogio ou sugestão basta nos enviar um e-mail para contato@vadetaxi.com.br. Sua opinião é muito importante.Atualize agora seu app e aproveite todos os benefícios dessa nova versão! Android Pay is the simple and safe way to pay with your Android phone at over one million store locations across the US (and soon in apps). To set it up, just add your credit and debit cards. When you're ready to pay, simply unlock your phone, hold it near a contactless terminal, and you're good to go. You don't even need to open the app.Setup is simpleInstall Android Pay on any NFC-enabled Android device (KitKat 4.4+). Then add your credit and debit cards from any participating bank. You can view the full list here: https://goo.gl/inQlgf. Android Pay works with cards from many of the most popular US banks, including: American Express, Bank of America, Citi, Discover, Navy Federal Credit Union, PNC, Regions Bank, USAA, U.S. Bank and Wells Fargo - with Capital One coming soon.Shop at your favoritesAndroid Pay works at over one million locations (and counting...) across the US, everywhere tap and pay payments are accepted. You can view some of your favorites here: http://goo.gl/JU1AD1Get security on the goYour actual card number isn't shared with the merchant when you use Android Pay. Instead, a virtual account number is used so that your card details stay safe. After paying, you'll receive transaction details to help you keep track of your spending activity.Since your phone can be used to pay when it's unlocked, Android Pay requires you to have a screen lock set up. And if your phone is ever lost or stolen, you can lock your device from anywhere using https://myaccount.google.com.To best protect your info, Android Pay isn't supported on rooted devices. This is because Google can't verify that the Android security model is intact on a rooted device.Earn rewards and saveYou can use Android Pay to store gift cards, loyalty cards, and offers. When using credit and debit cards from participating banks with Android Pay, you'll earn the same points and rewards that you do when swiping those cards.Looking to send money?The new Google Wallet app is the fast and free way to send money to friends and manage the Google Wallet card. Download it here: https://goo.gl/g4QXYMMore questions? Learn more at https://support.google.com/androidpay

Support unlock animation.How to use? 1.open this app's settings,then this 'Fireflies live wallpaper lock screen' will start to work. 2.You can preview the screen lock by clicking the 'preview' option no matter when you change any settings. 3.You can change the unlock ways by clicking the 'Slide to unlock style' option and select the corresponding option.FAQQ: What should I do if I encounter double lock screen?A:You can click 'Disable System Screen Lock' option to close system screen lock or set to none.Q:When I turn on the notifications,it talks back to me while operating my phone.A:Please turn off 'Talkback' in Accessibility of System setting.Q:This lock screen sometimes not work?A:It means that this lock screen had been killed,This happens when the system is in low memory while you are playing games or you start too many applications. Oficiální aplikace Jízdních řádů ZDARMA. MOBILNÍ APLIKACE ROKU 2016 v kategorii Životní styl a UX aplikace roku.Hlavní funkce:• Vyhledání vlakových, autobusových a MHD spojů• Online vyhledávání = vždy aktuální a oficiální informace včetně zpoždění a výluk• Inteligentní našeptávač zastávek a adres včetně zadání Moje poloha• Notifikace na příjezd, odjezd, přestup včetně zobrazení zpoždění (je-li dostupné)• Automatická detekce MHD jízdního řádu a nejbližší zastávky dle GPS• Offline prohlížení vyhledaných spojení• Inteligentní průvodce funkcemi• Výběr zastávek, adres z mapy• Funkce SMS jízdenka• Anglická mutace• Široké možnosti sdílení spojení• Zobrazení odjezdů/příjezdů z vybrané zastávky s možností filtrovat na konkrétní spoj• Uložení 6 spojení do oblíbených, 6 hledání v historii s offline daty• Vyhledávání bezbariérových spojení, spojení pro cyklisty nebo pro cestující s dětmi• Podrobné informace o spoji včetně nástupiště, koleje, čísle zastávky, zpoždění, aktuální pozice spoje, výlukách, orientační ceně jízdného a řazení vlakových vozů s popisem• Zobrazení trasy a polohy spoje na mapě• Kontextové propojení do prodejních systémů třetích stran pro rezervaci/zakoupení jízdného• Zobrazení legendy k použitým piktogramům• Nápověda - průvodce aplikací• Možnost zakoupit licenci na 1 rok provozu aplikace bez reklam za 49 Kč/rok a navždy za 149 KčMožnosti vyhledávání:• Postupné zadávání názvu a zužování výběru z našeptávače• Zadání začátku názvu• Zadání začátků slov - např. "P H" = Praha Hradčanská• Zadání textu obsaženého v názvu - např. "UAN" = Ostrava UAN, Brno UAN, Praha UAN• Možnost zadat jako cíl adresu nebo název objektu - např. "Praha, Divadlo v Dlouhé" nebo "Praha, Ve Smečkách" = najde nejbližší zastávku k tomuto bodu a spojení z výchozí polohy hledání• Možnost zadat "!" Před název zastávky nebo cíle a omezí se našeptávač na první nalezenou položku např. "!Ben" = Benešov A hivatalos pályázati menetrendek INGYEN. Mobil alkalmazások 2016 kategóriában Életmód és UX alkalmazás évben.Főbb jellemzői:• Ide vonat, busz és tömegközlekedési kapcsolatok• Online search = mindig naprakész és hivatalos információkhoz, beleértve a késések és lezárások• Intelligens suttogó megáll és címe, beleértve a beállítás Saját hely• Bejelentés az érkezés, indulás, beleértve a megjelenítését átviteli késleltetés (ha rendelkezésre áll)• Automatikusan felismeri a tömegközlekedési menetrendeket és a legközelebbi busz GPS• Offline böngészés a keresett kapcsolat• Intelligens funkciótárat• A kiválasztás leáll, címek Térkép• Az SMS jegy• angol mutáció• Széleskörű kapcsolat megosztását• kijelzése indulási / érkezési válogatott megálló lehetőségek, hogy kiszűrje konkrét közös• Mentés 6 kapcsolatok közé 6. keresési előzményeket offline adatokat• A keresés akadálymentes kötés, kerékpározás vagy gyerekekkel utazik• Részletes információk a fedélzeten, köztük állványok, műsorszám száma megáll, késések, a jelenlegi helyzetben az ízületek, výlukách, hozzávetőleges viteldíj és fajta vasúti kocsik egy leírást• A kijelző út és helyzete az ízületek a térképen• Kontextus linkeket harmadik fél értékesítési rendszerek foglalás / vásárlás viteldíjak• Kijelző legendák használt piktogramok• Súgó - alkalmazási útmutató• Lehetőség a licenc megvásárlására egyéves működés alkalmazások hirdetései nélkül 49 CZK / év, és örökre CZK 149Keresési beállítások:• Fokozatos egy elnevezésnek és szűkül a választék keresési javaslatok• Belépés az elején a cím• Belépés a kezdetektől a szavak - pl. "P H '= Prága Hradčanská• Adja meg a szöveg a nevét - pl. "UAN" = UAN Ostrava, Brno UAN, UAN Praha• Képesség a célállomás címét vagy nevét a tárgy - például. "Prágai Színház Long" vagy "Prága Ve Smeckach" = találja a legközelebbi megálló ezen a ponton, és a linkeket a otthoni helyzetben keresés• Képesség, hogy belépjen a "!" A név előtt a stop vagy a cél, és csökkenti a suttogás elsőfokú talált tételt.! "Ben" = Benesov

Find the best of Twitter in an instant with Moments. Follow top stories through immersive pics, clips, and conversations. Get insights and perspectives you won't find anywhere else.Twitter is a free app that lets you connect with people, express yourself, and discover more about all the things you love.• Get breaking news. Stay informed with the local and global news that matters to you most, as it happens.• Go behind the scenes at exclusive events like the Oscars, the Emmys, the MTV VMA's and the World Cup.• Express yourself with text, photos, emoji, emoticons, video, GIFs and Vines.• Use hashtags (like #NFL) to find more Tweets about topics you love.• Get closer to people who interest you, including celebrities like Kim Kardashian, Harry Styles and Rihanna.• Share Tweets with apps like Facebook, Whatsapp, Kik, LINE, email and SMS. • Tweet links from sites like YouTube, Pinterest, Instagram, Spotify and Pandora.• Send a private message without limits: now you're no longer limited to 140 characters when writing a Direct Message.• Now it's even easier to share a Tweet privately in a Direct Message. Simply press and hold the Tweet you want to share, then pick the people you want to send it to.Click here to see why Twitter is requesting permission to access features on your device:https://support.twitter.com/groups/54-mobile-apps/topics/223-android/articles/20171517-why-is-the-twitter-app-requesting-permission-to-access-features-on-my-android-device

האפליקצייה החדשה של הארץ מביאה לך את מיטב החדשות, המאמרים וכתבות המגזין של העיתון האיכותי בישראל - בעיצוב מרענן ונוח לשימוש. האפליקציה מאפשרת לקרוא את מיטב הכותבים, לנהל את רשימת קריאה חוצה בין מדורים, לשתף חברים, להגיב למאמרים, לדפדף בין התמונות ולקבל התראות מיידיות. Food you want: We’re working with over a hundred of the best spots in Toronto to put the best local food all in one place. If your favourite restaurants are cooking breakfast, lunch, or dinner, UberEATS is delivering. Speed you need: Order a signature dish from the Instant Delivery menu and eat in 10 minutes or less. Have something specific in mind? We’ll deliver any meal from our roster of local restaurants, faster than anyone else.Service you love: If you have an Uber account, you’re good to go. Just select the food you want–sushi, pizza, tacos–and watch it come right to you. It’s as smooth and reliable as getting a ride. UberEATS is currently available in Toronto, Canada. Aliments que desitgi: Estem treballant amb més d'un centenar dels millors llocs a Toronto per posar la millor menjar local en un sol lloc. Si els seus restaurants favorits són cuinar l'esmorzar, el dinar o el sopar, UberEATS està lliurant.Velocitat que necessita: Sol·licitar un plat al menú de lliurament immediat i menjar en 10 minuts o menys. Si té alguna cosa específic en ment? Anem a lliurar qualsevol menjar de la nostra llista dels restaurants locals, més ràpid que qualsevol altra persona.Servei t'estimo: Si vostè té un compte Uber, ja està bo per anar. Només has de seleccionar els aliments que vostè desitja, sushi, pizza, tacs, i veure que vingui bé a vostè. És tan suau i fiable com aconseguir un passeig.UberEATS està disponible actualment a Toronto, Canadà.

appName: THE NEW GATE(ザ・ニュー・ゲート)
description: アルファポリスの人気ファンタジー小説「THE NEW GATE」がついにスマホゲームに登場！【あらすじ】デスゲームと化したオンラインゲーム「THE NEW GATE」は、「シン」の活躍によりついに解放のときを迎えようとしていた。しかし最後のボスを倒さんとしたその瞬間、 突如未知の光を浴び、500年後のゲーム世界に飛ばされてしまう！そこでシンが見たものとは！？ストーリーはゲームオリジナル。新たな「THE NEW GATE 」がここに始まる！【ゲーム紹介】▼バトルはカンタン操作のリアルタイムバトル技の発動で戦局が大きく変化！タイミングを見極めて勝利を掴め！▼最大５人のマルチプレイ協力バトルは最大５人まで同時プレイ可能。仲間と力を合わせて強敵を倒そう！▼装備で見た目もチェンジ武器、鎧、兜を装備すると見た目も変化！自分だけのお気に入りの組み合わせを見つけよう。▼手に入れた装備は鍛えて、鍛えて、鍛えまくれ。装備は「鍛錬」「昇華」と様々な方法で強化可能！極限まで鍛えて強くなろう。◆最新情報はこちらから◆公式Twitter：https://twitter.com/thenewgate_game公式サイト：http://game.the-new-gate.jp/◆『THE NEW GATE』原作紹介 ◆数万人を巻き込んでデスゲームと化したオンラインゲーム「THE NEW GATE」は、最古参プレイヤー・シンの活躍によりついに解放のときを迎えようとしていた。しかし最後のボスを倒し脱出することができたと思った瞬間、 突如未知の光を浴び、500年後のゲーム世界に飛ばされてしまう！最強プレイヤーの新たなる無双バトル伝説開幕！◆推奨環境◆Android4.0以上+++++++アルファポリスでは、様々な小説、漫画が無料で読み放題！小説・漫画投稿も随時受付中！・アルファポリスPC向けサイトhttp://www.alphapolis.co.jp/・公式Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/alphapolis・公式Twitterhttps://twitter.com/alpha_polis+++++++©Shinogi Kazanami　©AlphaPolis Co., Ltd. Akhirnya muncul di Sumahogemu novel fantasi populer dari alpha Polisi "THE NEW GATE"![Sinopsis]Kematian permainan dan berubah menjadi game online "THE NEW GATE" adalah, akan memasuki ketika akhirnya rilis oleh keberhasilan "tipis". Tapi saat itu tidak dibawa turun bos terakhir, tiba-tiba bermandikan cahaya yang tidak diketahui, akan telah dilewati dalam dunia game setelah 500 tahun! Jadi adalah bahwa Shin melihat! ?Cerita ini game asli.Sebuah baru "THE NEW GATE" dimulai di sini![Permainan pengenalan]▼ Pertempuran real-time Pertempuran pengoperasian yang mudahsituasi perang telah berubah sangat dalam pengenaan trik!Pegang kemenangan menilai waktunya!▼ hingga lima multiplayerPertempuran kerjasama bisa bermain secara bersamaan hingga maksimal lima orang.Menggulingkan musuh yang tangguh untuk memenuhi sesama dan kekuasaan!▼ melihat juga dilengkapi dengan perubahanSenjata, armor, juga terlihat dan dilengkapi dengan perubahan helm!Mencoba untuk menemukan kombinasi favorit Anda sendiri.▼ marah peralatan dimasukkan di tangan, dilatih oleh, duri terlatih.Dilengkapi dengan kemungkinan ditingkatkan dalam berbagai cara sebagai "disiplin", "sublimasi"!Ini akan sangat marah untuk membatasi.◆ paling up-to-date informasi dari sini ◆Official Twitter: https: //twitter.com/thenewgate_gameSitus resmi: http: //game.the-new-gate.jp/◆ "THE NEW GATE" Pengenalan asli ◆Dan game online "THE NEW GATE", yang berubah menjadi permainan Kematian yang melibatkan puluhan ribu orang,Aku hendak masuk ketika akhirnya rilis oleh keberhasilan pemain tertua Singh.Tapi saat itu saya pikir saya bisa lolos mengalahkan bos terakhir,Tiba-tiba bermandikan cahaya tidak diketahui, itu akan telah dilewati dalam dunia game setelah 500 tahun!Sebuah Laskar Baru pertempuran pembukaan legendaris pemain terkuat!◆ direkomendasikan lingkungan ◆Android4.0 atau lebih+++++++Di Kepolisian Alpha, berbagai novel, all-you-can-baca manga gratis!Novel, pasca komik juga diterima setiap saat!situs Alpha Polisi PC-anakhttp://www.alphapolis.co.jp/· Resmi Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/alphapolis· Resmi Twitterhttps://twitter.com/alpha_polis+++++++© Shinogi Kazanami © AlphaPolis Co, Ltd

(Weitere Infos unter: www.postbank.de/privatkunden/pk_mobile_tan_verfahren.html)- Weitere Informationen zum Datenschutz finden Sie im Infobereich des Postbank Finanzassistent oder hier im Google Play Store unter „Datenschutzerklärung“.Sie haben Fragen oder Verbesserungsvorschläge zum Postbank Finanzassistent? Brother iPrint&Scan is a free app that lets you print from and scan to your Android device. Use your local wireless network to connect your Android device to your Brother printer or all-in-one. Some new advanced functions have been added (edit, fax send, fax preview, copy preview, machine status). For a list of supported models, please visit your local Brother website.[Key Features]- Easy to use menu.- Simple steps to print your favorite photos, web pages, emails (Gmail only) and documents (PDF, Word, Excel®, PowerPoint®, Text).- Print your documents and photos directly from the following cloud services: DropboxTM, OneDrive, Evernote®.- Scan directly to your Android device.- Save scanned images to your Android device or email them (PDF, JPEG).- Automatically search for supported devices on a local wireless network.- No computer and no driver required.- The NFC function is supported, this enables you to print or scan by simply holding your mobile device over an NFC mark on your machine and tapping the screen.- The remote print function enables you to print from anywhere. (Your machine needs to support Google Cloud Print to use this function.)*Memory card needed for printing and scanning.*To use the NFC function, both your mobile device and your machine need to support NFC. There are some mobile devices with NFC that cannot work with this function. Please visit our support website (http://solutions.brother.com/) for a list of supported mobile devices.*As the remote print function is based on Google Cloud PrintTM, you must first register your machine in your Google account. For detailed information, please see the Google Cloud Print Guide available on the Brother support website (http://solutions.brother.com/)."[Advanced Functions] (Only available on new models.)"- Edit previewed images using the editing tools (scale, straighten, crop) if necessary.- Send a fax directly from your mobile device.(This app feature requires access to the contacts list on your mobile device.)- View received faxes stored on your machine on your mobile device.- The copy preview function enables you to preview an image and edit it if necessary before copying to avoid copy errors.- View the machine’s status such as ink/toner volume and error messages on your mobile device.*Compatible functions will depend on the selected device.[Compatible Print Settings]- Paper Size -4" x 6" (10 x 15cm)Photo L (3.5" x 5" / 9 x 13 cm)Photo 2L (5" x 7" / 13 x 18 cm)A4LetterLegalA3Ledger- Media Type -Glossy PaperPlain Paper- Copies -Up to 100[Compatible Scan Settings]- Document Size -A4Letter4" x 6" (10 x 15cm)Photo L (3.5" x 5" / 9 x 13 cm)Card (2.4" x 3.5" / 60 x 90 mm)LegalA3Ledger- Scan Type -ColorColor (Fast)Black & White*Compatible settings will depend on the selected device and function.*Google Cloud Print is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.*Evernote is a trademark of Evernote Corporation and used under a license.*Microsoft, Excel, and PowerPoint are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries.*Please note the email address mobile-apps-id@brother.com is for feedback only. Unfortunately we cannot reply to inquiries sent to this address.

Quikr is a local classifieds shopping app that lets you buy, sell rent or find anything online. The app offers a one-stop destination for all your shopping needs, and allows you to buy or sell anything at your convenience.PRODUCT FEATURES-------------------------------- Post an Ad about your product or service in under 60 secs, and watch the buyers’ responses come in.- Add real and unedited photos to get more buyers’ responses on your Ad post.- Chat directly with your buyers without revealing your number.- Share your location, send voice chats and exchange photos at your convenience.- Receive real time information by creating an alert regarding the product you want to buy or sell.- Get a fair price for your sold goods by using the Maximum Selling Price (MSP) calculator.- Stay updated on the products trending in your city and find the best deals near you.CLASSIFIEDS CATEGORIES----------------------------------------Quikr is an online community where people can connect with each other to buy or sell in over 12 categories and 170 sub-categories.- Cars & Bikes: (get detailed Inspection Report on used cars) #QuikrCars- Mobiles & Tablets: Phones for all popular brands, Mobile accessories and Tablets- Electronics & Appliances: Laptops, Home & Kitchen Appliances, TVs, Cameras- Real Estate: Premium Homes, Apartments for Rent & Sell, Commercial properties #QuikrHomes- Jobs: Full-time and Part-time, Freelancers, NGOs, Agencies #QuikrJobs- Home & Lifestyle: Furniture for homes & offices, Clothing, Fashion accessories, Sports equipment- Services: Drivers, Cooks, Maids, Interior Design, Movers & Packers #QuikrServicesPERMISSIONS--------------------In addition to basic permissions, the Quikr App needs access to the following features:- Direct call: For connecting you directly with the sellers - Camera: For allowing you to click pictures while posting an ad - Record Audio: For enabling voice messages over chat- Location: To show relevant and nearby ads ABOUT US---------------India’s No.1 online classifieds platform: Quikr operates from 940 cities across India and is accessed by more than 30 million unique users and 26 million brand new customers per month. Download the Quikr app, and see what your community can do for you today!For feedback/concerns reach out to us at: mobileapps@quikr.com

Descárgate ya la App gratuita FlixBus y reserva tus billetes de autobús económicos directamente con tu smartphone. FlixBus ofrece con sus más de 10.000 conexiones de autobús diarias a lo largo de toda Alemania y Europa la red más extensa de autobuses de largo recorrido. Ampliamos permanentemente nuestra red de autobuses de largo recorrido en toda Europa para ofreceros cada vez más salidas, conexiones más rápidas y nuevos destinos a precios económicos. ¿Qué puedes hacer con nuestra App?✓ Buscar & reservar trayectos de autobús ✓ Mostrar los billetes en el smartphone ✓ Encontrar las paradas ✓ Obtener respuestas a todas las preguntas acerca de FlixBus ✓ Llevarte a la Luna: estamos en ello… ;)Nuestras prestaciones en detalle:★ ReservarEncuentra de forma completamente sencilla con nuestra búsqueda de líneas de autobús la conexión de FlixBus que desees, comprueba disponibilidad y precios actualizados y reserva directamente en nuestra App tus billetes económicos para tus viajes en autobús de largo recorrido. Sin importar si se trata de Berlín, Hamburgo, Múnich, Viena, Ámsterdam, Bruselas, París, Praga, Copenhague, Milán... – ¡allí te llevaremos!★ Mis billetes Puedes acceder de forma móvil a todos los billetes de autobús que hayas comprado. Solo tienes que añadir tu reserva en "Mis billetes" a través del botón "Buscar reserva" e introducir tu número de reserva y dirección de correo electrónico y el billete seleccionado quedará guardado en tu App. Otra opción incluso más sencilla es añadir tus billetes mediante el código QR. Para ello, solo tienes que escanear el código QR de la confirmación de reserva y tendrás acceso al billete en la App (por esta razón necesitamos poder tener acceso a tu cámara).Gracias a la App FlixBus, el papeleo de billetes pasa a ser cosa del pasado, ya que tu billete de autobús puede ser escaneado cómodamente desde tu smartphone cuando subas al autobús. Además, es posible pasar directamente a tu agenda tus viajes en autobús y así llevar un control adecuado de tus trayectos.★ Paradas ¿No tienes ni idea de dónde para el autobús o no sabes cómo llegar a la parada? ¡No hay problema! Accede en "Estaciones" a nuestro localizador de paradas e inmediatamente te será propuesta la parada más cercana. Naturalmente, también puedes buscar cualquiera de las paradas y luego dejarte llevar directamente a nuestro autobús siguiendo las instrucciones del navegador.★ Info/ Preguntas típicas ¿Cuánto equipaje está permitido? ¿Puedo navegar por internet durante el trayecto? ¿Cómo puedo reservar billetes en FlixBus? ¿Cómo canjeo mi vale? No dejes que tus preguntas te hagan perder el control, naturalmente encontrarás todo sobre los viajes de FlixBus también en el menú de información de nuestra App.Evidentemente, ampliamos y mejoramos nuestra App de forma permanente por lo que seguro que te gustarán muchas de las nuevas prestaciones - por ello, lo mejor es que te descargues siempre la última versión. Te deseamos mucha diversión con nuestra App, está claro que FlixBus cuenta con la mejor oferta de viajes.¿Tienes comentarios y sugerencias para ayudarnos a mejorar? ¡Envíalos ahora mismo! Nos alegrará recibir tu correo electrónico en android@flixbus.es Y ahora, basta de bla bla: ¡instala ya la App FlixBus y compra tu billete! Más fácil imposible ;)

TARGOBANK Mobile BankingMit der kostenlosen Banking-App der TARGOBANK haben Sie stets den Überblick über Ihre Konten und können Überweisungen bequem von unterwegs ausführen.TARGOBANK Mobile-Banking – Ihre Banking-App für Ihr mobiles, flexibles Leben.Im Handumdrehen sind sie startklar: Registrieren Sie sich jetzt auch über die Banking-App für das TARGOBANK Online-Banking. Sobald Sie registriert sind einfach mit den Zugangsdaten anmelden und schon steht Ihnen der komplette Funktionsumfang der Banking-App für Ihre Bankgeschäfte zur Verfügung:>> Funktionen exklusiv für TARGOBANK Kunden- Kontoübersicht für alle Konten und Karten- Anzeige von Kontoständen und Kontodetails- Anzeige der Kontoumsätze sowie grafische Darstellung der Salden-Entwicklung- Überblick über aktuelle Kreditkartenzahlungen jeweils bis zur Kreditkartenabrechnung- Interne Umbuchungen zwischen den Konten mit iTAN- Überweisungen auf andere Konten mit iTAN – auch vordatierte Überweisungen möglich- Einrichten, ändern und löschen von Daueraufträgen- Rückgabe von Lastschriften- Depotübersicht- Persönliches Postfach für Nachrichten- Zugriff auf Ihre Bankdokumente- Produkte eröffnen- Termine in einer TARGOBANK Filiale vereinbaren- Ändern von persönlichen Daten (Adressänderung, Kontaktinformationen)>> Funktionen für alle Nutzer- Geldautomatensuche der TARGOBANK, des CashPool und der Crédit Mutuel Gruppe in Frankreich - TARGOBANK Filialsuche – inklusive Öffnungszeiten und Kontaktinformationen- Geografische Suche mit Routenplaner – einschließlich Entfernungsangaben und Kartenansicht- Überblick über wichtige Service- und Notfallrufnummern und direkte Kontaktmöglichkeiten>> Unterstützte KontenDie App ist nur mit Konten der TARGOBANK verwendbar. Folgende TARGOBANK Konten werden unterstützt: Girokonten, Sparkonten, Festgeldkonten, Tagesgeldkonten, Depots, Kreditkartenkonten>> SicherheitDer Zugriff auf Ihre persönlichen Kontoinformationen ist nur mit den Zugangsdaten Ihres Online-Banking möglich. Das Ausführen von Überweisungen und internen Umbuchungen ist nur mit dem iTAN-Verfahren möglich. Das mobile TAN-Verfahren (mTAN) wird nicht unterstützt.Euro-Information und TARGOBANK gehören zur französischen Genossenschaftsbank Crédit Mutuel – eine der größten europäischen Bankengruppen.

"כל-קו" – האפליקציה הרשמית של משרד התחבורה המספקת עבורכם מידע בזמן אמת על התחבורה בישראל.בגרסה זו של האפליקציה, תוכלו לקבל את המידע הבא:א. הצגת תחנות בסביבה שלכם – האפליקציה מאתרת תחנות אוטובוס בסביבה שלכם ומציגה פירוט על הקווים העוברים בתחנה.ב. מידע בזמן אמת של קווים לתחנה – האפליקציה מאפשרת הצגת נתוני זמן אמת של כל מפעילי התחבורה הציבורית.ג. הצגת מסלול הקו ע"ג מפה – כולל אפשרות של בחירת תחנה והצגת זמן אמת עבורה.ד. תחנות הקו – כולל סימון מעברי ערים וזמן הגעה מתוכנן בין תחנות. ה. תדירות קו – הצגת מידע על תדירות הקו בחלוקה לימים בשבוע ובמהלך היום.ו. האפליקציה מאפשרת לכם חיפושים שונים, ע"פ: •מק"ט תחנה-כולל מעבר למסך זמן אמת של התחנה שהוזנה. •קו ועיר – איתור קווים וקבלת המידע על הקו הנדרש. •רחוב ועיר – קבלת מיקום ע"ג מפה והצגת תחנות בסביבה.ז. האפליקציה מאפשרת לכם לשמור מועדפים של תחנה או קו, ע"י בחירתם במסכי תחנות או קווים.ח. קבלת היסטוריית חיפושים. «Все - лінія" - офіційний додаток з департаменту транспорту надає вам інформацію в реальному часі на транспорт в Ізраїлі.У цій версії програми, ви отримаєте наступну інформацію:А. Показати станції у вашому районі - автобус зупиняється додаток знаходить і відображає докладну інформацію про середовище перетину ліній на станції.В. Закрита станція лінії - Додаток дозволяє відображати дані в реальному часі всіх операторів громадського транспорту.C.. Показати маршрут на карті, - у тому числі можливість вибору і представлення станції в режимі реального часу.Середа. Лінійних станцій - в тому числі Симон перерв і прибуття міст заплановані між станціями.. Частота мережі - відображає інформацію про частоту мережі розподілу, а через тиждень протягом дня.І. Додаток дозволяє різних пошуків, у відповідності з:          • Ідентифікатор станції - в тому числі в режимі реального часу за межі станції, введеного.          • Лінійні та міста - розміщення ліній і отримання необхідної інформації на лінії.          • стріт і Сіті - отримання розташування на карті і подивитися довколишніх станцій.М. Додаток дозволяє зберігати улюблені станції або лінії, вибравши екрани станцій або ліній.. Отримання історії пошуку.

appName: 沉睡森林-史上最暖心之作感動千萬人
description: 昔日的勇者們再次集結，無數的快樂與感動，冒險與回憶！一起並肩作戰，穿梭每個光輝的場景，喚醒屬於我們最美好的冒險旅程！◆日系溫暖，舒適溫馨！傳承經典柔和畫風，唯美夢幻的場景，錯落有致的光影表現，營造出賞心悅目的遊戲世界。◇經典傳承，分支轉職！沉睡森林擁有宏大的世界觀，有著無數的冒險故事篇章。三大職業、共達十八種轉職路線，享受豐富的育成系統、多元化勇者培養、獨一無二的成長路線！◆造型百變，寵身相隨！多種裝備，時裝飾品，隨意打扮，展示屬於自己最個性的冒險造型！忠心可愛寵物坐騎伴你左右，與你共同快樂冒險。◇守護榮譽，永遠隊友！騎行作戰、陣營戰、遭遇戰多種核心互動玩法，為共同的榮耀而戰，召集各地志同道合的冒險家一同組建強大的公會，在沉睡森林的世界探索與歷險！官方粉絲團：http://www.facebook.com/mcwytw

Helpchat is a personal assistant app that helps you get more things done.This could be anything - from recharging your phone to tech support, travel booking, holiday guidance, ordering groceries and food at your doorstep, providing shopping assistance, helping you find the best deals & coupons, web check-in and laundry. And, hey all you have to do is send a chat message. On every recharge you get helpchat cash as cashback! Helpchat now offers quick recharge, top-ups, coupons for recharge & entertainment & special recharge ability added. Utilize this helpchat cash to make other transactions on the App.Book Cheapest Cabs: Ola & Uber combined in one App! We have combined leading cab services providers in one screen, now you have the ability to view cabs available on both at one go itself. Select the one that suits you the best & book it right there for Ola. Helpchat would show the nearest and cheapest cabs, Help calculate the Fare, track your cab and also give you the Rate card. Latest News: Stay updated always with your personalized news App! Helpchat offers news feed which provides you the latest news across the globe which can be personalized as per your own preferences. It would also offer you updates on:Daily Weather: Current day temperature & Forecast for the dayPollution Levels: Pollution index of the dayLatest Movies: Updates all the movies releasing soon & Book currently released movies. Also get reminders for movie show timings that you have booked currently. Trending Videos: Check out the latest trending videos.Deal of Day: Get the best deal in your area for the day.Additional Features:DND Option: Activate DND at a single swipe!Train & Flight PNR Status: Stay updated on your PNR status for Train & Flight Tickets.Online Deals: Get the best online deals available in your area. Helpchat (your personal assistant) offers you wide variety of online deals that you can use for shopping, at restaurants, spas & beauty salons. You can buy these deals in App itself and avail discounts. Order Food: Ordering food through multiple apps on regular basis just becomes too hard. Helpchat (Your Personal Assistant) knows your cravings & thus on the same basis suggests the menu & restaurants as well.Travel: Planning a holiday, having hard time booking tickets? Don’t know which OTA to choose from? Let your personal Assistant handle it. We would help you pick the best ticket options & create an itinerary which suits your budget.Entertainment: Wish to know which movies are currently running, their show timings, reviews? Or just want to book tickets for events happening near you? Your Personal Assistant will do it for you. Helpchat updates it users about all the latest movies & events happening nearby and also enables them to book tickets for them.Expert Services: Be it plumber, electrician, beautician or any expert that you require; your personal assistant would arrange it for you. Just place requirement and we would handle the same for you.Helpchat is free to use & response is less than a minute in 90% of the cases. Dan, hey semua harus Anda lakukan adalah mengirim pesan chat. Memanfaatkan kas helpchat ini untuk melakukan transaksi lain di App.Buku Taksi Termurah: Ola & Uber digabungkan dalam satu App! Helpchat akan menunjukkan taksi terdekat dan termurah, Bantuan menghitung Harga tersebut, melacak taksi dan juga memberikan kartu Rate.Berita terbaru: Tetap update selalu dengan berita dipersonalisasi App! Helpchat menawarkan feed berita yang menyediakan berita terbaru di seluruh dunia yang dapat dipersonalisasi sesuai preferensi Anda sendiri. Hal ini juga akan menawarkan update pada:Cuaca harian: Suhu hari sekarang & Forecast untuk hariTingkat polusi: Indeks Polusi hariFilm terbaru: Update semua film merilis film segera & Pesan saat dirilis. Juga mendapatkan pengingat untuk film acara timing bahwa Anda telah memesan saat ini.Trending Video: Check out video trending terbaru.Kesepakatan Hari: Temukan di daerah Anda untuk hari.Fitur tambahan:Pilihan DND: Aktifkan DND di babatan tunggal!Train & Penerbangan PNR Status: Tetap update status PNR Anda untuk kereta & Penerbangan Tiket.Terakhir Online: Dapatkan penawaran secara online terbaik yang tersedia di wilayah Anda. Anda dapat membeli penawaran ini di App itu sendiri dan memanfaatkan diskon.Agar Makanan: Memesan makanan melalui beberapa aplikasi secara rutin hanya menjadi terlalu keras. Atau hanya ingin memesan tiket untuk peristiwa yang terjadi di dekat Anda? Asisten Pribadi akan melakukannya untuk Anda. Helpchat update itu pengguna tentang semua film terbaru & peristiwa yang terjadi di dekatnya dan juga memungkinkan mereka untuk memesan tiket untuk mereka.Layanan Ahli: Jadilah itu tukang ledeng, listrik, kecantikan atau ahli yang Anda butuhkan; asisten pribadi Anda akan mengaturnya untuk Anda. Hanya menempatkan kebutuhan dan kami akan menangani hal yang sama untuk Anda.Helpchat bebas untuk menggunakan & respon kurang dari satu menit dalam 90% kasus.

Say “hello” to friends and family with an instant message, voice or video call on Skype for free. Join the millions of people using Skype today to stay in touch with the people who matter most. There’s so much you can do, right from the palm of your hand. Features:• Find all your friends and family in an instant - With over 250 million people using Skype, you’re bound to bump into someone you know.• Talk with your fingers - No matter where you are, your friends are always at your fingertips with free instant messaging.• Call your world from Skype - Talk to your heart’s content with free voice and video calls to all your friends and family on Skype.• Skype Mojis: Send short clips from your favorite movies and TV shows in a Skype chat.• Low cost calls to mobiles and landlines too - Keep in touch, even if they’re not on Skype, with low cost calls and SMS to mobiles and landlines on the other side of town or the world.• Share your favourite snaps - Got a favourite photo to share? Send it over Skype to friends and family and you won’t have to worry about email size limits or expensive MMS charges.• Chat with anyone, anywhere - Skype’s available on smartphones, tablets, PCs, Macs, and even TVs. Whatever device your friends or family use, Skype just works. Simple.• Video messaging – Record life’s everyday moments and share them with the people who matter most, with free and unlimited video messaging over Skype.* Operator data charges may apply. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or WiFi connection.

Kodi® media center, formerly known as XBMC™ Media Center, is an award-winning free and open source cross-platform software media player and entertainment hub for digital media for HTPCs (Home theater PCs). It uses a 10-foot user interface designed to be a media player for the living-room, using a remote control as the primary input device. Its graphical user interface (GUI) allows the user to easily browse and view videos, photos, podcasts, and music from a harddrive, optical disc, local network, and the internet using only a few buttons.Confluence is the standard skin and is designed to be fast and user friendly. With the skin re-Touched, Kodi® has now been enhanced to better work with larger phones and tablets as well. Kodi is not currently recommended for use with smaller phones. Disclaimer:- Kodi does not supply or include any media or content.- Users must provide their own content or install one of the third party plug-ins- Kodi has no affiliation with any third-part plug-in or add-on provider what so ever.- We do not endorse the streaming of copyright protected material without permission of the copyright holder.- In order to upgrade from a previous version you must have installed an official released version by Team Kodi. Any other version may cause failure to upgrade.License and development:Kodi® is a trademark of the XBMC Foundation. For further details you can visit http://kodi.wiki/view/Official:Trademark_PolicyKodi® is fully Open-Source and released under the GPLv2.0+ license. It includes many third-party libraries which use compatible licenses. Due to the inclusion of some GPLv3.0 libraries the entire application becomes GPLv3.0 as binary.Should you wish to help on future development you can do so by visiting our forum for further questions.Attribution of images or names shown in the used screenshots:“Sintel” is licensed as Creative Commons Attribution 3.0.© copyright Blender Foundation | durian.blender.org

Piano Solo HD will give you tons of fun with your own music. You will enjoy the sounds and the amazing experience of playing this superb multitouch piano simulator with accompaniment chords. Learn to play piano or improve your skill with the demo songs. Play with your fingers in your mobile phone or tablet / pad. Piano Solo HD is free and has fast response, and include perfect sounds recorded with studio quality. Piano Solo HD includes the best piano sounds on Android.Unlike other piano apps, Piano Solo HD includes 2 realistic keyboards. The bottom piano is used for soloing (conventional piano), and the top piano is used as the basis for accompaniments (chords mode): the above part will play a major chord and the lower part a minor chord. You can do the accompaniment of your songs in a simple and intuitive way.Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play it with headset for a superior experience. Piano Solo HD is designed for everyone: children, pianists, musicians, organ players...The main features are:- Tons of demo track songs to learn to play piano.- Several exclusive instruments: Grand Piano, Harpsichord, Clavichord, Organ... More instruments are coming soon.- Thanks to the recorder, you can record your own session and later, you can play on it while playback. Double your experience!. You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record un unlimited number of notes in your loops. Since it is recorded into a similar MIDI format, your sessions will use little storage into your device.- Drag your finger for different keys and play an incredible piano solo- Multitouch polyphonic piano. You can touch up to 20 fingers simultaneously.- Realistic HQ sampled stereo with effect sounds- HD piano images.- Animations for each key- Repeat button in order to play continuously your improvisations.- Low latency- Fast loading time

appName: Loan Tam Gioi: Game S KingSoft
description: Sở hữu công nghệ làm game cực kì tân tiến, KingSoft tiếp tục mang đến cho các tín đồ thể lại game SLG Turnbase – Chiến thuật theo lượt siêu phẩm hành động thần thoại RPG mới mang tên: Loạn Tam Giới. Rất thành công với tựa game huyền thoại: Võ Lâm TK, KingSoft nay muốn đem đến làn gió mới cho cộng đồng game thủ Việt bằng đề tài Phong Thần, nhưng được cách tân hiện đại với các chư tiên sở hữu những món “đồ chơi” công nghệ cao và thiện chiến, bên cạnh những phép thần thông truyền thống. Loạn Tam Giới sở hữu cách chơi Phi hành trên không 3D – 360o toàn cảnh độc đáo: • Các chư tiên có thể tự do phi hành để đi săn đá quý up đồ, farm đồ hoàng kim và truy tìm tứ đại thần thú để thu phục, gameplay độc đáo này lần đầu xuất hiện trên mobile và Loạn Tam Giới là game duy nhất tại VN sở hữu lối chơi độc đáo đó. Điểm đặc sắc Loạn Tam Giới và Kingsoft mang lại:[ TÍNH NĂNG PHI HÀNH TRÊN KHÔNG 360o ] • Thể hiện góc nhìn 3D tự do: farm đồ hoàng kim dễ ợt![ CÔNG NGHỆ LÀM PHIM UNIVERSAL ĐƯỢC ÁP DỤNG ] • Góc nhìn thực tế ảo lạ lẫm - Công nghệ làm phim universal lần đầu tiên xuất hiện trên game mobile.[ CHIẾN BOSS THỜI GIAN THỰC CÙNG 500 AE ] • Tổ đội đánh boss-real-time 5vs5: Chiến boss thời gian thực sát cánh cùng 500 ae với góc nhìn và lối chơi hoàn toàn mới.[ HỆ THỐNG NHÂN VẬT ĐỘC ĐÁO TỪ CỔ CHÍ KIM ] • Hệ Thống nhân vật 46 Chư Tiên - và các cao thủ trong Võ Lâm TK cũng tham gia góp vui.[ NHỮNG TRẬN ĐẤU BANG HỘI SINH TỬ ] • Chiếm thành đoạt đế - Công thành chiến liên server. • Công nghệ chat PiP tân tiến - thoái mái thả thính - ko lo miss bossCùng KingSoft, bước vào thế giới Phong Thần Ngoại Truyện, một cách chân thật nhất.[ Với cốt truyện Phong Thần Ngoại Truyện: Thiên Vực – Nơi ở các vị thần đã bị Thiên Đế - Người bị ma hóa, hậu quả của việc cố gắng tu luyện loại skill mới, chiếm đoạt và âm mưu tiêu diệt tất cả các chư tiên và thành lập trật tự thế giới mới. Save more than 50% on your Shopping! On Shopfully, you’ll find deals at Walmart, Target, Kmart, Sears, Best Buy, Staples, Home Depot, Bed Bath & Beyond and many other big-name stores! Shopfully is the location-based digital platform that showcases the weekly ads and catalogs of top retailers and brands in categories ranging from grocery to electronics, discount, clothing, hardware, home and sports, displaying them to users when they are near store locations.Shopfully is eco-friendly: it helps save trees by transforming paper ads to digital format, making it easy to flip through them when you want and where you want using your smartphone, tablet or computer without harming the environment.Main features of app:- WEEKLY ADS: quickly search and browse all the weekly ads in your neighborhood- DEALS: discover the best deals of the week selected by our staff- MAP: use the built-in map to find the location of any store including address and phone number, then choose your preferred navigation program to get directions with one click- STORE HOURS: decide where to do your shopping on Sundays and holidays thanks to always up-to-date store hours- ALERTS: get notified of the latest sales and price cuts at the stores where you shop- FAVORITES: save your favorite ads and deals so you can easily access them while shoppingTo send us feedback or ask a question, write to info@shopfully.comYou’ll find big name retailers such as Walmart, Target, Kmart, Sears, Best Buy, Staples, Home Depot, Bed Bath & Beyond and many others. Never miss a sale!Saving money with paperless weekly ads and catalogs is a breeze with Shopfully, making it easy to find the best deals and promotions when you shop! Save your favorite ads and catalogs with the tap of a finger and flip through them whenever you want!Save time by using Shopfully to find out which stores in your neighborhood are open 24 hours or late at night, be sure you know the exact price of products you’re interested in before you get to the store, and don’t waste any more time sorting through junk mail!Where should I do my shopping this week? The answer is simple with Shopfully!The app requests access to your exact location using GPS (Global Positioning System) or other network location sources in order to determine your current location and provide the most relevant deals and stores in your area.Alternatively, you can manually set your location from the functions menu.

*** AKTUALIZACJA *** + Marka nowe środowisko open-miasto do zwiedzania + Wszystkie nowe heist i uciec misji + Fresh wybór wypad samochodów wypróbować + Nowe systemy kontroli (kierownica i żyroskop kontroli) Ostatecznym robota ucieczki zawodnik jest tutaj! Jak dobrze można sobie poradzić vs prawem? Twoja podróż w życiu zbrodni właśnie się rozpoczęła.Jesteś kierowcą wypad śmiertelnego głośnej bandy rosyjskich bandytów, że jest przekraczających Amerykę w poszukiwaniu banków. Każdy skok jest starannie zaplanowane i złodziei wyłączyć wszystkie alarmy i normalnie wyjąć strażników przed pomagając się do rejestru. Hakerzy cięcia przewodów, wykonawcy kontroli tłumu, podczas gdy ciężkie maszyny obowiązkiem jest używany do złamania otwartego sejfu banku. Ale Rezerwa Federalna ma Skarbonka, policja jest w pogotowiu i na miejscu podejrzanych na pierwszy rzut oka. Jesteś bandytą, a czasami rzeczy po prostu idzie źle .... bardzo źle!Zabójcy Snajper są w gotowości do współpracy z policją i będzie strzelać, by zabić, ale najlepiej, aby uniknąć otwartej wojny i uciekać. Czy możesz pomóc zabezpieczyć przed kradzieżą i pomóc swoim towarzyszom chuligana w uciekał szybko? Nadszedł czas, aby nagrać asfaltu, pokazać swoje walory i pokonać racer ruchu. Twoim celem jest dotarcie do gangstera kryjówki podwórko położyć nisko na chwilę.To jest, gdy przyjdziesz, w ostateczności, a jedynym sposobem, aby uniknąć niebezpiecznego strzelaniny ze świń. To twój obowiązek plan ucieczki przez zatłoczone środowiska otwartego miasta. Gliny cię gonić w pościg i tylko twoje uspokoić i zaawansowane umiejętności kierowcy mogą zaoszczędzić posse i łupy.JAK GRAĆPolicja jest w życie i mają kilka samochodów patrolowych w ich dyspozycji, aby wyciąć cię i / lub blokadę trasy do wolności. Wściekły policji są bardzo lekkomyślny, agresywna w dążeniu jak to jest ich zadanie, aby zatrzymać cię raz na zawsze! Więc umieścić gaz do dechy i wykreślić swój pas startowy! Sterowanie jest proste i intuicyjne. Wystarczy dotknąć strzałki kierunkowe i przytrzymać przepustnicę do kierowania.POJAZDNa szczęście wybrali swój wypad samochód starannie. To jest twój towarzysz, a ty i twój samochód muszą czuć się jak jeden. Pod względem prędkości, przyspieszenia, obsługi i zwrotnością, ten samochód jest asem! Możesz wybrać pomiędzy helikopterem i-kokpitu / deski rozdzielczej widzenia samochodu. Wypróbuj oba punkty widzenia, aby zobaczyć, który lubisz najbardziej.TAKTYKANie wystarczy po prostu spróbować jazdy trudne, jak można, ale być inteligentnym i upewnij się, że uderzył się co wierzchołek dobrze. Unikaj przeszkód na każdym kosztów, jak policja w domu na ciebie szybko i będzie próbował aresztować przez całkowicie blokuje wyjście.*** Kilka porad na wynos ***- Należy zwrócić uwagę na strzałki i spot w rogach w odległości ocenić prędkość- Przechytrzyć policję i nie denerwuj się, jeśli dotrą do Ciebie- Cheat i szkolić się na skróty poprzez przyspieszenie przez śmieci, ale nie walić do lamp ulicznych, jak będą cię zatrzymać w jednej chwili- Gorączka i podłogi go na prostych, to jest Twoja szansa, aby wygrać cenny czas- Nie zgubić się w tym otwartym mieścieNAJWAŻNIEJSZE CECHY+ NOWY wiele samochodów+ Nowe misje+ Najbardziej zabawne i ekscytujące wyścigi aplikacja mobilna dla tym sezonie+ Weź udział w napadzie na bank notorycznie big przez parkowania jazdy gangster przed bankiem+ W centrum uwagi w dzikim pościgu samochodowego i wykreślić trasę ucieczki uważnie, to jest rozmowa+ Unikaj całkowitą wojnę z policjantów w tym heist sim i pokonać swoich rywali na asfalcie+ Odkręć świnki pogoni za pomocą zagrożeń środowiskowych na swoją korzyść+ Szalone wciągająca akcja kierowca dzięki 2 perspektyw+ Thunder na otwartym mieście z poprzecznych dróg, skrzyżowań i budynków+ Zbudowany z Unity 3D+ Czysty i szczegółowa grafika HD+ Ta darmowa aplikacja nie posiada żadnych zakupów w aplikacji

这是一个独一无二的网络社区：每一天，都有来自全球 813 个城市的数百万用户汇聚在这里，共同讨论生活中的方方面面。这里拥有难以置信的活力，平均每 10 分钟就有一个新的小组被创建，每分钟就有数百篇话题被发表。无论你来自这个世界的哪一个角落，无论你将去向何方，都能在这里找到和你一样特别的人，并与他们互动交流。2005 年至今，这里已经诞生了超过 35 万个兴趣小组，通过豆瓣小组 Android 客户端，你可以轻轻松松找到最活跃的兴趣小组，随时随地参与最火热的话题讨论。- 如果你热爱旅行，「背包客的人文地理」「没钱也旅游」「出国自助游教室」「Lonely Planet」等 3700 多个小组欢迎你来加入；- 如果你热爱摄影，「爱lomo 爱生活」「一二手相机市场」「数码单反DSLR俱乐部」「胶片旁轴同学会」等 2300 多个小组的成员正在火热讨论；- 如果你是网购达人，「淘宝好店」「我爱化妆品」「無印良品 MUJI」「团购完我就喜极而泣了」等 6100 多个小组会让你乐不思蜀；- 如果你喜欢星占，「占星与玛法达」「星译社」「星座情感交流」「XX座运势早知道」「青城塔罗」等 800 多个小组每天发布最新的运势资讯；- 如果你爱文艺生活，「豆瓣食谱」「爱猫俱乐部」「句子迷」「手工DIY教程」等 15500 多个小组涵盖了生活的方方面面。即使你天生没有方向感、即使你有密集恐惧症、即使你一只眼睛单眼皮一只眼睛双眼皮，无论你有什么样的爱好或怪癖，都能在这里找到和你一样的人。App 主要功能：- 浏览最新话题：加入的上百个小组 60 秒内正在讨论什么？尽在一手掌握- 浏览发现小组：搜索、标签查找等多种方式，助你将 35 万多个小组一网打尽- 发表话题：让大家知道你的疑惑，这里会有人帮你解答，有人给你建议- 夜间模式：睡觉前躺在床上追直播贴，妈妈再也不用担心我的眼睛疲劳- 只看楼主：在手机上追直播贴，最贴心的功能- 如果你是小组管理员和楼主，还能通过 App 对话题和回应进行管理 Dit is een unieke online community: Elke dag zijn er miljoenen gebruikers uit 813 steden in de wereld hier bijeen om alle aspecten van het leven te bespreken. Hier heeft ongelooflijke energie, om de 10 minuten is er een nieuwe groep wordt aangemaakt, is er elke minuut honderden onderwerp zijn gepubliceerd. Het maakt niet uit waar je vandaan komt van de ene hoek van de wereld, het maakt niet uit waar je heen gaat, kan hier en vooral mensen zoals jij te vinden, en de interactie met hen.Sinds 2005 is er de geboorte van meer dan 350.000 belangengroepen, via waterkers Android-client groep, kunt u gemakkelijk vinden van de groepen die het meest actieve belangstelling voor deelname aan de heetste onderwerp van discussie overal.- Als u houdt van reizen, "backpackers Aardrijkskunde", "geld kan reizen" "Wandelingen klas buitenland" over 3700 team, "Lonely Planet", etc. U bent van harte welkom om mee te doen;- Als je van fotografie, "liefde lomo liefde leven," "een tweedehands camera markt," lid van de "digitale SLR DSLR Club", "filmafstandsmeter studenten zouden" meer dan 2300 teams zijn hete discussie;- Als u online winkelen van mensen, "goede Taobao winkel" "Ik hou van cosmetica", "Muji Muji" "Ik huilde een complete buy" meer dan 6100 groepen en ga zo maar door zal u terughoudend om te vertrekken;- Als je van astrologie, "astrologie en Ma Fada," "Star Translation Society," "constellatie van emotionele communicatie", "XX Block fortuin vroeg om te weten" meer dan 800 teams, "Qingcheng Tarot" en ga zo maar door-to-date informatie op een dagelijkse fortuin;- Als u houdt van de kunst van het leven, "waterkers recepten" meer dan 15.500 team "Cat Club" "zin fans" "handgemaakte DIY handleiding" enz. die alle aspecten van het leven.Zelfs als je bent geboren met geen gevoel van richting, zelfs als je intense fobie, zelfs als je een oog enkele vouw een oog ooglid, het maakt niet uit wat je hebt hobby's of eigenaardigheden, is hier te vinden en je bent dezelfde persoon.App Kenmerken:- Nieuwe topic: kom honderden teams binnen 60 seconden van wat er wordt besproken? Alles in een hand en greep- Bladeren discovery team te zoeken, etiketten, andere manieren vinden om u te helpen vangen meer dan 350.000 team- Bericht Onderwerp: Laat iedereen weten dat je je afvraagt, hier zal iemand helpen beantwoorden iemand advies geven- Night mode: liggend in bed voor het slapen gaan om live stickers herstellen, mijn moeder niet langer zorgen te maken over vermoeide ogen- Kijk naar de verhuurder: achtervolging live op je mobiele telefoon stickers, de meest intieme mogelijkheden- Als u een teammanager en verhuurder, kunnen worden beheerd via de App van onderwerpen en reacties

Waze is the world's largest community-based traffic and navigation app. Join drivers in your area who share real-time traffic & road info to save time, gas money, and improve daily commuting for all.Just by driving with Waze open, you're already contributing tons of real-time traffic information to your local community. You can also actively report accidents, police traps and other hazards you see on the road. Get road alerts along your route and find the cheapest gas prices around you shared by the community. Plus, you can add friends, send locations or keep others posted on your arrival time.- Live routing based on community driven, real-time traffic & road info- Community reported alerts including accidents, hazards, police traps, road closures, and more- Turn-by-turn voice guided navigation- Live maps, consistently edited and updated by Waze community map editors- Automatic rerouting as conditions change on the road - Send your ETA & real-time drive to update those you’re meeting- Learns your frequent destinations, commuting hours, and preferred routes- Find the cheapest gas station on your route - Add information on local places and businesses- Add Facebook friends and sync Contacts- See friends’ ETA when driving to the same destination- One tap navigation to Facebook & Calendar events- Earn points as you contribute road info and climb the ranks in your community Waze is all about contributing to and benefiting from the common good, so hop on board and get involved! Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Waze will automatically shut down if you run it in the background and haven't driven for a while.Learn more about the Waze privacy policy, including what information is accessed and how it is used. With Waze, you have full control over your privacy settings. http://www.waze.com/legal/privacy/

appName: ガストアプリ お得なクーポンが使える無料アプリ
description: ■□■ファミリーレストラン「ガスト」の公式アプリです■□■会員登録なしで、お得なクーポンや店舗検索・フェア情報などを無料でお楽しみいただけます。今ならダウンロード特典クーポンをもれなくプレゼント！※一部コンテンツは会員限定（無料）です。ぜひ、会員限定のお得なクーポンでお食事をお楽しみください。●主な機能・クーポンアプリ限定のお得なクーポンがいつでも使えます。クーポン情報が更新された場合は、プッシュ通知にて更新のお知らせを予定しております。・アプリ内ポイント店舗チェックインや、Twitterでアプリの紹介をしていただくなどの指定の行為によりポイントを貯められます。貯まったポイントはポイントプログラム限定のクーポンや様々な特典と交換可能になります。・店舗検索GPS機能を利用して現在地からお近くのガストを探したり、キーワード・住所から行きたいガストを探せます。メールやSNSで店舗情報をシェアできるので、待ち合わせ等にも便利です。・メニューハンバーグやグリルなど、カテゴリ毎にガストのメニューをご覧いただけます。カロリー、塩分も表示しておりますので、どうぞご確認ください。・ガストからのお知らせガストアプリからお得な情報をプッシュ通知等にて配信します。キャンペーン情報やお得なクーポン情報など盛りだくさん！プッシュ通知受取の設定も可能ですので、ご利用いただきやすいサービスです。他、様々なサービスを順次公開予定です。どうぞお楽しみに！！※画面の画像はすべてサンプルです。※注意：本アプリはGPSを使用しております。バックグランドでGPSを使用し続けると、バッテリーの寿命が非常に短くなることがございますのでご注意ください。※タブレット端末では、会員限定サービスはご利用いただけません。あらかじめご了承ください。●本アプリご利用にあたって・スマートフォンの位置情報を利用します。・推奨環境Android OSの2.3.3以上の端末が推奨環境となります。●Android版アプリのアクセス許可についてAndroid版アプリをダウンロードいただく際に、お客様の端末より取得する情報が表示されますが、当該情報については以下の利用目的のため、お客様にアクセスの許可を頂いております。▼画像/メディア/ファイルの情報に関してガストアプリの画像やデータはインストール後、お客様の端末に保存され、それらの情報を更新するために必要な情報となります。ガストアプリに関する情報以外は取得しておりません。▼電話/端末IDと通話情報に関してタブレット端末でないことの確認や、プッシュ通知配信時に必要な携帯電話会社名を確認するためにアクセスの許可を頂いております。お客様の通話履歴、通話相手の電話番号等は、ガストアプリでは取得しておりません。

Mit unserer kostenlosen App haben Sie die Consorsbank immer dabei. So haben Sie überall den perfekten Überblick über Ihre Finanzen und die weltweiten Wertpapiermärkte. Und natürlich können Sie auch unterwegs schnell und einfach Geld überweisen oder mit Wertpapieren handeln.•schneller Überblick über Ihr Geld und Ihre Wertpapiere•Watchlists anlegen und interessante Wertpapiere beobachten •mit wenigen Klicks Aktien, Fonds & Co. kaufen und verkaufenEine App – alle Funktionen Alle Ihre Konten auf einen BlickDie App zeigt unter „Konten“ alle Ihre Konten oder Kontoverbünde übersichtlich an. Selbstverständlich können Sie Ihre Umsätze dabei nach verschiedenen Kriterien filtern. Und auch Geld zu überweisen oder einen Dauerauftrag einzurichten, war mobil noch nie so einfach. Schnell den nächsten Geldautomaten findenSie wollen Geld von Ihrem Consorsbank Girokonto abheben? In unserer App zeigen wir Ihnen übersichtlich auf einer Karte, wo Sie den nächsten Geldautomaten finden. Und falls Sie den Weg dorthin nicht kennen, starten Sie einfach direkt aus der Geldautomatensuche den Routenplaner.Mehr als nur ein HaushaltsbuchMit dem Finanzplaner sehen Sie sofort, wieviel Geld Sie eigentlich ausgeben und an welchen Stellen Sie noch sparen können. Sie behalten Ihre Giro-, Tagesgeld- und Verrechnungskonten im Blick und lassen sich Einnahmen und Ausgaben grafisch darstellen.Wertpapiere einfach verwalten und handeln Wenn Sie auf „Depots“ klicken, sehen Sie sofort, wie Ihr Depot sich entwickelt hat, seit Sie es eröffnet haben. Sie haben außerdem zahlreiche Anzeige-Optionen, z.B. ob Sie in der Übersicht zu Ihren Wertpapieren die Kursentwicklung sehen wollen oder nicht. So können Sie sich die Anzeige ganz auf Ihre persönlichen Bedürfnisse zuschneiden. Und natürlich lassen sich auch mit wenigen Klicks Wertpapiere kaufen oder verkaufen.Ob App oder Web: mit Watchlists Wertpapiere beobachtenMit Ihren individuellen Watchlists behalten Sie alle Wertpapiere im Blick, die Sie besonders interessieren. Sie können Ihre Watchlists natürlich mit unserer Website synchronisieren, um sie auch auf all Ihren anderen Geräten nutzen und bearbeiten zu können. Es ist aber auch möglich, sie einfach nur lokal und sicher auf Ihrem Smartphone oder Tablet zu speichern. Wie auch immer Sie die Watchlists speichern: Sie machen es noch ein bisschen leichter, Ihre Anlageentscheidungen zu fällen.Wertpapiere suchen, finden und Details erfahrenKlicken Sie oben rechts auf die Lupe und finden Sie in Sekundenschnelle alle Wertpapiere, die Sie suchen. Sobald Sie drei Zeichen eingetippt haben, liefern wir Ihnen die ersten Ergebnisse. Einfach anklicken – und schon bekommen Sie alle Infos, die Sie benötigen: z.B. aktuelle Charts, Kursdetails, Entwicklung der letzten Jahre, Kennzahlen, Rating, Nachrichten etc.Bei uns haben Sie den MarktüberblickUnser Marktüberblick zeigt Ihnen schnell und klar, wie es den weltweiten Märkten gerade geht. Wie entwickeln sich DAX, Dow Jones oder Nikkei? Wie sieht es beim Euro aus? Welche Aktien oder Rohstoffe sind heute interessant? Und welche Termine könnten in den nächsten Tagen die Märkte bewegen? Das alles und noch viel mehr erfahren Sie mit einem Klick auf „Marktüberblick“.Immer die neuesten NachrichtenWer gut über Wirtschaft und Börse informiert sein will, kommt kaum um die Nachrichten in unserer App herum. Wir bieten Ihnen die aktuellsten News zahlreicher seriöser Quellen, wie Handelsblatt, n-tv, Dow Jones oder Manager Magazin. Ob Texte, Videos oder Podcasts – unsere App hat alles an Bord.Diese App ersetzt die Android App von Cortal Consors.

Cool Zipper Lock Screen is a stylized lock screen application. A funny photo displays on your lock screen while your phone is locked and you can unzip the image to unlock your phone. It comes with cute HD wallpapers and beautiful backgrounds.This app is an easy and simple lock screen but offers extra security to your phone. It also offers an awesome but simple way to unlock your phone by just just zipping the zipper downwards with amazing unzip effect. Pin code lock screen feature is included. You can also enable or disable the lock screen from its settings menu.

Заказ пиццы, суши, бургеров и другой еды стал максимально простым! Мы собрали 4000 ресторанов с удобной системой поиска, рейтингов и отзывов в одном приложении.
