Flud is a simple and beautiful BitTorrent client for Android. The power of BitTorrent protocol is now in the palm of your hands. Share files with ease from your phone/tablet. Download files directly to your phone/tablet.Features :* No speed limits on downloads/uploads* Ability to select which files to download* Ability to specify file/folder priorities* RSS feed support with automatic downloading* Magnet link support* NAT-PMP, DHT, UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) support* µTP (µTorrent Transport Protocol) , PeX (Peer Exchange) support* Ability to download sequentially* Ability to move files while downloading* Supports torrents with large number of files* Supports torrents with very big files (Note: 4GB is the limit for FAT32 formatted SD cards)* Recognizes magnet links from the browser* Encryption support, IP filtering support. Proxy Support for trackers and peers.* Has option to download on WiFi only* Ability to change theme (Light and Dark)* Material design UI* Tablet optimized UIMany more features coming soon...Note: Since Android KitKat (Android 4.4), Google has removed the ability for apps to write to external SD card. This is not a bug in Flud. You can only download in folder Android/data/com.delphicoder.flud/ on your external SD from KitKat onwards. Please note that that folder is deleted when Flud is uninstalled.Help translate Flud in your language so others can enjoy it too! Join the translation project here:http://delphisoftwares.oneskyapp.com/?project-group=2165We're happy to announce that the paid ad-free version of Flud is now available for download. Search for "Flud (Ad free)" in the Play Store.You feedback is very important. Don't hesitate to drop us a mail if you find any bug or you would like to see a new feature in the next version.If you are giving less than 5 stars, please leave a review telling us what you didn't like in the app.

Hanya 4 MB, Browser Ace adalah browser yang kecil, cepat, dan pribadi untuk ponsel dan tablet Android, terbukti memberikan pengalaman browsing internet terbaik. Kemampuannya meningkatkan kecepatan loading hingga 60% membuat Browser Ace aplikasi browser terbaik di Google Play.Sebagai aplikasi yang penuh fungsi bermanfaat, Browser Ace menyediakan sejumlah fitur dan add-ons unggulan, termasuk Pemutar Flash, Mode Cepat, Mode Layar Penuh, Mode Rahasia, Mode Tanpa Gambar, Berita dan Video Trending, dan masih banyak lagi. Fitur Unggulan✔ Browsing cepat✔ Hemat kuota✔ Mode Kilat✔ Mode Layar Penuh✔ Browsing Rahasia✔ Manajer Unduhan✔ Mode Komputer✔ Mode Tanpa Gambar✔ Simpan halaman web untuk browsing offline✔ Variasi konten (berita & video populer)✔ VPN✔ Mesin Pencari yang Hebat✔ Terjemahan✔ Sejarah/Bookmark✔ Mode Malam & ✔ Halaman Beranda Custom✔ Panggilan Cepat (Saran otomatis)Kenali lebih lanjut tentang Browser Ace✔ Browsing CepatDengan mekanisme preloading, browser cepat ini dapat memprediksi kebutuhan browsing Anda dan mempercepat speed loading hingga 60%, memberikan Anda kenyamanan dan kelancaran untuk browsing di ponsel dan tablet Android. Browser ini juga akan lebih cepat dengan mode cepat dan mode tanpa gambar.✔ Hemat kuota/dataBrowser Ace menekan kuota sekecil-kecilnya dan mempercepat navigasi untuk Anda.✔ Browsing RahasiaDengan mode rahasia, Browser Ace dapat mencegah pengguna meninggalkan jejak cookies, cache, dan sejarah browsing. Sangat cocok untuk browsing secara rahasia dan pribadi.✔ Pencari cepat (termasuk pencari dalam halaman) Aplikasi browser ini menyediakan sejumlah mesin pencari raksasa. Temukan hasil pencarian dari Google, Bing, Yahoo, Baidu, Yandex. Yang lebih baik lagi, pencarian dalam halaman membantu Anda menemukan apapun dalam halaman web.✔ Browser multi tab & Mode KomputerBrowser web ini memperbolehkan pengguna untuk mengganti tab dan browsing dengan mode PC & mode ponsel.✔ Simpan halaman untuk dibaca offlineSimpan halaman web dan baca offline untuk menghemat kuota/data.✔ Mode MalamTukar ke mode malam untuk melindungi mata Anda serta membaca lebih nyaman di suasana gelap.✔ Kaya akan konten (berita & video populer) Browser Ace membawakan Anda hal-hal terkini termasuk berita, video trending. Jangan mau ketinggalan zaman!

媲美電腦家機畫面特效，次世代3D手遊《九陰真經3D》掀起視覺革命！國際級研發團隊打造醉美3D大世界，擬真高動態HD畫質。同名經典端遊100%完美移植優化，告別孤單任務關卡，和所有的玩家一起闖蕩江湖，體驗正統MMORPG樂趣！正宗九陰精神續作，今日開創手遊新世代！==遊戲特色==【絕美場景】遊戲採用全新Flexi二代引擎開發，超高解析畫質3D世界，每一幀都是不能錯過的風景，給玩家帶來極致的沉浸式遊戲體驗。【策略戰鬥】告別無腦手指連點，體驗經典實招、虛招、架招戰鬥系統，自由組合6種武學套路，隨心切換戰鬥風格。【絢麗輕功】御風輕功體驗乘風飛翔的颯爽快感！在唯美的湖光山色中自在穿梭。經典戰鬥輕功-穿雲縱、雁行功，享受極限閃躲迅速擊殺的戰鬥節奏。【幫會經營】豐富幫會玩法，透過強化建設提升幫眾戰力。專屬幫會駐地，和成員在遼闊的場景中隨意互動。【華麗造型】華麗造型風物誌，打造個人專屬風格。絢麗特效武器和服飾，不只讓你與眾不同，還可提升角色能力。【豐富玩法】眾多經典玩法全面優化，累積活躍度，領取豐厚武學和裝備獎勵！粉絲專頁：https://www.facebook.com/ai9yin3d 遊戲官網：http://9yin3d.aicombo.com 聯絡信箱：app_tw@aicombo.com建議作業系統4.4以上之版本建議使用4核以上之CPU及1.5G以上之RAM*本軟體依遊戲軟體分際管理法分類為輔15級*本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣物品等付費服務*請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷

Online Taxi is the taxi cab interface for an advanced Taxi Dispatch System. The system allows large numbers of taxi cab drivers to connect to a single dispatch system, providing up to date updates of jobs and other real time information. Using this application, taxi cab drivers are able to quickly and easily manage their workload and improve efficiency.

Приложение реализует функциональность системы «Мобильный банк», а также позволяет просматривать баланс по картам большинства банков (на основе входящих sms-уведомлений).Приложение работает на sms-запросах и бесплатных USSD-запросах (для абонентов Билайн, Мегафон и TELE2). При подключении Мобильного банка по тарифу "Полный пакет" все запросы бесплатные (оплачивается только стоимость sms оператору связи как за обычное sms), по тарифу "Экономный пакет" - запрос баланса - 3 руб., запрос истории - 15 руб., все платежные и остальные запросы - бесплатные.Безопасность работы в системе "Мобильный банк" обеспечивается тем, что все платежи являются предопределёнными (шаблоны платежа должны быть первоначально зарегистрированы) или платёж подтверждается повторным sms (в случае оплаты произвольного номера телефона).Для совершения платежей:1. Вы должны быть подключены к услуге «Мобильный банк» (подключить можно в любом подразделении Банка или через устройство самообслуживания).2. Зарегистрировать платежи через интернет-банк или устройство самообслуживания.При первом запуске:1. Назначьте и установите пароль на вход в приложение. Этот пароль никак не связан паролем от интернет-банка и проверяется при запуске локально! Если пароль на вход в приложение утерян, нужно удалить приложение и заново его установить.2. На основе анализа входящих от банка сообщений в приложение будут добавлены ваши карты. При необходимости отредактируйте их в разделе «Карты->Мои карты» или воспользуйтесь запросом информации о подключенных картах в разделе «Сервис». После добавления карт становятся доступны платежи и сервисные операции по картам.3. Будет просканировано хранилище sms телефона и показан баланс по картам других банков (экспериментальная функция, поддержка других банков не гарантируется).SMS-запросы отправляются на сервисный номер 900 или +79165723900 или +79262000900 (выбирается в Настройках).Платежи состоят из разделов:Новый - для разовых платежей и создания шаблоновШаблоны - для платежей по шаблонамИстория - для просмотра совершённых платежей и создания повторных платежейАвтоплатёж - автоматическое пополнение баланса телефона в рублях при его снижении до установленного порога. В настоящее время доступны автоплатежи в адрес МТС, Билайн, Мегафон, БайкалВестКом, TELE2, Мотив, НСС и Енисейтелеком. Подключение услуги - бесплатно, комиссия за платежи не взимается.БанкоматыПоиск осуществляется по всем городам присутствия Банка, используется локальная база. В городах, для которых отсутствуют подробные карты, все банкоматы на карте представлены центром населённого пункта.Для контроля баланса карты и просмотра курсов валют можно установить виджеты приложения.Для получения курсов валют выберите Ваш регион (для показа курсов валют требуется наличие мобильного интернета).USSD-запрос баланса карт в виджетах - двойной "тап" в верхней строке (на имени карты или поле баланса, в зависимости от типа выбранного виджета). Для запроса баланса через виджет необходимо, чтобы USSD-запросы были включены в настройках основного приложения.Виджет устанавливается долгим касанием на свободном месте рабочего стола экрана телефона. При этом необходимо, чтобы основное приложение было размещено во внутренней памяти телефона (не на внешней SD-карте).Приложение является неофициальным. Все форматы отправляемых в рамках услуги запросов соответствуют Руководству по использованию «Мобильного банка», которое Вы можете найти на сайте Банка.

Displays GPS and sensor data: position and signal strength of satellites, accuracy, speed, acceleration, altitude, bearing, pitch, roll and battery state.Tools included: compass with magnetic and true north, leveling tool, mark or share your location and navigate back later using the Radar. Keep your GPS fast: reset it or download A-GPS data regularly for faster fixes.Visit the FAQ at: http://mobiwia.com/gpsstatusGPS Status is 100% space proof. Try to spot the program in the promo video :)PRO features:- show/store/edit/export multiple waypoints and use them on the Radar for navigation.- pressure, rotation, temperature, humidity values (if supported by the device)- removed adsPermissions- Location: We need this to display your location and allows the program to re-download AGPS data or reset the GPS.- External storage: required by the PRO version to be able to export the stored waypoints to an external file.- Internet: Used by the advertisement component. The PRO version does not use the internet connection at all.KNOWN FIRMWARE ISSUES (please do not report them): - Galaxy S4 on Verizon: Because of a firmware bug, the notification item in GPS Status can't be removed. You need to disable the notification feature in Settings if this annoys you.- Droid 3: The initial Droid 3 firmware does not implement the satellite status API so you will not see the satellites and the signal strength bars. The rest of the features should work properly.- Motorola phones: On some phones, turning your phone to airplane mode will turn off the GPS receiver, too. This is a hardware limitation.- Droid Charge: Reports 0 altitude.- LG Optimus: The phone cannot report the satellite SNR values correctly (all signal bars will be maxed out).- Samsung phones: Because of a firmware bug, they may report extreme battery consumption for GPS Status even if it is not running at all (other programs using sensors are affected too). This is harmless and no power is consumed! Just ignore it and let's hope that a future firmware upgrade will fix this on your phone.- Nexus One/S: With Andoid 2.3 it cannot report NMEA sentences. This means that the DOP/HDOP/VDOP values are not available.-- MobiWIA - a cooperation with Andrs Studio --

NYC Bus & Subway Maps offers something very simple, yet invaluable to both native and tourist alike. Complete offline access to the official MTA Subway and Bus Maps for all five boroughs of New York City. A return to it's original no-frills design, NYC Bus & Subway Maps is an app you can count on working when you need it most. When you first launch the app, you won't have any map's available, but all you have to do is click the "Download Maps Now" button and select as many or as few as you want and download them all at once. No more hoping you remembered to save that BX Bus map when you're already on the train!Features Include:- Multi-Touch pinch-to-zoom where supported, or double-tap to zoom in, tap the zoom-out button to zoom out- Batch download multiple maps in the background- Quick links to the MTA's online route details- Create custom home screen shortcuts to any map or quick-link- Choose where to save you map tiles (defaults to SD Card)

Колкото по-високо ви оценяват пътниците, толкова повече поръчки получавате от системата.Предимства:- повече клиенти – получавате допълнителни поръчки от бизнес-партньорите на Taxistars- интерактивна информация – виждате в реално време положението на клиента и подробностите за поръчката- вече не сте един от тълпата – вашият профил е видим за клиентите и по-високият ви рейтинг автоматично привлича повече поръчки за вас.- виждате всичко на екрана – карта, поръчки, отчети. Лесно и удобно.- намалени разходи – не обикаляте из квартала в търсене на поръчки, а ги получавате директно на таблета в автомобила ви.

Setelah ribuan tahun mengalami kekalahan, kekuatan gelap mulai muncul kembali menghantui Kerajaan Asgard. Dibantu oleh Fallen Angels, Iblis mulai bangkit dari neraka. Sedikit mulai sedikit Iblis menguasai Kerajaan Asgard, dan memaksa Para Dewa menciptakan The Exorcist! Satu-satunya Pahlawan harapan dunia melawan kekuatan Iblis. Apa kau ingin menjadi Hero yang mengalahkan kejahatan?★★★★★ "Dari tampilan animasi yang luar biasa sampai dengan gerakan pertarungan sangat memukau, The Exorcists menjadi pilihan top listku untuk game Action RPG." - AndroidB.com. Pilih Main Character kamu dan dapatkan puluhan Hero yang tersedia, kamu mulai di kota Faith City dimana kamu akan berinteraksi dengan player lain, menjalankan quest atau side missions. Semakin berbahaya suatu misi, semakin banyak yang kau dapat. Latih dirimu naikan level, pelajari skill baru, cari Hero yang kau inginkan, dapatkan gear equipment yang bagus atau berduel di Arena.Dengan 3D Grafik yang menajubkan, efek gambar dan suara yang luar biasa, dan gameplay yang seru!Berikut fitur-fitur dari Game The Exorcists:☑️ Bahasa dan Suara Dubbing Indonesia☑️ 3D Graphics detail semua character, lokasi, dan lingkungan sudah mengunakan High Quality 3D artinya player dimanjakan dengan gambar kualitas HD. The Exorcists mengunakan standart baru dalam grafik mobile game. Jangan khawatir kamu bisa mengubah settingan detail jika kamu mengunakan low device.☑️RPG Gameplay Mempunyai banyak fitur yang menarik, selain bertualang menyelesaikan misi, game ini menyediakan fitur-fitur yang menunjang untuk PvE dan PvP, dan kamu bisa juga membuat komunitas di dalam game, The Exorcists memiliki gameplay yang seru dan tidak membosankan.☑️Dozens of Heroes Memiliki 30 Hero yang bisa dimainkan, kamu bisa memainkan Hero yang seram seperti Corpse King, bisa juga memainkan Hero Winged Devil dengan baju jirah hitamnya, atau Hero yang lucu seperti Clumsy Bear dan kamu bisa kombinasikan komposisi Hero dari STRENGTH, AGILITY atau INTELEGENT! ☑️Upgrades & Level Ups Dapatkan pengalaman bermain, menaikan level, menambah kemampuan skill Hero, dan upgrade equipment. Dengan 270 lebih jenis senjata, 380 lebih jenis armor dan juga ada item sets.☑️Hundreds of Locations Kamu akan menikmati lokasi dan dungeon dengan nuansa yang berbeda dengan hampir 900 map lokasi dan dungeon ditambah juga map Deadly Raids, dari Scary Ghost Cementery ke Undead Swamp, bermain berasa tidak membosankan.☑️Multi-Player Mode Kamu bisa bermain dan berinteraksi dengan player lain, berpartisipasi dalam Guild Wars, mengalahkan Boss yang kuat di World Boss, PVP dengan player-player lain di Big Warfare atau melewati dungeon bersama-sama.☑️Ranking, Bonuses & Achievements Bermain game RPG kamu juga akan dapat bonus hadiah harian, Summon Hero, atau menyelesaikan misi untuk mendapatkan item lebih banyak, dan juga player diajak untuk berkompetisi dengan player lain yang dicatat secara statistic kemampuan player dalam ranking.Kamu akan mempunyai 3 Hero pendamping yang membantumu dalam bertempur dan bertualang melawan para Demons, jika kamu menemukan kesulitan kamu bisa mengunakan menu Helper yang ada di game.The Exorcist akan menjadi Action RPG anda yang baru dan kami disini akan selalu siap untuk membantu. Follow Facebook dan website kami untuk update terbaru, tanya jawab, dan hadiah in game.Minimum Requirement :☑️300MB Free Space☑️Android OS, v4.0☑️CPU Dual-Core 1.5 Ghz or Higher,☑️RAM 1 GbRecommended Requirement :☑️300MB Free Space☑️Android OS, v4.0☑️Quad-core 2.2 GHz or Higher☑️RAM 2 Gb▶️ Website: https://www.maentrus.co.id▶️ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/the.exorcists.indonesia/Kita sangat senang apabila kamu sekalian bisa turut membantu perkembangan game ini dengan mensupport dan memberikan review agar game ini selalu menjadi BEST 3D ACTION RPG!

Cadeau exclusif Google Play pour célébrer le lancement mondial, disponible pour une durée limitée !Construisez une ferme sur une île paradisiaque !Évadez-vous vers une île de rêve remplie d’aventures, de mystère et de mini-jeux sympas, en jouant à ce jeu gratuit coloré conçu par les créateurs de FarmVille, la franchise numéro un en matière de jeux de simulation de ferme !Construisez votre propre hôtel au bord de la plage et, sur cette même île, construisez également des ateliers, faites pousser des plantes tropicales et élevez des animaux exotiques. Agrandissez votre ferme en cultivant des ananas, des noix de coco et des mangues afin de régaler vos hôtes. Réalisez de délicieuses recettes telles que des piña coladas et du poisson grillé, et confectionnez des objets rares tels que des colliers de fleurs.L’aventure se déroule sur l’ensemble de l’île ! Attrapez des poissons avec Capri le dauphin, explorez l’île avec les singes espiègles, et bien plus ! Les quêtes scénarisées vous permettront d’explorer des terres vierges, d’en apprendre un peu plus sur l’île et de trouver des objets et des biens rares.Caractéristiques de « FarmVille : Tropic Escape » :PARTEZ SOUS LES TROPIQUES- Faites tourner un hôtel situé en bord de mer et commencez une nouvelle vie dans un cadre paradisiaque- Découvrez toutes les plantes tropicales et tous les animaux exotiques qui peuplent votre île- Créez une île de rêve regorgeant de fruits et légumes uniques, de boissons sensationnelles et d’animaux adorables- Jouez à des mini-jeux et amusez-vous avec les nouveaux personnages tels que Capri le dauphin et Aayla le singeDÉCOUVREZ LES SECRETS ET LES TRÉSORS DE L’ÎLE- Accomplissez des quêtes scénarisées en compagnie des guides de l’île tels que l’archéologue et le surfeur expert. - Explorez le volcan bouillonnant et l’ancien temple des singes- Découvrez des trésors cachés et des biens rares dans la ville engloutie- Explorez les zones vierges de l’île afin de découvrir encore plus de secretsCONSTRUISEZ DES INFRASTRUCTURES POUR VOS HÔTES- Réparez les ateliers de l’île et créez votre petit paradis rien qu’à vous- Achetez un « tiki bar », un comptoir à sushis, un atelier artisanal et bien plus- Développez votre hôtel et embauchez des guides afin que vos hôtes profitent au mieux de l’îleFAITES DU COMMERCE AVEC LES AUTRES ÎLES- Faites du commerce avec les autres joueurs grâce au navire de commerce- Vous n’avez plus d’œufs ? Achetez les biens dont vous avez besoin aux habitants des îles voisines- Vous avez trop d’ananas ? Fixez votre prix et vendez vos surplus de récoltes et d’objets artisanaux- Plus vous aurez de pièces, plus vous pourrez faire de choses sur l’îleÉvadez-vous vers ce monde scintillant où le soleil, l’aventure et le plaisir règnent en maître, en jouant à « FarmVille : Tropic Escape » !Téléchargez ce jeu dès aujourd’hui et commencez à aménager votre île paradisiaque !

Avec l’application gratuite ARTE, vous pouvez regarder ARTE en direct live ou revoir la quasi-totalité des programmes TV de la chaîne en streaming, gratuitement et sans publicité, avec la possibilité de choisir entre toutes les versions diffusées (version originale sous-titrée, version française, version allemande, et sous-titrage pour sourds et malentendants), directement dans le lecteur vidéo.ARTE+7 vous offre la possibilité de revoir les programmes que vous avez manqués pendant les sept jours qui suivent leur diffusion à l'antenne. L'application permet de retrouver facilement les vidéos de votre choix en les triant par dates, par émissions ou par genres. La rubrique « Programmes » présente les émissions de la semaine à venir, ainsi que des sept jours passés. Vous y trouverez les informations essentielles sur chaque programme et trouverez des photos, un choix d’extraits et de bandes annonces.Au menu : du cinéma, des films, des séries, des infos avec le journal télévisé, des documentaires d’investigation sur des thèmes d’actualité comme l’environnement, la politique, l’Europe, la médecine, l’histoire, l’économie, la société ou l’art, mais aussi de la musique avec des concerts pop, rock ou classiques. Vous trouverez également des magazines d’information, des documentaires historiques, des reportages culturels ainsi que des programmes jeunesse … depuis votre mobile.Parmi les programmes à venir ou les vidéos à consulter dans les sept jours, retrouvez vos émissions de télé préférées en créant et gérant votre propre liste de favoris et vos abonnements dans « Mon ARTE ». Inscrivez directement dans votre agenda les programmes à ne pas manquer ou ajouter les à vos favoris pour recevoir des rappels par notifications « push ».Et pour en avoir toujours plus, retrouvez nos autres offres ARTE Future, ARTE Creative, ARTE Concert dans la rubrique « Plus d’ARTE ».Pour des raisons juridiques, nos vidéos sont géolocalisées. Quelques-unes ne sont accessibles qu’en France et en Allemagne. En dehors de ces deux pays, l’accès aux contenus de « ARTE + 7 » est limité. L’application ne montre que les vidéos auxquelles vous avez accès selon le lieu où vous vous trouvez.Regarder ARTE en direct n’est possible que depuis la France et l’Allemagne. Certains programmes en direct ou en replay peuvent être indisponibles en fonction de votre localisation.Informations sur les autorisations dans l’appli ARTE :- Communication du réseau : L’appli ARTE montre des contenus et des vidéos d’ARTE- Réglages de la synchronisation : La synchronisation des données peut être modifiée dans les paramètres de l’appareil ou directement dans l’appli. Pour cela, un compte ARTE est enregistré sur votre Android. Aucune donnée personnelle ou anonyme n’est transmise à ARTE.- Stockage : Outils système (test accès à mémoire protégée)- Les images de chaque programme sont sauvegardées sur la mémoire tampon.- Effet sur l’utilisation de la batterie (désactiver la mise en veille) : Pendant le visionnage de la vidéo, le verrouillage de l’écran est désactivé.N’hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous avez des questions.Votre équipe ARTE (www.arte.tv) | App Support (http://www.arte.tv/zuschauerdienst) | Marketing URL (http://arte.tv/apps)

Product DescriptionShop for the millions of digital and physical products in Amazon’s catalogue and manage your orders from anywhere. The Amazon App for Android phone combines the fast and easy mobile shopping experience customers have come to know and love with access to unlimited streaming of thousands of movies and TV episodes from Prime Instant Video. After installing this version of the Amazon App for Android, customers wishing to stream Prime Instant Video movies and TV episodes can install the Prime Instant Video player, which is delivered exclusively via the Amazon Appstore. To start streaming movies and TV episodes, just search for your favourite video and tap play; the Amazon App will guide you through the setup process. • UK customers can now use a single app to discover and shop for hundreds of millions of physical and digital items.• Prime members in the UK can stream unlimited Prime Instant Video from inside the Amazon App using the Prime Instant Video player, including exclusive hit TV shows such as Extant, Vikings, Black Sails and the Amazon Original series Alpha House and exclusive movies including Red 2 and Horrible Bosses• Customers can shop any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app• Quickly search, get product details, and read reviews on millions of products sold by Amazon and other merchants• Take advantage of 1-Click ordering, order tracking, delivery information, customer support, Wish Lists, and Push Notifications• Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode or typing your search• Buy with confidence, knowing that all transactions are securely processedImportant Note Regarding PermissionsPlease note that the Amazon App requires access to the following services to operate properly:* Camera: The camera is used to scan barcodes and for Flow, a new way to search for multiple items quickly.* Location: Location permissions are required to support the convenience store delivery service offered by Amazon in France and Japan. Customers in those locations can request delivery to a convenience store near their current location. This service is not available in other countries supported by the Amazon app.* Account: Account permissions are used for integration with Facebook and other social networks you have connected to your device to allow you to share products with friends and family.* Phone status & local storage permissions are required to support notifications in China. Data on phone status and local storage is used only in China.OS Requirements: Requires Android OS 2.3 or higher and a rear-facing camera.The Amazon App for Tablets is available on Google Play. Search for "Amazon Tablet" to install the app and begin shopping.

The Oral-B App is your personal brushing assistant to help you to achieve great oral health!Brush smarter not harder…the Oral-B App makes your bushing smarter. The Oral-B app is designed to work with the Oral-B Bluetooth®-enabled electric toothbrushes, to help you perfect your teeth brushing, and achieve a great beautiful smile. The Oral-B App together with the Oral-B Bluetooth®-enabled electric toothbrushes help drive oral care compliance, which determines a large part of the success of dental appointments. Improve your oral care routine with real time feedback and brushing guidance, get alerted when you press too hard, define custom programs and focused care areas to address your specific oral care needs, and track your progress over time via the statistics. With the Oral-B App, the average brushing session duration is 2 minutes and 24 seconds1. Given that most people brush less than 60 seconds2, this is a significant improvement in brushing routines.ORAL-B TECHNOLOGY✓ Bluetooth® ConnectivityThe Oral-B app running on a Bluetooth® 4.0 compatible device connects to an Oral-B Bluetooth® enabled electric toothbrush. Once paired, the Bluetooth® connectivity provides features that strengthen your teeth brushing performance, control, and compliance, including personalized routines tailored to your oral care needs, dental professional care engagement, and achievement trophies for good compliance!✓ Sound RecognitionIn addition, the Oral-B app uses the microphone in your smartphone to detect the sound of any Oral-B electric toothbrushes*, allowing you to use the app without a Bluetooth® connection.*except Oral-B Pulsonic electric toothbrushFEATURES✓ Brushing TimerChoose a timer visualization, and we’ll help pace you to brush your whole mouth evenly for the dentist recommended 2 minutes.✓ Dental Professional Guidance Work with your dentist to create a customized brushing routine that highlights areas where you can improve. In addition to programming extra brushing time for specific zones, you can see your dentist's personalized oral care guidance while you brush.✓ Dental Care JourneysChallenge yourself to a personalized Dental Care Journey focused on one of several common oral care goals. Through the Dental Care Journeys, you will experience apersonalized brushing routine for a designated period of time based on your goal. Each personalized Dental Care Journey is tailor-made to help users’ mouths achieveIts goals, such as whiter teeth for an upcoming wedding or cleaner braces.✓ Brushing Activity and AchievementsKeep track of your daily brushing achievements and review your routine with a weekly or monthly summary while you improve your oral care. If you like strolling around flea markets and car boot sales on weekends or spending hours browsing through classifieds, you will love Shpock. Whether second hand, used, antique, vintage or simply beautiful, Shpock is always there as the SHop in your POCKet.Shpock is a 24/7 market, full of pictures of the most beautiful classifieds around you. It is the second hand shop on your smartphone and makes buying and selling extremely simple and fun. WHY USE SHPOCK: ☆ A BOOT SALE FULL OF TREASURES: start Shpock and immediately discover beautiful things from friends and neighbors around you - sorted by distance or one of your favorite second hand categories (Fashion and Accessories; Home and Garden; Electronics; Movies, Books and Music; Baby and Child; Sport, Leisure and Games; Cars and Motors)☆ POST YOUR OFFER IN LESS THAN 30 SECONDS: take a photo, add a title, description and price, and instantly everyone around you will find your local treasure.☆ IT’S FREE, NO FEES ATTACHED: sell and buy for free, no listing fees, no transaction fees. Add or take a nice picture in seconds and let Shpock do the rest. ☆ SPREAD THE BEAUTY: Share your offers or great items from others easily with Facebook, Twitter, SMS and email. Your friends (and their friends) are surely looking for beautiful things. ☆ EASY REGISTRATION: A few simple taps on the screen and you are registered via Facebook or E-mail. Why Facebook? Because we believe that it helps to stop annoying spammers and scammers. This is also the reason why we ask for a SMS-confirmation if you register via e-mail. Your data will not be shared with third parties.☆ YOUR PRIVACY IS SACRED: - We only ask for data we really need for a great experience. - We never share anything without your consent. - Item locations are always offset from their real location. - Still not sure? Contact us at support@shpock.com Shpock is a young flea market, boot sale and classifieds app - name it however you like. We look forward to your feedback and your questions, comments, requests at support@shpock.com via email or @shpock via twitter. Or even faster at http://shpock.com/en/feedbackPS: If you were wondering - there is no connection at all with the famous guy from planet Vulcan. Shpock is simply the "SHop in your POCKet".“Booting from the sofa… What better way to sell than from the sofa after a hard days work”by Paul Cavanagh ★★★★★“Awesome. Great app, bargains galore, easy to use and best of all free unlike (…)!!!”by Adam Johnson ★★★★★

Mit der aktuellen Version der ZDF-App treten sie in Kontakt mit dem ZDF-Programm: Durch neue Second-Screen-Funktionen bekommen Sie die Möglichkeit, zeitgleich zur Ausstrahlung im TV Zusatzinformationen zu nutzen und mit dem Programm zu interagieren. Das ZDF begleitet unter anderem die Champions League, das „NEO MAGAZIN ROYALE“, das Verbrauchermagazin „WISO“ und den Polittalk „maybrit illner“ mit einem Second Screen-Angebot.Natürlich können Sie die ZDF-App auch weiterhin wie gewohnt nutzen. Die App bietet Ihnen den bequemen Zugriff auf die ZDF-Livestreams und jetzt auch auf das Live-Programm von 3sat und arte. Sie haben die aktuelle Ausgabe der heute show, des heute journals oder den letzten „Herzkino“-Film verpasst? In der ZDF-App finden Sie das komplette Angebot der ZDFmediathek.Praktisch ist auch die Abonnement-Funktion: Unter „Sendungen A-Z“ können Sie Ihre Lieblingssendungen abonnieren. So bekommen Sie automatisch eine Nachricht, wenn die neueste Ausgabe Ihrer abonnierten Sendung in der Mediathek verfügbar ist.

【HAPPY MAIL APP介紹】這是擁有16年歷史，配對成效頗受好評，被暱稱為「HAPPY咩」的交友網站ハッピーメール所推出的官方APP。獻給尋愛中的你！這是一款不費時，能輕鬆享受交友樂趣的社群APP。提供對話形式的訊息交流服務，還有時下流行的多樣化貼圖。為正在尋找戀人、朋友、結婚對象的你，提供各種解逅的機會。因會員人數眾多，可從會員照片、個人檔案及留言板，找到投緣的對象。◆可使用Facebook帳號可使用Facebook帳號登入使用HAPPY MAIL APP 註冊步驟也很簡單，註冊後可立即啟用。使用Facebook帳號註冊時，使用者姓名會轉為英文字母縮寫，可安心使用。此外還能隨時變更使用者名稱※不論使用者在HAPPY MAIL有任何動作都不會反映在Facebook塗鴉牆上，請安心使用。已婚・未滿18歲者不得使用。◆完備的客服機制如發現不當圖片或不當貼文將即刻刪除，或發送注意警告。此外，也會迅速回覆使用者之提問，為使用者提供安心的交友服務。◆個人檔案照片搜尋功能這是HAPPY MAIL的熱門項目可顯示已使用照片註冊的使用者表單，提供瀏覽該使用者個人檔案與發送訊息的功能。重視第一印象的使用者不妨試試這項功能。◆「我的菜」功能使用「我的菜」功能可以對有設定個人檔案照片的對象表示好感。若自己有設定個人檔案照片，也可接受異性的示好。當覺得用訊息很難開啟對話時，推薦您使用此功能向對方間接表示好感。◆留言板功能HAPPY MAIL準備了符合使用者目的的留言板。讓使用者能從留言板發送訊息給心儀對象，也能張貼文章，等待其他使用者所發送的訊息，尋找情投意合的伴侶。歡迎使用留言板來尋覓意中人或朋友喔。◆免費下載HAPPY MAIL 是免費下載的交友APP。◆免費註冊不論男女都能免費註冊成為會員。※HAPPY MAIL內所有內容都能提供女性使用者免費使用，讓女性使用者有一個主動積極交友的天地。不論是想要戀愛、或純粹交朋友，都歡迎您充分利用。■關於點數男性使用者利用部分內容需購買點數，如點閱留言板需用1P，發送訊息使用5P。女性使用者與男性使用者交流，則一律免費。HAPPY MAIL會員退會時，其持有點數概不予退還。■【HAPPY MAIL會員數遍布各地，並持續成長中】HAPPY MAIL比其他交友型APP更重視宣傳活動。因為多種宣傳活動的效果，已發展成為廣受各方男女歡迎，每天都能有許多新增會員的優質交友應用程式。■安全機制有回應使用者需求的客服與巡察監視服務。以滴水不漏的安全機制，落實資訊管理，提供讓使用者安心的交友服務。

(책갈피도 PC웹 모바일웹과 동시에 저장됩니다.)3. 인기 랭킹 TOP 100 제공전날 작품을 감상한 독자 수를 바탕으로 인기 작품 랭킹을 제공합니다. 매일 변하는 랭킹을 앱을 통해 확인하세요!(웹툰리그 랭킹은 정식 웹툰 승급 기준에 근거하여 일반 웹툰과 다른 랭킹 지수가 적용됩니다.)4. 완결작품 솎아보기 어떤 작품을 봐야 할지 모르시겠다고요? 연재 작품 말고 완결된 작품만 감상하고 싶으시다고요? 이런 독자분들을 위해 만화속세상의 모든 완결 작품을 평점순, 추천순, 최신순으로 정렬하여 골라보실 수 있도록 하였습니다. 독자들의 평점, 추천을 통해 검증된 작품들을 즐겨보세요!(장르별 작품 탐색은 만화 내부 검색에서 지원합니다. 우측 상단 검색 아이콘을 눌러 이용해보세요.)5. 댓글로 보는 추천 작품 '베플'오늘의 화제의 댓글은? 매일 들어와서 확인하고 싶은 독자 베스트 댓글을 한 번에 보실 수 있습니다. 독자가 쓴 베스트 댓글 중 추천 지수를 설정하여 100개 단위로 제공이 됩니다. 6. 보던 컷의 위치까지 기억하는 스마트한 저장 기능!최근 감상하신 작품은 MY 서랍에 실시간으로 저장이 됩니다. 단순한 회차 저장에서 '보던 컷의 위치까지 기억'해 주는 기능을 제공해, 지하철에서 급작스럽게 내려야 할 때나 휴대폰을 잠시 슬립모드로 전환하실 때라도 동일한 회차 접속 시 보던 컷 부터 감상을 지속할 수 있습니다. 7. 마니아를 위한 정주행 기능웹툰 마니아, 바로 당신을 위한 특별한 뷰어의 숨은 기능, 정주행! 뷰어의 상단 바에 위치한 정주행(달리기) 아이콘을 선택하시면, 선택한 회차부터 마지막화까지 하나의 뷰어 안에서 연이어 감상이 가능합니다.8. 혼자 보기 아까운 웹툰 에피소드, 명장면을 친구에게 공유해보세요 웹툰을 감명 깊게 보셨다면 에피소드 단위로 공유해보세요. 회차 단위 및 작품 단위로 공유 기능을 지원합니다. 그밖에 웹툰에서 본 웃기는‘짤방’이나 명장면을 친구에게 공유하거나 SNS로 보내보세요. 컷 공유 기능 사용 시 단말기의 갤러리에 자동으로 저장됩니다.----개발자 연락처 :1577-3321제주특별자치도 제주시 첨단로 242 (주)카카오

Orbot is a free proxy app that empowers other apps to use the internet more securely. Orbot uses Tor to encrypt your Internet traffic and then hides it by bouncing through a series of computers around the world. Tor is free software and an open network that helps you defend against a form of network surveillance that threatens personal freedom and privacy, confidential business activities and relationships, and state security known as traffic analysis.Orbot is the only app that creates a truly private internet connection. As the New York Times writes, “when a communication arrives from Tor, you can never know where or whom it’s from.” Tor won the 2012 Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) Pioneer Award.★ ACCEPT NO SUBSTITUTES: Orbot is the safest way to use the Internet on Android. Period. Orbot bounces your encrypted traffic several times through computers around the world, instead of connecting you directly like VPNs and proxies. This process takes a little longer, but the strongest privacy and identity protection available is worth the wait.★ PRIVATE WEB SURFING: Use with Orweb, the most anonymous way to access any website, even if it’s normally blocked, monitored, or on the hidden web. Get Orweb: https://goo.gl/s3mLa★ PRIVATE CHAT MESSAGING: Use Gibberbot with Orbot to chat confidentially with anyone, anywhere for free. Get Gibberbot: https://goo.gl/O3FfS★ PRIVACY FOR APPS: Any installed app can use Tor if it has a proxy feature, using the settings found here: https://goo.gl/2OA1y Use Orbot with Twitter, or try private web searching with DuckDuckGo: https://goo.gl/lgh1p★ PRIVACY FOR EVERYONE: Tor can help you confidentially research a competitor, get around the Facebook block at school, or circumvent a firewall to watch sports at work.★ PRIVACY MADE EASY: Check out our fun, interactive walkthrough: https://guardianproject.info/howto/browsefreely★ IT’S OFFICIAL: This is the official version of the Tor onion routing service for Android.***Expert Root Mode***★ UNIVERSAL MODE: Orbot can be configured to transparently proxy all of your Internet traffic through Tor. You can also choose which specific apps you want to use through Tor.***We Love Feedback***★ ABOUT US: Guardian Project is a group of developers that make secure mobile apps and open-source code for a better tomorrow.★ OUR WEBSITE: https://GuardianProject.info★ ON TWITTER: https://twitter.com/guardianproject★ OPEN-SOURCE: Orbot is free software. Take a look at our source code, or join the community to make it better: https://gitweb.torproject.org/orbot.git★ ABOUT TOR: https://TorProject.org★ MESSAGE US: Are we missing your favorite feature? Found an annoying bug? We’d love to hear from you! Send us an email: root@guardianproject.info★ HELP US BRING ORBOT TO YOUR COUNTRY: We’re trying to get Orbot into as many languages as possible. Right now it’s in: Arabic (العربية), Basque (Euskara), Bulgarian (български език), Chinese (中文简体), Czech (Čeština), Danish (Dansk), Dutch (Nederlands), English, Farsi (فارسی), French (Français), French (Français), German (Deutsch), Greek (Ελληνικά), Hebrew (עברית), Hungarian (Magyar Nyelv), Italian (Italiano), Japanese (日本語) Korean (조선말), Latvian (Latviešu), Malaysian (بهاس ملايو ), Polish (Polski), Portuguese (Português), Russian (Русский), Spanish (Español), Swedish (Svensk), and Vietnamese (Tiếng Việt). If Orbot isn’t in your language yet, we’d love to have you join our translation team: https://goo.gl/6hni4***Disclaimer***The Guardian Project makes apps that are designed to protect your security and anonymity. The protocols that we use are widely regarded as the state of the art in security technology. While we are constantly upgrading our software to combat the latest threats and eliminate bugs, no technology is 100% foolproof. For maximum security and anonymity users must utilize best practices to keep themselves safe. You can find a good introductory guide to these topics at https://securityinabox.org

Google Photos is the home for all your photos and videos. Automatically organized and searchable, you can find photos fast and bring them to life. Access them on any device or on the web at photos.google.com. Music Folder Player was made for people who don't like to see music displayed based on artist, album, track or playlists. If you prefer organizing your audio tracks in folder this may be the right player for you.Besides that it comes with a lot of unique features.• Material Design• Resume where you left. Stores for each folder where you left• Show folders as a 'flat' list if you have a small collection• Alternatively show folder hierarchy like in a file manager for larger collections• Four configurable seek buttons. Very useful for seeking in podcasts or audio books• Equalizer (Android 2.3 and newer): - 4 customizable settings - 8 predefined settings like Bass Booster, Vocal Booster and Party setting• Virtual room and reverb effect (Android 2.3)• Speed control with pitch correction (Android 4.2+) Increase or decrease the playback speed of your podcasts or audio books. Not suitable for music. Please watch the video: http://youtu.be/d_0eWUXs6Yo• Pre-amplifyer: Increase the volume of audio which was recorded with a low level. (Android 4.2+)• 432 Hz playback mode. Please read this article for details: http://goo.gl/Oeg5hh (Android 4.2+)• Car/Sports mode with big buttons• Change volume and balance with two finger gesture. Youtube video: http://goo.gl/9LXsIE• Undo function: Undo actions if you accidentally touch a button or select another track• Shuffle and repeat options (long tap on play/pause button)• Delete and rename files (long tap on file)• Sleep timer• Headset button control (double and triple clicks)• Lyrics via musiXmatch app• Last.fm scrobbling via 'Simple Last.fm Scrobbler' app• Search for files and folder• Share filesNote: Since there are recently some complaints in the review section:This app is an audio PLAYER, not a DOWNLOADER. If you search for an app to download new music, this app is NOT suitable for you. This player just handles audio files which are already on your device.Don't worry about 'adware' warnings of some antivirus scanners. Of course the player is not a virus. This is just because the player shows advertisements. The full version is not affected by that.Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ZorillasoftPermissions: Please take a look at the F.A.Q section on my homepage:http://goo.gl/gH7bme

Save time managing your health care. The UnitedHealthcare Health4Me mobile application is designed to help you find the answers you need. Whether you want to find physicians or pharmacies near you, check the status of a claim, manage prescriptions or estimate your health care costs, Health4Me is your go-to resource for everything related to your health and is designed to be:• Mobile. It goes where you go. Use the location search feature to find a physician, pharmacy or facility near you. Whether you need a specialist or general practitioner, the largest selection of network doctors is at your command.• Personal. From emailing your health plan ID card information to checking on medical spending accounts, Health4Me is the resource that is designed to work for you. And you can rest assured that your information is absolutely confidential. • Simplified. myHealthcare Cost Estimator can make your health options easier by comparing procedure, provider, price and place.• Secure. Keeping your health information private is paramount to us. You can rest assured that your information is absolutely confidential. Who can use Health4Me? Everyone. You don’t need to have a UnitedHealthcare plan to benefit from features such as finding the average cost for hundreds of medical services and procedures in your area.If you have a UnitedHealthcare plan, you can get even more from Health4Me. Features may vary depending upon your employer’s health plan:- Register for myuhc.com to enable both mobile and online services- Search for Physicians, Pharmacies or Facilities by location or specialty- Locate Urgent Care facilities and ERs nearest your location- Estimate your health care and drug costs- Use EasyConnect to let us know you want to talk about something and we’ll call you back- View and share member ID Card - Contact an experienced registered nurse 24/7 for health information- Check status of deductible and out-of-pocket spending- View Medical and Prescription Claims - Check status of refills, renewals and Refill your prescriptions- Review order status for home delivery medication- Compare medication prices and find lower-cost options- Check your Health Reimbursement, Flexible Spending and Optum Bank Health Savings Account balances

Mit der EVENTIM-App für Android bietet Ihnen Europas Marktführer Zugriff auf über 200.000 Events jährlich und einen einzigartigen Service & Funktionsumfang: Kaufen Sie mobil Original-Tickets zum Original-Preis, entdecken Sie neue Künstler, nutzen Sie die vielen Informationen und Vorteile rund um Ihren nächsten Veranstaltungsbesuch.Die EVENTIM-App bietet:• Saalplanbuchung: Mit dem Saalplan finden Sie ganz bequem Ihren Wunsch-Sitzplatz. Geben Sie einfach an, wie viele Tickets Sie kaufen möchten. Mit einem Klick wählen Sie anschließend Ihren Block und die gewünschten Sitzplätze aus. Die neue Funktion Bühnenanzeiger hilft Ihnen bei der Orientierung. So behalten Sie auch in der Detailansicht die Richtung der Bühne im Blick. • Übersichtliche Veranstaltungsauflistung: Durch die verbesserte Übersicht sehen Sie, wann und wo Ihr Event stattfindet. Mit einem Klick auf das Kalenderblatt können Sie den Termin in Ihrem persönlichen Kalender speichern.• Ihre persönliche Startseite: Hier haben Sie Ihre Favoriten stets im Blick und sind immer bestens über neue Events informiert. Alles passend zu Ihren Lieblings-Orten und -Genres. Außerdem wird Ihnen angezeigt, ob das hochwertig gestaltete EVENTIM-FanTicket für Ihr Wunsch-Event verfügbar ist. • Ihre Künstler: Sie können Ihre Favoriten jetzt auch automatisch aus Ihrer lokalen Musikbibliothek oder Facebook übernehmen oder wie gewohnt mit dem Herz-Button markieren. • Die Spielstätten-Favoriten: Jetzt können neben den Künstlern auch die Spielstätten mit dem Herz-Button gemerkt werden. Sie werden dann über alle kommenden Veranstaltungen informiert und bekommen wichtige Serviceinformationen wie Anfahrtskarten und Parkmöglichkeiten.• Die Autocomplete-Suche – noch während Sie tippen, haben wir die passenden Suchergebnisse für Sie.• Jetzt auch auf Englisch. Now we have an english version for you.• Das News-Widget: Regelmäßig die heißesten News aus der Musikszene direkt in der Mitteilungszentrale Ihres iPhones oder iPads. Richten Sie das Widget dazu einfach in der Mitteilungszentrale ein. Aktivieren Sie zusätzlich Push-Mitteilungen, um bei Vorverkaufsstarts auf dem Laufenden zu sein.• Event-Empfehlungen: Lassen Sie sich durch die neuen Themenwelten oder Fan-Reports zum nächsten Eventbesuch inspirieren oder verfassen Sie selbst eine Bewertung.• Sicherer Zugriff auf Ihren Account: Mit Ihrem EVENTIM- oder Facebook-Login haben Sie Zugriff auf Ihre Mobile-Tickets, getätigten Bestellungen und alle Ihre Ticketalarme. Alle Funktionen und Sicherheitsstandards entsprechen denen der EVENTIM-Webseite. Übrigens: Bis auf den Bestellvorgang sind alle Funktionen auch ohne Registrierung zugänglich. Bitte kontaktieren Sie uns gerne für Feedback & Fragen unter android@eventim.de.

Bei Ankunft des Taxis erhalten Sie einen Hinweis direkt auf Ihr Smartphone.taxi.eu ist mit über 62.000 angeschlossenen Taxis und 160.000 Taxifahrern Europas größtes Taxi-Buchungsportal. In 12 Ländern und mehr als 100 europäischen Städten können Sie Ihr Taxi bequem bestellen. In diesem Jahr begrüßen wir gleich drei neue Hautstädte, in den Sie Ihr Taxi automatisch mit taxi.eu bestellen können: Athen, Belgrad und Istanbul.Funktionen:• Automatische Ortung via GPS• Anzeige der Fahrzeuge in der Nähe• Integrierter Fahrpreis, -distanz und Fahrtdauerrechner• Anzeige der Anfahrtszeit des Taxis• Beobachtung der Taxianfahrt• Automatischer Hinweis sobald das Taxi eingetroffen ist• inApp-Payment (auf Wunsch bargeldlose Zahlung, z.B. mit PayPal)• Sofortbestellung oder Reservierung• Persönliche Adressen als Favoriten verwalten• Auswahlmöglichkeit zahlreicher Kundenwünsche• Intuitive BedienungSichere Taxibestellung:• 24h-Service-Hotline für Rückfragen• Nur geprüfte Taxifahrer und -Fahrerinnen• Bewerten Sie Ihre FahrtenBuchen Sie Ihr Taxi in Berlin, Wien, Zürich, München, Hamburg, Amsterdam, Lyon, Antwerpen, Rotterdam, Stuttgart, Frankfurt am Main, Düsseldorf, Essen, Leipzig, Hannover, Nürnberg, Duisburg, Wuppertal, Lausanne, Genf, Basel, Graz, Salzburg, Luxemburg, Linz, Bielefeld, Münster, Augsburg, Kiel, Aachen, Würzburg, Pforzheim, Rastatt, Rostock, Wolfsburg, Baden-Baden, Ulm, Neu-Ulm, Neumünster, Lüneburg, Bitterfeld und in vielen weiteren Städten.Das taxi.eu Team freut sich über Ihre Hinweise und Vorschläge. Das Feedback unserer Nutzer ist eine wichtige Hilfe für die weitere Entwicklung und Verbesserung der Taxi App. Senden Sie Ihre Feedback-Email an:info@taxi.euWeitere Informationen finden Sie auf http://m.taxi.eu

appName: Thailand TV - ดูทีวีออนไลน์
description: *เพิ่มระบบใหม่ เพื่อผู้ใช้ที่เคารพรักทุกท่าน- ปรับเปลี่ยนช่องสัญญาณ อัตโนมัติเมื่อเจอลิ้งค์เสีย- เพิ่มช่องสัญญาณใหม่ๆ อีกเพียบ เพื่อรองรับกรณีดูไม่ได้- แสดงจำนวนคนรับชม เพิ่มอรรถรสในการดู*อยากได้ฟีเจอร์อะไรเพิ่ม แจ้งทีมงานมาได้นะคะหากคุณกำลังเบื่อ! แอพดูทีวีแบบเดิมๆ ที่มีลูกเล่นมากมายแต่คุณไม่อยากใช้มัน!หากคุณกำลังมองหา! แอพดูทีวีที่เร็ว ฟีเจอร์การใช้งานและขนาดไฟล์เล็กๆ!“Thailand TV” แอพดูทีวีที่เร็วที่สุดในสามโลก! เบาบางพลิ้วไหวดั่งสายลม รูดปรื้ด…รูดปรื้ด… ลื่นไหล ได้ดั่งใจด้วยปลายนิ้วสัมผัสดีไซน์เรียบง่าย สบายตา ใช้งานง่าย ไม่ยุ่งยากขนาดไฟล์แอพเล็กกะทัดรัด จึงทำให้ไม่เปลืองพื้นที่อีกหนึ่งทางเลือกเจ๋งๆ เอาใจคนชอบความเฟี้ยว*โปรดให้คำแนะนำหรือติชม เพื่อทีมงานจะได้นำมาปรับปรุงแอพให้ถูกใจท่านมากที่สุด**ขอกราบขอบพระคุณทุกท่าน ที่สนับสนุน Thailand TV Application ดูทีวีออนไลน์ โดยคนไทยเพื่อคนไทยด้วยครับ

Cette application vous aidera à mémoriser Le Coran, inchaAllah. Sélectionnez sourates de la liste que vous souhaitez mémoriser, âyâts seront chargés dans la liste de la récitation, après, sélectionnez le nombre des âyâts de répéter.Âyâtes choisis seront récités en continue jusqu'à ce que vous les mémoriser.Cette application utilise les fichiers mp3 à partir www.everyayah.com. Après l'installation, vous devez, aussi télécharger des recications dans le menu "Télécharger Qiraat".Pour la traduction de l'application en plusieurs langues, contactez le programist, s'il vous plaît.C'est application graduit, pour les musulmans à mémoriser le Coran.Si vous aimez, faites de douas pour les musulmans.
It works as a silent by default * Operating mode (camera) 1 General 2 Black 3 User Screenshot 4 Widget Check inside the app for more features and description. Thank you.

Join the Guild of Heroes and fight the forces of evil in a new fantasy world full of adventures and danger. Here, you'll find a way to glory and recognition. Equip your character and sharpen your skills, practicing sword play and magic. It's a real, free, fantasy-style action - RPG game for tablets and smart phones. The Guild of Heroes game differs from other games by its simple and handy gameplay. Check it out for yourself!◆ Jump right into the heat of battle. An intuitive UI will help find your way around the game in no time. But if you want to become a real hero, you’ll have to work hard.◆ Explore a vast and colorful world. Venture on an epic journey across unique locations hiding countless secrets. You will travel through vast expanses of plains, thick forests and immeasurably deep caves and dungeons.◆ Crush your enemies. Each of them will have unique behaviors and skills. Find their weak spots and leave them with no chance of defeating you.◆ Defeat mighty bosses. These children of the dark have evolved to become almost invincible. They only fear their own Dark Lords. Kill them to obtain unique ancient artifacts.◆ Equip your character. Collect your own armor and weapon sets from hundreds of available pieces.◆ Learn new spells, upgrade them and use them in battle. In this world, all elements can be controlled with magic. Harness them, and even the darkest forces will yield to your power.◆ Fight shoulder-to-shoulder with your friends. They will always help you defeat the strongest and most vicious enemies. Bring together your own team of warriors and get ready for exciting challenges.◆ Change your character class as you progress through the game. Choose one of the three available classes: warrior, archer or mage. Change it at any moment without having to replay the game.======================Join game's community on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guild-of-Heroes-1521284534853738/ Uneix-te a la Confraria dels herois i lluitar contra les forces del mal en un nou món de fantasia ple d'aventures i perills. Aquí, trobareu un camí a la glòria i el reconeixement. Equipa al teu personatge i esmolar les seves habilitats, la pràctica de joc espasa i màgia.És una veritable acció d'estil fantasia, gratis - RPG joc per a tauletes i telèfons intel·ligents. El Gremi d'Herois joc es diferencia d'altres jocs de la seva manera de joc simple i pràctic. Comprova-ho tu mateix!◆ Anar a la dreta en el fragor de la batalla . Una interfície d'usuari intuïtiva l'ajudarà a trobar el seu camí en el joc en cap moment. Però si vols convertir-te en un heroi real, vas a haver de treballar dur.◆ Explora un vast i colorit món . Endinsa't en un viatge èpic a través de llocs únics amaguen innombrables secrets. Va a viatjar a través de grans extensions de planes, espessos boscos i coves immensament profundes i masmorres.◆ Aixafar als teus enemics . Cada un d'ells tindrà comportaments i habilitats úniques. Troba els seus punts febles i els deixen sense possibilitat de derrotar a vostè.◆ Derrota als caps poderosos . Aquests fills de la foscor han evolucionat fins arribar a ser gairebé invencible. Només tenen por que els seus propis Senyors Foscos. Mata'ls per obtenir artefactes antics únics.◆ Equipa al teu personatge . Reculli els seus propis conjunts d'armadures i armes de centenars de peces disponibles.◆ aprendre nous encanteris, actualitzar i utilitzar-los en la batalla . En aquest món, tots els elements es poden controlar amb la màgia. Aprofiti ells, i fins i tot les forces més fosques de retre al seu poder.◆ Lluita espatlla amb espatlla amb els teus amics . Ells sempre van a ajudar a derrotar als enemics més forts i viciosos. Reunir el seu propi equip de guerrers i preparar-se per als reptes emocionants.◆ Canviar la classe de caràcters a mesura que progresses en el joc . Trieu una de les tres classes disponibles: guerrer, arquer o mag. Canviar en qualsevol moment sense haver de jugar de nou el joc.======================Uneix-te a la comunitat del joc a Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Guild-of-Heroes-1521284534853738/

Metro Digital EditionYour favourite FREE newspaper specially redesigned and optimised for your Android device.Get each new edition automatically downloaded to your phone or tablet every morning for the ultimate Metro mobile experience. The responsive app has been specially created to suit all Android screen dimensions, without compromising on quality, for whatever device you’re on.-Read it offline cover to cover or skip straight to your favourite sections at any time throughout the day.-Visually attractive and easy to navigate format, with all the best bits from the paper – plus even more exclusive content.-Embedded video and audio clips allow you to watch news videos and film trailers, plus listen to music samples.-Impressive Window On The World photo gallery showcases amazing images from around the globe daily.-Completely interactive, with an optimised on-screen reading experience to suit all Android devices.-Bookmark your favourite pages and easily share articles with friends.We want you to enjoy and get the most out of your Metro Digital Edition. Please email us your feedback at tablet@ukmetro.co.uk Metro Digital EditionIhre bevorzugten Kostenlose Zeitung speziell überarbeitet und optimiert für Ihr Android-Gerät.Jede neue Ausgabe automatisch auf Ihrem Telefon oder Tablet heruntergeladen bekommen jeden Morgen nach dem ultimativen Metro mobile Erlebnis. Das ansprechende App wurde speziell geschaffen, um alle Android-Bildschirm Abmessungen anzupassen, ohne Kompromisse bei der Qualität, für welches Gerät du bist auf.- Lesen Sie es offline Deckung zu Deckung oder zu überspringen direkt auf Ihre Lieblings-Abschnitte zu jeder Zeit während des Tages.- Optisch ansprechend und leicht verständlichen Format, mit allen die besten Stücke aus dem Papier zu navigieren - plus noch mehr exklusive Inhalte.- Embedded Video-und Audio-Clips können Sie Nachrichten-Videos und Trailern zu sehen, plus Musik hören Proben.- Beeindruckende Window on the World Fotogalerie zeigt erstaunliche Bilder aus der ganzen Welt täglich.- Komplett interaktive, mit einem optimierten On-Screen-Leseerlebnis, passend für alle Android-Geräte.- Bookmark Ihre Lieblings-Seiten einfach und Aktien Artikel mit Freunden.Wir möchten, dass Sie zu genießen und das Beste aus Ihrem Metro Digital Edition. Bitte mailen Sie uns Ihr Feedback an tablet@ukmetro.co.uk

★ “진짜 최강자를 가릴 시간!” 무릉도장의 주인 ‘무공’에게 도전장을 던지세요!★ “요일 던전 즐기고, 쥬얼 받자!” 매일매일 열리는 요일 던전에서 ‘쥬얼’ 아이템을 획득하세요!▶ 모바일로 만나는 진짜 MMORPG ◀메이플 월드의 다양한 대륙에서 친구들을 만나보세요!싱글 플레이로는 느낄 수 없던 MMORPG만의 꿀재~M, 여러 플레이어와 대화도 하고 친구와 파티도 맺으며, 플레이를 즐겨 보세요.▶ 시그너스 여제를 수호하는 5명의 기사단 ◀소울마스터, 윈드브레이커, 나이트워커, 플레임위자드, 스트라이커5명의 시그너스 기사단이 모바일 메이플 월드에서 용사님을 기다립니다!검은 마법사의 군단에 맞서 여제를 지키고 정의를 수호하세요!▶ 당신을 기다리는 5명의 모험가 ◀다크나이트, 보우마스터, 나이트로드, 비숍, 캡틴5명의 모험가가 모바일 메이플 월드에서 용사님을 기다립니다!함께 모험을 시작하세요!▶ 메이플 월드의 최강자를 가리는 무릉도장 ◀층별 등장하는 강한 내공을 가진 몬스터를 격파하고 ‘무공’에게 도전장을 던져라!내공 수련의 끝판왕! 무릉도장을 접수하세요!▶ 매일매일 열리는 요일 던전 ◀요일 별로 열리는 타임어택 던전을 클리어하고 ‘쥬얼’ 아이템을 획득하세요!획득한 ‘쥬얼’ 아이템을 쥬얼 소켓에 등록하면 캐릭터 능력치를 강화할 수 있습니다.▶ 몰려오는 적을 섬멸하라! 네트의 피라미드 ◀디펜스 형태의 던전 ‘네트의 피라미드’로 탐험을 떠나세요!몰려오는 강력한 몬스터를 막아내면 신비한 ‘파리오’의 전리품들을 획득할 수 있습니다.▶ 강력한 보스가 기다리는 원정대 ◀거대한 보스 ‘자쿰’과 ‘혼테일’을 만나보세요!파티를 모아서 거대 보스와 치열한 전투를 즐기세요!승리의 기쁨 만큼 많은 보상을 획득할 수 있습니다.▶ 실력만큼 보상받는 엘리트 던전 ◀강한 몬스터를 사냥하면 더 좋은 보상을 획득할 수 있어요!레벨별로 입장 가능한 다양한 던전은 혼자 혹은 파티원들과 함께 플레이가 가능합니다!▶ 한적한 나만의 사냥터 미니 던전 ◀북적북적한 사냥터를 떠나 혼자만의 사냥을 즐기고 싶다면?미니 던전으로 오세요! 용사님, 혼자만의 쾌적한 사냥터를 맘껏 즐기실 수 있습니다.원하는 몬스터를 선택하고 퀘스트 아이템도 획득하실 수 있습니다.▶ 다양한 아이템을 만날 수 있는 거래소 ◀에그리치 아저씨의 거래소를 만나보세요!각 마을에 있는 ‘에그리치’ NPC를 선택하면 거래소 이용이 가능합니다.다른 메이플 용사님들과 다양한 장비와 액세서리 거래가 가능합니다.■스마트폰 앱 접근권한 안내앱 이용 시 아래와 같은 서비스를 제공하기 위해 접근 권한을 요청하고 있습니다. Energy Protector - Pembunuh Tugas ini Ringan, namun Canggih untuk membersihkan dan mempercepat perangkat. Energy Protector – Pembunuh Tugas ini akan meningkatkan performa ponsel, dan Anda dapat menikmati Booster Kecepatan serta memperpanjang waktu penggunaan perangkat. Semuanya Gratis!!!Energy Protector - Fitur Pembunuh Tugas (Semua Gratis):★ Penghemat Daya 1 Ketukan Booster Ponsel mematikan aplikasi di latar yang tidak berguna dan menghabiskan baterai untuk mempercepat ponsel dan memperpanjang waktu penggunaan perangkat Anda.★ Booster Memori (Booster & Pengoptimal Kecepatan)Mematikan aplikasi/proses yang tidak diperlukan saat perangkat Anda lambat dan kekurangan memori. Booster Memori akan mempercepat Android Anda dengan satu ketukan, mendinginkan ponsel saat CPU panas, dan bahkan mencegah ponsel mengalami pengurasan daya. Fungsinya sama seperti pembunuh tugas.★ Cooler PonselMendinginkan perangkat dengan menghentikan aplikasi dan file redundan yang menimbulkan panas. Jika perangkat Anda mengalami masalah panas dan harus didinginkan, fitur ini bisa menjadi pilihan terbaik.★ Boost PonselBooster memori (RAM) ponsel Android gratis ini akan membersihkan aplikasi di latar yang tidak diperlukan untuk mengosongkan lebih banyak memori dan mempercepat ponsel Anda. Dan booster memori ini semakin spesial berkat dampak boost-nya yang tahan lama, yang mencegah aplikasi dimulai ulang secara otomatis.★ Pemantauan langsung suhuLangsung memantau dan mencatat suhu perangkat, serta menampilkan kurva perubahan suhu.Energy Protector – Pembunuh Tugas ini beroperasi seperti aplikasi pembersih cache yang mempercepat perangkat dengan mengosongkan sebanyak mungkin kapasitas memori.

Photofy is a super-easy photo editing app for consumers and businesses that combines all the features you need in one app: Filters, Light Effects, Photo Mirror, Fit (Insta-size photos to square for easy sharing to Instagram), Text with 90+ free fonts, Meme editor, Collage maker with over 70+ free layouts, and the world’s largest collection of overlay content (40,000+ graphic elements). Create amazing photos, collages, and marketing content to share with the world on the most popular social networks like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Line..With our 5.0 release, we have added some great new features to complement our already awesome collection of editing and overlay options.TemplatesChoose a pre-designed layout (template), and simply apply your photo and update the applicable text. Our creative team from around the world has set these up to make you look like a creative genius - now go have fun with them!GeofiltersUse our location-based Capture feature to generate amazing photos with special overlays specific to the location you are at. We are adding more geofilters daily, and if you are creative and would love to help us out, become an art contributor today.Share UpdateWe have simplified our share screen to make it easier for you to post to your favorite social channels. We now showcase a preview of your finished photo, and then let you select from the most popular share options. Or, click on more options and share to any app on your phone that accepts photo submissions.Overview of Core Photofy FeaturesCaptureNow you can take as many selfies as you want and choose the perfect one to share/edit all in one spot. CollageChoose from over 75 adjustable collage layouts.Photo EditingCrop & AspectSeven different aspect ratios including 4x6, 5x7, and 8x10 along with zoom to crop.BackgroundChoose from over 30+ different pattern backgrounds or use another photo of your choice.AdjustTilt, rotate, and reflect your photo to showcase the right angle of your photo.Filters30+ filters (more coming) to enhance your photos.Light FXAdd bokeh or other light effects to add some flair.BlurBlur your entire photo or use the radial blur feature to focus on one particular spot.SharpenMake your photos sharper with our sharpen feature.Photo MirrorEnhance photos by creating mirrored illusions of a single photo.InstaSquare (InstaFit)Insta-size your portrait or landscape photo to show your entire photo on Instagram.Photo BlurEasy to use feature that duplicates your photo and blurs the background.WatermarkFor you Photofy lovers, you can now change our simple watermark to a more stylized graphic that better suits your photo.Text & OverlaysTextCreate your own sayings by choosing one of our 90+ fonts and using our simple and intuitive text controls.ArtworkDon’t feel like creating anything? Search or browse through 20,000+ professionally pre-designed typography type overlays of words, phrases, quotes, and expressions.StickersAdd some extra character to your images by choosing from our collection of over 10,000 stickers to overlay on your photos.FramesKeep it simple and add bordered frames or horizontal/vertical banners.MemeCreate a meme using our simple meme editor.Shape MaskAdd unique shapes to frame your photo.Stock PhotographyAccess over 3,000+ stock photos and background patterns.Don't forget to always check out our Marketplace to find licensed and branded content from world-class artists, Disney / Disney Pixar, Shrek, Popeye, colleges and universities such as Notre Dame, Alabama, Georgia, Florida State and Michigan, as well as Greek Sororities like Chi Omega and Kappa Kappa Gamma.And don't forget to show your love for Photofy and submit 5-star reviews - it goes a long way!Not to be confused with Photify, Photofi, Photofy+

National Rail Enquiries, the UK’s number one travel website, is proud to release the must-have app for every train traveller.Straight to your smartphone, now you can access train tickets, timetables, rail fare enquiries, train line information, track specific trains, find out disruptions about your journey, and re-plan your journey on the go, all from the official source of UK rail travel.With unprecedented visibility and intuitive tools, the National Rail Enquiries app will transform your train travel experience, empowering you to catch the right train and complete your journey.Features- Buy tickets via third party websites- My travel - One place for your favourite journeys and stations. Find the next train home and get relevant live updates at a glance- Live trains - View real-time departures and arrivals boards for any station- Progress tracking - From A to B and everything in between, find out exactly where a train is along a route- Journey planner - Plan your journeys with up-to-the-minute travel information. Track the progress of trains and disruptions along your route- Watch a train - Pin a train to My travel to watch its progress with a single tap- Push notifications - Get disruption alerts as they happen- Wake-up alerts - Avoid missing your stop or getting caught out when the train divides or arrives at its destination- Tube and DLR - Plan your journey to or from London Zone 1 Underground and DLR stations- Plan journeys between a station and a postcode- Find out ticket prices- Widget featuring live train arrivals/departures between home and work stations- Cycling facilities at your station- Can you take your bicycle on your journey? Are reservations required? How many bicycle spaces are there?- Tips for travelling with bicyclesEnhance your train travel experience - download the FREE National Rail Enquiries app today.Please note:- It is now possible to add planned journey details to your calendar as events. To allow this the app’s permissions regarding calendar events have been updated.- Despite the permissions description, the app will not send email to guests without owner’s knowledge- We are aware from feedback that platform information is not available for some stations in the South of England (including London), this is a problem with the availability of the data and not with the app. We are working with the wider industry to get this data back in the app as soon as possible. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience that this will cause, but rest assured we are working hard to get this data back.Thank you for all of your feedback so far. We are committed to listening and working on improvements and bug fixes. We appreciate your patience and will be releasing updates soon. Please feel free to email us on app_customer_services@nationalrail.co.uk with your feedback.

We are happy to release the Mathrubhumi Android Phone & Tablet Integrated Edition to Malayalees around the world! With a refreshing new design , the Android edition of the Mathrubhumi Newspaper now delivers the power of journalism directly to your phone and tablet (8 inch screen and above) , with latest news , regional news , cartoons , videos and photos streamed live 24/7. Read all the news from Kerala's favourite Newspaper now on the move , anywhere , anytime! The new reader-friendly layout allows users to read their favourite news on very small devices and large tablets with ease.The App consists of various sections such as Latest News , Sections , Districts , Gallery and Other News , containing all news categories covered by the Newspaper. All the news stories are locally stored in your device for off-line viewing as well. The Gallery consists of Daily Cartoons , Kakadrishti - the front page cartoon , Photos and Videos streamed from Mathrubhumi servers and are updated regularly. The Tablet edition of the App also includes an e-Paper functionality that allows users to read the e-Paper editions of Mathrubhumi on their device.The various news categories covered are Top News , District news feeds from the 14 districts of Kerala , World News , India News , Kerala News , Science and Technology , Movies , Health , News Specials , Travel , Agriculture , NRI News , Books , Women's affairs , Sports , Business etc. A scrolling breaking news ticker is also displayed on the Home page which can be closed and re-opened by a user touch on the Mathrubhumi logo.The User can choose the font sizes for comfortable reading and also choose between full screen and partial screen viewing in the detailed news pages. The detailed news pages can be viewed in Landscape and Portrait modes as per your preference.An easy Bookmark saving option is also provided to the user to save favourite news items on the device. All news items ,images and videos can be shared with your friends and family through email , social media or by any wireless connectivity option supported by your device.An App user guide is also provided along with the Application to enable users to navigate the app easily. Kami sangat senang untuk melepaskan Mathrubhumi Android Phone & Tablet Edition Terpadu untuk Malayalees di seluruh dunia!Dengan desain baru yang menyegarkan, edisi Android dari koran Mathrubhumi sekarang memberikan kekuatan jurnalisme langsung ke ponsel Anda dan tablet (layar 8 inci dan atas), dengan berita terbaru, berita regional, kartun, video dan foto disiarkan secara langsung 24/7 . Membaca semua berita dari Kerala favorit koran sekarang bergerak, di mana saja, kapan saja!Tata letak yang ramah pembaca baru memungkinkan pengguna untuk membaca berita favorit mereka pada perangkat yang sangat kecil dan tablet besar dengan mudah.The App terdiri dari berbagai bagian seperti Berita Terkini, Bagian, Kecamatan, Galeri dan Berita lainnya, mengandung semua kategori berita ditutupi oleh koran tersebut. Semua berita disimpan secara lokal pada perangkat Anda untuk off-line melihat juga. The Gallery terdiri dari Kartun Harian, Kakadrishti - halaman depan kartun, Foto dan Video streaming dari server Mathrubhumi dan diperbarui secara teratur.The Tablet edisi App juga mencakup fungsi e-Paper yang memungkinkan pengguna untuk membaca edisi e-Paper dari Mathrubhumi pada perangkat mereka.Berbagai kategori berita yang dibahas adalah Top News, berita Kabupaten feed dari 14 kabupaten di Kerala, World News, India News, Kerala News, Sains dan Teknologi, Film, Kesehatan, Berita Khusus, Travel, Pertanian, NRI Berita, Buku, urusan Perempuan , Sports, Bisnis dll bergulir berita ticker juga ditampilkan pada halaman Home yang dapat ditutup dan dibuka kembali oleh sentuhan pengguna pada logo Mathrubhumi.Pengguna dapat memilih ukuran font untuk kenyamanan membaca dan juga memilih antara layar penuh dan layar tampilan parsial di halaman berita rinci.Halaman-halaman berita rinci dapat dilihat di Landscape dan mode Portrait sesuai preference.An Anda mudah Bookmark pilihan tabungan juga diberikan kepada pengguna untuk menyimpan item berita favorit pada perangkat.Semua item berita, gambar dan video dapat dibagi dengan teman dan keluarga melalui email, media sosial atau dengan opsi konektivitas nirkabel yang didukung oleh perangkat Anda.Sebuah buku petunjuk App juga disediakan bersama dengan aplikasi untuk memungkinkan pengguna untuk menavigasi aplikasi dengan mudah.

With BMI Calculator you can calculate your Body Mass Index, Waist-to-Height Ratio, Body Fat Percentage and Calorie Consumption (BMR + PAL) to find your ideal weight based on age and gender.It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on diet.• BMI Calculation for everyone 7 years and older• Metric and imperial systems are supported• Optional saving of last entered valuesInfo:• BMI - Body Mass Index: is defined as the body weight divided by the square of the height. It provides a rough guide since the BMI doesn't take into account a persons build or the composition of the body weight.• WHtR - Waist-to-Height Ratio: is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It measures abdominal obesity and therefore can be used as an better indicator of health risks than BMI (Body Mass Index).• Body Fat Percentage: is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. It is estimated with the 'US Navy Circumference Method' which uses the height and circumferences of waist, neck and hip.• Energie Expenditure / Calorie Consumption: is mainly a sum of internal heat produced (Basal Metabolic Rate estimated by Mifflin St Jeor Equation) and external work (Physical Activity Level).Criticism, praise, problems with this app? Feel free to visit appovo.com/support

Turkcell Müzik ile 3 Milyondan fazla şarkıyı keşfedin, dinleyin arkadaşlarınızla paylaşın. Ne zaman ve nerede isterseniz, üstelik internet paketinizden düşmeden Turkcell Müzik ile müzik keyfini yaşayın.Turkcell Müzik Uygulaması ile;- İstediğiniz sanatçı, şarkı veya albümü arayabilir,- Pop, Rock, Caz, Rap, Elektronik vb. 16 radyo türünden seçim yaparak Turkcell Müzik’in size önerdiği şarkıları dinleyebilir, - Sevdiğiniz bir sanatçı adını kaydederek benzer sanatçılardan şarkılar dinleyebilir,- Dinlediğiniz şarkıları cep telefonunuza indirebilir.- Sevdiğiniz şarkılardan liste yapabilir veya turkcellmuzik.com’da oluşturduğunuz listelere erişebilir, - İnternetinizden düşmeden müzik dinleme keyfi yaşayabilir,- Beğendiğiniz şarkıları Facebook’ta ve Twitter’da paylaşabilirsiniz.Bu uygulamayı Türkiye’deki tüm Android kullanıcıları indirebilir ve kullanabilir.

Ridlr is a smart commuting and transit app that’s apt for your City travel. Get timetable for Metro, Local Trains, Monorail, BEST and NMMT buses in Mumbai. TripView displays Sydney and Melbourne public transport timetable data on your phone. It features a summary view showing your next services, as well as a full timetable viewer. All timetable data is stored on your phone, so it can be used offline.Features: - Trackwork and service interruption information - Interactive maps (create your trip by clicking on your station/stop) - Multi-modal trip editor (customise exact change locations / lines) - Real-time delay information and vehicle map (subject to data availability)Additional features in the full version of TripView: - Save your trips - No advertisements - Organise trips into folders - AlarmsRealtime data is available for the following operators:- Sydney Trains (Sydney metro area only, excluding Waterfall and the T6 Line)- Sydney and Newcastle Buses- Hillsbus, Forest Coach Lines, Busways Blacktown, Transdev North Shore- Sydney Ferries- Sydney Light Rail (excluding stops between Exhibition Centre and Central)NOTE: Best efforts are taken to ensure timetable accuracy, but no guarantees are made. If you find an error in the timetable, please email contact@grofsoft.com with details.

GooglePlay農曆新年活動【活動名稱】：禮品購買【活動時間】：2017/1/19~2017/2/9【活動內容】：歲末禮包限時下殺2折起!!【活動名稱】：首儲重置【活動時間】：2017/1/19~2017/2/9【活動內容】：現在首儲任意金額除了獲得黃蓉與少年楊過整將之外，更可得到期間限定郭靖新年時裝一套!【活動名稱】：禮品兌換【活動時間】：2017/1/19~2017/2/9【活動內容】：在活動期間完成指定任務即可獲得新春爆竹，蒐集滿指定數量新春爆竹即可在相關介面兌換辭舊紅包 或是迎新紅包。辭舊紅包能夠開出神兵-干將莫邪碎片以及各式強化素材迎新紅包能夠開出神兵-玲瓏棋局碎片以及各式強化素材注意事項：活動結束後將無法兌換或開啟相關道具，請所有玩家儘早兌換、開啟以免自身權益受損。——————————————————————————「T-POP天團」玖壹壹、「香港爆機達人」達哥 聯名推薦金庸正宗射鵰三部曲《射鵰英雄傳.神鵰俠侶.倚天屠龍記》英雄大亂鬥!——————————————————————————遊戲改編自金庸武俠經典巨作，完整還原了從牛家莊到華山論劍的小說劇情，大俠們在遊戲中不僅能夠收集並培養小說中大家耳熟能詳的英雄人物，融入金庸超乎常人的博大雄渾的時空境界，玩家可以率領打造屬於自己的金庸群俠團再闖江湖，體驗手遊版的武林絕學，與線上的好友們一決雌雄。以4.5頭身Q萌造型再現小說中的經典角色，並利用Unity3D引擎、動態鏡頭捕捉技術，突出打鬥場面的爆發力和流暢感，匠心獨具，傾力鑄就精品質感，為玩家們完美呈現金庸筆下的大宋江湖!● 遊戲特色※ 正宗金庸武俠- 純正武俠血統-從遊戲過程重現金庸小說的江湖恩怨情仇。※ 炫麗視覺效果- 失傳絕世絕學華麗登場‧超過百種武學爭奪排名。※ 即時真人武鬥- 玩家公平比武競技‧實戰體驗動作競技手遊，知己知彼戰無不勝。※ 獨特角色養成- 每個屬性情緣相剋‧真英雄無廢角‧各有獨特的武學技能。※ 群英闖蕩江湖- 江湖活動豐富多元，讓玩家愛不釋手留連忘返。※ 真金庸三部曲- 射鵰英雄傳.神鵰俠侶.倚天屠龍記群英亂鬥，敬請期待!《射鵰英雄傳3D》Facebook粉絲團網址:https://www.facebook.com/iwplay.sdm/《射鵰英雄傳3D》官方網站: http://sdm.iwplay.com.tw/《射鵰英雄傳3D》巴哈姆特哈拉版: http://forum.gamer.com.tw/A.php?bsn=30260

Az Opera Max spórol adataival, kibővíti adatcsomagját és egyedülálló felügyeletet biztosít telefonja adatfogyasztása felett. Ez az adatkezelő és adatspóroló alkalmazás a 3G/4G/LTE és Wi-Fi adathasználatot akár 50%-kal is csökkentheti. Spóroljon adataival kedvenc alkalmazásai és weboldalai videóinak, fotóinak és médiatartalmának tömörítésével a mobil és Wi-Fi hálózatokon - észrevehető minőségromlás nélkül. Az Opera Max emellett az akkumulátorral is spórol az észrevétlenül a háttérben futó alkalmazások blokkolásával. Használhatja Wi-Fi kezelőként is, hogy hatékonyan felügyelhesse a háttérben futó alkalmazásokat, amikor Wi-F-re csatlakozik.• Nézzen még több videót YouTube-on és NetflixenFogyasszon kevesebb adatot a macskás YouTube videókkal vagy kedvenc show-műsorai és filmjei nézése közben a Netflixen. Az Opera Max egyedülálló technológiája számottevő minőségromlás nélkül spórol adatokat a videókon, a pufferelést is csökkentve - ami több izalmas videót és Kártyavár epizódot jelent.• AdatkezelésFigyelje és felügyelje minden alkalmazás internet-használatát. Az Opera Max figyeli és számlálja, hogy mennyi mobil internet vagy Wi-Fi adatforgalmat használt az adott hónapban vagy napon. Azt is figyeli, hogy az egyes alkalmazások mennyit forgalmaztak, ezzel teljes felügyeletet nyújt díjcsomagja felett.• Alkalmazások blokkolása és az adatszivárgás megelőzéseFelügyelje alkalmazásai internet-használatát azzal, hogy blokkolja azok mobil vagy Wi-Fi adathasználattal összefüggő engedély nélküli futását a háttérben. A háttérben futó alkalmazások blokkolása akkumulátoridőt takarít meg és minimalizálja az akkumulátor használatát.• Forgalomkövetés és spórolás az adatokkal Wi-Fi és mobil hálózatonAz internettel való spórolás és az alkalmazások adatforgalmának blokkolása a “Megtakarítás be/ki” kapcsolóval a mobil és a Wi-Fi hálózaton egymástól függetlenül szabályozható.• Személyes és biztonságosAz Opera Max nem elemzi vagy tárolja a személyes adatokat. Ha további tájékoztatást szeretne arról, hogyan működik az adatvédelem az Opera Max alkalmazásban, olvassa el a Gy.I.K. válaszokat ezen a címen: http://opera.com/help/max/android/.* A megtakarítással kapcsolatos adataink az USA-ban élő béta tesztelőink jelentésein alapulnak. Az Ön által mért eredmények ettől eltérhetnek.Ahol még többet megtudhat: http://opera.com/mobile/max/.Műszaki kérdései vannak? Lásd: Gy.I.K.:http://opera.com/help/max/android/.Csatlakozzon hozzánk:Twitter - http://twitter.com/opera/Facebook - http://facebook.com/opera/

Looking for New York apartments for rent or real estate for sale in NYC? Get free and instant access to the largest database of real estate listings in Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens and all of New York's five boroughs on StreetEasy. Whether you're new to New York real estate, or "in-the-know," StreetEasy provides buyers and renters a comprehensive set of for-sale and rental listings throughout NYC, including no-fee apartments. Not to be forgotten: Sellers and homeowners can take advantage of StreetEasy's unparalleled database of information on New York real estate market trends, neighborhood, building and property-level facts and history. Key features:• Search NYC apartments for sale, including condos and co-ops• View property history, see how long it’s been on the market and navigate to the building page to see what else is available or recently sold in the building. • Search NYC apartments for rent, including fee and no-fee apartments• Filter by price, New York neighborhoods ("Chelsea") and buildings ("Trump Tower")• Find apartments and real estate with amenities important to you (e.g., doorman, pets allowed)• See listings in a list or map view.
