The free Roku Android application allows you to: · Control your Roku player or Roku TV from your mobile device.· Use Roku Search with your mobile device. See what’s on, where you can watch it for free, with a subscription, or how much the different channels charge to rent or buy.· Use your voice to search for movies, TV shows, actors, and directors as well as for streaming channels by name.· Follow "Movies Coming Soon” within My Feed and get updates when new movies are ready to stream – on what channel and at what price.· Browse, add, and rate Channels from more than 2,000 streaming channels offered in the Roku Channel Store.*· Quickly launch your favorite Roku Channels on your Roku player or Roku TV from your mobile device.· Enter text in your Roku player on-screen interface using your device's keyboard instead of the included remote.· Name and switch between multiple Roku players and Roku TVs.· Enjoy your Android device's photos, music, and video on your Roku player or Roku TV using the “Play on Roku” feature.* Subscription or other payment may be required to access certain channel content. Channel availability subject to change and not all content is available in the countries in which Roku devices are sold.THIS APP REQUIRES A ROKU PLAYER OR ROKU TVTo use this app, you must connect your Android device to the same network as your Roku player or Roku TV. Certain features require compatible Roku players/Roku TVs or may require logging in to your Roku account. HAVING TROUBLE FINDING YOUR ROKU PLAYER OR ROKU TV?Note: If the app does not recognize your Roku player or Roku TV (you see a “No Roku Devices Found” message after you sign in), try going to network setup again on your Roku player or Roku TV. This will wake your Roku player or Roku TV on your home network. Then, select “Try Again” in the Roku app. FEATURE AVAILABILITY· Roku Search is available when your connected Roku player or Roku TV supports this functionality.· Searching by voice is available in English in the US and Canada only and elsewhere when updates make voice search available. This feature requires permission to access your Android device's microphone.Go to support.roku.com for FAQs or to get help.

MyChart gives you access to your lab results, appointment information, current medications, immunization history, and more on your mobile device. With MyChart you can: • View your health information • Stay in touch with your physician • Manage your appointments • Access your family's health information You must first create an account through your healthcare provider in order to access your information through MyChart. If your healthcare provider is not listed, or if you require support accessing your existing account, contact them directly about accessing your account through the MyChart app.

Mit MobileTV von der Telekom haben Sie beste TV-Unterhaltung jederzeit auf Ihrem Android-Smartphone und Tablet. MobileTV bietet Ihnen eine breite Auswahl an Kanälen an: • Basis-Paket mit über 25 TV-Sendern, darunter Das Erste, ZDF, RTL, VOX, SAT.1, ProSieben, Kabel eins, N24, Eurosport • Vorschau-Funktion im Basis-Paket: Testen Sie kostenlos den gewünschten Kanal, bevor Sie das Paket buchen!• Sky Fußball-Bundesliga-Paket mit der Live-Übertragung aller Spiele und Konferenzen der Fußball-Bundesliga und 2. Bundesliga sowie Videohighlights und Zusammenfassungen der Spiele• BVB total!-Paket oder HSV total!-Paket: News, Talk und Entertainment rund um Borussia Dortmund oder den Hamburger SV Voraussetzung für die Nutzung von MobileTV: • Mobilfunkvertrag mit der Telekom Deutschland GmbH• Original-Android OS 4.1 für Tablet, Original-Android OS 4.1 für Smartphone oder höher• UMTS/LTE-Netzversorgung oder WLAN-Zugang• Für das Basis-Paket ist der WLAN-Zugang nur im Telekom-Netz möglich.• In Einzelfällen kann es vorkommen, dass die Vorgängerversion von MobileTV zuerst deinstalliert werden muss, um diese neue Version nutzen zu können. Zur Neuinstallation suchen Sie bitte „Mobile TV Telekom“ im Store.Aus technischen/lizenzrechtlichen Gründen ist die Nutzung NICHT im Ausland möglich.Aus rechtlichen Gründen dürfen die Inhalte von MobileTV nicht über das Smartphone oder Tablet über Airplay, HDMI- oder andere Verbindungsvarianten an einem Monitor genutzt werden. Um die Kanäle anschauen zu können, buchen Sie in der App eines der angebotenen Pakete. Für die Nutzung fallen folgende Preise an: • Basis-Paket 7,50 € im Monats-Abo oder 2,00 € Tageszugang • Sky Fußball-Bundesliga-Paket im 3-Monats-Abo für 9,95€/monatlich oder 12,95 € im Monats-Abo• BVB total!-Paket 4,95€ im Monats-Abo• HSV total!-Paket 4,95€ im Monats-Abo• Für die Übertragung der TV-Kanäle/Videos über das Mobilfunknetz entstehen keine Kosten für den Datentransport, auch wird das Datenvolumen nicht auf das Inklusiv- Datenvolumen Ihres Tarifs angerechnet.• Wird das Sky Fußball-Bundesliga-Paket (drei Monate Mindestvertragslaufzeit, 9,95 €) nicht zum Ende des jeweils dritten Monats der Mindestvertragslaufzeit mit einem Monat Kündigungsfrist gekündigt, verlängert sich die Laufzeit automatisch um weitere drei Monate. Soweit die übrigen MobileTV Pakete nicht zum Ablauf des Monats gekündigt werden, verlängert sich die Laufzeit automatisch um jeweils einen Kalendermonat. Mit Beendigung des zu Grunde liegenden Telekom Mobilfunk-Vertrages endet auch das Vertragsverhältnis über die Option.• Wichtig: Wenn Sie die App löschen, werden Ihre Abos nicht automatisch storniert. Bitte beenden Sie daher vorher Ihre Abos in der App oder über die Kundenhotline 22 02. Die Telekom Deutschland behält sich vor, die im Rahmen von MobileTV angebotenen Programme zu verändern. Hinweise: Bitte beachten Sie, dass Sie über diesen Dienst, abhängig von Sender und Tageszeit, auch Inhalte der Alterseinstufung ab 16 Jahre anschauen bzw. abrufen können. Für die Dienstenutzung müssen Sie für die MobileTV Anwendung unter Umständen noch die Übermittlung Ihrer Rufnummer in den Datenschutzeinstellungen Ihres Mobilfunkvertrages zulassen. Senden Sie hierfür +mobiletv per SMS an die 27637, um diese Freigabe zu erteilen und Fehlermeldungen zu vermeiden.

――世界が闇で満ちたとき、虚無への門が開かれるCygamesが贈る新世代の本格スマホカードバトル「Shadowverse」、始動。▼600種類を超える美麗なカードイラスト全世界登録者数2,000万人突破のCygames代表作「神撃のバハムート」から、第1弾は400種類以上のカードが登場。第2弾以降も続々追加。圧倒的なアートワークが彩る、至高のバトルを体感せよ。▼フルボイスのストーリーモード7人のキャラクターが織りなす重厚なダークファンタジー。描くのは、Cygames を代表するイラストレーター。演じるのは、豪華声優陣。「Shadowverse」の深淵を、その眼で確かめろ。▼戦略は無限大。勝利の鍵は「進化」場に出て戦う「フォロワーカード」のすべてが進化可能。切り札を進化させて強化し、勝利への道を切り開け。▼世界中のライバルが君を待つ「フリーマッチ」で気軽に腕試し。「ルームマッチ」で友達とバトル。「ランクマッチ」で頂点を目指そう。君だけの最強のデッキを創造し、その名を世界に轟かせろ。

Snap with your phone camera & store cheques in your App.- Send e-Gift Vouchers right from your phone.- Locate nearest ATMs/Branches & contact us with a tap.ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) requires following permissions:- Contacts: This is required to allow you send SMS after Funds Transfer.- Calendar: This is required to set reminders for your Bill payments.- Camera: This is to take pictures of your cheque and store it for your reference.- Location: This is required for Branch / ATM locator.- Photos / Media / Files: This is required to let you access gallery / click an image to set profile picture. - Phone: This is required for let you dial customer contact centre.- Please note that ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) fetches this data only when initiated by user and not otherwise.Steps to start using ING Vysya Mobile (now Kotak) Application on your Android Phone/Tablet: - Login with your Net Banking ID & Password*If you are not a Net Banking user you can directly register for Mobile Banking on the app and access your accounts Re-menemukan perbankan dengan resmi aplikasi Mobile Banking untuk ponsel Android dan tablet Android dari ING Bank Vysya (sekarang Kotak)Ada banyak bahwa aplikasi memungkinkan Anda melakukan selain melihat Account Anda & Deposit, membuka FD / RD, Transfer Dana, Pembayaran Tagihan, Belanja & lebih termasuk:- Argometer keseimbangan yang memberikan update cepat hanya dengan keran.- Built-in SMS kepada penerima segera setelah transfer dana dilakukan.- Alarm pada kalender mobile untuk Bill Pay. Katakanlah 'Tidak' untuk biaya keterlambatan.- Lupakan periksa counterfoils. Snap dengan kamera & toko cek ponsel Anda di App Anda.- Mengirim e-Voucher Hadiah langsung dari ponsel Anda.- Cari terdekat ATM / Cabang & hubungi kami dengan keran.ING Vysya Ponsel (sekarang Kotak) membutuhkan izin berikut:- Kontak: ini diperlukan untuk memungkinkan Anda mengirim SMS setelah Transfer Dana.- Kalender: ini diperlukan untuk mengatur pengingat untuk pembayaran tagihan Anda.- Kamera: Ini adalah untuk mengambil gambar dari cek dan menyimpannya untuk referensi Anda.- Lokasi: Ini diperlukan untuk Cabang / ATM locator.- Foto / Media / Files: ini diperlukan untuk memungkinkan Anda mengakses galeri / klik gambar untuk mengatur gambar profil.- Telepon: Hal ini diperlukan untuk membiarkan Anda dial pusat kontak pelanggan.- Harap dicatat bahwa ING Vysya Handphone (sekarang Kotak) mengambil data ini hanya bila diprakarsai oleh pengguna dan bukan sebaliknya.Langkah-langkah untuk mulai menggunakan ING Vysya Handphone (sekarang Kotak) Aplikasi di Ponsel Android Anda / Tablet: - Login dengan Anda Net Banking ID & Password* Jika Anda bukan pengguna Perbankan Net Anda dapat langsung mendaftar untuk Mobile Banking pada aplikasi dan mengakses akun Anda

The Disney Movies Anywhere app allows you to watch your Disney movie collection across your favorite devices, anywhere you go. Grow your digital collection two ways - purchase eligible Disney, Disney•Pixar, Marvel, and Star Wars titles from participating providers (Android mobile app or Android TV) or unlock your Digital Copy from eligible Combo Packs (Android mobile app only). Once you connect your participating provider account to Disney Movies Anywhere using your Android mobile app, your eligible movies will seamlessly flow into your Disney Movies Anywhere Collection. Then use the Disney Movies Anywhere Android mobile or Android TV apps to watch your favorite Disney movies!You get more with Disney Movies Anywhere – access to more exclusive videos, more bonus content, special offers, and reward points for all your eligible digital purchases.Disney Movies Anywhere’s built in parental controls allow your family to watch their favorite Disney films in a safe environment you can trust. With Disney Movies Anywhere: • Watch your eligible Disney, Disney•Pixar, Marvel, and Star Wars movies anywhere you go, across your favorite devices. Or download movies to watch without an internet connection.• Get exclusive Disney content with your eligible purchases, including original programming, never-before-seen videos, and much more • Build your digital movie collection with a library of hundreds of movies to choose from • Unlock your Digital Copy from eligible Combo Packs (Android mobile app only)• Earn Disney Movie Rewards points for every eligible digital transactionDisney Movies Anywhere is open to U.S. residents age 13+. Visit DisneyMoviesAnywhere.com for complete details & terms and conditions.All transactions subject to applicable license terms and conditions.The movies featured and more are available on Disney Movies Anywhere.

appName: 刀劍煞-刀光劍影，煞氣逼人
description: 《刀劍煞》是專為“動作迷”量身打造，以極致動作體驗為目標的3D大型多人線上動作類手遊！【遊戲簡介】東方武俠動作手游《刀劍煞》給你超炫酷武俠體驗！端遊級超清畫面、無限動態連擊，帶你感受動作的酷爽打擊、親歷江湖的腥風血雨！【遊戲背景】東方大陸在邪惡魔龍族的侵襲下戰亂不息，霸刀、傲劍、靈煞三大派系英雄少年為平息紛爭，與魔龍一族展開殊死鬥爭。他們一路經歷格鬥、團戰、組隊闖關等重重阻礙，用熱血演繹俠骨柔情的浮生。【遊戲好康樂不停】每日登入抽大獎，持續線上得資源！成就達成領元寶，累計簽到獎不停！七日狂歡送豪禮，戰力飆升無壓力！超值投資回報大，金幣元寶天天拿！【遊戲特色】◆端遊級畫面，盡享光影盛宴通過對HDRI光照系統，高級粒子特效、殘像、角色即時陰影等技術的應用，打造出了端遊級別超清畫面，給玩家帶來無與倫比的視覺體驗。◆無限動態連擊，暢快戰不卡頓通過擬真動作引擎LSAE計算浮空高度及方向，解放Z軸，依靠立體的招式判定，精確把握時機，讓敵人浮空不落地，真正的動態連擊，給體驗者以極致戰鬥爽快感。

Beat traffic, find cheap gas price options easily, share your travel details, explore local places and more with AT&T Navigator.No matter what the journey, navigate your way around traffic in real-time using AT&T Navigator, now powered by more than 100 million traffic sources; whether it’s your daily commute, shopping with friends or taking in local city attractions. Use AT&T Navigator to plan your trip with real-time traffic updates, GPS-enabled multi-route recommendations, one-touch traffic avoidance, commute times and more.We’re making it easy to navigate when a GPS signal isn’t available with downloadable maps. When downloadable maps are active, this feature minimizes app data and battery usage. You can also easily share your journey from anywhere along your route with our Share ETA feature. Send your friends and family a temporary link displaying your ETA and a live map of your route so they get your travel details even before you arrive.Powered with more than 142 million local reviews and ratings from Yelp and TripAdvisor, AT&T Navigator also lets you discover top local restaurants, best places for coffee and drinks, hotels and other recommendations. See what the Yelp and TripAdvisor communities have to say about shopping, restaurants, hotels, bars and nearby attractions. AT&T Navigator will be your trusted guide to help you explore your city with detailed maps and recommendations no matter if you want to eat, shop, drink or play.SUBSCRIPTION CHARGES & OPTIONSNew to AT&T Navigator? Try AT&T Navigator for free* for the first 30 days and enjoy a robust set of navigation features. Unless cancelled, at the end of the 30-day period your account will automatically be billed $9.99 per month. You may cancel at any time. See Subscription Cancellation & Changes for additional information. A free**, limited features version of AT&T Navigator called Basic Maps is available after you download the AT&T Navigator app. **Data & messaging rates may apply for app download & usage. *First 30 days free for new subscribers only, otherwise $9.99/mo. Cancel w/in 30 days or you will be billed $9.99/mo. Cancel anytime at att.com/mobile purchases or call 800.331.0500 (or 611 from your mobile phone). Basic Maps option is avail. w/ no monthly subscription charge. Data & messaging rates may apply for app download & usage. Compatible phone w/elig. data plan req’d. Phone’s internal memory space is needed to use offline maps feature. App may use personal info, including location. Use governed by AT&T’s Privacy Policy found at att.com/privacy. AT&T is not responsible for any third party content and services including coupons. Participating merchants are solely responsible for the processing and redemption of coupons and related offers. Other charges & restr’s may apply. Visit http://att.com/navigator for additional terms & conditions.You took the time to tell us what you love about AT&T Navigator, and what you want changed. We listened and made some updates. Let us know what you think. Send your comments to support@telenav.com, Subject: AT&T Navigator for Android.We want to keep hearing what you love about the app and what we can do to make it even better for you.

Nemo est conçue pour vous aider à prononcer les mots les plus utiles en hébreu immédiatement et en toute confiance. Avec des millions de téléchargements à travers le monde, Nemo est maintenant disponible pour les téléphones et tablettes Android.✓ Chaque mot hébreu est prononcé clairement en audio de haute qualité par un locuteur natif.✓ Tous les sons sont téléchargés sur votre appareil et sont disponibles hors connexion ou en mode avion.✓ Maîtrisez votre accent avec Studio d’apprentissage. Il suffit de vous enregistrer lorsque vous prononcez une phrase puis d’entendre votre voix en même temps que celle de l'enseignant. Au besoin, réessayez. Vous serez étonné de voir à quelle vitesse vous allez perdre votre accent de non-natif.✓ Nemo n’est pas pensé autour de leçons. Il est destiné à être utilisé tout au long de la journée, dès que vous êtes en mesure d’y consacrer quelques minutes.✓ AUCUNE CONNAISSANCE DE BASE du hébreu n’est requise.Cette application pour apprendre l'hébreu est entièrement disponible en français ainsi qu’en 10 autres langues.Nemo cible les mots et expressions les plus souvent utilisés en conversation. Pour les débutants, nous avons préparé des listes d’introduction rapide, pour aller à l’essentiel comme « Si vous n'apprenez que 10 choses », « Si vous n'apprenez que 50 choses » et « Si vous n'apprenez que 100 choses ». Les étudiants de niveau intermédiaire peuvent opter pour un apprentissage des mots les plus fréquemment utilisés pour leurs voyages d'affaires et commencer à converser en hébreu en un mois. Les étudiants de niveau avancé bénéficieront quant à eux particulièrement de la technologie de Studio d’apprentissage qui leur permettra de corriger leur accent étranger.Avec Nemo, vous pouvez personnaliser les cartes mémoires pour optimiser votre apprentissage de la langue et vos compétences. Au début d'un nouveau sujet, configurez les cartes mémoire de manière à vous exercer en version, du hébreu au français afin de vous familiariser avec de nouveaux mots. Ensuite, passez au thème, du français au hébreu, pour exercer votre mémoire et votre capacité de parler. Pour une maîtrise complète de la langue, passez aux cartes de spécialisation, afin de peaufiner votre écoute et de perfectionner votre prononciation.N'importe quelle carte peut être marquée comme préférée, vous permettant ainsi de composer votre jeu de cartes personnalisé et par là même vous concentrer sur les mots du jour. Activez le mode de révision pour récapituler ce que vous avez pratiqué plus tôt dans la journée et ainsi optimiser vos capacités de mémorisation.Plongez-vous dans ce que vous voulez apprendre à tout moment. Le guide de conversation offre un accès rapide au vocabulaire de l'application par le biais d’une interface de dictionnaire français-hébreu. Nemo fonctionne également comme outil de traduction. Il suffit de trouver les mots dont vous avez besoin dans l'interface de recherche et d’en jouer le son via le haut-parleur de l'appareil.◆ Sortez des sentiers battus ou trouvez du réconfort avec les phrases destinées aux voyageurs.◆ Devenez petit à petit maître en la matière grâce aux chiffres et aux plus importants blocs de construction verbaux et phrastiques.◆ Prise en charge du mode « Genre du mot » pour affichage d’informations supplémentaires sur le genre des mots.L'hébreu moderne est l'une des langues officielles d'Israël et la langue la plus parlée à Jérusalem et à Tel-Aviv.Utilisez vos nouvelles compétences pour vous faire des amis, impressionner d’anciens amis, faire sourire les enfants, vous sortir de situations compliquées, expérimenter de nouvelles choses, parler avec confiance et rendre votre voyage et expérience culturelle la plus riche et épanouissante qui soit.Téléchargez cette application gratuite aujourd'hui !

Online eten bestellen met de gratis Pizza.be-app bij 1300+ restaurants. Super handig!Ben jij ook zo zot op pizza, sushi, shoarma, salade of pita? Met de Android-app van Pizza.be kun je in slechts drie simpele stappen online eten bestellen. Bij ons bestel in je bij meer dan 1300 restaurants in België. Je kunt onder andere terrecht bij Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Pitza Service, King Pizza en vele andere restaurants. Of je nu zin hebt om Indiaas, Chinees, Italiaans of Grieks te bestellen: er is keuze genoeg! Het restaurant bezorgt je eten (afhankelijk van de drukte) meestal al binnen 30-45 minuten.Voordelen van onze app✔ Jouw favoriete eten bestellen in slechts drie simpele stappen.✔ Veilig online betalen met je creditcard, Bancontact / Mister Cash of PayPal-account.✔ Al je favoriete restaurants in een handige widget op je homescreen.✔ Haal je je eten liever zelf af? Dat kan! Schakel naar afhalen om te zien bij welke restaurants dat kan. ✔ Bestelling herhalen nóg makkelijker door bestelgeschiedenis.Hoe werkt het1. Kies het restaurant en je gerecht.2. Betaal gemakkelijk en veilig met iDEAL, PayPal of creditcard. Contant aan de deur kan natuurlijk ook.3. Laat je eten bezorgen of haal het zelf af, de keuze is aan jou!Volg je bestelling tot aan de deurVolg je bestelling met de Food Tracker ® van de keuken tot aan de deur! Via drie berichten word je op de hoogte gehouden van de status van je bestelling: één ter bevestiging van je bestelling, één wanneer het restaurant begint met de bereiding in de keuken, en één wanneer je bestelling onderweg is.Nog meer handig functies✔ Bekijk alle aangesloten restaurants op de kaart.✔ Bekijk welk gerecht het populairst is bij anderen.✔ Kies makkelijk je favoriete keuken: Italiaans, Chinees, Thais, Grieks, vegetarisch of iets anders misschien? Kan allemaal!✔ Filter restaurants op beoordeling, afstand, populariteit, nieuwste restaurant, prijs, product, bezorgkosten, alfabet en relevantie.✔ De app is beschikbaar in vier talen. Switch gemakkelijk tussen Nederlands, Engels, Frans of Duits.✔ Nog geen account? Creëer je eigen account in de app en login om bestellen nog makkerlijker te maken.✔ Sla meerdere adressen op voor andere bestellingen.Zeer eenvoudig sushi, shoarma, pita, pizza, chinees, kebab, salade, pasta, Indiaas, Grieks of Chinees bestellen. Te veel om op te noemen! We maken eten bestellen met de dag simpeler!Help ons de app nóg beter te makenEnthousiast? Laat een recensie achter! De Android-app van Pizza.be wordt regelmatig voorzien van updates en nieuwe functies. Heb jij tips, ideeën of andere feedback voor onze app? Stuur een e-mail naar androidapp@takeaway.com, dan nemen wij z.s.m. contact met je op.Bon APPétit! Заказ Інтэрнэт ежа з бясплатным Pizza.be прыкладанне з 1300 + рэстараны. Супер зручна! Вы, як вар'ят, аб піцы, сушы, шашлыка, салата або Піта? З Android дадатак Pizza.be вы заказваеце вашу ежу онлайн ўсяго за тры простых кроку. With the Amazon app for Android tablets you can easily search across Amazon’s catalog of millions of products to quickly find what you are looking for, browse and shop by department, and check out lightning deals and deals of the day. Product detail pages provide useful product information and allow you to read and write product reviews or share products with friends.Enjoy features built especially for tablets, including a fun new way to set aside items – press and hold on any product image and fling it to the bottom of the screen. The items are saved in a tray that is available to you throughout the entire app, making it easy for you to get to your set aside items with one tap.All purchases made on the Amazon app for Android Tablets are routed through Amazon's secure servers just as they are on the web. And just like the web experience, Android app customers enjoy the same functionalities of the Amazon Shopping Cart, Wish Lists, order history, payment and Amazon Prime member shipping options, and 1-Click settings. Customers are able to shop any of Amazon's sites around the world from a single app.** The current release supports Android tablets that are 7" to 10" with resolutions from 600x1024 to 1600x2560 with Android OS 4.0.3 and up.Permissions:On Android devices with GPS, we access location information only so that we can provide customers with the option to send packages to a nearby Amazon Locker (a feature only available in the US and UK currently). On Android devices with both WiFi and cellular radios, we access the phone only to determine which radio to use depending on the strength of signal. On WiFi only products, this permission isn't applicable, but Android's security model requires us to ask on all installations. In order to securely send and receive push notifications on your device (should you choose to do so), we need to use the following permissions: "Receive data from Internet" and "Prevent tablet from sleeping". We require “Read Contacts” permission to make it easier for you to find and invite friends from your phone address book.* Microphone access: search Amazon catalogue of products using your voice.

Explorer is perfect for organizing your internal storage and SD card contents. Simple, with a smooth intuitive interface. You can also easily access your cloud and network files. Features include: • Multiple tabs - Easily navigate between different locations by swiping or clicking on a tab• Google Drive, Box, Dropbox and Network (SMB) support • Multiple themes (Light, dark and home wallpaper) • Built in Text Editor• Create and extract zip or tar files• Extract rar archives • Perform long running operations (e.g. copy, move) in the background • Stream video and audio files from network and cloud to media player applications• Create home screen shortcuts to files and folders• Customisable icon sets • Send files (via email, bluetooth etc)• Built in SQLite database viewer• Bookmark frequently used files and folders• Search function• "Open With" facility allowing files to be opened as a generic type or by using specific apps• View file and folder properties including size, date, MD5 checksumFor fast, friendly support simply email us: support@speedsoftware.co.ukExplorer supports 11 languages including: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Hebrew, Danish, Russian and Portuguese. Permissions:• Full network access - Required for network and cloud access. No information is passed to us over the internet.• Add or remove accounts - Used by the Google Drive SDK to add a new account if desired. No changes are made to existing accounts and no details accessed apart from the account name.• Find accounts on the device - Used to list available accounts for logging into Google Drive.• Prevent from sleeping - Used to stop the device sleeping during long operations so they are not interrupted.

Anytime and anywhere, with MyBRD Mobile you are in permanent contact with your bank, 24h/24, 24 days/7. MyBRD Mobile gives you access to your accounts, banking operations and useful information directly on your mobile phone / tablet.Using the mobile banking service you benefit from maximum security, BRD implementing in this scope the best security systems that also gives you the mobility you need.The application’s design and ergonomics are conceived so that you can enjoy the simplicity and convenience, all functions being available in only a few steps.After registration, the first screen welcomes you with a graphical representation of your favorite account so you can have quick access to the information that interests you the most.You want to transfer money to someone but you don’t know the account number? Nothing more simple! All you need to know is the phone number and full name. You make the transfer from the MyBRD Mobile application and the beneficiary may go to any BRD agency to get the amount received.Even more, you benefit of:- Relevant information about all your accounts: current accounts, savings, revolving, deposits, loans, pension fund- Transfers between accounts, including foreign exchange- Transfers to national beneficiaries, which you can define directly in the application- Bill payments, including by barcode scanning- Transfers between the users through QR code- Create and terminate depositsThe security of the application is provided by the built-in mobile token. Based on the PIN that you’ve set, it generates a unique code used to confirm each operation. Thus, you will get high security without having to carry an additional device.Also in the application have access to the bank feed where you receive information about the status of the transactions and messages sent by the bank, check the history of operations performed and you can change your PIN code.Even without logging in, you can use the public functions:- BRD’s ATMs and agencies locator- Exchange rates and currency converter- Interest rates- Information about BRD’s products and services - Credit Simulator- ContactAll you have to do now is contact the nearest BRD branch or call Vocalis service and become a MyBRD Mobile user!

#1 medical app | The Pregnancy Tracker trusted by over 3 million womenFeatured in The New York Times, Good Morning America, Forbes, The Boston Globe, CBS, People and moreLet Ovia Pregnancy make your pregnancy easier and healthier. At Ovia, we are passionate about using technology, science and data to help expecting mothers understand their unique health from conception to postpartum. With Ovia’s personalized approach you can track your pregnancy and baby’s development on a week by week basis. Receive daily feedback on your progress as you track your weight, sleep, moods, symptoms and more in our comprehensive calendar. Ovia uses this information to deliver personalized pregnancy articles, weekly baby development milestones and real-time feedback on your symptoms.Key Features- Daily updates on your baby’s size and development based on your maternity calendar- Use Ovia’s new Community feature to ask questions about your baby and pregnancy and get answers instantly. Private, anonymous and delivered directly to your inbox- Receive health alerts when your pregnancy symptoms could be dangerous - 500+ pregnancy articles, tips and tools - Calculate your due date based on date of conception and last menstrual period. Let the countdown begin! - Receive personalized feedback based on your pregnancy stage, BMI, age, personal goals, and health data as well as emotional support throughout each stage of your pregnancy and postnatal journey Track your pregnancy- Track and chart your weight progress - Manage weight gain goals with clinical guidelines for your BMI - Track your sleep - Connect Ovia with your WiFi sleep tracker Symptoms - Learn which symptoms are common for each week of pregnancy- Track 100+ possible symptoms- Get immediate alerts if your symptoms indicate a health risk or miscarriage Food - Know if you’re getting the right nutrients for your baby’s development - Record daily servings of protein, grains, dairy, fruit, veggies, waterPrenatal Foods and Vitamins - Learn what medications are safe or unsafe for pregnant moms- Track and remember to take your vitaminsMoods- Record your moods each dayExercise - Stay fit, track your workoutsEssential Tools - Symptoms lookup: Is this normal for pregnancy?- Medication safety lookup: Is this safe to take during pregnancy?- Food safety lookup: Is this safe to eat during pregnancy?Trusted Source- Developed by Harvard scientists, pregnancy specialists, and fit moms- All of your data is saved and analyzed so you can have a healthier, easier pregnancy- Backup your data safely and securely in the cloudCompletely Personalized - Guidelines for pregnancy based on your BMI, age, pregnancy day - Customizable baby name and gender- Dynamic timeline with articles and feedbackAdd Photos, Notes, Tags & Milestones- Document special pregnancy moments and milestones - Add photos of your belly, ultrasounds, baby shower etc- Add notes and create tags to keep track of questions for your doctor, things to buy, baby names ideas etcShare on Facebook, Email, Text & TwitterAll of your Ovia content is shareable. Share your pregnancy progress, milestones, baby development, and articles on Facebook, email, text and TwitterMore- Get daily reports on your pregnancy progressWhat our users are saying about Ovia - “I love that it’s individualized: it’s like the app is just for me, for my pregnancy.” -“My pregnancy is going to be different than other people’s…and it's nice to get information about me, and how to help me.”The History & Science behind Ovia Ovia is built and powered by Ovuline, a women’s health company that uses proprietary algorithms to help women conceive up to 3x faster and have healthier pregnancies. With over 3.1 million users and 325 million data points collected and analyzed, Ovuline is always improving its apps to help couples start healthy families.LEARN MOREhttp///www.ovuline.comhttp://www.facebook.com/ovuline

Write and send Email messages from the Sony SmartWatch on your wrist!IMPORTANT:* Uses GMail only, and requires the sender account to be set-up on your phone / tablet.* Before using the app, select the account through which the E-mails will be sent, and allow the requested permissions* The recepients are the contacts in your address-book(s).Type the message directly, or choose from the templates which you can define in the app settings. Use codes such as %name, which will be replaced with the recipient's name upon sending ;-)UPDATE, v2.0:If the app is performing slowly, turn spelling suggestions off in the settings.Spelling suggestions are currently available for these languages:* English* Russian* Italian* German* French* Portuguese* Greek* Serbian* Croatian* SlovenianThe spelling suggestions need to be enabled in the app settings (on your phone/tablet) first. Use the keyboard switch (top right) to select the keyboard and turn spelling suggestions on / off.DELETE a char via the <- button on the right.Insert SPACE via the _ button on the left.SWIPE UP/DOWN to scroll through the text suggestions.INSTRUCTIONS (for SmartWatch2 and v2 see the note above):====================Step 1.A: Write the message-------------------------------------------------------------------------------Swipe RIGHT to input SPACESwipe LEFT to DELETESwipe UP to enter CAPSSwipe DOWN to switch between keyboards.When done writing, LONG TAP the blue area to confirm the message contents.(On SmartWatch 2, you can also press "Menu" and then "Choose recipient")Step 1.B: Choose from a template----------------------------------------------------------------------------------LONG TAP the "Use predefined message?"(On SmartWatch 2, you can also press "Menu" and then "Select template")= Template list mode =Swipe UP and DOWN to find the template you want to use.LONG TAP the template to preview it (i.e. switch to Template preview mode)LONG TAP the blue area on the left to directly select the template, without previewing.Swipe LEFT to switch to Template preview mode = Template preview mode =Swipe UP and DOWN to find the template you want to use.LONG TAP the blue area with the text "Use this one" to select the template.LONG TAP on the gray area with the text "Cancel" to return to Step 1.ASwipe RIGHT to switch to Template list mode(On SmartWatch 2, you can also use the menu button)Step 2: Select the recipient from your contact list--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Swipe LEFT: to delete the last typed number or characterSwipe RIGHT: to delete allSwipe UP / DOWN: to switch to T9 searchSwipe UP / DOWN: to list through the search results in T9 modeLONG TAP on the green area to confirm the selection / input.(On SmartWatch 2, you can also press "Menu" and then "Send message")LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatchSmart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 Psaní a odeslání e-mailové zprávy od Sony SmartWatch na vašem zápěstí!DŮLEŽITÉ:* Používá Gmail pouze, a vyžaduje, aby odesílatele účet musí být nastavení na vašem telefonu / tabletu.* Před použitím aplikace, vyberte účet, jehož prostřednictvím bude odeslán e-maily, a aby v požadovaném Oprávnění* K příjemců jsou kontakty ve vašem adresářem (y).Zadejte zprávu přímo, nebo si vybrat z šablon, které lze definovat v nastavení app. Použijte kódy, jako% název, který bude nahrazen jménem příjemce při odesílání ;-)UPDATE v2.0:Pokud aplikace provádí pomalu, vypněte návrhy pravopisu vypnout v nastavení.Návrhy kontroly pravopisu jsou v současné době k dispozici v následujících jazycích:* English* Russian* Italian* NěmeckáFrancouzský* PortugueseŘecká* Serbian* Chorvatský* SlovenianNávrhy pravopisu musí být povoleno v nastavení app (v telefonu / tabletu) jako první. Pomocí přepínače klávesnice (vpravo nahoře) a vyberte klávesnici a zapněte návrhy kontroly pravopisu zap / vyp.DELETE char pomocí <- tlačítka na pravé straně.Vložit mezeru pomocí tlačítka _ na levé straně.Přejeďte nahoru / dolů můžete procházet návrhy textů.Pokyny (pouze pro SmartWatch2 a v2 viz poznámka výše):====================Krok 1.A: Napiš Puffin Web Browser is a wicked fast mobile browser. Once users experience the thrilling speed of Puffin, regular Mobile Internet feels like torture. Puffin Web Browser includes Adobe-Flash-Over-Cloud 24/7 now without additional in-app-purchase. Wicked Fast: Puffin speeds up mobile browsing by shifting the workload from the resource-limited devices to the cloud servers, and resource-demanding webpages can run super-fast on your phones or tablets.Cloud Protection: All traffic from Puffin app to Puffin server are encrypted, a protection from nearby hackers. It’s safe to use public non-secure WiFi through Puffin, but not safe at all for most browsers. The Latest Flash: We keep improving our cloud servers, and provide the latest version (18.0) of the Flash player over the cloud.Save your bandwidth: Puffin uses proprietary compression algorithm to transmit web data to your device, and it can save up to 90% of your bandwidth on regular web browsing. (Please be noted that streaming Flash content or videos requires more bandwidth than the normal usage.)Features:☆ Incredible page load and rendering speed☆ Adobe Flash support over cloud during the daytime (also works on Android 4.4+)☆ Download to cloud (up to 1G per file)☆ Theater mode for Flash videos and games☆ Virtual trackpad and gamepad☆ Add-on functions (Pocket, Evernote, Facebook, translator and more)☆ Color theme for toolbar and sidebar ☆ Fastest JavaScript engine☆ Full web experience (desktop and mobile view）☆ Incognito tab: Auto-clean your browsing activities in the app===== Limitations =====* The data centers of Puffin Web Browser are in the US and the cloud servers can only access public web sites from US geolocations. * For users outside the US, local contents, especially videos of local interest, may not be accessible from the US due to geo-restrictions in their home countries.* Puffin is blocked in some countries (e.g., China, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates) and by some schools (e.g., in United States).For more information, please check our FAQ: http://www.puffinbrowser.com/faq/

Unlike all other piano apps, you are not forced to follow the fixed instructions (animated dropping bar).Piano + HD is specially designed to enable you to play in any speed. Mehr Service für Sie: Die ALDI SÜD App mit allen Angeboten und Öffnungszeiten auf einen BlickInformieren Sie sich einfach und bequem von zuhause oder unterwegs über die derzeitigen Angebote unserer Aktionstage und die Preissenkungen in den ALDI SÜD Filialen. Um schnellstens dorthin zu kommen, bietet Ihnen die ALDI SÜD App die Möglichkeit, per „Filialsuche“ die nächstliegende Filiale und ihre aktuellen Öffnungszeiten zu finden. Für unsere Lebensmittel geben Ihnen zahlreiche Rezeptideen im Anschluss an den Einkauf Anregungen für diverse Gerichte und Getränke, die sich einfach und schnell zubereiten lassen. Wir wünschen Ihnen viel Spaß bei Ihrem Einkauf und mit unseren ALDI SÜD Artikeln!Unsere kostenlosen Funktionen für Sie:* Alle Angebote im Überblick: Verpassen Sie keines der Angebote unserer Aktionstage mehr und seien Sie stets über unsere Preissenkungen informiert - denn wir haben immer etwas Passendes für Sie zu bieten. * Nur einen Klick entfernt: Der praktische Filialfinder zeigt Ihnen alle ALDI SÜD Filialen in Ihrer Nähe an und informiert Sie über die aktuellen Öffnungszeiten.* Mobile Einkaufsliste: Gefällt Ihnen eines unserer Produkte, können Sie dieses in der App auf Ihrer persönlichen, mobilen Einkaufsliste speichern – somit geht kein Artikel mehr, den Sie später in der Filiale kaufen möchten, verloren. * Lassen Sie es sich schmecken: Mit unseren zahlreichen Rezeptideen für herzhafte und süße Speisen können Sie für jeden Anlass das passende Gericht zaubern – egal ob Sie Anfänger oder Profi am Herd sind. Sollten Sie Anregungen und Verbesserungsvorschläge oder aber Probleme bei der Nutzung der ALDI SÜD App haben, freuen wir uns über Ihr Feedback. Schicken Sie uns eine Mail an mail@aldi-sued.de, damit wir uns Ihrem Anliegen unmittelbar widmen und die ALDI SÜD App für Sie optimieren können. Ansonsten teilen Sie gerne Ihre Freude an der App mit anderen Nutzern, indem Sie uns positiv bewerten. Wir freuen uns zudem auf Ihren Besuch auf unserer ALDI SÜD Facebook-Seite oder in unserem ALDI SÜD YouTube Channel.Berechtigungen:* Netzwerkkommunikation: Diese Berechtigung wird insbesondere für den Abruf der aktuellen Aktionsartikel und der Filialdaten genutzt. Mit Ausnahme des Erinnerungsservices per E-Mail werden keine Informationen über den Nutzer versendet. Weitere Informationen finden Sie in unserem Datenschutzhinweis. Vor dem Abruf der aktuellen Informationen erfolgt eine Prüfung, ob tatsächlich eine Datenverbindung besteht, damit bei fehlender Datenverbindung eine entsprechende Hinweismeldung ausgegeben werden kann.* System-Start: Bislang wurden bei einem Neustart des Smartphones alle Erinnerungen gelöscht, die über die App erfolgen sollten. Erinnerungen per E-Mail waren von diesem Fehler nicht betroffen. Durch diese neue Berechtigung werden die Erinnerungen bei jedem Neustart erneut im System registriert.* Zugriff auf geschützten Speicher: Dadurch kann die ALDI SÜD App Google Maps das Zwischenspeichern der Karte ermöglichen. Die ALDI SÜD App greift selbst nicht auf den externen Speicher zu.* Ungefährer Standort: Die Nutzung des GPS benötigt vergleichsweise viel Leistung. Daher versucht die ALDI SÜD App für die Funktionalitäten der Filialsuche zunächst die Position anderweitig zu bestimmen. * Ihr Standort: Der GPS-Standort wird für die Funktionalitäten der Filialsuche benötigt.* Hardware-Steuerelemente: Die nächstgelegenen Filialen können per Augmented Reality dargestellt werden. Zusätzlich können über den Menüpunkt „Code-Reader“ unter „mehr“ viele der auf unseren Produktverpackungen aufgedruckten QR-Codes gescannt werden.

Order food delivery from local restaurants in just a few taps. Download the ease and convenience of Seamless to your device!Ditch the idea of dialing and get yourself fed! Having opposable thumbs is a huge advantage for many things: fencing, unzipping your sweaters, cleaning lint out of your pocket, and best of all, ordering your favorite foods from your favorite restaurants. So if you live in one of our Seamless cities, get those thumbs ready, your food is waiting. Seven reasons the Seamless app is the best way to get your favorite foods:1. Seamless is the easiest way to order food from your favorite local restaurants. Calling, on the other hand, is the worst part of anyone’s day. 2. Seamless is a completely free app and free service to use, plus there’s no wondering if your order is correct, it’s all right there for you!3. We’ve got oodles of restaurants with menus that are always up to date for your ordering satisfaction. Plus, new ones are added daily!4. Order sushi, pizza, thai or whatever you’re into in a snap, tap, or a click. Its that simple! 5. In the unlikely event snafu happens, we’ve got a team of helpers ready to make it right. Call or email us on the 24/7, we’ll be around. 6. Your credit card and personal information are always safe with us. Plus, tell us once and we’ll remember!7. With our food tracker you can monitor the progress of your order and get a delivery time. We promise not to judge you for being a food stalker. sonido, Holter / EKG, genética, ultra-sonido - ginecólogo, PAP, Primer Trimestre / AFP• Sustitución de asegurados: información Ver y / o la realización de los familiares (Dependiendo de los permisos otorgados Maccabi)• Visita de tarjeta desconocido: a la aprobación de una sola vez para visitar a un médico sin una tarjeta magnética• Cambiar contraseña

DESCRIPTION:Introducing Fly Delta 3.0, the biggest update yet to Delta’s award winning Android app. With redesigned navigation, quick access to important day-of-travel information and a history of all your notifications, Fly Delta makes travel easier than ever before.• Find, compare and book Domestic and International flights• Book SkyMiles® award tickets• Purchase Delta Comfort+™ and other seat products and Trip Extras, including in-flight Wi-Fi, Priority Boarding and more• Rebook cancelled flights or missed connections• Manage your trips, profile and transactions, and customize your travel preferences• Check your SkyMiles account balance and current Medallion status• Check in and download your eBoarding Pass (available at select airports worldwide)• Pay for checked bags and track their location• Check the latest flight status and receive flight and gate change notifications• Support for Android Wear™ – once checked in, view your eBoarding Pass on your watch• Save a photo to remember your parking spot• Check your status on the upgrade or standby list• View or change your seat• Locate Delta Sky Club® lounges• View expanded airport maps, public transportation details and weather information• Get detailed info about our fleet and partners• Map flights en route with an interactive flight tracker• “Today” gathers everything you need for your day of travel in one convenient place• “Feed” ensures you always have the latest flight updates, gate changes and moreThe Fly Delta app for Android and delta.com are always free to use on Delta’s WiFi enabled flights. Visit delta.com/app for more information.Delta Air Lines serves more than 160 million customers each year. With its unsurpassed global network, Delta and its partner airlines offer service to more than 350 destinations in nearly 70 countries in six continents.

RADYO is a comprehensive global radio entertainment application which lets you listen to various music stations all over the world.RADYO project has been active since 2009 with your sincere support and it has inspired many music applications during it's development. Again, as we hope, with your help we will keep listening to radio with RADYO in the year 2015 too!We all love music! Different style, different life, the same feeling!Premium features of RADYO is currently FREE for Android users.HOW FREE:We always wanted RADYO to be free and we think we succeeded in doing this while keeping the necessary features for a normal RADYO user. Neither do we like advertisements and limitations! Though, to be able to serve this application under reasonable conditions, without preventing normal users from enjoying the application, we combined some features under Premium Usage category and we added advertisement areas on to sections where it won't disturb you. These sections may still show up with the Premium Usage; there will be alternatives to remove them completely. If there is anything you don't like, please first contact with us using the contact form located in the application; we are ready to listen to you.GIFT:You may buy and and give gift cards (codes) to whomever you want. Gift owners may easily activate Premium features in seconds without paying anything! Currently, Premium features -except removal of advertisements- are free for Android users under "Plus" features. Activating a gift card will upgrade the application to premium level and remove most of the advertisements too.CONTACT:You can reach us easily and tell us about your ideas or experiences, by using the contact form located on our website or the one integrated right inside the application; may you use the review/comments section of the Store, we may not be able to help you as we will probably not be able to reach you.RADYO SITES:RADYO supports it’s own url mechanism that lets listeners easily share stations between them. This feature also lets website owners to embed an RADYO link to their website easily and let the followers listen to their station with one click. RADYO will manage any address changes. No need to worry about streaming address changes anymore!YOUR FAVORITE STATION:If it's not on the list, it'll be on the list! Please contact us!ADVERTISERS:You may advertise in the application with viewer targeting options.SPONSORSHIP:You may gift Premium features to RADYO users and show your logo inside the application.PERMISSIONS:You have every right to know the details of the permissions used/requested by RADYO. We documented them for you: http://androidradyo.com/permissionsMORE:http://androidradyo.com/featureshttp://androidradyo.com/faq

Avec l’application EDF & MOI, mes contrats d'énergie sont à portée de main ! En m’authentifiant, j'accède à mon espace client pour : • voir en un coup d'œil l'état de mon compte EDF sur le tableau de bord, • comprendre et m’aider à réduire ma consommation avec le suivi de consommations e.quilibre, • transmettre mes relevés de compteur tous les deux mois pour être facturé au plus juste, • payer ma facture ou gérer mon mode de paiement (Prélèvement Automatique ou Mensualisation), • télécharger une attestation de contrat ou ma facture EDF (seulement si souscrit au service gratuit Facture Electronique et au Prélèvement Automatique), • souscrire le contrat d'énergie le mieux adapté en cas de déménagement. Je peux mémoriser mon e-mail/mot de passe en cochant la case "Se souvenir de moi" - disponible à partir de la version 4.3 Android et pour les smartphones non "rootés".L'application EDF & MOI me permet aussi de : • consulter la liste des numéros de téléphone utiles, • trouver la boutique EDF la plus proche, • comparer les différentes offres d'énergie d'EDF, • connaître la couleur des jours EJP ou Tempo, après une 1ère authentification à l'espace client (si j'ai souscrit à l'une de ces options). À quoi servent les autorisations demandées lors de l'installation de l'appli ? • Position : l’accès à votre position géographique est utilisé uniquement pour afficher les boutiques EDF proches de vous. • Téléphone : cela vous permet de téléphoner à un conseiller client depuis la page Contacts, à votre initiative uniquement. • Photos/Contenus multimédias/Fichiers : permet d'optimiser l'affichage de la carte des Boutiques. L'API Google Maps ne fonctionne pas sans cette autorisation malheureusement. • Caméra : permet d'allumer le flash pour le relevé de compteur (bien utile si votre compteur est dans une zone sombre) • Identifiant d'appareil et infos d'appel : permet d'identifier votre appareil pour recevoir des notifications si vous les acceptez. NB : Ces informations ne sont pas utilisées à d'autres fins et ne sont pas conservées. Amb l'aplicació del FED & ME, els meus contractes d'energia estan a la mà!Autenticació, puc accedir al meu espai client:• veure d'un cop d'ull l'estat del meu compte d'EDF en el tauler d'instruments,• comprendre i ajudar a reduir els meus consum amb el seguiment e.quilibre consum,• transmetre les meves lectures dels comptadors cada dos mesos per ser carregada a la fira,• pagar la factura o és propietari de la meva pagament (domiciliació bancària o pagament mensual)• descarregar un certificat o contracte de la meva factura de la llum (només si subscrit al servei gratuït Factura Electrònica i dèbit)• subscriure el contracte d'energia més adequada quan es mou.Puc recordar el meu correu electrònic / contrasenya marcant la casella "Remember Em" - disponible a partir de la versió 4.3 d'Android per a telèfons intel·ligents no "Rootes".aplicació del FED & ME també em permet:• una llista de telèfons d'interès,• trobar la botiga més propera del FED,• comparar les diferents ofertes d'energia EDF• conèixer el color de EJP i Tempo dies després d'una primera autenticació de Dijon (si em vaig subscriure a una d'aquestes opcions).Quins són els permisos sol·licitats a l'instal·lar l'aplicació?• Posició: accés a la seva ubicació només s'utilitza per a visualitzar les botigues del FED a prop seu.• Telèfon: això li permet trucar per telèfon a un assessor de clients de la pàgina de contactes, només la seva iniciativa.• Fotos / Contingut multimèdia / Arxius: optimitza la visualització de les botigues de mapes. L'API de Google Maps no funciona sense aquest permís per desgràcia.• Cambra: els commutadors de la lectura del mesurador de flash (encara que útil si el mesurador està en una zona fosca)• ID de dispositiu i la informació de la trucada: per identificar el dispositiu per rebre notificacions si està d'acord.Nota: Aquesta informació no s'utilitza per a altres fins i no es conserven.

appName: ルナルナLite：無料で生理/排卵日予測！生理日管理アプリ
description: ゜.+:。おかげさまで、700万DL突破しました゜.+:。 次の生理日や排卵日、妊娠しやすい時期/妊娠しづらい時期、ダイエットにオススメの時期や日々の体調など、女の子が気になるからだの情報がギュッと詰まった無料の生理日管理アプリです！◇◆概要◆◇生理が来たら、その生理日をパッと簡単入力。それだけで、次の生理予定日(生理日予測)、排卵予定日(排卵日予測)、ダイエットやお肌の調子など、あなたのからだをバッチリお知らせ！さらにトップ画面とカレンダーの表示で一目で分かりやすい！日常的に使うのにもめんどくさくなく、手軽に生理日予測ができてとっても便利な、女性のための体調管理アプリです。しかも無料！◇◆ルナルナLiteの特徴◆◇・「次の生理日まで○日」と、トップ画面でカウントダウン。具体的な生理予定日、排卵予定日の日付や、妊娠可能性の高い/低いもアプリを開けば一目で分かります！・生理日が近くなると、トップに記録ボタンを表示。ポンポンっとタップするだけで簡単に毎回の生理を記録できます♪ ・生理周期とからだの調子は、実は密接に関係しているもの。あなたの生理周期に合わせて、「ダイエット」「お肌」「キレイ」を始めとした5つの指数(アドバイス)をお届け！ ・先の予定を立てたい時は、見やすいカレンダーで生理予定日/排卵予定日をチェック！ 妊娠可能性の高い期間もカレンダーに表示されるから、旅行などの計画にも使える♪・これだけ使えて全部無料！ みんな使ってる生理日管理アプリです！◇◆基本機能◆◇1.生理日予測/排卵日予測記録されたこれまでの生理の生理開始日を元に、次回の生理日、排卵日を予測してお知らせします。 また、毎回の生理周期も確認できます。2. 妊娠可能性の予測記録されたこれまでの生理から生理周期を計算し、今のあなたの妊娠可能性(妊娠しやすい日/妊娠しにくい日)を予測してお知らせします。 3.指数(体調アドバイス)表示体調と密接な関係がある女性ホルモンのバランスを、過去の生理日と生理周期から計算。次の生理予定日までの間で、お肌の調子やダイエットに最適な日を表示する「お肌指数」「ダイエット効果指数」が確認できます。 さらに、美容ケアに役立つ「キレイ指数」や、各種タイアップ指数も提供中です！ 4.カレンダー次の生理予定日、排卵予定日と、妊娠可能性の高い期間をカレンダーで一目で確認できます。ちょっとした日記などを書けるメモ欄も付いていますので、生理日管理にお役立ち♪5.体重/体脂肪率の記録毎日の体重/体脂肪率を記録でき、グラフ表示にも対応。増えているのか減っているのか傾向をチェックして、ダイエットを成功させて！6.基礎体温の記録毎日の基礎体温も、数字4ケタをさっと入力するだけでOK！これも自動でグラフ化されるので、生理日予測、排卵日予測や、自分のからだのバイオリズムがより把握しやすくなります。7.パスコードロック生理や基礎体温、体重などのパーソナルなデータは、誰にも見られたくないですよね。ルナルナLiteにはちゃんとパスコードロック機能が付いているので、安心して生理日管理ができます。◇◆お客様からの声◆◇「生理日予測がとても確実で、旅行の計画等に役立っています」 「生理日管理も体重管理も、無料でここまでできるってすごい！」 「排卵日予測が的中して、おかげで妊娠しました！」 などの声を数多くいただいております。 （どうもありがとうございます！） Die neue SATURN App bietet mehr Technik News aus dem TURN ON Online Magazin sowie heiße Schnäppchen und bequemeres Shoppen. Hol dir jetzt das Update für dein Smartphone oder Tablet.Die neuen Highlights:• Mehr Technik-News– Mit TURN ON bekommst du die neuesten Tech-Trends, Top Produkte & aktuelle Tests.– Produkt Ratgeber & Toplisten zeigen, was grade angesagt ist.– Du hast jederzeit Zugriff auf die komplette TURN ON Mediathek.– Auf Wunsch wirst du über neue Highlight-Folgen per Notification erinnert.• Mehr Schnäppchen– Alle Angebote aus den aktuellen TV-Spots & dem SATURN Prospekt.– Super-Sunday & Late Night Shopping als Notification einstellen und nie mehr Schnäppchen verpassen.• Mehr Shoppen– Die Riesen-Markenauswahl in geordneten Kategorien durchstöbern oder nach deinen Wünschen clever filtern.– Gekaufte Produkte im nächsten SATURN-Markt abholen oder bequem liefern lassen.– Immer die neueste Markentechnik entdecken und auf Merkzetteln festhalten.• Und außerdem – Einfach mit Facebook-Account anmelden und Lieblingsgeräte direkt Teilen oder Senden.– Gutscheine und Geschenkkarten ganz bequem über die App einlösen.Die App benötigt Zugriff auf folgende Berechtigungen:- Identität: Für den Versand von Push-Benachrichtigungen greift die App auf Google Cloud Messaging zu. Den Erhalt von Push-Benachrichtigungen können Sie jederzeit über die Einstellungen der App deaktivieren.- Standort: Für die Funktion Marktsuche „Saturn vor Ort“ greift die App auf Ihren aktuellen Standort zu. Diese Funktion können Sie jederzeit über die Einstellungen der App deaktivieren.- Fotos/Medien/Dateien: Um die Performance der App zu optimieren, werden Dateien lokal auf Ihrem Gerät zwischengespeichert.- Kamera: Für die Nutzung des QR Code-Scanners benötigt die App Zugriff auf die Funktion Ihrer Kamera.- WLAN-Verbindungsinformationen: Um eine optimale Performance der App zu garantieren, benötigt die App Zugriff auf den Status Ihrer WLAN-Verbindung.- Informationen zur Bluetooth Verbindung: Für den Erhalt von ortsabhängigen Nachrichten, benötigt die App Zugriff auf die Bluetooth-Verbindung. Den Erhalt von ortsabhängigen Nachrichten können Sie jederzeit über die Einstellungen der App deaktivieren.Diese App unterstützt aktuell Android 2.3 und höher.Die App ist generell für Smartphones optimiert, Tablets größer 7 Zoll werden derzeit nicht unterstützt.

Data Perks, brought to you by AT&T and Aquto, makes it easy for AT&T customers on an eligible plan to earn extra data and transfer it to their wireless plan. More data equals more fun on your phone.With Data Perks, the equation is simple: Take surveys, shop, sign up for subscriptions and more from popular brands to earn data, measured in megabytes (MB). Your earned data is added to your Data Perks account. Each bill period, you can transfer up to 1,000 earned MB from your Data Perks account to your AT&T smartphone line for that line to use within your current bill period.* Use your earned data to enjoy videos, music, and more. *Transferred data is used and expires within the bill period transferred. See below for additional app details.BENEFITSEarn extra MB by completing offers featured on the app.Taking surveys, signing up for subscriptions, and shopping are all ways you can earn extra data.Transfer up to 1,000 MB per bill cycle to the AT&T smartphone line registered with the app.REQUIREMENTS*Android smartphone running OS 4.0 and above*An eligible AT&T postpaid consumer wireless plan that includes data Learn more at http://att.com/dataperksTry the app today, and we’ll give you 25MB to get started. Go ahead, start earning now!Data Perks: Data may only be earned, transferred & used by the individual smartphone line registered with the app. It cannot be shared. Earned data begins to expire if app not used for 12 consecutive months or with app cancellation. Data Transfers: Data transferred from app is used within the bill period transferred & prior to monthly plan data. Unused transferred data automatically expires at the end of the bill period transferred or with certain plan changes (such as switching to an ineligible plan). Transferred data is for domestic use only. Data Rates: Data rates may apply to app download & usage. Offers: App features third-party offers subject to each merchant’s offer terms & conditions. AT&T is not responsible for third-party products or services. App offers & terms of use are subject to change & app may be discontinued at any time without notice.

Fun fact: “Kim Ariyor?” means “Who is calling?” in Turkish ☺ WHY CALLER ID?Imagine answering a call – or receiving a missed call – from a person or a company you have never talked to before. You think “Who is calling?” With Kim Ariyor? you can immediately see who this caller is on your mobile phone – you can even identify who calls you from most mobile phone numbers*. Kim Ariyor? Gives you caller details on over 1.5 billion numbers! It shows the name, address and other details right on your screen, while the phone is still ringing. This means you can prepare yourself properly for the call, or even decide not to take it. Priceless!WHAT DOES KIM ARIYOR? DO?Kim Ariyor? gives you Caller ID on all calls, about private persons as well as businesses. Search phone numbers, block spam callers and identify who’s calling, while the call is happening! KIM ARIYOR? FEATURES➢CALLER ID: Don’t wonder about who is calling you, if you don’t have the number in your contact list. With Kim Ariyor? you can now identify a caller in real time. ➢BLOCK CALLS: Avoid annoying telemarketers, scam calls and other spam callers. Simply block calls with Kim Ariyor?➢SEARCH NUMBERS: Identify name, address or business information of the person or company behind a number. With Kim Ariyor? you can identify contact information on over 1.5 billion callers’ numbers worldwide!➢BACKUP CONTACTS: Tired of losing contacts when you switch to a new phone? With Kim Ariyor?’s Backup function, you will never lose a contact’s number again.➢UPDATE CONTACTS: Easily add numbers to enrich your phone’s contact list with name and address information. With Kim Ariyor? you can add new numbers and profiles for callers that you want to keep in your phone book.➢MY PROFILE: Manage the name other users see, when you call them by updating your profile in Kim Ariyor? Delete unwanted nicknames in our database information to maintain a clean and flawless reputation.➢SCREEN SETTINGS: In the app settings you can choose which screens to show, choose the location of the caller ID window and choose for how long you want the information display to show. STILL READING? Go ahead and download the Kim Ariyor? app NOW! ☺CIAmedia GmbHKim Aryior? is developed by Austrian-based CIAmedia GmbH. CIAmedia is also the company behind the award winning caller ID app – CIA (Caller Identification App™). Across all platforms, more than 45 million mobile phone users have downloaded CIA to their smartphones worldwide. Live running train status, time tables, station status, PNR enquiry, a unique berth & seat calc, and reservation date calc for Indian Railways.Amaze your co travellers by telling them "Hmmmm.. we are running twenty minutes late", without looking outside!You can also add home screen widgets & quick★marks for ultra-quick, one-touch access to train, station & PNR status and time tables.Time tables & PNR statuses are cached offline for quick rechecking.Featuring the handy berth & seat calculator: for the times when you want to quickly know whether its a lower berth or an aisle seat......and the reservation date calculator: to find the reservation opening date for a given date of travel, and also set reminders for it.A convenient link to open the IRCTC mobile app/website based on the time of day is also featured.The app has a companion app to make your journeys even better, which may be installed by selecting the "More Enquiries" option.Note: 'Launch Map'- launches the default android 'Maps' application which can show the exact location of the train on Google Maps. Please note: this will work only if the 'Maps' application and location features are available on your device; these are pre-installed on most android phones and tablets.Train status information shown is from the National Train Enquiry system - http://enquiry.indianrail.gov.inPermission required (only in pre-KitKat devices):Photos/Media/Files - This is for accessing the external storage, where time tables and PNR statuses are saved offline. (Note that the permission is not called 'External Storage' or 'SD Card', but 'Photos/Media/Files'.)Beta Testing:If you would like to check out new features as they are being developed, please join the ITS Beta Testers Google+ group, https://plus.google.com/u/1/communities/110626927754743610753

appName: OLX South Africa: Sell and Buy
description: Love buying at bargain prices?On OLX, your local classifieds app, we get thousands of *new* ads every hour, making it easy to find the bargain that’s just right for you. Upgrade your life – without affecting your budget.Or, maybe it’s time to move on?For your unused stuff that it is!With OLX, you’ll have the perfect place to find a new home for all the stuff you just don’t need anymore. Selling your unused stuff is as easy as taking a photo - so you can make extra cash in a flash. Here are the things we think you'll love most about OLX:+ Make money when you sell – or save money when you buy #UpgradeMyLife+ You can browse through thousands of deals to discover gems near you+ Posting is free and super quick+ Your item will be for sale in under 15 minutes+ Better search to help you get the best deals

300 Abs - is your own home trainer for ab workout.If you want to have strong and beautiful abdominal muscles - it for you! You can find all information about training abs here.It is simple program but very effective. Program contain 21 levels from 0 to 300 abs.App features:- Timer between sets;- 21 Levels (training programs);- Notifications will remind if you forgot about pushups;- Warm ups before training;- Quick statistic (current program and day, level, status and medals);- Cloud service to backup your statistic;300 Abs - it is one app from great series of programs "Be Stronger". Combine different programs - 300 Squats, 100 Pushups, 50 Pullups.1. Do the test (max situps as you can).2. Select the most appropriate schemeFor example: if you perform 15 abs - start from scheme - '11-20 situps', if 45 - select '41-50 situps'.Training program for abs needn't breaks, it designed for 6 days. On 7th day you must do the test again (max situps as you can). If you can't complete one of the training days, don't worry. Repeat this day again. After every training your strength and stamina will increase and in next training you could do more situps.Follow these rules until you reach 300 absTo achieve the best result we recommend to combine "300 Abs workout" with other apps "Be Stronger"Good luck!There is ads in app. To disable ads please buy inapp.

Die App bietet Folgendes:* Einfache und übersichtliche Benutzeroberfläche* Direkte und schnelle Umrechnung des gewünschten Betrages* Werbefrei* Wahlweise die wichtigsten Währungen oder sämtliche Währungen weltweit* Währungstabelle, um schnell Beträge abzuschätzen* Stark verbessertes Look & Feel* Wechselkurse werden automatisch gespeichert* Automatische Updates lassen sich deaktivieren (z.B. während des Roamings)* Mehrsprachige Anwendung* App2SD-Unterstützung* Freie Software unter der GNU GPLDie Berechtigungen und wozu sie nötig sind* Uneingeschränkter Internetzugriff Nötig, um die Kursdaten aus dem Internet abzufragen* Vibrationsalarm steuern Nötig für die Funktion „Vibrieren bei Tastendruck“Viel Spaß mit dem Währungsrechner!Frank

Heineken komt met iets heerlijks: Heineken biertegoed. Een uniek programma, waarmee je via de App, Biertegoed kunt verzilveren voor een vers getapte Heineken aan de bar. Hoe gaat het in zijn werk? Simpel! Zo werkt het: 1 Koop een Heineken verpakking met Biertegoed code in de winkel 2 Activeer de code op de verpakking via de Heineken Biertegoed app 3 Enjoy een vers getapte Heineken aan de bar na het verzilveren van je Biertegoed Welke verpakkingen bevatten Biertegoed? - Heineken 24x30cl krat: 1 Biertegoed - Heineken 12x25cl flessen met draadop, zonder statiegeld: ½ Biertegoed - Heineken 6x25cl flessen met draaidop, zonder statiegeld: ¼ Biertegoed Waar kun je het verzilveren? Heineken Biertegoed kun je verzilveren bij ruim 2.000 cafés in Nederland. Er is dus altijd wel een café bij jou in de buurt. Open de app, meld je vrijblijvend aan en ontdek welke cafés bij jou in de buurt mee doen! Extra in de app De app houdt het saldo bij van je opgewaardeerde en verzilverde Heineken Biertegoed. Daarnaast tappen wij voor jou regelmatig verse Heineken acties, de leukste social media posts, quizjes en handige tips. Zo mis je niks! * Kijk voor meer informatie, voorwaarden en beperkingen op Heineken.nl HEINEKEN BIERTEGOED IS 6 MAANDEN GELDIG, EXCLUSIEF TE BESTEDEN IN GESELECTEERDE HORECAZAKEN IN NEDERLAND. DE AANKOOPPRIJS IN DE WINKEL IS DE PRIJS VAN HET PRODUCT ÉN BIERTEGOED IN HORECA. ER GELDEN BEPERKINGEN T.A.V. MAXIMUM AANTAL TE SPAREN EN TE VERZILVEREN BIERTEGOED PER DAG. VERZILVEREN IS MOGELIJK PER HEEL BIERTEGOED. KIJK VOOR ALLE VOORWAARDEN OP HEINEKEN.NL Heineken comes with something delicious: Heineken credit.A unique program, which you can redeem through the App, Beer Credit for a freshly tapped Heineken at the bar. How does it work? Simple!That is how it works:1 Buy a pack of Heineken Beer Credit Code in the shop2 Enter the code on the package through the Heineken Beer Credit App3 Enjoy a freshly tapped Heineken at the bar after cashing your Beer Credit Which packages include Beer Credit?- Heineken 24x30cl crate: 1 Beer Credit- Heineken 12x25cl bottles draadop without deposit ½ Beer Credit- Heineken 6x25cl bottles with screw cap, without deposit: ¼ Beer CreditWhere can you cash it?Heineken Beer Credit can be redeemable at over 2,000 pubs in the Netherlands. So there is always a bar in your area. Open the app, sign up on a voluntary basis and find out which cafes in your area to join!Extra in the appThe app keeps the balance on your upgraded and struck Heineken Beer Credit. In addition, we regularly draw fresh Heineken actions for you, the best social media posts, quizzes and tips. So you miss nothing! * For more information, conditions and limits on Heineken.nlHEINEKEN BEER CREDIT IS VALID FOR 6 MONTHS, EXCEPT TO SPEND IN SELECTED CATERING BUSINESS IN THE NETHERLANDS. THE PURCHASE PRICE IN THE SHOP IS THE PRICE OF THE PRODUCT ONE BEER BALANCE IN HOSPITALITY. THERE RESTRICTIONS Attn MAXIMUM NUMBER TO SAVE AND SILVER BEER CREDIT PER DAY. SILVER IS POSSIBLE BY A LOT OF BEER CREDIT. LOOK FOR ALL CONDITIONS HEINEKEN.NL

appName: Thần Tiên Cũng Có Giang Hồ
description: Tác phẩm: Thần tiên cũng có giang hồThể loại: Xuyên khôngGiới thiệu: Than tien cung co giang hoDù có là thần tiên hay phàm nhân thì cũng có chút giống nhau, có chăng là họ một nơi nào đó cực lạc. Thần tiên thì thần tiên không phải cũng có gốc gác con người, có tâm cơ, có bản tính sao ?Thần tiên thì thế nào? Chẳng phải là nam nhân vẫn cứ đấu đá tranh nhau đấy thôi?! Nam nữ vẫn cứ liếc mắt đưa tình đó thôi?!Tiểu bạch Đinh chạy từ nơi đô thị hiện đại đến nơi nước đục thì sao? Vẫn có thể kề vai sát cánh với thần tiên, càng làm càng phát triển. Nàng cư nhiên có thể xuyên không đến chốn này, nơi cảnh đẹp như tranh vẽ, người người xung quanh đang ở cõi khác.Sư phụ không thích ta? Mặc kệ? Lão nhân gia hắn không thể thiếu ta, bởi vì chỉ có bổn tiểu thư mới rút được thanh kiếm nguy hiểm kia!Cái thứ thần thú, pháp bảo gì đó, bổn tiểu thư sẽ thu nhận một cách không khách khí!Aii, tiên tại giang hồ, thân bất do kỷ!Còn nữa còn nữa, tam giới đại loạn, tu tiên phạm phải sai lầm, thật sự không phải do ta! Ta thề! Thần tiên thì thần tiên thì sao chứ Thần Tiên Cũng Có Giang Hồ cơ mà

appName: 【戦艦】Warship Saga ウォーシップサーガ
description: 【アップデート内容】■軍用機を追加■ログインイベントの奨励を調整キャラクター作成の24時間後にゲームにログインして、ログインギフトのレア艦船は「ビスマルク」から「大鳳」に変わります！！※アップデータ前でキャラ作成、アップデート後で受領する場合も「大鳳」になりますの、ご注意してください。■「限定優待」のイベントお得な商品を調整22日アップデート後、商品を調整しリセットすることになります。アップデート前のお得商品は販売をリセットしますので、まだご購入していない方は、お見逃しなく！■軍団貢献の上級寄付を調整VIP0每日1回、VIP1每日3回，VIP5每日10回，VIP8~制限なし■「軍団護送」時間を調整時間19：00-23：00■デイリークエストで軍事品ショップと諜報センターで艦船抽選を追加■「港湾争奪戦」と「軍団護送」戦役時間を調整サーバーオープン14日合後、挑戦できます。■遠洋争覇戦の奨励を調整■「港湾争奪戦」、「軍団護送」、「軍団対抗戦」の軍団報酬は参加しポイントを獲得したメンバーのみ獲得 ■「軍団対抗戦」報酬は、軍団全メンバー獲得から参加メンバーのみ獲得に変更 ■「軍団対抗戦」決戦回数の使い切り通知を追加■「軍団対抗戦」参加条件を、軍団メンバー≥25人から軍団メンバー≥5人に変更 ■一部の不具合を修正------------ゲームの特徴-------------【200隻以上の歴代艦船を完全再現！】ミリタリーマニアも納得の美麗な艦船グラフィック。細部を見逃さず、こだわり抜きハイクオリティに再現された世界の名鑑たち。実在の名鑑を集め、あなただけのオリジナルの艦隊を作りましょう。【世界の覇権を賭けた物語】物語の中であなたはどの国にも属しておらず、全ての航路を征服していきます。敵国同士による同盟が結ばれても、あなたは全ての国を敵に回しても孤軍奮闘します。生ある限り、あなたの故国と航路を守る。母なる海はあなたの決意を見ていることでしょう。【美麗な海戦バトルシーンと特殊効果】美しく精密な海戦バトルシーン。ゲームの中で様々な気候や天候、多種多様な地形、時間、光と影の効果。これらの組み合わせにより、毎回バトルシーンの情景は変化し、プレイヤーを飽きさせません。【いざ、永遠の航海へ】海域を制覇できない艦隊は真の艦隊とは言えません。定番のPVP、PVEの遊び方以外にも、様々な独創的なゲームシステムを搭載。自らの艦隊を結成し，思い通りに陣形を組みましょう。全世界を航行しながら、神秘の資源を求め探索をし、世界の海の覇権を掌握してください。------------こんな人にオススメ-------------・ミリタリーや戦艦を愛好する・近代史が好き・第二次世界大戦の英雄たちに憧れる・ストラテジーゲームが好き・今ある戦艦ゲームに物足りなさを感じている・ドラマチックなストーリーにハマる・コレクションをするのが好き------------ストーリー-------------1939年9月3日夜に本事件は発生。ヘブリディーズ諸島以西，敵の雷撃を避けるためにジグザク航行をしていた客船アテナ号はドイツ海軍の潜水艇U-30により撃沈。この事件から主人公の苛烈な戦争の物語は始まります主人公であるあなたはこのゲームを通じ、第二次世界大戦を舞台に九死に一生を得る体験し、友と絆を結び、苦しい別れと暖かい愛情に包まれ、世界の海をあなたの手に収めることができるでしょう【公式Twitter】　@Warship_Support【推奨端末】Android4.0以上※Android4.0以上の端末であっても一部未対応の端末もございます。推奨端末以外でのサポート、補償等は致しかねますので何卒ご了承くださいませ。 [UPDATES]■ Add the military aircraft■ Adjust the encouragement of login eventsLog in to the game in the 24 hours after the character creation, rare ship of login gift will change to "Daiotori" from the "Bismarck"! !※ character created in the previous update, the will to be "Daiotori" If you want to receive in a later update, please be careful.■ "limited preferential treatment" adjust the event deals Product22 days after the update, it will be reset to adjust the commodity. Since the pre-update deals commodity resets sell, those who have not purchased yet, do not miss!■ Adjust the senior donation of corps contributionVIP0 Every day once, VIP1 Every day three times, VIP5 Every day 10 times, without VIP8 ~ limit■ Adjust the "army convoy" timeTime 19:00 to 23:00■ Add the ship lottery in the daily quest for military goods shop and intelligence center■ a "port competition" adjust the "army convoy" campaign timeAfter the server open 14 days if, you can challenge.■ Adjust the encouragement of the ocean race for supremacy■ "Port scramble", "army convoy", corps reward of "Legion tournament" earned only members earn points to participate■ "corps tournament" compensation, changes to the acquisition only members participate from the corps all members acquisition■ "corps tournament," added the one-time-use notification of the decisive battle of times■ the "Legion tournament" participation conditions, changes in ≥5 people corps members from corps members ≥25 people■ modify some of the problems------------ Game Features -------------[200 vessels or more successive ship full reproduction! ]Beautiful ship graphics of military mania also convinced. Not miss the details, Directory around the world that have been reproduced in Good Without high quality. Collect the real Hall of Fame, let's make your own original fleet.[Story that bet the hegemony of the world]In the story you are not belong to any country, will continue to conquer all of the route.Also tied the alliance by the enemy to each other, you will also lone struggle by turning all of the country to the enemy. As long as there is life, defend your homeland and the route. Mother sea will be looking at your decision.[Beautiful naval battle battle scenes and special effects]Beautifully precise naval battle scene. A variety of climate and weather in the game, a wide variety of terrain, time, light and shadow effects. These combinations, each scene of the battle scene is changing, do not get bored players.[Emergency, to eternal voyage]The fleet can not be conquered the sea is not a true fleet. Classic PVP, other than the play of the PVE, equipped with a variety of ingenious game system. And they formed their own fleet, let he wanted to set a formation. While sailing the whole world, to the search request the mystery of resources, please seize the hegemony of the world's oceans.------------ Recommended for people -------------Loving Military and battleship- Modern history like- Yearn for heroes of the Second World WarI like strategy games· Feels thing insufficient in the battleship game now- Addictive dramatic story- The collection likes------------story-------------The case occurred in 1939 September 3 evening. Hebrides west, cruise ship Athena issue that had been a zig-zag sailing in order to avoid the lightning of the enemy is sunk by the submarine U-30 of the German Navy. Story of a harsh war hero from this incident will beginIs the hero you through this game, the Second World War to have a narrow escape experience on stage, signed a friend and bonds, wrapped in painful farewell and warm affection, that fit the world of the sea in your hands you will be[Official Twitter]@Warship_Support[Recommended terminal]Android4.0 or more※ even Android4.0 or more terminals there is also not compatible with terminal part. 24/7 access to health information and decision-support tools.WebMD for Android helps you with your decision-making and health improvement efforts by providing mobile access 24/7 to mobile-optimized health information and decision-support tools including WebMD’s Symptom Checker, Drugs & Treatments, First Aid Information and Local Health Listings. WebMD the App also gives you access to first aid information without having to be connected wirelessly – critical if you don’t have Internet access in the time of need. KEY FEATURES• WebMD Symptom Checker – Select the part of the body that is troubling you, choose your symptoms, & learn about potential conditions or issues.• Conditions – Find medically reviewed information about Conditions relevant to you & learn more about causes, treatments, & related symptoms.• Drugs & Treatments – Search our extensive database for information on Drugs, Supplements, & Vitamins. Access content such as Uses, Side Effects, Warnings, and more.• Pill Identification Tool – Identify your prescription drugs and over the counter medicines by pill shape, color, & imprint.• First Aid Essentials – Your handy guide for medical emergencies. From insect stings to broken bones, helpful treatment tips are always available, even without an Internet connection.• Local Health Listings – Find the closest physician, hospital, & pharmacy based on your current location or search by city, state or zip.Personalization:• Create custom lists of Drugs, Conditions, and Articles• Save custom lists securely• Review your saved information anytime and anywhereADDITIONAL FEATURES• Native Voice Search Functionality – Search WebMD with their voice for a condition, drug, treatment or first aid topic.• Maps – View local health listings & individual Physician, Hospital, & Pharmacy locations in a map view.• Get Directions – Enter your primary address once in app settings and get one click directions.• Email Friends – Send your friends medically reviewed content covering First Aid, Conditions, & Drugs.• Email Me – Quickly send yourself content with one click. Simply save your email address in app settings.• Content Updates – Timely content is updated automatically. • Tour – Swipe through a quick visual tour of key features and navigation.ABOUT WebMDWebMD Health Corp. (Nasdaq: WBMD) is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.SOURCE WebMD Health Corp.WebMD. Better Information. Better Health.WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the WebMD mobile application.

Wishbone is your home for comparing social content. Every morning you receive a new "Daily Dozen", which is a series of 12 pop culture-based questions with two distinct choices. If you complete all 12, then you get a "Nightly Dozen" too!! You pick a side and then you can see how your friends voted. It's a quick and fun start to each morning, giving you a little bit of knowledge about what’s buzzing around the world. We cover humor, fashion, celebrities, sports, music and pretty much anything that you want to talk about.Now with Community Feed!! - Get 20x the questions every day! Also - Create your own Wishbone to share with your friends. If it's really great, we'll feature it in the app for the whole community to vote on.

This free, interactive app will provide you with trusted Kelley Blue Book® Values and the information you need to simplify the car buying process and get a great deal! From the dealership lot to just about anywhere, you can easily find the value of your current car or research new and used car prices. This KBB.com app gives you direct access to vehicle pricing and information to help you make a confident car buying decision. Find a local dealer and access detailed maps and directions.
