Google Play обрав крокомір Accupedo, як один з 30 найкращих додатків 2014 року в Google Play Store у Японії і Кореї. [Грудень 2014]"Крокомір Accupedo став гарним приятелем для ходьби у наших останніх тестах." [Washington Post, 10/1/12] "Серед додатків для смартфонів, крокомір Accupedo на Android в цьому році був на першому місці." [LA Times, 12/28/11]Accupedo – це додаток для точного підрахунку кроків, який щодня відстежує всі Ваші прогулянки прямо на домашньому екрані. Контролюйте пройдені кроки, спалені калорії, пройдену відстань і час з легкими для читання графіками і журналами подій. Як Ваш найкращий приятель для ходьби, Accupedo буде мотивувати Вас пройти більше! Встановіть Вашу щоденну мету і крокуйте до здоровішого життя з Accupedo. ++++ УВАГА ++++ Ваш смартфон може бути несумісний з додатком Accupedo. Деякі телефони не підтримують роботу G-сенсору в режимі СНУ (РЕЖИМ ОЧІКУВАННЯ, коли екран ВИМКНЕНИЙ). Це не є недоліком додатка. Accupedo – це безкоштовна версія додатку Accupedo-Pro. Інтелектуальна тривимірна технологія розпізнавання руху відстежує лише шаблонні рухи ходьби, фільтруючи і вилучаючи інші випадкові рухи. Accupedo підраховує Ваші кроки, незалежно від того, де знаходиться Ваш телефон - у кишені, на поясному ремені, чи у сумці. Будьте здоровими, встановлюючи щоденну мету і точно контролюючи пройдені кроки з Accupedo. ++++ Особливості ++++● Інтелектуальний алгоритм починає відстеження після 10 послідовних кроків, а потім зупиняється і запускається автоматично, коли Ви йдете.● Режими відображення віджету, що настроюються: кроки, відстань, хвилини і калорії.● Щоденні журнали подій: лічильники кроків, відстані, калорій і час ходьби.● Графіки: щоденні, щотижневі, щомісячні і річні графіки підрахунку кроків .● Опції режиму збереження енергії для ефективного збереження енергії.● Індивідуальні персональні налаштування: чутливість, метрична/англійська одиниці виміру, довжина кроку, маса тіла, щоденна мета, і т.д.● Стислі розміри віджету на домашньому екрані: 1x1, 2x1, 3x1, або 4x1.● Можливість редагування щоденного лічильника кроків.● Функція "Круг" для короткої прогулянки.● Функції управління додатком Продовжити/Пауза/Скинути.● Резервне копіювання бази даних: на SD-карту і Google Диск.● Кольори віджету: чорний, синій, зелений, помаранчевий, рожевий, прозорий.● Діліться щоденними журналами подій на Facebook і MyFitnessPal.● Відправляйте щоденні журнали подій на e-mail.● Опція вибору мови: за замовчуванням (встановлюється така ж, як і мова операційної системи) і англійська. ++++ Встановлення ++++- Для Android версії 4.0 або вище1. Після завантаження, натисніть на іконку додатка. Ви побачите ярлик віджету зверху.2. Виберіть "Віджет", і знайдіть Accupedo.- Для Android версії 2.2 або 2.31. Після завантаження, натисніть пальцем і утримуйте на вільному місці домашнього екрану. (Якщо Ваш домашній екран заповнений додатками, видаліть щонайменше два сусідніх додатки, тому що для встановлення Accupedo потрібно два вільних місця для додатків). Меню “Додати на домашній екран” з'явиться зі списком опцій.2. Виберіть "Віджети" з меню, а потім виберіть віджет "Accupedo”. ++++ Нотатки ++++ ● Додаток підраховує кроки найкращим чином, коли телефон знаходиться на поясному ремені.● Підрахунок кроків може бути неточним, якщо Ви покладете Ваш телефон в штани вільного крою, через випадкові рухи Вашого телефону у кишені.● Чутливість Вашого телефону може відрізнятися від інших. Виберіть рівень чутливості, що найкраще працює з Вашим телефоном.● Допомога і Поширені запитання вбудовані у додаток.

Tomar en consideración que esta aplicación no es compatible con dispositivos con privilegios de administrador (root).Bienvenido a la nueva Banca Móvil BCP. Ahora podrás realizar operaciones de una manera más sencilla y cómoda desde tu dispositivo móvil, con la seguridad que solo el BCP te puede brindar.Con esta nueva aplicación tendrás las siguientes funciones:• Consulta de los saldos y movimientos de tus cuentas y tarjetas de crédito del BCP• Realizar transferencias entre tus cuentas y cuentas de terceros del BCP• Pagar tus tarjetas de crédito y de terceros del BCP• Recargar celulares Movistar• Disponer de efectivo de tus tarjetas de crédito del BCP• Localizar nuestros canales de atención.• Contar con un acceso directo a nuestra aplicación de Beneficios BCP.Además, tenemos la nueva opción “Pago compartido”, la cual te permitirá crear pagos para compartir con tus contactos, tales como una cuenta de almuerzo o un regalo de matrimonio.Recuerda que para usar la aplicación ya no es necesario afiliarte en VíaBCP. Application contains workout schedule to perform in 42 days - no shortcuts - known as Aerobic Weider Six (Aerobic Six of Weider).Daily ab workout contains 6 exercises to perform everyday to get perfect 6pack. Forget about push ups, sit ups, pull ups, squats etc. No need to go to gym. You can do this 6 pack abs workout at home. Text to speech engine is used during 6 pack workout.Advanced high quality voices (like IVONA Text-to-Speech HQ or SVOX) are available on market - download them to use custom language accent.Notice.This application shouldn't be used as personal trainer. Before You start training ask Your fitness instructor how You should perform each exercise.If You have obesity problems You might not notice results of these exercises (flat stomach).This workout was not designed to lose belly fat but to get flat, muscular abs/sixpack. If You want to burn body fat use Caynax HIIT app that provides support for interval workouts like Tabata and Fartlek.Free application version is supported by in-app ads and has some limitations.Give it a try and get perfect abs in just 6 weeks.Multi view/multi window is supported.Permissions:- READ_PHONE_STATE - used to detect incoming phone call and pause workout.- RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - to start reminder service after phone start.- ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, INTERNET - ads.- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - backup/restore settings.- WAKE_LOCK - to ensure that workout works when screen is off.

Cep İmza, işlem güvenliği sunarak VakıfBank İnternet ve Mobil Bankacılık kanallarını daha güvenli ve kolay bir şekilde kullanmanızı sağlayan bir güvenlik uygulamasıdır. İnternet Bankacılığı üzerinden yaptığınız işlemler için Cep İmza detaylı onay ekranlarını kullanır ve güvenli bankacılığın rahatlığını yaşarsınız.Uygulamayı indirdikten sonra aktivasyon adımlarını takip edin ve size özel uygulama şifrenizi oluşturarak kolay bankacılığın keyfini yaşamaya başlayın.Mobil Uygulama ve Cep İmza şimdilik sadece bireysel müşterilerimiz içindir.

Fine Chromatic Tuner is a chromatic instrument tuner that allows you to quickly and accurately tune your instrument using the built-in mic in your Android device. Features nice and clean interface allowing you to quickly find your pitch. The exact frequency of the sound is displayed.The Fine Chromatic Tuner was adjusted and tested with acoustic guitars, soprano ukulele, tenor uke and electric guitars. I believe that it will work with any mid to mid-high range instrument as it was fine adjusted for the 70 Hz - 500 Hz. So this one is not suitable for bass guitars for example. I will make a different app for the low range instruments soon. This is automatic chromatic tuner that supports every screen size. Fine Chromatic Tuner works well with devices supporting 44100 16 bit audio input (almost every phone and tablet in mid - high price range) and 22050 16 bit audio input. Tuner still works with the other possible settings but not so accurate.Features: - Automatic note selection- Ultra responsive -50 to +50 cent range fine tuning display - Precise to ±1/100 semitone (±1 cent) - may be used by stringers- Analog like needle - Exact frequency display.- Clean bright and simple analog like UI- Keep screen on while working.- Works in noisy surroundings Now NO ADS on Marshall London phones! Marshall has made a great and rich sounding phone for musicians. THIS IS VERSION 1.71 (BETA) so if you find any problem please write me an email and I will fix it as soon as possible! As a pitch detector the app is capable of recognizing colored and floral sounds.This is a Fine chromatic tuner free app - for no ads version check the PRO chromatic tuner.

Official Wikipedia App for Android. Wikipedia is the free encyclopedia containing more than 32 million articles in 280 languages, and is the most comprehensive and widely used reference work humans have ever compiled.Features:- Tabbed browsing: pressing-and-holding a link lets you open it in a new tab, allowing you to keep reading the current article without losing your place, and switch to the new tab when you're ready.- Link previews: Tapping on a link shows a preview of the linked article, giving you a chance to get the gist of the link without losing your place in the article you're reading.- Lead images: experience Wikipedia like never before with a prominent, contextually-relevant image and description at the top of articles- Image gallery: tapping on an image shows you the image full-screen in high resolution, with options to swipe left/right for browsing additional images- Descriptions from Wikidata: when searching, each search result now contains a quick description that helps to contextualize the result. These descriptions are also shown in other areas of the app, like Nearby- Article suggestions: scroll to the bottom of an article to see suggestions about what you could read next- Saved pages: save select pages for offline reading and browse them even when you don't have a data connection- Nearby: learn more about what's around you by getting links to articles about things that are near your current location- Language support: seamlessly switch to reading Wikipedia written in any language, either by changing the language of the current article, or changing your preferred search language while searching.- Table of contents: swipe left on any article to bring up the table of contents, which lets you jump to article sections easily- Wikipedia Zero: data charges waived for participating mobile operatorsSend us your feedback about the app! In the menu, press "More", then "About the Wikipedia app", then "Send app feedback".The code is 100% open source. If you have experience with Java and the Android SDK, then we look forward to your contributions! https://github.com/wikimedia/apps-android-wikipediaBy using this app, you agree to the automatic transmission of crash reports to a third-party service provider. If you would like to disable this feature, please press "Settings", then toggle off "Send crash reports" under the General section.Privacy policy: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Privacy_policyTerms of Use: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use

#1 ZIP application and first Android archiver since early 2009!AndroZip File Manager helps you copy, delete, move, unzip/unpack and compress encrypted ZIP files, search, and organize your files, music, pictures, and folders just like you would do on your PC. It's optimized for both phones and tablets.With over 20,000,000 downloads and its support of ZIP, encrypted ZIP, RAR, TAR, GZIP and BZIP2, AndroZip File Manager is a definitive leader among similar applications on the market.Full support for decompression of encrypted ZIP files (Standard, AES-128 and AES 256 bit), compatible with WinRaR and other PC archivers as well as compression of encrypted ZIP files. AndroZip supports Standard ZIP file encryption compatible with WinRaR and other PC archivers (AES 128 and AES 256 bit encryption available in paid version).Besides the archive functionality it also lets you send files, e.g. via email.Optimized specifically for both phone and tablet display. Due to many added features like drag and drop functionality, AndroZip File Manager is preferred among tablet users.Use it also to back up your applications, install new APK’s on your phone, and manage phone memory and resources via task manager.AndroZip can be moved to your SD card to free up internal storage space.What others say about AndroZip:✔ "AndroZip comes to the rescue, providing a file explorer, task manager, archive manager, app backup tool, and more, all within a simple and intuitive interface." (PCWorld, MacWorld and Washington Post had same review)✔ “Of all the file managers I have tried for the Android platform, the one that stands heads above the rest is the free AndroZip File Manager...“(Jack Wallen, TechRepublic)✔ “Just like winzip or winrar” (Eric, AndroZip user)Requested permissions: Device & app history: required for our Task Killer to show the running apps.Photos/Media/Files: required for our app to let you manage these files and to cache images needed for our app’s interface.Wi-Fi connection information: required for displaying ads in the free version of our app.OtherClose other apps: required for our Task Killer functionality.Install shortcuts: required for when you want to use our app to add shortcuts to your phone’s home screen.Run at startup: required for the app to send analytical info back to AVG to help improve our app.Full network access: required for displaying ads and sending analytical info back to AVG to help improve our app.View network connections: required for displaying ads and sending analytical info back to AVG to help improve our app.Prevent device from sleeping: required to ensure tasks like file zipping are completed before your device goes to sleep.AVG AndroZip suggests other apps you might like based on information collected about apps you already have installed on your device.By installing/updating this app, you agree that your use of it is governed by these terms: http://m.avg.com/termsAndroZip features: File Manager with multiple/batch delete, move, copy, create ZIP, Task Killer, Application Manager, APK Installer and short tap and long tap menus.Download for free NOW!

Have you ever travelled with a Tuk Tuk when you went on a holiday? no then this is the opportunity to drive a Tuk Tuk. The rickshaw you will drive will be an old school rickshaw. The KALNIRNAY Group is known all over the world as India’s premier almanac publisher. Since its inception in 1973, the group has emerged as the No. 1 and most authentic almanac publisher, providing up-to-date information about India’s festivals, auspicious days and culture of all religions. According to the Audit Bureau of Circulation (India), it is the World’s Largest Selling Publication with a circulation of 1, 81, 87,168 copies.Kalnirnay is a calmanac for solar as well as veidic lunar events. It shows lunar dates and year along, with regular dates and year. Events are shown in a local language. Currently Kalnirnay is available in Marathi, English, Hindi, Tamil, Kannad and Gujarati languages. Kalnirnay for other languages will be coming soon. For any feedback or suggestions, please write it to kalnirnaydeveloper@gmail.comImportant Features of Kalnirnay are :1) Detail information about lunar events.2) View of Monthly Bhavishya, Panchang and Auspicious days for marriage.3) Facility to set reminders for events of interest.4) Ability to take notes and set reminders for the notes.5) View of monthly events grouped by categories.Application supports following features :1) Panchang2) Horoscope3) Important DatesThis section includes the following sections,a) All Events - This section includes events for all the religions.b) Indian Holidays - This section includes list for Government declared holidays in India.c) Indian Festivals - Includes all the Festivals observed mainly in India.d) Western Holidays - This section includes list of Holidays observed in Western Countries.e) Next Year Events - This section includes list of events of upcoming year.f) Sankashti - This section shows the details of Sankashti in every month.In important dates section we can also set reminder for each event.4) Reminder.This is a list of user reminders set for notes as well as events. There are 3 sections : ‘Past’ section shows reminders for past events.‘Today’ shows reminders due to be shown on current day including any advance warnings.‘Upcoming’ shows reminders set for even dates in future but does not include advance warnings.5) Personal List.This section shows list of personal notes by month. Multiple notes can be added for a day using “Set Reminder” button on this screen. A reminder can be set for a note by clicking ‘Set Reminder’. 6) Settingsa) Reminder Settings - User can set reminders for different events as well as notes. b) Events to Remind - Events to remind screen shows types of events like Purnima, Sankashti, Gurupushya etc. These types represent group of similar events which repeat throughout the year. The KALNIRNAY Group dikenal di seluruh dunia sebagai almanak utama penerbit India. Sejak tahun 1973, kelompok ini telah muncul sebagai No 1 dan paling otentik almanak penerbit, memberikan informasi up-to-date tentang festival India, hari keberuntungan dan budaya semua agama. Menurut Biro Audit Sirkulasi (India), itu adalah Terbesar di Dunia Jual Publikasi dengan sirkulasi 1, 81, 87168 eksemplar.Kalnirnay adalah calmanac untuk solar serta peristiwa bulan veidic. Ini menunjukkan tanggal bulan dan tahun bersama, dengan tanggal biasa dan tahun. Acara akan ditampilkan dalam bahasa lokal.Saat Kalnirnay tersedia dalam Marathi, Inggris, Hindi, Tamil, Kannad dan Gujarati bahasa. Kalnirnay untuk bahasa lain akan segera hadir.Untuk umpan balik atau saran, silakan menulis ke kalnirnaydeveloper@gmail.comFitur penting dari Kalnirnay adalah:1) Informasi detail tentang peristiwa bulan.2) Lihat Bulanan Bhavishya, Panchang dan hari Menguntungkan untuk menikah.3) Fasilitas untuk mengatur pengingat untuk acara yang menarik.4) Kemampuan untuk membuat catatan dan mengatur pengingat untuk catatan.5) Lihat peristiwa bulanan dikelompokkan berdasarkan kategori.Aplikasi mendukung fitur berikut:1) Panchang2) Horoskop3) Tanggal PentingBagian ini termasuk bagian berikut,a) Semua Acara - Bagian ini termasuk acara untuk semua agama.b) Liburan India - Bagian ini termasuk daftar untuk Pemerintah menyatakan liburan di India.c) Festival India - Termasuk semua Festival diamati terutama di India.d) Liburan Barat - Bagian ini mencakup daftar Holidays diamati di Negara Barat.e) Tahun Depan Acara - Bagian ini termasuk daftar acara tahun mendatang.f) Sankashti - Bagian ini menunjukkan rincian Sankashti di setiap month.In tanggal penting bagian kita juga dapat mengatur pengingat untuk setiap acara.4) Reminder. Ini adalah daftar pengingat pengguna ditetapkan untuk catatan serta peristiwa. Ada 3 bagian:Bagian 'Past' menunjukkan pengingat untuk peristiwa masa lalu.'Hari ini' menunjukkan pengingat karena akan ditampilkan pada hari ini termasuk peringatan terlebih dahulu.'Upcoming' menunjukkan pengingat yang diatur bahkan tanggal di masa depan tetapi tidak termasuk peringatan terlebih dahulu.5) Daftar Pribadi. Bagian ini menunjukkan daftar catatan pribadi dengan bulan. Beberapa catatan dapat ditambahkan untuk hari menggunakan "Set Reminder" tombol pada layar ini. Pengingat dapat diatur untuk catatan dengan mengklik 'Set Reminder'.6) Pengaturana) Pengaturan Reminder - Pengguna dapat mengatur pengingat untuk berbagai acara serta catatan.b) Acara ke Ingatkan - Acara mengingatkan layar menunjukkan jenis acara seperti Purnima, Sankashti, Gurupushya dll jenis ini mewakili kelompok peristiwa serupa yang mengulang sepanjang tahun.

By playing this game you will not only have fun, but you will also improve your skills and abilities. Playing Skillz Game will:- Improve your memory- Train your sense of reflex- Increase your accuracy- Prove your ability of touch- Increase your speed- Learn color coordination- And much more!Each level pushes your skills and abilities to their peak. After successfully completing a level, your results are ranked between 1 and 5 Stars and you will be rewarded with a number of Brains. For every Star earned you will be rewarded with one Brain. Brains can be used to do any of the following 3 options:1. Retry from the current round2. Pass a round3. Pass a level with 5 StarsThis challenging logical game helps you improving your abilities while having fun. Sharpen your mind, playing this addictive game.For example, the levels 3 and 6 help you to improve your memory, while levels 14 and 15 help you to improve your color coordination and accuracy. Every level is designed to help you improve your skills, memory to sharpen your mind with this addictive game.This is a logical game designed for all the people who want to enjoy an addictive mind game which tests their skills.We are working on creating new levels in the Skills Game. Please send us your feedback and ideas for new levels that you would find challenging! Mempertajam pikiran Anda, bermain game adiktif.Misalnya, tingkat 3 dan 6 membantu Anda untuk meningkatkan memori Anda, sementara tingkat 14 dan 15 membantu Anda untuk meningkatkan koordinasi warna dan akurasi. Setiap tingkat dirancang untuk membantu Anda meningkatkan keterampilan Anda, memori untuk mempertajam pikiran Anda dengan permainan adiktif ini.Ini adalah permainan logis dirancang untuk semua orang yang ingin menikmati permainan pikiran adiktif yang menguji keterampilan mereka.Kami sedang bekerja pada menciptakan tingkat baru dalam Keterampilan permainan. Kirimkan masukan dan ide-ide untuk tingkat baru yang akan Anda temukan menantang!

Mit der neuen Foto-Paradies Foto2Go Mobile App powered by Kodak für Android Smartphones/Tablets können Sie Bildaufträge und Fotobücher überall gestalten, online in Ihren dm-Markt übermitteln, vor Ort am Kodak-Sofort-Drucker ausdrucken und sofort mitnehmen. Einfach und schnell, ohne lange Wartezeiten. Für die Übermittlung eines Auftrags benötigen Sie eine Anbindung an das Internet und eine E-Mail-Adresse. Nach dem Abschluss einer Bestellung erhalten Sie eine Auftragsnummer per E-Mail zugesandt und eine weitere E-Mail sobald der Auftrag erfolgreich in den dm-Markt übertragen wurde. Mit der Auftragsnummer starten Sie dann am Kodak-Sofort-Drucker vor Ort den Ausdruck.Zusätzlich können Sie aber auch in Ihrem dm-Markt mit Hilfe der App Bilder von Ihrem mobilen Gerät auf den Kodak-Sofort-Drucker übertragen und die dort angebotenen Foto-Produkte vor Ort gestalten.
